title: Rubbish
comment: We booked our table for around 9pm, upon arrival we were escorted to a very poor closed off table, the atmosphere was somewhat busy but began to calm down. We asked if we can go into the shisha garden and was told it was first come first serve which I think should definitely be changed into a booking thing as it’s not fair for those that have literally come to do shisha. We were promised by multiple staff that they will get us into shisha and an hour later - still nothing. We ordered our drinks which were a simple soft drink and had to wait a good half an hour for them, the staff were quite busy but not as attentive as I hoped. The music was poor. Social distancing did not exist. It’s a shame because in the past I’ve heard good things about this place but by the looks of the latest reviews, it’s gone seriously downhill.

title: Authentic Indian Food
comment: Excellent food and quality. Everything we have ordered has been delicious.  Always on time and food is hot. Staff are very friendly and helpful

title: so glad I found this place
comment: just moved to the area and have been giving local restaurants a try out for our Friday curry night takeaway. Now we have found citi kitchen we don't need to look any further. The portions are crazy enormous, so be careful not to over order. There are dishes on here that I've never seen anywhere else, such as the truck drivers curry, which was amazing, highly recommended. The meat is great quality, they use lovely Kentish lamb. Super delicious chats and bread, and fantastic service.

title: Another wonderful delivery from LDV
comment: Our delivery meals from here have been a family favourite in both lockdowns. The latest was sensational, especially the prawn garlic starter, the Ragu pasta and the tiramisu. One tiny comment - it would be good to have an option (for extra payment perhaps) to get the food in recycling friendly paper / cardboard, which some places now offer.

title: Amazing
comment: Another amazing take away from LDV, thank you very much for your good food see you the 12th december

title: Best in its class
comment: Love the fact that this eatery is clean, the food is very well prepared and the staff are friendly. Yes, it’s more expensive than other similar restaurants but the value shows through.  Highly recommended.

title: Best Cafe in Beckenham by far
comment: Hands down the best place to get food in Beckenham. The staff are unbelievable, I don't know what I enjoyed more, the food or the lovely service. 10/10 everytime. You got to try the pineapples smoothie

title: Delightful food
comment: I visited with 2 work colleagues in January 2020. The food was excellent - we had a range of starters to share and then just a main course of chicken. Garlic prawns starter was particularly lovely. Few drinks plus service charge and it was just above £50 a head.

title: Amazing!
comment: We went here for our staff party and were greeted by all smiling faces. Very impressed by the food quality and the service.  Thanks a lot!

title: This place is a hidden gem.
comment: This place is a hidden gem. I’m a British Gujarati that’s tried most of the authentic Indian restaurants in East London and Northwest London and can honestly say that this is up there with the best. The food is authentically Indian and spiced so perfectly.

title: Awesome Thai
comment: Visited the Awesome Thai last night with friends. Fantastic place  Fantastic food and great staff. Very reasonable prices for food and wine. Can’t wait to return very soon. Mike

title: A lovely 18th anniversary dinner
comment: We love this restaurant. The staff are consistently kind and welcoming and the food is the most authentic outside of Thailand. I cannot recommend this restaurant highly enough especially to mark a special occasion or simply if you want to enjoy delicious food in a lovely restaurant but book early, I’m not the only one that knows about this special place.

title: Great Food
comment: Returned here today and enjoyed a fantastic veggie breakfast, granola pot and coffee. As always, service was very polite, prompt, food served quickly, hot and very tasty. Would highly recommend this lovely venue for anyone who is looking for a well run, friendly eatery with a calm atmosphere and well priced, varied menu.

title: Always fantastic experience
comment: Our favourite hidden gem in Chiswick. The restaurant has a beautiful vibe, a really warm atmosphere, the staff is knowledgeable (thank you, Julija, for always recommending a spot-on wine), the team is relatable and very attentive. All this adds to a special experience and enjoying the most amazing steak you can wish for. We had their signature sampler board on two occasions and it allows you to explore different cuts. My boyfriend whose birthday we were celebrating last night praised his Churrasco de Lomo as the best steak he has ever had. He woke up this morning already planning when do we go again. My order of a fillet/tenderloin was delicious too. Highly recommend their sauces, all are booming with flavour. Excessive choice of fabulous freshly made desserts, impressive wine list, lovely waiters. The kitchen is consistently exceeding our highest expectations and we look forward to visiting soon. Many thanks to others who looked after us, we had a great time. Sarka & Adam

title: So it’s not very often that
comment: So it’s not very often that I grab the receipt on the way out to make sure I remember the name of the place for a good reason... but I did for this restaurant. We were staying at the hotel above, so we tried to get a table. It was a Friday night in December and it was busy with festive gatherings, but they found us a table. The service was great, really attentive and highly quality. The food was equally as good. I would even recommend this place for a special occasion. It seemed lots of things were being celebrated with balloons and private gatherings all over the place. I found this was quite a high end place, without the steep high end prices. I liked the bubble tea. Anyway- this is a decent place to eat if around the Heathrow area. People seemed to be wearing nicer clothes in the evening and although jeans would be perfectly acceptable, you may be more comfortable in trousers.

title: Best tawa in London
comment: We visited here after seeing the reviews. We wanted authentic food and that’s what we got! The flavours were amazing and the staff so friendly! Will definitely be going back when we are next in London!

title: A meal that makes a meal a celebration!
comment: Had a great meal as always from Orpington Citi Kitchen. The perfect food that changes all ordinary meals into a celebration!

title: Wonderful authentic Italian
comment: We booked to eat at this restaurant last night as we were taking our daughter to university in Twickenham so were having a last family meal for a while. We booked here based on trip advisor reviews. We were not disappointed! The food was wonderful. My daughter and I are vegetarian and the options were delicious. Couldn’t fault the food at all. What really made the experience memorable was the fantastic service by Luca. Such a funny warm attentive man. He made us laugh so much. Such friendly service. I know that when we come to visit our daughter we will come here again and I’m sure it’ll become our regular place to eat. Wonderful. Ruth, Gavin and Charlotte x

title: Calm chill good vibes with incredible food, amazing people, great service!
comment: Very engaging friendly staff been back over 5 times. The food is so authentic and delicious. Staff always remember us. The owner is also so kind and eager to check everything is good. Would recommend traditional chicken red Thai curry or chicken red green bean curry. Spring rolls are delicious as are the prawn wonton’s. Also, they always have complementary prawn crackers and sometimes sesame prawn toast. For dessert the banana fritters with ice cream is delicious.

title: Fab food.
comment: We went for breakfast , it was absolutely delicious and the service was excellent without being overbearing. The restaurant was clean and it was nice to be sitting somewhere that wasn't covered in fake flowers. Will definitely be returning.

title: Excellent and naturally happy service.
comment: This restaurant has all you need to have a nice evening: great staff, high quality food and very comfy atmosphere. We loved our interaction with the waiters. Thanks for being so on point and managing unforeseen situations smoothly. Der a lace to come back to enjoy a proper meat lifestyle.

title: pre-rugby
comment: excellent service, delicious food, and fair pricing. the steak platter was especially good and good value

title: Fantastic!
comment: We went to meet our two adult sons to celebrate my husband's 60th birthday. It was a truly special evening. We were greeted by very friendly staff and when we had to wait a few minutes for our sons to arrive , we were given a celebratory birthday drink. This was just the start of the exceptional service. That, together with the most delicious steak I have ever tasted will ensure a return visit. Thank you.

title: Good but overpriced
comment: We had a decent meal but paid handsomely for it. I would not say that the quality of the food was anything much above average. The restaurant is also on the small size and was very noisy. We came close to shouting to make ourselves heard. One thing that is in its favour is the service which was very good!

title: Amazing Italian foods
comment: It was the first time We’ve visited here for my birthday dinner. Firstly we ordered Arancini di Carne and Mozzarella di bufala e Caponata as a starter. We absolutely loved it. Mozzarella bufala was the best. Super delicious. My husband ordered Fettuccine Funghi (truffle was perfect) and I ordered Dolce vita pizza. Everything was perfect. We loved each dishes. It is the best Italian restaurant in the town. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The food excellent. Definitely we’ll visit it again soon.

title: Excellent food
comment: Had a great evening here at spice station with the hubby. Great food and lovely staff. Highly recommend

title: Fab breakast, great value for money and lovely staff!
comment: A real gem in Beckenham for breakfast. Lots of options for everyone, including vegetarians. We all had different breakfasts around the table, but it was a really good portion and great value for money. They also do fabulous milkshakes! The staff were so friendly and really accommodating to try and get us in and sat at a table as it was so busy, so I would advise booking if you can!. Would highly recommend!

title: The best cafe in Beckenham No.1
comment: I eat my breakfast here every morning because it’s the best cafe in town. I love the fresh orange juice too.

title: Fantastic breakfast
comment: Best breakfast in Beckenham! Best cafe run by lovely people. Great atmosphere. I could spend all day here.

title: Fantastic cafe, delicious food, dog friendly!
comment: We absolutely love this place and we visit every couple of weeks for brunch.  They are always friendly and welcoming, the food is always delicious and they welcome dogs (and always give them a treat and water which is so kind).  The location is really convenient following walks in the nearby park.

title: Fabulous lunch
comment: Briliant. Everything was perfect. Great quality meat, all course absolutely great. Good drink and wine list too.

title: Excelente servicio
comment: The food was delicious, we can try everything. Also, Caetano was amazing and have a really good service.

title: Hidden Gem
comment: We stayed at the Skyline Sheraton at London Heathrow airport the night before our return flight home. The hotel was nice but holy cow! The Madhu's Restaurant was out of this world. I think it is the best Indian food I've ever eaten! The restaurant itself is very attractive and calming. The service was outstanding, for which I must commend M. Selinton (I hope I got that right). The portions are ample so sharing might be in order. My husband ordered Palak Patta which made a wonderful starter. One of my favorite dishes in the world is bharta and their Baigan ka Bharta was the best. My husband and I both ordered the whole seabass (Madhu Macchi) which they kindly deboned for us. The flavors were enchanting. If you are ever passing through the Heathrow area, I encourage you to treat yourself to dinner at Madhu's.

title: Great Takeaway
comment: Fabulous takeaway! Arrived when said and was hot and tasty! Definitely recommend them. A really enjoyable meal from comfort of own own during a difficult period with COVID-19!

title: Delicious!!!
comment: Delicious food and good vibe Went for my bday and they brought me cake :)  Great starters and the best pad Thai

title: 1st Year Anniversary
comment: The food was delicious and service was amazing.  One of my favourite restaurants in London. What a beautiful place to visit!

title: Best dog friendly cafe in Beckenham
comment: Such welcoming and friendly staff, followed by an amazing breakfast and coffee. Will be returning. Recommend the Avo and poached eggs. Me and caesar loved it x

title: My New Favourite Spot
comment: New into the area and popped in for some brunch. Very very friendly staff and the food it’s so fresh and soooo delicious with beautiful presentation... will definitely be back and bring friends along Next time!!

title: Fantastic find 👌
comment: I came here for a full English Breakfast with my sister while she was visiting. The ambience is super cosy and comfortable very welcoming atmosphere and wonderful service We had the traditional Full English and Veggie Breakfast, along with a Green Riviver and Chi Latte both were delicious.  The food came quickly and our eggs were cooked perfectly and the sourdough bread was absolutely yummy.  I will be back

title: Larry
comment: I thought I had had great tasting Indian food in the past, but Madhus at the Sheraton Skyline took the taste to a new level. Thank you Preet for your service and wonderful desert recommendations

title: 40th birthday celebration
comment: Madhu’s was exceptional in catering for our 25+ guests and very happy to accommodate our requests by changing the menu to our likes. All our guests were given best seats in the Resturant where we all can enjoy without disturbing any other guests as the Resturant was at full capacity. All our guests loved the ambience along with the food as it was exceptional. We had many guests who visited Madhu’s for the first time and now I’m assured they will be patrons for long time. Thank you Madhu’s for great evening. Keep it up.

title: Perfect breakfast
comment: Superb food, great coffee and the friendliest staff you could ask for. Highly recommended. Keep up the great work

title: Diane Haynes
comment: The dinner and dessert was Fabulous!!!! Thank you Preet for the recommendation!!! We loved the whole experience.

title: Meal - 23/09/20
comment: Delicious food and great service, really good night out. Had a great chicken bhuna, and keema nan, along with a salad

title: Awesome as it is
comment: We choose Awesome Thai to celebrate my graduation and they made an extra effort to make the evening even more incredible. Best in service! Best in food! Thank you Awesome Thai

title: Lovely Thai food and great service
comment: We visited the restaurant for the first time last weekend and had a delicious meal. My partner and I enjoyed the mixed starters and the main course. We tried the coconut rice and would highly recommend it. The service was great as staff were very friendly. We would recommend booking a table if visiting Friday evening or Saturday evening.

title: Great restaurant, wonderful food and friendly service
comment: We’ve been coming here ever since moving to the area 5 years ago, and we always enjoyed the great food, friendly service and pleasant atmosphere. We are so happy to have this restaurant near us.

title: Turmeric coffee
comment: Throw in great coffee, fabulous cakes and friendly service and you get a super and irresistible blend. Visited and vowed in be back and when I did it was just as fab. Great for coffee, cakes and having a wonderful time with friends or loves ones

title: Best Food and Coffee in Beckenham
comment: This is the best cafe in Beckenham with amazing fresh food and exceptional coffee. 5 stars every time.

title: Amazing Kate
comment: Finally a caffe that’s dog friendly! Lovely service especially from Kate that’s always smiling. Great food and coffee. Ticks all the boxes and are regular visitors now so much so they already know our order and always have tasty treats for the dog!

title: 'Top of the Tree!'
comment: Without doubt the best coffee and service in Beckenham. Food is outstanding. The two Sam's and Kate are great hosts!

title: Burger was Amazing
comment: super nice and friendly family run business. The burger was amazing, the best I've eaten for a while. everything was homemade and the price was very reasonable.  my new goto spot when I visit Beckenham!

title: Mr
comment: Excellent place. Freshly made food and friendly staff. I will go back again and do recommend it to anyone.

title: excellent food and service by punam
comment: amazing starters exccelent food and service. A special thank you to punam who made our experiance that extra bit speacial very attentive and made us feel very welcomed

title: great food but watch out for the extras
comment: This place is not cheap but provides really good quality food. Lots of Indian families were eating there which we saw as a good sign. Our waiter Caetano was attentive and discreet. Check your bill though as they add a "discretionary service charge" of 12.5% and then there is a box to add a tip. If you are not careful you end up paying an extra 22.5% on top of the food and what is worse is the waiters do not receive any of the "service charge". I told them to remove the service charge and put it on the tip so the people who do the real work get a share of it.

title: Classy Indian Restaurant
comment: Had our family dinner at Madhu’s for 25 people. Ambience is classy and elegant. Food was very tasty, full of flavour, authentic and not too spicy. Preet looked after tables. Thank you so much for your hospitality and great service.

title: Awesome it is!!
comment: We had visited this restaurant for the second time and we were once again blown again. Fresh and flavourful dishes, very authentic. The wine list includes various interesting choices too. The atmosphere is charming and the staff is very attentive and friendly. I highly recommend this restaurant and looking forward to be back!! The place is busy, so make sure to book in advance.

title: Great food
comment: The guys always make amazing fresh food. Very welcoming. My favourite is spinach and eggs. Cajun chips also brilliant

title: 10/10 Best Caffe
comment: I often come here for lunch as it is my favourite place to eat by far, the staff are amazing and friendly and the food is AMAZING! Would 100% recommend!!

title: Amazing place
comment: Best coffee shop in Beckenham, amazing service and food  The owner and the chef are very pleasant and nice  Staff are all lovely and make you feel at home and the food is absolutely amazing Awesome place and I highly recommend it

title: Fantastic Restaurant
comment: Had an overnighter pre flying out and some family who live in London come out for dinner. Wasn’t expecting anything great and this was FANTASTIC - my sister who has lived in London for 30 years said it was the best Indian meal she has had. Our waiter Clyde was wonderful and helped make the evening Worth staying at the Sheraton just for the restaurant

title: Amazing Service even though they were supposed to close an hour earlier
comment: Great food, great service (especially our waiter Caetano) and amazing ambience. Have stayed in the Sheraton Skyline Heathrow several times now on our way to different places and have always enjoyed our stay here. Will definitely be coming back to both the hotel and Madhu’s. Thank you thank you. Adam

title: A personal touch !
comment: I am delighted to write that we took our mother for her 58th marriage anniversary to Madhus Sheraton Heathrow UK to celebrate over dinner. We had an amazing experience both with the food which was excellent and most important factor "the personal touch " Claudia and his colleague caetano gave mum.....She felt so comfortable .. Mum enjoyed she was happy ..so we were happy!! Thanks to the two guys ..they did their restaurant proud .. Many more will be delighted I am sure with her food and service. Thanks Dita

title: Fantastic Indian dinner
comment: Stopped at the Sheraton Heathrow and had dinner at the Indian restaurant there - was an unexpected surprise! We were expecting hotel food but instead were treated to a delicious gourmet Indian feast! We ordered the fixed menu where you get to to taste all the popular dishes and it was all amazing! Highly recommend this place!

title: HIDDEN GEM IN SHERATON HEATHROW!!!
comment: Driver from airport to Marriott (next door) told us it was great. We were skeptical at first due to an Indian resturant inside of a hotel, boy were we wrong.  The best Indian resturant I've ever had anywhere.  Peter Costa our waiter was great, very pleasant man with great recommendations.  My fav was the prawn curry, I dipped some roti on it and it was delicious.

title: Terrible service, incredibly slow
comment: First visit to Awesome thai and the service was very poor, the food was just fine. The atmosphere there was very packed, my girlfriend and i felt like we were in a cage. I wouldnt go back here again Terrible!!!

title: A Splendid Surprise!
comment: Madhu’s turned out to be quite other than an overpriced in-house restaurant for customers ‘trapped’ in a four star airport hotel. The ambiance is smart but relaxed and staff are particularly friendly and efficient.  The menu is good and varied but familiar items have a quite superior appearance and quality to most high street Indian restaurants.....try the popadoms as a simple example. Portions are substantial and the flavours superb.  Madhu’s transformed the night before our holiday flight ....from being the night before our holiday.....into the beginning of the holiday itself. Warmly recommended and not over-priced.

title: Beautiful Food, Parking & Hotel Staff Could Improve
comment: I sent my boss with some important clinets here on Monday evening for dinner as we had heard the food was delicious. Arriving at 5:30pm for a 6:00pm reservation they were told by staff outside that the car park for the hotel (and inturn the restaurant) was full, and they would need to park in another car park. My senior team found this reception unprofessional- and surpising at this time; why would the restaurant not cater for parking aswell as the hotel guests? The gentlemen outside did not want to offer any additional assistance, nor did his attitude improve. Nether the less- My boss had waited until someone had left the hotel- to secure a space; again without any help from the hotel itself. The food in the restaurant was worth the trip- however again, this was only being Monday - the bill being asked for- and arriving at the table for payment took 45 minutes. Safe to say the food was increadible, but i will not be sending any of my team here in the future.

title: Absolutely Amazing
comment: From start to finish the service was impeccable. Madhus is definitely high end, so with their prices you would expect brilliant service and that is exactly what we got and more. The staff are very friendly and very helpful. One staff member accidentally dropped some glasses and the manager (im assuming) came over to all the tables near the incident to make sure everyone was okay and not hurt, that no glass had fell onto our tables, into our plates or into our drinking glasses. He also offered to change our glasses and plates just incase which was a very nice gesture. The ambience and atmosphere is beautiful. We had a wonderful time. And the food was absolutely divine. We ordered butter chicken, rice and roti, it was to die for! Highly recommend.

title: Great place
comment: I have been here a few times now, on my own and also with my sons, it's clean, friendly and welcoming, the varied menu all seems of very high quality and served pleasantly... The coffee is fantastic.... Complete recommendation.

title: Faultless!
comment: Myself and my family stopped off at this lovely cafe for breakfast. From the minute we walked in to the minute we left we were made to feel so welcome. The staff clearly have a great relationship with their regulars, addressing many of their customers by name. The food we had was superb and the portions very generous, I cannot recommend this cafe enough and just wish we lived nearer so could visit more often!

title: Friendly and Tasty
comment: Wonderful ambience, good fresh food , friendly staff . Would recommend a visit for breakfast or lunch . Certainly the best caffe in Beckenham and surrounding areas .

title: Kimmy
comment: Such a warming happy cafe. Visited every day for 2 weeks during business. Kate and Sam are lovely and so welcoming. Also the food is DELICIOUS

title: Best coffee and food in Beckenham
comment: If you are looking for great coffee and food highly recommend this cafe. They are open very early 7 days a week bringing you fresh delicious food and the most amazing coffee. Thank you for being the best!!

title: Fantastic
comment: Delicious food. Lovely service from the hostess and our server Caetano. Pleasant ambience. Will stay here purely for this restaurant.

title: Lovely meal and drinks
comment: Came with my wife for dinner. The food was really amazing. Thank you for the great service too, especially Caetano. We loved it overall and will see you again soon.

title: Love this place!
comment: I cannot say enough good things about this place. It is a brilliant indian/pakistani high end (as far as high end in this market goes) in the sheraton skyline. The Nymah Choma (lamb ribs) are absolutely the best BBQ ribs I have ever had! The rest of the food is also really good, but the ‘from the robata grill’ menu is the best they have! You have to go check this place out!

title: Good food, poor staff
comment: We visited on June 15 and the hostess said there was no space available despite multiple tables being available. They also turned away another family due to reservations. Does the owner know they are turning away multiple families even though there are many open tables? It didn’t seem like those reservations never showed up and my husband really wanted to eat there so we asked again if we could be seated- and we were. The food is ok/good.   At the end of the meal, the check has a 1 pound donation to the British Asian society automatically added. I asked what the donation was about and the lady says “I don’t know, I have nothing to do with this. It is manadatory.” I again asked “I don’t understand, what does the society do?” She is unable to answer. I looked confused so she says “would you like me to give your pound back?” I said “yes please.”  As I am walking out with my family, I can hear her commenting about us to her colleague. She couldn’t believe that I took the pound back. I felt really insulted that she was talking about us on our way out Listen lady....I can afford the pound and I am happy to donate. However, if you are going to make a “mandatory donation” and automatically put it on the check, I would like to know what exactly I am donating to. If she could expalain what the organization actually does, I would have left the pound.  I don’t think I will return back due to the very front rude hostess that was working on June 15th.

title: Best place for Asian food in west London
comment: Hi guys, This place is one of the best place in London for Asian food.I have been going their since 10 years with my family real authentic Asian food. On tops look out for a waiter called Caetano he will give you the best service ever don’t be shy just ask the manager who Caetano is. You can take your parents, friends or any kind of people it will accommodate your needs or call them to book a private room.

title: Amazing breakfast with amazing service!
comment: If I could give more points I will! The service was amazing! So polite and helpful - that's what you need for the day start. Coffee and breakfast was just lovely. Definitely recommend!

title: Super breakfast
comment: Loved the sweet pancakes.......with bananas and strawberries....delicious! Washed down with tea! Perfect. The guys are so friendly too.....definitely want to return

title: Excellent Visit to Madhus
comment: We dined at Madhu’s Heathrow on lamb with spinach, rice and peas, grilled broccoli and cauliflower which was excellent. We look forward to our next visit to Madhus. We thank Preet, our waitress. Her service was also excellent. Joy was a joy, a perfect hostess!!

title: Enjoyable experience
comment: Went to have food at Madhus and really enjoyed great indian food. Were also enjoying diner service provided by Punam thanks

title: Good Indian food
comment: An enjoyable and delicious meal here. Well served and presented. I would eat here again and bring friends.

title: Listen to Karnon
comment: Group of us went. About half very experienced in the Indian food, half having never eaten it before. Those in the know ordered poppadoms straight off the bat - because this is what you do. This is where Karnon stepped in. I think she realized that those of us “in the know” did not really know what we were doing. She basically ordered our entire meal and all of us could not have been happier - personally I’ve been eating Indian food for decades and, but for one thing, everything I ate was new to me. Outstanding service from a professional.

title: You will not be disappointed
comment: Punjabi food with a Kenyan twist. The food is really something else. Gorgeous location, amazing food and incredible staff. We will be back. Thank you.

title: Love this place!
comment: The Sheraton skyline is our hotel of choice when flying from Heathrow and one of the reasons we return is so we can dine at Madhus.  The food and service is top notch. A lot of locals eat here so that is a recommendation in itself. We ordered the Thali so we could sample many dishes and we were not disappointed. Our waitress Punam looked after us despite the restaurant being very busy.  Looking forward to returning here very soon.

title: Overall, Overpriced & Overestimated.
comment: I have heard the place is extremely classy and posh with top class food. Booked a table for 10 in advance for dinner. They gave us a 5able right by the bar at the end of the restaurant with 2 uneven joined up tables. The outside temperature was 19 but the temperature at our table was not less than 26 even though according to the staff, the restaurant was centrally aircon. We were literally sweating. Food was half cooked fresh, and a half from the ready-made tins. Extremely overpriced. simple Naan bread is £3.50 and 2 small lamb chops were £13. I will never pay at Madhu's again if someone invites me here, i will make sure i have something at home before i eat at Madhu's because of the food taste and quality. It's so ordinary. 2 * FOR THE STAFF. PLEASE DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY HERE ITS JUST NOT WORTH IT.

title: Excellent Indian restaurant
comment: Walked over from the Novotel, since their food is not great. Was not disappointed. The food was excellent, and prices were reasonable-ish given the location (airport hotel - captive audience). Service was OK, although it took a fair while to get a drink order in, but the food more than made up for that.

title: Convenient if staying at the Sheraton, but nothing special
comment: We enjoyed our meal at this restaurant but we did not find it anything special. The restaurant was noisy and packed. We did not have the greatest table.  The food was fine but, in our opinion, no better than meals that we have had in many other Indian Restaurants. We found the meal expensive and did not consider it good value for money. We thought that the service was pretty poor with staff struggling to keep up with their workload. But we were tired (having been travelling) and, as we were staying at the hotel, found it a convenient place to eat. In hindsight, we should have probably opted for the sports bar which is also in the hotel.

title: Ordinary Stuff
comment: This was a unique experience. While the food was ok , not stellar - the service was way below standards we expect from a ‘fine dining place’. Moreover the restaurant was very noisy. You could hear the other person talk on a 4 person table. Service was very slow and server was disinterested.

title: Beautiful Breakfast
comment: This cafe serves such beautifully presented, gently cooked food. Even with a traditional set breakfast menu they allow you to go “off piste” and create your own. Friendly smiles all around and they even bring water for your dog when dining outside. Lovely all around, and highly recommended when in Beckenham!

title: Great food and friendly staff!
comment: Visited today for coffee and cake with my colleague. The atmosphere is great and the staff are so friendly and attentive. Sam takes the time to ensure that all of his customers are having the best experience. Would highly recommend this cafe (and the cake!) to everyone. We also tried a new organic product, Honest Lemonade, which was delicious!

title: Great place for coffee and a lovely breakfast....
comment: Amazing food and a very nice place to sit in... The staff are really friendly as well !! Highly recommended

title: Best of the Rest
comment: Small, intimate, homely and friendly. Mix this ambience with excellent food and prompt and friendly service and you have a recipe for a memorable visit, worthy of several repeats.

title: The best of the best
comment: Having visited several cafes in London, I am eager to say that this is by far the best cafe I've gone to and the food served there is on another level to your typical cafe in London. The customer service is exceptional and the staff will always serve your food with a smile.  One thing I would definitely recommend are the brownies served here, they're really delicious!!

title: Best burger in beckenham
comment: Nice little cafe with good homemade food - including what I think is the best hamburger in beckenham. Lovely and good value too.

title: "Hands Down Best cafe in Beckenham"
comment: The fresheness, the choice of food and the friendly staff make this the 'go to' place to have breakfast, lunch, or a good catchup with friends. You won't be dissapointed.

title: Always a pleasure to come here
comment: This Beckenham-based cafe is a real find. I often come here in the morning for one of their delicious coffees, but more recently have chosen it as a place for lunch with family and friends. The food is excellent, a really good variety. Generous servings at fair prices. In addition, the staff (Sam, Sam and others) are generous, welcoming people. They are a hard working team. I always enjoy visiting and have no hesitation in welcoming this excellent place. And don't forget what I said at the start - the coffee is delicious!

title: Valentine’s Day CHK 40917
comment: Punam was VERY NICE AND HELPFUL. She served us the whole night she was so lovely speaking to me. She did amazing service she should get all tips :)  Thank you to DORI for giving us the bill and being nice.

title: Great experience
comment: Fantastic welcome by the staffs, made us comfortable and offered us an array of choices.  Myself and a friend enjoyed a superb vegetarian breakfast, freshly prepared by a friendly staff. This without doubt should be anyone first stop in the morning, afternoon or indeed in the evening.  Whether you are a first time visitor or regular, there is everything for all. Love Rendez Vous restaurant.

title: Amazing food!
comment: I went with my family for a chilled lunch. The service was outstanding, everyone was so friendly and was not kept waiting once. I particularly enjoyed the lasagna, one of the best I’ve ever heard. I would most certainly recommend this place to anyone. They’ve got something for everyone.

title: Great discovery
comment: Best food in the area tbh , i recommend anyone that visits the neighborhood to try there spicy cajun chicken panini is the best and there cappuccino if you wanna taste real coffee .

title: Yummy Breakfast
comment: Came this morning for breakfast with my two kids! Guy couldn’t have been more helpful and we had clean plates all round! The coffee was good!    Very welcoming and interacting with the kids which is a big thing for me. Nothing was too much trouble.  A real diamond place!

title: Best breakfast in Beckenham!
comment: Came here last month and again this morning. Last time we both had a more traditional breakfast and today we had something different. Both occasions the food was amazing. We will keep on returning!!

title: Don't be afraid of Indian Food!
comment: Great experience. Restaurant is located in the Sheraton Hotel and is worth a visit. If you have never had Indian food, there is nothing to worry about! The chicken I had was as you would make it at home with specific spices added on that made it spicy but not an unbearable spice level that I think Indian food gets a bad reputation for. Everything was very tasty and it was great to try something new. Staff was friendly and mains came very quickly.

title: Great food
comment: Went for lunch Tuesday and was excellent as always. A very large selection of sandwich types and fillings. Very friendly staff and quick service.

title: Nice Lunch
comment: Returned here again and this time opted for the halloumi wrap and a hot drink, both of which were as always served hot and tasty. Despite being busy, service was prompt and polite with food arriving quickly. Nice relaxed atmosphere and another thoroughly enjoyable visit to this lovely cafe. Will be returning again soon.

title: Well worth treating yourself
comment: If you want great sometimes you just have to pay for it. Its fairly expensive but well worth the money. Went here yesterdsy with mixed thoughts after reading the reviews. All I can say is fantastic food and perfect service. The waiting staff were fantastic, warming, friendly and spot on with their timing. Food was delicious, served up super quick. Lovely plush interior and surroundings with nice bars for after dinner drinks. Would highly recommend and definitely go again soon I hope.

title: E.P.I.C
comment: Awesome experience, Food is amazing and customer service is exceptional.  First choice any time i want to go for a curry with the family or for a business meeting.

title: Birthday Brunch
comment: Absolutely wonderfull customer service at rendez-vous on my Birthday! The staff were polite and efficient, and the food was wonderfully flavorful thanks to the chef Sam! He is full of energy and greeted us as we came in immediately! I would reccomend the pasta dishes, fresh salads and extensive sandwich selection. Fresh produce... You can tell from the taste of the food! Thank you, rendez-vous!!!!!  Amanda x

title: Dinner
comment: The restaurant is based in Sheraton skyline Heathrow. Ambience is great . Menu is limited for vegetarians but is sufficient . Their cauliflower broccoli starter is worth a try. Everything we ordered was to a great taste. Staff are very welcoming. A bit over priced menu. I would only keep it for special occasions for that reason.

title: Top Food & Customer Service
comment: Went to Madhu’s for dinner with friends; different menu books were placed on table as we go, starting from drinks, main course, and dessert. Ordered a Mango Lassi, which was very smooth. Next went to Staters and Main Course. Starters was really good. The customer service was very good from the staff.

title: Baily
comment: Food is of high standard couldn’t say anything wrong about it, best coffee you can get around Beckenham, staff are friendly and provide great service, highly recommend a visit

title: My favourite spot in Beckenham
comment: I often treat myself and my children to a visit here for lunch or dinner. They have an amazing moroccan pancake. It’s absolute delicious and It’s the only place I can get them. Highly recommend. Great service, very kind staff and most importantly for me they’re great with my children.

title: The best breakfast and lunch in Beckenham by far
comment: Rendezvous Caffe goes from strength to strength. Having visited regularly for the last 4 years, it is by far the friendliest and most welcoming food and drink establishment in Beckenham. All staff are attentive and if there is something you want not on the menu the team will do what they can to prepare it to your liking. The food continues to be fresh and extremely well presented. High class.  I have recently discovered scrambled eggs on sourdough toast which is really really good with a coffee and sets me up for the day.  Keep up the good work guys!

title: Defiantly worth a visit
comment: Visited this cafe with my manager for a coffee and was really impressed, the relaxation of the place along with friendly staff defiantly made my meeting feel more enjoyable. I must admit Sam the manager is lovely, willing to go out of his way to ensure that you have the best experience, the coffee was up there as being one of the best. I would defo recommend visiting rendezvous.

title: Fav brekky spot!
comment: I love this place! Not only is the service and the food alwayyysss good but it’s Halal! A lil pricey but hey ho worth every penny!

title: Awesome Sunday breakfast
comment: Visited this cafe again on Sunday. You can’t go wrong in Beckenham for great breakfast options but I think this is now the best place to go. The food is always piping hot, excellent quality, cooked fresh and satisfies the biggest of appetites. Friendly staff always and quick service. You can’t go wrong. Superb menu options as well and excellent coffee! A great place

title: 60th bday party
comment: Decided to celebrate my wife’s 60th without making it too obvious and it was just fantastic. Excellent food combined with wine and service and you could not ask for more. Sherin I think who is the manager made sure we were left alone during my big speech and hey would certainly go back

title: Delicious food
comment: We visited Madhu's again last night. We go there 2 or 3 times a year, whenever we are staying at the hotel for a flight out of Heathrow the next morning. The food is fabulous and I love trying something new each time. This time I tried the spinach Chaat and it was so good. I will certainly order it again! Everything we have ever had there has been delicious. Our server Franco was very attentive and gave us some excellent suggestions. Can't wait to go back again!

title: Perfect - great value for money
comment: Great prices Great location Courteous staff - would like to specifically mention Stacy Good breakfast

title: Christmas meal
comment: I've visited Madus twice in the last 3 months, once was for a birthday celebratory meal and yesterday we had our works Christmas meal there.Both visits have been equally satisfying!The food is tastefully presented and just like traditional home cooked food, I highly recommend their speciality chicken Machuzi kuku and the achari prawns! The waiting staff were both pleasant and attentive to our requests and I liked all the attention to details,such as the tiny dustpan & brush that they swept the table with, to the choclate cups that the ice-cream is served in to the madafus.If you've not been definitely give it a go,I'm already penciling in the next visit!

title: Very Nice Restaurant with Good Food.
comment: Over past 4 months I have been to this beautiful restaurant 4 times, twice for Sunday Brunch and twice for Dinner, each time it has been very good experience, very good food with good service, hope to go there again for New Years Eve Party?. Mikaeel

title: Food is very nice. Staff are very friendly and the restaurant has a very nice atmosphere.
comment: The food is very nice and a lot to choose from. The staffs always have a smile on there face and makes you feel very welcome. My new favourite place in Beckenham.

title: Highly recommend
comment: Fabulous food, amazing choices from breakfast to snacks, cakes or main meals. All freshly cooked. My whole family love going here. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Highly recommend a visit.

title: Dan Duggan
comment: A place I walked into on the off chance and now visit most mornings for good coffee and friendly, individual and very efficient service. Always busy when I pass at lunchtime. Popular for all the right reasons. Perfect place for getting work done early morning. Always welcoming and hugely helpful with a very wide range of well priced, delicious food. A brilliant independent.

title: Nice to find a decent restaurant in one of the Bath Road Airport hotels!
comment: I had dinner last night at Madhu's (located in the Sheraton Skyline). Most of the hotels on the Bath Road are better known for their functionality rather than their style. Having stayed at the Skyline in the past, I was surprised to find that it now has a very decent Indian restaurant. A Dutch friend of mine was staying at the Holiday Inn, so we walked down the road to give Madhu's a try based on its TripAdvisor ratings. It is a large restaurant, catering for both hotel guests and visitors. As with many hotel restaurants, they never quite lose the sense that they are providing a mass service, so it's not somewhere I would come for an intimate tete a tete.  That said, the service was efficient and attentive. We were delivered our pints of Cobra and a tray laden with a mix of popadums. These seemed to be a curious variety of mini-popadums and rice crackers, but were duly dispatched. The curse of popadums is that they can become chewy when not completely fresh, but there was no risk of that. We each ordered the thalis - one meat, one veggie - and there was more than enough food to have us staggering from the table at the end. It was all freshly prepared, with some piping hot samosas, naan and a dhal thrown in. I took the vegetarian option, and enjoyed each of the dishes. I'm not normally a fan of paneer, but the saag paneer here was very good, with relatively small chunks of paneer which were not overly chewy. My friend was equally impressed. Clearly this place is targeted at business people and those staying on holiday - either in transit, or because they don't realise that Heathrow is still quite a way from London - and the pricing is correspondingly steep for what you get. Our meal came to close on £50 a head, with only a couple of beers and a bottle of sparkling water. That said, they know their market, cater to it accordingly and who can blame them? I would certainly suggest Madhu's as an option for an informal corporate dinner and would return again.

title: Mr. Chetan
comment: Great food, great service and excellent ambiance. recommend that you try this place when you are i the Heathrow area.  Our server, Harman was fantastic; she was extremely attentive and very helpful.  This entire experience was a very pleasant surprise.

title: Great mango lassi!
comment: An overnight stay so only one evening meal. We had one vegetarian and one meat Thalia, both very good. Harman served us very well, she is knowledgeable about the food especially the degree of heat. The mango lassi was wonderful!

title: Raw chicken, awful service, don't waste your money!
comment: If you are looking for something special, great service and free from food poisoning risk then this is NOT the restaurant to go to. We were served raw chicken and told that it is ok to eat. There is no concept of customer service at this restaurant which is a real shame. Save your pennies and your health, and try out other restaurants in the local area.

title: Change isn't always good
comment: I stay in this hotel at least once or twice a month. I used to come and eat at this place for diner because I was very pleased by the service. I came back there last week and was surprised to see that some things had changed. Indeed, they used to give all customers a complementary starter before ordering the main dish. That disappeared unfortunately. Plus the waiter asked us three times if we wanted it. It felt like all they wanted was to cash as much as possible. That is when I asked why it wasn't complementary anymore. They simply said it had changed. The naan changed too. They used to be thick and the one I had was crispy, so crispy I wasn't able to eat it the indian way as it would break into pieces. The portion of rice is so small you have to order another one to be fully satisfied... let's point out that the small portion of plain white rice is 4£! I cannot say the quality of their butter chicken is bad. It was delicious but again too small for the price of it. Indeed, in the past I used to pay around 25£ for a drink, rice, naan and the main dish but I paid around 30£ last time. Have the prices changed too? Anyway, I will unfortunately not come back to that place anymore as I believe the quality has gone down. What a pitty. I used to recommend this place to all my colleagues...

title: Hidden gem
comment: Madhu’s is located within the Sheraton Skyline Hotel. Most hotels have an in-house resturant with the basics, but what’s surprising here, is that Madhu’s is AMAZING! This is not your typical hotel resturant fare. I purposely stay at this property when in town several times a year so I can eat here - it’s that good. Tonight, our server Punam took great care of us.  If you’re keen on Indian food, don’t hesitate. Go. Trust.

title: Super delicious
comment: My husband and I have just finished our meal here at Madhu’s . Wow we loved it . Very welcoming and friendly staff as we entered. Professional and polite through out the meal .  The atmosphere was calm but of course as the evening has gone on it’s got busier ... this didn’t make a difference to the fabulous service we got . We have been asked by several members of staff how our meal was ... love love loved it  The lady who was looking after us was called Poonum she was lovely very accommodating . The food was flavoursome and plentiful . We can’t fault it all . If you stay at the Sheraton hotel by Heathrow this is where this little gem is . Spot on  Thank you so much  We would highly recommend a meal here .  Regards  Sangeeta & Vinod Mistry.

title: Fantastic food & service
comment: We booked at short notice for a group of six. Their group slots were full, but they accommodated us in the bar area. We were a bit early but our table was ready on arrival. It was the first visit for our friends and they loved every single starter and main we ordered. There was lots of choice if veg and meat options. The service was fantastic and we were looked after by Franco who was brilliant throughout the evening.

title: 3 D Leadership Training
comment: Fabulous restaurants and ambiance, amazing food and service. Would highly recommend this restaurant and food.

title: Breakfast
comment: Absolutely loving this healthy option brekkie! So tasty,if i could give 10 stars i would, Keep up the good work!

title: Very tasty, great service, loud
comment: The saag paneer was good (not the best I've had but solid), the nalli gosht was amazing, and the real star was the harra barra chaat. Our server Punam was very attentive and made sure we had everything we needed throughout the meal. Friendly service and great food made this a surprisingly enjoyable airport hotel dining experience!  The main room was quite loud / had poor acoustics which made it difficult to hear my dining companion.  Not a cheap meal but very satisfying. Delicious garlic naan!

title: Amazing
comment: Went with my wife and son a few times and its a cozy cafe with good decor and amazing food, I had the pancakes with scrambled eggs and halloumi and then tried the avocado breakfast the day before very nice welcoming people they offer freshly squeezed juice and good coffee too. Will be back again.

title: Good variety of food, great service
comment: My sis in law Jo says if you want the biggest smile, great service and a good variety of food, see Kate and the team at this gem amongst the the many cafes in Beckenham.”

title: Fab Veggie full English Breakfast
comment: I was recommended this place, and it did not disappoint. Friendly vibe immediately, decent menu, good coffee. I selected the veggie full english, as I had a long stretch until a main meal again (that's my excuse!). The most enjoyable one of these I can recall in a long time; highlights were - the cooked tomatoes were tasty baby ones, done with herbs, the beans were nice (not 'value' type) and grilled halloumi was included (wow). I also bought a green Reviver smoothie to go; that was lovely and zingy without being sharp or sour.

title: Heaven Treat
comment: This is my usual stop for a coffee when I am in the area and a few days ago I also fancied something sweet. The menu was showing a dessert that I don’t usually order but this time I was really tempted: ‘Chocolate Brownies with Ice Cream’ Well, these brownies are the best I’ve ever had, without doubt. The care and attention, the ingredients, freshness – it shines through. Fluffy and crisp around the edges (from the individual bakes), but rich and moist inside, with milk chocolate chunks to add bite and cut through the dark cocoa. They’re little parcels of heaven! Combined with scoops of ice cream it makes the whole experience something that can easily be addictive. Calories worth trying!

title: Nice surprise!
comment: Usually the restaurants inside hotels are overrated compared to what they service or their services but this was a pleasant surprise, very nice food and great staff service, Harman took good care of us and guide through this flavor journey!

title: Indian Food At Its Best
comment: We have been at the Sheraton Skyline Hotel attending an Event and Madhu's Heathrow was just the perfect space to end the day with. The service, in particular, Franco! was absolutely incredible. His recommendations and his way of serving us contributed to making this an unforgettable weekend. We had a great conversation with him as well and he surely loves being in the space of his customers. Inspiring to see and experience. Thank you for your attention.

title: Faultless attention to sevice
comment: Exemplary customer service and a genuinely warm welcome with various cuisine awaits you here in this Mediteranean bistro/cafe in the heart of Beckenham town. Sam and Kate go out of thier way to look after you without being over fussy. It absolutely gets five stars from me without hesitation.

title: Excellent
comment: Cosy cafe with very tasty food. The staff are also very friendly and the service is excellent. No wonder why they are so busy!

title: A Brillant cafe
comment: Good service, friendly. Lovely food. Highly recommend. Use this cafe everyday for 2 months. If your in the high street it’s worth a visit.

title: Best cafe in Beckenham
comment: This caffe is just my everything! I absolutely love everything about it. The new decor and ambiance has been well thought through and executed successfully.  The service is impeccable, the staff are so kind and attentive. They really take time to get to know and develop a relationship with their customers; to the point were they know exactly what is wanted before I have to say anything.  I’m a picky customer but they have never complained and they are all so willing to meet my dietary needs... it’s just a bonus that the food and drinks taste great too! The pricing is reasonable for the quality of ingredients and service provided too!  Yes, I’m a regular and I wouldn’t have it any other way ☺️

title: Great food, excellent service, great prices
comment: Fresh ingredients that are well prepared - chicken, bacon and avocado panini is delicious.  And everyone works hard to ensure an excellent experience.

title: Top service & Great food
comment: I popped in to order a couple of bacon sarnies and they couldnt have been more welcoming.  Really lovely guys, lovely atmosphere and outstanding bacon sarnies. Will definitely pop back to sit in and sample some of the delicious food I saw them serving.

title: My new one stop shop!
comment: Two Lattes and a sausage and egg baguette, every morning... friendly, caring and great service. Remembered my name after one visit, and welcomes me every morning now. Also had lunch there and again faultless, clean and professionally done. R-V is now our R-V.

title: Very attentive service great food
comment: Must visit inside of Sheraton skyline hotel. Good ambience. Good food. Great staff thanks to Punam and all staff.

title: Birthday
comment: Brilliant setting for our birthday meal. The service was spot on and the food even better. We were a party of 8 including two babies with high chairs but this was no issue as the staff were very attentive to our needs. The lamb chops and Jhinga prawns were outstanding , the lamb was cooked to perfection and the chutney that accompanied the prawns was simply heaven. I had a thaali for my main meal which had a great variety of meat and prawn dishes and was beautifully presented . Having an Indian background we are very fussy when it comes to eating Indian away from home. However I’m glad to say Madhus fully exceeded all our expectations and we will definitely come back again!

title: Best Indian food ever!
comment: Excellent value for money. Food cooked freshly to order, can see food being prepared in kitchen area. Attentive staff and beautiful setting. Ate here while staying overnight in Sheraton Hotel and didn’t expect much, but honestly the best Indian food we have ever eaten. Loved that most staff were dressed in traditional costume. Absolutely clean restaurant. Toilets situated in main part of hotel but literally just outside restaurant. Had two separate, quite dinning areas for family or small group which looks intimate and luxurious. Highly recommend for couples, families and/or groups. Corporate group in at the same time as us but this did not effect our waiting time or service. Food tasted fresh and authentic rather than precooked or usual sauce dishes. Server/waitress Punam was very helpful and knowledgeable about dishes delicious on menu.

title: Towards the best Indian Restaurant in the London area. Really.
comment: My wife and I were staying overnight at Heathrow ready to pick up some friends coming in on an early flight. We fancied an indian meal and chose this restaurant, which sits inside the Heathrow Sheraton hotel. Words of praise almost fail me, it is so very good in all its aspects. I'm not a young man and I have eaten thousands of indian meals in hundreds of restaurants all over the UK, but I can't think of a better one than this. For a start its decor and spaciousness is impressive and welcoming. You don't feel on your own, but the tables of sufficiently apart such that you don't feel swamped by your neighbours. On the night we were there we were met by a stylish and competent lady in a full length multi-layered, black evening gown. She looked quite the ticket. She swept along as if on rails, head held high, as she escorted us our table. The menu is extensive and quite unusual. For a starter I chose puffed semolina cases that came filled with spiced and mixed chutneys, and they were delicious; looked good on the plate too. For the main course I chose a lamb curry (saag gosht) and when I took the first mouthful, my immediate thought was "I don't think I have ever had a better lamb curry than this"; you would have to taste it to understand. Also the portion is generous. In fact, I wanted chapatis to go with the curry, but they didn't have exactly that on the menu. So I talked to the waiter and chose a couple of different breads. But only one arrived and about 2/3 through I realised they had forgotten the 2nd and so called over the waiter. He went to the grill area and they seemed to drop everything else as they corrected the mistake. These things happen and I wasn't upset, but afterwards the restaurant manager came across to apologise and then followed that with a couple of free glasses of really excellent champagne. We were delighted with the whole experience and say that - if you are within range, do make a reservation and find out just how good a really good restaurant can be. It's not cheap of course, but worth it for a special treat.

title: Wonderful Tasty Dishes
comment: They won't win any prizes for quantity, but they sure should win them on quality. So if you're stuck on Hotel Row of Bath Road along the edge of Heathrow, this is a good bet for a delicious Indian meal with some unusual herbal twists.

title: Great food
comment: Visited with friends. The food and service were both excellent. The menu isn’t typical. We all went for the set menu which gave multiple starters, mains which you could order more of if wanted and a pudding . The lamb chop starters were nothing short of gorgeous. Yes it is a little pricy but it is top quality

title: The brownies are to die for!!!!
comment: Iv been going there for nearly 5 years now. The staff are all amazing and accommodating. Chef Sami makes a lovely pesto pasta.

title: Beckenham’s Finest
comment: I love this place, the staff are all amazing and very welcoming. Chef Sami seems to the only one who knows how to cook a great scrabbles egg with salmon. I strongly recommend if you’re in Beckenham that you drop in. Food is amazing. Wayne

title: Sunday Brunch
comment: Great food, great location, but price was too high just for a Sunday lunch buffet. Not sure I would go again at those prices.

title: A place to Go
comment: One of my favorite places in Beckenham with a great and friendly atmosphere. At Rendezvous, you have space and intimacy at the same time. The staff is also friendly and helpful. Would definitely recommend this place.

title: Family Lunch
comment: Great food and great atmosphere has outdoor seating, breakfast and lunch options. The staff are nice and friendly and helpful. The cafe was clean and welcoming. Super cafe with lots of yummy food, their cakes are just Devine and their sandwiches are super fresh tasting and full of flavour.

title: genuine customer service.
comment: This is one of the best cafe's I've been to in a very long time. The customer service is really good. The time it takes to prep food is efficient & theres a large verity of choice. I've been to too many cafe's in Beckham that simply don't offer any alternatives to pork.  My expectations were definitely exceeded after shopping there for a few colleagues and my myself and without asking, the representative had labeled all of meals to reduce confusion. This act of good will made my day and possibly a lifetime customer.

title: Returning customer no more
comment: I have eaten at this restaurant 5+ times previous and completely enjoyed each time. Therefore I booked a celebratory family meal for 7.  We ordered meals we knew and also recommended meals for our other guests. However, the quantity and quality had fallen and because of this, we will not eat here again. The rice was dry and halved in size and the curry dishes had barely any meat. Additionally, the peshwari naan was not as moist and sweet as it used to be.  What's more, the waiters we removing dishes from the table before they had been finished and i had to ask them to leave our table despite it not being overly busy. Awful service and not good food. possibly a victim of it's own success. spending close to £300 on this meal / drinks I will sadly say Mandu's has seen the last of my money; i will not return.

title: Expensive , could be better
comment: We stayed here the night before a flight to NY. We love Indian food and enjoy cooking curries. My other half shared a house years ago with two Indian guys training to be doctors and they showed him how to mix spices and taught him all about curry. When we saw there was an Indian restaurant at the hotel we booked a table. We were asked during our meal how the food was, when my husband said that the aubergine purée was too hot and spicy ,and he likes spicy hot food , the waitress replied' well this is an Indian restaurant ' ! Omg !  Spices are meant to enhance the flavour of the food not burn the roof of your mouth!  We wouldn't go again, very expensive for what it was. No side dishes to order, we wanted some Dahl and the aubergine to go with a main course, the waitress said that would be too much food. So we just had the aubergine . Spoilt the rest of the food as the heat took away your sense of taste !  Maybe warn people on the menu how hot the food is !

title: Looking for Indian food
comment: Didn't like the look of the place tbh but the food is something that you'd like to take notice of as miss Punam survey me with a smile I was pleased with what I got. Food was well clocked and nicely surved. I just wish it wasn't so noisy in here.

title: Great service
comment: We visited Madhu’s restaurant for the first time, the ambience was great and service provided by Ashton was exceptional, specially the guavarita cocktail.

title: Madhu's -THE only caterer for your wedding day.
comment: Having just come back from our Honeymoon, we felt we needed to give credit where credit is due, to a fantastic Event Manager (Agha Abbas) and team at Madhu’s for catering and organsing our wedding last week at the Radisson Edwardian Blu hotel Hounslow. If you’re in any doubt about choosing this company for your big special day, please read on. Though Madhu's came up more on the top level of our budget, the things that we kept coming back to was just how good the service was from the initial enquiry,to our meeting, to the amount of time Agha spent with us - all of that before we even booked with them, AND before even trying the food! Now the subject of food. Both we and our families were really impressed and grateful for the service we received when food tasting with the Madhu’s team in the Southall branch. They were very attentive, listened to our requirements and were very helpful in finding out details from the wonderful Chef’s team. Though we had picked our choices for the menu, the team brought us so much more to choose from - which in other food tasting we never had - which helped us make our final choices - this was no easy task as all the dishes were delicious! We walked away very happy customers and 2kg heavier :) :) Now for the actual wedding day itself. From the very beginning of the day, all the way throughout, the Madhu’s team were absolutely fantastic!  The lunch food was extremely tasty, as well the canapes, starters and mains - all served hot, meat was tender when needed to be and the turnaround of food frequent - we, our guests and family were really happy and impressed. We actually forgot about the silver service our top table received and this really was a lovely touch - thanks again to the team they really looked after us.  No doubt we'll be back to the restaurant soon and of course have been advertising them to anyone who asks - but i'll be honest, we don't need to do much as they respected what we wanted from day 1 and during the whole event, Agha and the entire team's efforts spoke for itself during our special day.

title: Great brrakfast, good cooking .
comment: Been there many times and every time i had excellent and lovely service , good food quality and delicious coffee ,pleased and recommended our chef .

title: Amazing
comment: By far one of the best restaurants/caffs in the area there isn’t even a close second would recommend to anyone looking for good food and a good time amazing

title: Great food great place
comment: Rendezvous cafe has superb staff, excellent food and a lovely friendly atmosphere about the place, not to mention the best latte in south East London. Can not recommend this place enough  Aaron

title: Fantastic food. Fantastic service
comment: The food and the service in Rendezvous is fantastic and I would highly recommend eating there. Definitely one of the best in Beckenham.

title: amazing place
comment: Having recently been refurbished and redecorated, there is now a more home feel and together with lovely cooked food, polite service, this should be your port of call for breakfast and lunch. Take time to visit here.

title: Worth a rendezvous!
comment: This place is a real gem as one of the other posters alluded to.  The owner Samir and his staff are all lovely and welcoming. I normally visit with my family or friends two to three times a month and thankfully have never been disappointed with the food or service. There is no pretentiousness at all about this cafe; whatever I have ordered just delivers on taste, quality and value consistently.  The owners seem to understand the recipe of a successful eatery and keep it simple; there is a good selection on the menu and it’s honestly presented in a clean, cosy and inviting environment.  Rendezvous beats these soulless coffee chains by a country mile and has that ‘something special’ that they cannot replicate.  Samir and his eatery are an asset to Beckenham! Ahsan Ansari

title: Outstanding food and service
comment: We were welcomed and well attended by a team of wait staff. The food was authentic and well presented. Great end to a long day.

title: Excellent service
comment: Wonderful meal with family aided by attentive, world class service, from the maitre d' to our server, Franco. Very enjoyable evening, and delicious dishes.

title: Excellent food and excellent service
comment: This is a hidden gem!. We stayed near Heathrow Airport for convenience, we came upon this restaurant tucked in the back of the Sheraton Skyline Hotel. It was fantastic, the food was genuine to its roots and the service is stellar. We had been travelling all day and were very casually dressed and we were welcomed in with open arms. Make an effort to eat here, you will not be disappointed.

title: Above average for food with posh ambience
comment: Food is not fantastic. My colleague and I Ordered a lamb and chicken briyanis . A bit disappointed when we look at the portion. The mutton and chicken are cut in a very small cube sizes and mixed with rice. Thought it would be a piece of chicken or mutton placed aside. .but I have to say the sauces are good. Naans are also up to standard. A thumb down for the tea which I ordered. Lipton tea tastes better.

title: Now that was a great Indian meal!
comment: We ate here given we were staying in the Sheraton ahead of a flight out of Heathrow the next day and, boy, I am glad we did. To start my wife had the Keyde ki Tikki (pan seared crab cake) while I had the Murg Tikka (spiced and marinated boneless chicken), both of which were mouthwatering good. However, it got better! We both went with the Masala fish (Tilapia fillet cooked in Madhu’s unique masala sauce) with a shared portion of rice and Nan bread for the main course. All of it was excellent, the fish virtually melting in ones mouth, the sauce adding to the experience. A glass of white wine accompanied my wife’s meal while I had a pint of Cobra IPA - yes, IPA and not their familiar lager - which was another real plus for me. The slight negative, albeit made up for by the superb food, was the service was a little on the slow side. One thing which may be of interest to readers is that on the night we dined, the majority of other diners were Indian which I think showed the food was as authentic as it could be. Well, it was a great meal and this for an independent restaurant situated in a hotel! Will we go again - yes and it will make it almost a certainty that we will stay at the Sheraton again if we have an early morning Heathrow flight.

title: Fantastic curry
comment: I live in Bradford so am spoilt by living in the curry capital but even I was impressed by the food here. The ambience is also very good and the walk through the hotel was like something from Las Vegas.  I had Murgh Makhani and it was yummy, my colleague also enjoyed her Murgh Biryani. I wouldn't say there was extensive choice on the menu but 2 out of 2 very good meals can't be beaten.  Would certainly visit again if I'm in the area.

title: Great Indian Meal
comment: Staying at the hotel we decided to have our evening meal here. I’m glad we did because it turns out to be one of the best Indian meals I’ve ever had. My Lamb Biriani was cooked to perfection. Spicy, tender meat and flakey basmati rice all meant that every mouthful was a joy. Nice surroundings, popular and attentive service and combined with the wonderful food, what more could you want?

title: When it’s good it is very good.
comment: I have been here twice . The first time I went it was fantastic . The prawn dish and the meat on the bone dish were both excellent. The had real depth to the flavours . It is expensive but if the quality is there , that is not a problem. The second time I went I didn’t feel it matched the quality.

title: Great coffee ,great place,good service with excellent choice of food
comment: The staff were very welcoming and polite, i was served quickly and they were helpful. I ordered PENNE ARRABIATTA , it tasted fresh , very delicious and had a good amount of chilli in it to make it spicy but not too spice , i actually attend to go back for this dish again. The atmosphere was relaxed and friendly , the food came in a good time , the cafe was busy but didnt feel chaotic and they looked like they had a good system going , i would definitemy recommend it.

title: GREAT breakfast, friendly staff
comment: Just nipped in for a breakfast/lunch, super friendly staff which is always nice when its the first human you speak to in the day, breakfast was very nice... I tend to judge a breakfast on the sausages and the bread they were both spot on, very clean, will definitely be returning very soon

title: Consistently lovely food
comment: Wonderful food in a relaxed and comfy seating plan. Great ambiance. This is my third visit to this restaurant, and it never disappoints. The customer service is excellent, from the reception to all the waiting staff.  Only downside is that they do not provide the option to take away food in a doggy bag, unlike other restaurants.

title: Madhu's restaurant @ Heathrow
comment: Went here on the evening before we flew out of Heathrow T5, this restaurant is a concession within the Sheraton Skyline, so we didn't even have to go out of the hotel. Really creative menu and everything was absolutely delicious! Service was friendly without being obsequious. We were initially seated at one table, but then a large group of young girls came in and started chatting and laughing really loudly, so we asked to be moved - not a problem for the staff. Aaah, much better at the other table! Love the food here, much bigger than the Indian restaurants we're used to, so it felt a bit cavernous, but it was a great meal! I did have a bit of a moan about the mini-paddadums - they didn't seem particularly fresh, but after I mentioned it to our waiter, he brought a new dish of them and these were much better.

title: How they rectified their mistake
comment: Hi i had visited Madhus 2 months back and had a terrible experience .I was very upset as it was my late fathers birthday.I raised an official complaint.I did have to pursue the matter However finally I was very happy to see their response and their actions to rectify. The staff registered the errors and did not hestitate to show how they have taken steps to improve. I WILL mention that Madhus did finally show their commintment to both quality and customer satification.well done guys especially claudio your boys and Serina!

title: Traveling through and discovered greatness
comment: Family trip through Europe with an overnight at Heathrow. Took the kids to Madhu’s for their first ever Indian food experience and was absolutely blown away by the quality of the food. Only to be outdone by the quality of the service. Franco, our waiter, was amazing, friendly, and totally on point with the wine, food, everything. Supporting cast seamlessly filled the gaps and the whole family was impressed. Thank you, Franco and thank you Madhu’s for such a wonderful experience.

title: Dinner at Radhu’s
comment: We dined at Radhu’s while staying at the Skyline Sheraton at Heathrow. It was a truly memorable experience with great food, good wine and beer, and exceptional service from Franco and all of the very attentive staff. The desserts were unique and delicious. The perfect end to a perfect meal.

title: Always a pleasure
comment: We have had the pleasure of dining here many times since the restaurant opened at the Sheraton. The atmosphere and food are consistently excellent. Even better is the service. The staff is attentive and cordial, and always surpassing themselves! The last visit was made especially delightful, thanks to our waiter, Franco. Many thanks!!!r

title: Amazing experience
comment: I had an amazing experience. The staff are very helpful when it comes to the menu it is mouth watering. The food was lovely I had carbonara pasta which made want to come back I loved it there.

title: Good food
comment: I go here at least a couple times a week and the food is always good. The staff are also very friendly. I would recommend this place to everyone.

title: You’ve got to love Rendez-vous!!💕
comment: What a cheerful spot this is in Rendez-vous café ,i’ve passed it most days on my commute to and from my work for the last couple of months , i’ve noticed that the decor has changed to a shabby look and it always seems to be busy with locals. There is a great range of goodies on offer , for breakfast, brunch , lunch and afternoon ☕️, suck as a wonderful barista style coffee , fresh delectable pastries , an excellent fresh delectable pastries, many breakfast offerings from the full English to the full veggie breakfast , granolas and fruits , also an amazing range of paninis and wraps ,mouth-watering salads and smoothies. I enjoyed flat white coffee with mozzarella, tomato and avocado paninis and my friend had a green reviver smoothie wish was awesome and falafel burger to die for. All fresh , all tasty, all devoured , it really deserve another visit to try their salads . Just a lovely place to relax and chill, i will definitely come back again.

title: Great little Cafe
comment: Been here a few times recently and every time had excellent attentive service. Good honest food and delicious coffee. Pleased to recommend this independent cafe.

title: Outstanding service from Punam Pvivan.
comment: After a long day traveling, great atmosphere, excellent food. Choice are all appealing. Customer service is their strong suite.

title: Wonderful Place
comment: We have been to this fantastic caffe on numerous occasions and I must say each visit, the service was impeccable. Lovely staff and food.

title: Family catch up
comment: Visited this restaurant before with my wife and decided to visit again after being impressed but the service and food will definitely come again

title: Madhu’s was great!
comment: We stayed at the Sheraton Skyline in London at each end of our trip to Portugal and enjoyed dinner each night at the Madhu’s Restaurant in the hotel. Great food and service....our server Franco led a great team to give us a wonderful experience.

title: Best Place to eat . love Madhu's
