comment: Both the food and service were top class. Delicious soup for starters and the green curry was of high quality. The waiters were extremely welcoming and their quirky sense of humour really added to the overall enjoyment of the meal. Will definitely return to try other dishes.

title: Still awesome
comment: Lovely food. great for pre or post Olympic Cinema but v busy esp Fri and Sat so I think booking is a good idea. lovely staff.

title: Lovely Lunch
comment: Returned here recently and thoroughly enjoyed the tuna Niçoise salad and coffee, both which were served promptly, hot and very tasty. Owner Sam and Chef Sam are so welcoming and always have time for their customers which is why they deservedly receive such great reviews. Give this great independent caffe a visit when passing by you will not be disappointed.

title: Perfect
comment: What an amazing meal and service we had. Channon was the perfect host, friendly, helpful and informative. All the staff were wonderful, almost as good as the “awesome” food - thank you.

title: First experience ...first impressions
comment: We visited Awesome Thai for the first time to celebrate my daughters birthday. Wow what an experience helpful and attentive waiters as we were spoilt for choice, fabulous food , they surprised my daughter with Thai tiramisu and also gave the rest of us a free dessert. Great food and fab service we will definitely be going back.

title: The place to be
comment: Rendez is a lovely place to go for breakfast and lunch. I discovered this place a year ago and now it’s my favourite place.  The service is really good,the team is nice and kind.  They are really friendly.  I love being outside and in side.  They make you feel at home.

title: Such a lovely cafe but hasn’t reached its full potential!
comment: Visited on a Saturday lunchtime recently where I enjoyed a lovely lunch. The food was great and so was the service however it didn’t reach it’s full potential which ruined my trip. The female workers where often treated unfairly by the boss and the chef to the extent that you could hear swearing and shouting from the kitchen. It’s definitely creates uncomfortable and unpleasant atmosphere. It’s a shame otherwise I would’ve been more inclined to have returned.

title: Great GF Thai
comment: Really friendly and very attentive staff. Really helpful in explaining Gluten Free options and they use GF Soy Sauce on request. Deliciously fresh flavours and a great choice of great Thai favourites. Extremely well priced. Booking is essential .

title: Vegetarian Dinner for me and my daughter
comment: Awesome food, delectable green curry and sweet and sour Lovely honey and cinnamon banana fritters service was very quick and he ran after with my water bottle that I left under the Table

title: Awesome!
comment: We went last night for a dinner, following the brilliant reviews we saw.  I have to say that the reviews were right, quick service, very nice food, prices in range. The place is small so make sure you book in advance. Absolutely reccomended.

title: Busy restaurant
comment: Nice enough restaurant with good food in a very handy location. The service was pleasant and efficient, however it is quite busy on a Saturday night with take aways, which means that there is s constant traffic of people through the centre of the restaurant.

title: Great mixed starters
comment: Love a good Thai and this is right up there. Very authentic but with a modern twist. Also very handy for the Olympic Cinema - went there very hungry after a 2 hour Blade Runner and was not disappointed !

title: Awesome food
comment: Very nice authentic dishes which are lovely served and the texture my god is awesome. I would like to recommend this place to my friends

title: Amazing thai
comment: Was recommended this place and we really enjoyed it the food was great thank you very much i will come here oftenly because everything about it was great

title: Superb experience
comment: One of the few places we've eaten that scores high on everything that really matters. Full marks for exquisite food - both authentic classic Thai soups and dishes and innovative inventions like the coconut flavoured Thai Tiramisu, the Thai tagliatelle and the pana cotta-with-kiwi sauce. Fresh, high quality ingredients, cooked with obvious care and served with pride.  We booked a table for the family for my daughter's birthday party as she enjoyed her culinary experience in a holiday in Thailand very much. We were not disappointed. To top it all, their service is thoughtful and very hospitable. We are definitely coming back here as regulars now....

title: Another great meal
comment: Our fourth Christmas meal (for 8) was just as good as the previous occasions. Great food, friendly and efficient staff who provide a very warm welcome. Cracking restaurant, very reasonably priced.

title: Celebrating Wedding Anniversary
comment: Awesome food, the cuisine really lived up to its name! The restaurant also had excellent customer service. Many thanks!

title: Best place in Beckenham to go
comment: My girlfriend and I went to cafe rendezvous in Beckenham for lunch The food was lovely and the service excellence . Boss And chef ‍ they was very friendly they do very good service . They handled very well keep going guys. Well done.

title: Great food for great prices
comment: Came here early morning before work in need of a hot meal and drink I walked in and the staff was really friendly and gave me some suggestions and I tried a delicious baguette breakfast with a hot cup of coffee and a freshly mad croissant, I would most definitely recommend this cafe

title: Nice meal in a restaurant popular with locals.
comment: All in all a nice meal for two with some good wine. Starters were nice. The fresh spring rolls 'por pia sod' seemed small in terms of portion side when they arrived. However they are sold as appetisers and I might just be more used to the generous size of Vietnamese summer rolls in comparison. For the main, I played it safe with a green curry and jasmine rice which provided a good benchmark for a first visit and it was good. The wine selection was compact but the pinot noir we chose was very drinkable and went well with the food. Awesome Thai seems to very popular with the locals which is a good sign. I would go back and perhaps be a bit more adventurous with the menu next time.

title: Ok......
comment: Went for lunch Sunday 13th August. Walked in, at 1pm. Empty apart from us, Young man, didn't even say Hello, just gave us menus, we ordered Fishcakes, and Soft shelled crab for starters, my crab delicious, but fish cakes very disappointing, just 4 tiny slabs that really didn't taste of anything. We then order Pad Tai, and marinated beef, with Papaya salad which were both very good. Our waiter was on his mobile entire time were there , and on leaving didn't say goodbye. !! Having been to Thailand several times this is not typical of Thai people. As we were still only ones there when we finished, just lacked atmosphere.

title: Amazing
comment: I've been there two times and was amazing food experience. I love your starters, specially these green leaves , whuch taste like a crisps. I adore your fried rice. Prices are good just a wine but expensive.

title: Lives up to its name!
comment: Just had an awesome meal with the family here. The welcome was great, service excellent and food amazing! It was great value too. If you're after a great Thai meal in South West London look no further...

title: Amazing food awesome place!
comment: Went on an impromptu date night and it certainly didn't fail. From the time we arrived they couldn't do enough for my extremely heavily pregnant partner! Service was superb and the food was the best Thai I have tasted! Can't wait to go back again!

title: Lovely evening
comment: Although this is a small restaurant - which is typical for London - the service you receive here is amazing. The food is good and if you're not sure what to have then just ask. One thing I did notice was that they always opened the door for arriving and leaving customers. No surprise this is a very popular restaurant in London.

title: First rate experience
comment: Busy but efficient with delicious food this our local Thai offers dishes and service of the highest standard. And compared with the other local joints it's excellent value for money.

title: Tasty food and lovely staff!
comment: I caught up with a friend here on a Thursday evening and had a great time. The food was really tasty and authentic and the staff were so lovely. It's a small restaurant loved by locals and they really do live up to their name!

title: Lovely food, lovely staff
comment: Had a fab time here. Came for a family meal for my brothers birthday, food was amazing and the staff even brought out a surprise birthday cake. Food was fantastic. Suitable for both meat eaters and veggies. Highly recommend!!!

title: Same again next visit
comment: Went to this Thai place with my business associates really found it to be amazing cosy atmospheric the food was sublime the staff were great absolutely brilliant glad we  Went.

title: Great mains, poor starters
comment: I wish I had read reviews earlier, because I genuinely believe my review could have been different. When I saw the menu I KNEW I wanted the soft shell crab, but my wife convinced me to get the platter to try multiple dishes. But everything on the platter was 5/10. Nothing bad, but nothing great that stood out. The mains were a different story, I am not a usual fan of the standard pad thai - but these guys do a good one with meaty prawns. I also enjoyed the green curry, although I wish it was a little spicier like they are out in Thailand. I think I would have given this place a 3.5/5, but their Thai Tiramisu dish wouldn't allow me to do it. WHAT A DESERT! The coconut flavour and the lightness of the tiramisu - amazing. The staff were very nice and very attentive, the decor is clean and simple and the location is brilliant as Barnes is such a nice area. The prices are also very reasonable!

title: Love this Place
comment: Can't fault this place, it never disappoints. Quick service by attentive staff who are genuinely brilliant, really, really good customer service which gives the place a great, friendly, relaxed atmosphere that serves fantastic food. CAN NOT RECOMMEND THIS PLACE HIGHLY ENOUGH!!

title: Yep....it's awesome!
comment: Ate here on a Friday evening with friends. It gets busy so best book a table. The staff are all very friendly and attentive. The food was amazing. You must try the duck curry dish....really great quality meat used in the dishes. Every dish we ordered was extremely tasty and well made. I would definitely dine here again.

title: This is the best thai restaurant in Barnes ....
comment: I'm always visited this restaurant recently, I though is the best thai around especially the tastes of foods and services .. I'm very recommendable to visiters or locals peoples who is never visited thai foods..

title: One of the best Thai food and experience
comment: The food is absolutely amazing, very flavorful and quite authentic (one of the best green curries that I had in a while). It is a family run restaurant and the people there are very nice, they asked how many times we've been there and were generally very friendly. The deserts are huge and very good as well.

title: Awesome food and awesome customer service
comment: It really does what the restaurant name says. Everything from the start to the end of your journey in this restaurant is brilliant.

title: Really delicious and wonderful service
comment: This place is absolutely amazing. The prices are reasonable, the staff are very friendly and the food is delicious. They even heard from our conversation that it was my birthday and gave us a free cake with my name on it! Definitely recommend coming here.

title: Local restaurant, but really good Thai food
comment: I've eaten a lot of Thai food over the years and most of it is fairly predictable, especially in the UK. This was one of the exceptions. It looks like nothing much from the outside, wasn't very full when we were there (Saturday lunchtime) and the menus & wine list don't look like anything much. HOWEVER, the food was terrific. The sauces that came with the starters were all freshly made and the curries and salads were delicious. Spicy, but very smooth. And packed full of prawns!  I wish it were my local restaurant. Definitely recommended.

title: Nice food but service is terrible
comment: Visited on a Friday evening, food was flavoursome and tasty, but the service was very poor. We waited 45 mins from ordering to our food being served. Wouldn't go back because of the service.

title: Fabulous
comment: Another awesome meal at Awesome Thai! Never disappointed! Great service, wonderful food .... relaxed and easy! Will be back soon!

title: Awesome!!
comment: The food here is amazing! It is only a few doors down from where I work and every friday after payday we try and have our 'Thai Day Friday'. Awesome food, Awesome staff, Awesome Thai!

title: A meal out with friends
comment: My friends had recommended that we come with them to eat at The Awesome Thai, as they had been before. It was first class from start to finish, I can't recommend this restaurant enough, the waitresses were delightful. We mentioned it was our friends birthday and they presented him with a dessert with his name on with 5 minutes warning! Very reasonably priced too!!! We will be back. Thank you

title: Best Thai Food in London or even in the UK
comment: Best Thai food ever in London or even in the UK. Very delicious, authentic and will recommend to anyone. Price is very reasonable and food is beautifully decorated. Much better than the restaurant chains in central London. Extremely friendly staff who made the food with heart and effort (I don't normally make this kind of review this is the first time)

title: Book early
comment: Very reasonable prices for west London , the offer pad choi And really with that you do need noodles or rice and each main course can be shared between 2

title: Love it!
comment: Colourful, tasty and fresh food, and more importantly super friendly staff.  They serve the best Pad Thai, Green Curry and Pandan Pancake in London. Will definitely come back!

title: Super Good
comment: Nice to try Thai food here. People are so nice and friendly but the most important thing is test of Thai food are excellent. Love it

title: A GEM of a find
comment: Was introduced to this amazing place by a business contact - the food is off the scale - real flavours - cooked with passion and great service - was so impressed ordered a take away 2 days later and spoke to owner and told him I was pleased - he not only cooked the takeaway meal himself - but added a few surprises - JUST GO - this place ROCKS!!!!

title: Awesome good
comment: The food i ate was one of the best thai food i ate in years, thai green cury with prawns with plain rice.

title: Truly Awesome !
comment: Food's stunning, fresh, balanced and looks superb. Service brilliant, atmosphere warm friendly and informal. You won't find better - love it!

title: Overrated
comment: Not sure what the hype is. The food was edible but definitely not top (first?) thai food in London! The prices are okay, but not cheap at all. The lamb chops were fine but nowhere near amazing. Bit disappointed since I came here after reading great reviews. Paid around £50 for two.

title: Amazing restaurant !
comment: It is a lovely restaurant !   Food are delicious and the service is very attentive. Just one advice: Try !

title: Tasty food, great value and outstanding customer service.
comment: We have visited this place several times and the food it always delicious. The staff go out of there way to help and are extremely friendly. I always have the prawn and asparagus dish which is simply divine!  The food is very reasonably priced. I would recommend booking as it is only a small place.

title: An imported Americanism
comment: Good décor. Busy & popular new eatery in fashionable Barnes. Despite the irritating name of the over-abused Americanism 'Awesome' I thought I'd set aside my prejudice & give it a go. Sadly, despite the hype it was not a good experience. Chicken satays were dry, tasteless & not enough peanut sauce. The aubergine dish was so, so. The lamb cutlets were overcooked. On the up side my friends prawn curry was good, the egg fried rice was great & the deserts were excellent. The Singha beer was served nicely chilled but authentic Thai it is not. There weren't enough waiting staff who were rushed off their feet with no time for pleasantries. Luckily the bill came in less than we had imagined but still not worth it. Awesome it ain't.

title: Excellent!
comment: This has been on my must try list for a few years and we finally made it. Yup, 'amazing' and probably the best Thai we've had... and that's a lot of Thais! Service was very friendly and spring rolls, tom yum soup, pad Thai, and Thai basil chicken were all superb. A bit of a strange comment but even the sparkling water (Tau) was awesome!

title: slow down!
comment: Great and reasonable food, but felt as if they wanted us out soon! The staff were great but why do they try to bring the next course so fast? OK turnover, but it was well after nine and we felt hassled. Pity as the food was very good indeed.

title: A great find
comment: Had an amazing evening at the 'Awesome Thai'. The food was great and the service was pretty good too (and the prices were quite reasonable as well). First time there but will surely return before too long.

title: Fabulous Thai Restaurant
comment: Second visit, even better than the first!!! Very very good quality Thai food with the real Thai taste and very friendly service to match. Massaman and Pad Thai are the best I've tried in any Thai Restaurant in London. Grilled lamb is to die for....my advice is, if you like Thai food just go...period!!!They're packed even on a Thursday night. Good food, nice drinks (lovely cold beer), very good service with some good friends..cannot ask for more. Such a wonderful evening*****

title: The name says it all *****
comment: Fresh ingredients, tasty, well presented Thai food and wonderful service in a nice, clean and lively venue with lovely music. Very Awesome Thai indeed!!! Will surely be back when I'm in London again. Thoroughly enjoyable experience

title: Cosy place with fabulous food
comment: I am lucky enough to live quite near so have been many times to this cosy restaurant. The food is very fresh, delicious and beautifully presented and certainly has to be one of the best in London (and I have had many in the capital!) .When the supposedly simple and traditional green chicken curry is this good you know they really care about all their wonderful dishes. Service is delightful and the prices are very reasonable indeed. I'll be back!!

title: Good!
comment: I went with my family for a birthday meal and it lived up to expectations. I had prawn noodle dish which was excellent, and everyone was satisfied with the food (the Thai red curry was particuarly good). The service was adequate and the decor is fine; not the venue for a romantic meal or entertaining a foreign dignitary, but it's good. A worthwhile visit for the food.

title: My favourite place to eat at weekends
comment: I love this place, I come here most weekends and the food is always 10/10. They also do an amazing home made apple pie :-)

title: Chris Taylor
comment: Always stop by the Rendezvous when I’m in Beckenham. Sam the owner and Sam the chef always bring a smile to my face there hospitality is second to none. The tea coffee and food is A1

title: Good quality Thai in friendly restaurant
comment: Some lovely fresh tastes mixed with some Thai classics. Good red curry, really nice fresh spring rolls with dipping sauce and tasty prawn crackers. Staff are friendly. Good value.

title: Great Thai restaurant
comment: Fabulous, fresh food at this deservedly popular local Thai. Very attentive service and a lovely atmosphere.

title: Superb experience
comment: From staff to food this place has blown any thai I've been too out of the water! Softshell crab, lamb chops and pad Thai reached over my expectations. Delicious!

title: Vegans must eat here
comment: Since our part of four has vegans we didn't expect much but how wrong can a person be. Everything from waitress that took some time to explain dishes, than food that cae out faster than ever and complimentary drinks on the way out. I really can't say how impressed we were

title: Amazing Food Amazing People
comment: A truly amazing thai restaurant, I have been coming here for years and will continue to do so for many more. The food is wonderful, fresh, flavoursome and the menu has something for everyone. I'd recommend getting the sharing platter as a starter as everything on it is fantastic. The staff are all lovely and keen to help, we have got to know them over the years and they are all brilliant. I cant say enough good things about this place, if you love thai food then you must visit here!

title: Great food and amazing service
comment: Definitely a great date night choice and also a good venue for families also. The food was great and service was equally great. Will be eating there again.

title: Just amazing
comment: Everything about this place is just amazing Food Service Ambience  Truly faultless  Tonight  Soft shell crab  Red chicken curry/ pad Thai  Broccoli Lovely people

title: One of the best thai's in London
comment: Came across this place on TripAdvisor and the reviews were good and it certainly lived up to it's billing. We booked in advanced and it was needed on a Saturday night (Quite a lot of people came in and got turned away). The food was immense and would defo come back again.

title: Always Great Food and Service
comment: Have visited Awesome Thai many times, and for me, it is still the best Thai restaurant in London. The food is always excellent quality with great flavour and presentation, as well as being very good value for money. The service is very friendly, with all the little extras that make a good meal a great meal, added at no extra cost. As mentioned in other reviews, this is a very busy restaurant, with 2 sittings on both Friday and Saturday. So you need to book in advance and don't be surprised if you are in the early sitting and asked to free your table by 8:30pm.

title: Great food and friendly service
comment: Four of us went last weekend and really enjoyed the evening. You do need to book as it is opposite the Olympic Cinema and gets very busy at certain times. Each dish was quite different and really tasty. The waitress was very friendly and described how the gorgeous thai salad dressing was made. Thoroughly recommend going.

title: The best Thai in London
comment: No much more to say. It is just the best. I am so happy that I am having dinner there tonight as it is my favorite restaurant! It doesn't matter what you order, you can't go wrong, everything is delicious. Proper Thai food. Personnel is so kind and friendly. Again, the best Thai place in London

title: With this name it has a lot to live up to
comment: Yes the name is awesomely naff. However, the food is not. Five of us had the second sitting on Saturday night, which is a sign of how popular the palce is but also a limitation. First of all the food is delicious, with tender satay and I tried my litmus paper test of any Thai restaurant - the Green Curry. This had the requisite bite expected and was not a toned down western version. Not quite Bangkok hot, but close enough to be very tasty.Not cheap, the value is in thw quality. The drawback is the two sittings. We got there about 25 minutes early and there is nowhere to wait - so we wandered to the pub over the road. When we came back there was still someone in the seats allocated for us so they were discreetly hurried on. If you're in the first sitting you really have to watch the clock. Personally that's an off putter - or having to wait whilst people are ushered outand you're sitting awkwardly. The space even then is quite tight. So my judgement is that's it's good, but not top notch due to space and trying to cram too much in.

title: If it's your first time with Thai food, definitely visit this place!!!
comment: Went there for our wedding anniversary dinner. This was my first time trying a Thai restaurant in London. The food was delicious, great ambience and most importantly very very friendly staff. I have never come across such nice and hospitable staff. The waitress was very nice and explained the dishes where we needed a bit of help. She even brought us complimentary dessert which was very nice of her. Even the restaurant owner was very friendly and welcoming. Got full marks from missus for choice of restaurant as well :-)!!!

title: Discovered again
comment: It is a long time since we last ate in this restaurant - which is our loss. We had a really great evening, the service was excellent and our fish curry delicious. All at very reasonable prices. If you enjoy Thai food Awesome Thai is a must visit. A good idea to book it is deservedly busy!!

title: Consistently Good Quality Thai food and Value for Money
comment: I’ve never written a review before as I'm just not bothered. But I do think Awesome Thai deserves my effort, as you can tell the owner/staff have put a lot of effort and take pride in running the business (all in the details and the ingredients) and keeping their customers happy with their food and services. We’ve been there a few times as a family of four, and being Asians we do know what to expect in Asian food.  The owner/waiter always offered a friendly welcome, the place is always clean and tidy, he’s always happy to explain the dishes and alter it to suit our needs i.e. no nut, more spicy and different sauce etc. Their lunch bento offer very good value with good portion and variety. I enjoyed their curries with good balance of spices, herbs & body; I also enjoy the wide selection of salad that is refreshing. My kids love the Pad Thai and the non-spicy lamb curry. I must say it’s not the absolute best Thai food I’ve ever had (as it’d cost at least twice as much), but it is good quality food, value for money, lovely services, and enjoyable special treats and occasions.  Highly recommend people who love Thai food to give it a try.

title: Excellent service. Excellent cuisine.
comment: I have known the premises practically all my restaurant-going adult life - when it was my friendly local Indian. Somehow I thought I would never like the 'new kid on the block'. How wrong I was! As newcomers, my wife and I were treated with great courtesy and disarming friendliness. At the same time, the service was really attentive and efficient, without ever seeming robotic and rehearsed. The menu complemented all these favourable impressions. I am fond of Thai food and know (I think) roughly what to expect. A mouth-watering green curry for instance, washed down with perfectly chilled Singha beer! My wife had an excellent and less spicy stir-fried chicken with cashew nuts. Also memorable was the Pad Thai Koong: noodles with prawns, egg, spring onion and beansprouts etc.  I pushed the boat out a bit, but the meal for two still seemed very good value. All in all a delightful experience.

title: Great food and service.
comment: Visited on a number of occasions and never been disappointed; authentic Thai cuisine. Advisable to book on weekends.

title: Escellent
comment: Terrific family run retauarant , fabulous food and very friendly . I highly recommend this restaurant .

title: beautfil - as good as ever - Maybe even better
comment: So I made my yearly pilgrimage to Awesome Thai whilst working the ideal homes show. We were a group of 6 and had a truly wonderful meal - I spend 4 months of the year in Thailand and this is one of the few places that I eat Thai food outside of Thailand. We had mixed starters for everyone, A few curries, the sea bass seafood, Phad Thai, some fishcakes, fried rice and more - maybe over ordered - but we eat it all - and went through 3 bottles of wine - and lots of beer -  Only 200 for 6 - including tip - wow

title: Really Awesome Thai!
comment: Fantastic service, wonderful food, fabulous atmosphere .... keeps us coming back for more! Never disappointed!

title: Wonderful service as always
comment: We've often been to the correctly-named Awesome Thai, but this visit was special. I had a strange fainting fit,and the staff were exceptionally supportive and helpful: I can't speak highly enough of them! So thank you so much!  And the food was as good as ever, of, course.

title: Fabulous *****
comment: Awesome Thai is one of the best Thai Restaurants I've ever been to. Delightful food and second to none service to match...what else you need from a restaurant!!! Just go, give yourselves a treat!!!

title: Awesome
comment: Brilliant place. Good food. Charming staff. Reasonable prices. My new favourite restaurant in Barnes.

title: Fantastic Thai supper
comment: Monday night, date night - pre La La Land cinema trip. Perfect Thai. Great service too. Hadn't been here before although fairly local to us. Had a google and thought we'd give it a try - exceeded expectations by a long way. So much so we've just ordered a delivery for tonight! Thank you.

title: Just Go
comment: Just go and eat here, you will not be disappointed. From service to food I cannot fault it. 5 stars with doubt.

title: Great meal and venue
comment: Great food, really enjoyed it. Staff were very attentive. Nice vibe in the place. Recommend it for all.

title: Delicious food with attentive friendly service!
comment: We've been going to Awesome Thai since it opened. Lert (the owner) is a lovely host and knows how to make his customers feel right at home. The food is delicious - love the green curry & the flat noodles with bean curd and veggies - everything is delicious with quality ingredients. Thank you Lert for the Prosecco and Beer with the bottle opener for us to have at the movies after our dinner (for my birthday!). That was thoughtful and your kindness makes your restaurant even more special. We will return the bottle opener, i promise :-)

title: Great Restaurant
comment: This is really a very nice restaurant with great Thai-food. Came there without reservation, all tables were fully booked but the guys managed a table for me. The food is excellent and authentic, the waiters are nice and friendly, will definitely come back!

title: Just as the name suggests...amazing
comment: We had a great evening. The staff is super friendly...even offered to hold our 5 month old while we ate! Most importantly, the food was great. We had the red curry chicken as a main and it was the best we have had in the city. Well priced as well: two appetizers, 2 beer, 1 glass of wine and two main courses for £40. Go and enjoy!  Chris

title: San Valentine's dinner
comment: Awesome Thai is really awesome! Staff is very friendly and helpful. Food is exquisite, Thai with a touch of European. Good value for money, nice environment, cosy, good for romantic dinner or small groups. I'll definetly come back again!

title: A wonderful taste sensation
comment: I've visited this restaurant several times over the years with various sized groups, taken advantage of their home delivery service and even their lunch time self pick up service. I have never been disappointed even when the unmentioned pineapple in my curry had an adverse affect on me (I'm mildly intolerant) Not all the ingredients are listed in the menu so if you have a problem with something obscure like me I'd advise you ask. The staff are friendly and helpful without being over the top in this smaller venue. And the food...my goodness challenges you to dislike it. The flavours are clean and layered and are making me salivate right now just thinking about them.

title: Awesome with cake
comment: Once again  The Food was just awesome  The service charming We mentioned our forthcoming wedding and suddenly a personalised piece of cake arrives Our go to Thai Fabulous  Thanks folks x

title: Regular Thai Takeaway
comment: Super friendly local Thai. We always go for the takeaway option which is consistently good, always comes on time and is great value for money.

title: Truly awesome thai
comment: After seeing a great film at Olympic Studios popped across to the Awesome Thai. For a Tuesday night it was busy but we were still made to feel very welcome. Service was friendly, hospitable and quick. Food ordered was excellent. Would highly recommend. It certainly lived up to its name.

title: A gem of a find!
comment: Well as I said I am back again ! and recommend anyone looking for a great meal in lovely quaint Wexford try and eat here! Throughout the meal, I was always served with the utmost care and attention. The place was packed as I imagine it normally is; the only thing that supersedes the food is the exemplary service. The hosts are extremely attentive and work hard to cater to all their repeat customers.  The varied menu offers many authentic Thai dishes, as well as modern twists on classics, chicken satay is to die for, good selection of thai beers to enjoy too The restaurant did look busy - so book your tables!

title: One of the best family run restaurants around.
comment: What a great meal from beginning to end. Before we walked in the door was opened with great smiles all round and asked for jackets and seated on our reserved table. Even though we was the first ones there in the evening around 6.30pm this restaurant fills up extremely quickly and you will find out why, so book ahead! Service was great, you dont really need to wait around as they are always looking and checking to make sure all is good. Food was very fresh and extremely tasteful. Desert was really good too. What was surprising was when the bill came. They don't even charge service charge yet the service was near enough impeccable. This place is definitely a great shout for Thai food! Authentic, tasty, clean restaurant and great service. Only thing that could be improved is probably the size of the dishes, slightly on the small side. Couldn't of been an easier recommendation!

title: The little things
comment: What sets Awesome Thai apart is the attention to the little details that make a great experience. The food, for a start, was extremely tasty, hot, and fresh. Great service. It was our first visit and now we're regulars!

title: AMAZING
comment: This is one of my favourite restaurants in London. The service is amazing. I was given a beautiful Thai shirt for free ! Pricing is great and I think everyone should go.

title: Great service and tasty food
comment: Best restaurant experience in London. We will come again soon. You will not easily find a high level service like this. You have to try it!

title: Great Thai Dinner in London
comment: Came to Awesome Thai for my mom's birthday. She wanted Thai and so I used Trip Advisor to find a great Thai restuarant. I saw Awesome Thai was ranked high so I figured we'd give it a try. When I called the restaurant they were completely booked but I told them that it was my mom's birthday and they said they may have a table in the back if we came within the hour. When my party got to the restaurant we were actually given a better table. The food was pretty good. We all enjoyed our meals. To top it off after we were done eating they turned off the lights and came out with a surprise dessert with my mom's name on it. Everyone was singing happy birthday and she was so very surprised. I can't thank the staff enough. I would highly recommend and will return when I come back to London.

title: Best Thai meal outside of Thailand
comment: Great service, atmosphere and food!! Thoroughly enjoyed our evening here and will go out of our way to eat here when visiting London

title: Had to write another review
comment: This place always brings a smile on my face , I have been coming here many times now every time outstanding , I'm slowly working my way through the menu and every time finding a new favourite dish

title: Best Thai food in London
comment: Just Fabulous. Couldn't fault it. Great friendly service. Delicious flavours. Best Tamarin duck I've had in ages and the curries thoughtfully prepared. A real credit to the owner who has a passion for what he does. Bill

title: Terrific Asset to Barnes
comment: Everything about Awesome Thai is good - the friendly welcome, excellent menu and efficient service. Following a movie at the lovely Olympic Cinema, we shared an Awesome Thai selection of starters and then had various chicken, prawn and meat dishes with coconut and egg fried rice finishing with shared banana fritters - all delicious and fresh tasting. BUT - do book ahead as it is very popular and it is not worth risking a full house if you just tuen up.

title: Best staff!!
comment: Came here over Halloween weekend for a birthday meal with a group of 10. Cant thank the staff enough they were so kind, accommodating, welcoming, even brought our my cake with writing on the plate and brought a second plate with a slice of Tiramisu for me. The food was pretty good, I had red thai curry with prawns and coconut rice. Personally it wanst spicy enough for me, but I asked if they could make the sauce spicier for me and they remade within minuites and even brought me a pot of their homemade chilli powder to take home. So if you like spicy food prehaps mention that when ordering! Thank you so much guys, cant wait to come back soon :)

title: Awesome indeed
comment: Absolutely top experience, in all fronts - service, food, atmosphere, prices... overall Awesome Thai was easily one of the best restaurants I've ever been. No cons.

title: Tasty food
comment: Love this place service always friendly and with smile! Food is tasty and delicious! Keep coming back!

title: Good local food
comment: The restaurant is very popular with locals. It is not surprising as the food is good and well priced. The staff are very pleasant and the service is of a high standard.

title: first timer
comment: great food great service, really felt at home !! great service and great food all was excellent done have 100 words to fill trips requirements

title: London's treat!!
comment: I visit this place every time Im in London. Tom yum soup is always spicy enough- i like it sour! Sua rong hai as a main course with som tam salad and rice is like heaven on the earth!!!

title: Amazingly Tasty Thai Food
comment: We ate here for the first time on the weekend. Best Thai food I have eaten in England. There were 4 of us and I tasted a bit of everyone's dishes and all of it was delicious from the starter through to dessert. I will definitely be coming back here again the flavours were awesome as in the name of the restaurant.

title: Brilliant Expereince
comment: Visited with a family and had the best time. The food was great, the service was exceptional and my family were all very impressed. Have been back again since already and will be visiting plenty more as this is now our go-to Thai restaurant.

title: Absolutely Fabulous!
comment: Gave it a go after the cinema one night. Everything we tried was fresh and gorgeous. Lovely service too. Really pleased we found it.

title: Perfection
comment: Perfect Service Perfect Food Reasonably priced Made a special effort for my birthday Highly recommended

title: Exceeded our expectations. Nicest and Kindest Service.
comment: Busy restaurant and for all the right reasons. The whole experience is surreal. The food is incredibly fresh and authentically prepared, and Thai is a popular food in London, so we can tell the difference. The service is attentive and kind, that is, they are mindful of your needs and very polite and courteous. Seriously, this is one treat of a restaurant and a joy to write a review for.

title: Little gem
comment: Fab food, great ambience, packed restaurant even on a Wednesday. Unbelievable value. Thoroughly recommend.

title: Really good
comment: We had Sunday lunch here after a visit to the nearby Wetlands Centre. The food was top notch - clean, zingy and spicy. We booked about an hour ahead of arriving. Lunch (starter and main) was £120 for 6 of us with wine and very good value. The staff were all very friendly and attentive too. Recommended.

title: Delicious!
comment: I've been to this excellent Thai restaurant and last night did not disappoint. It was excellent as always. Very authentic flavours, quite delicious. But you do have to book as it gets full regularly.

title: Great pre Olympic cinema meal
comment: We booked 'awesome Thai' for a meal before watching the new Bridget Jones film. Great efficient service. Plenty of time to enjoy both a starter and main course. The Thai Beef Salad is wonderful! With a beer of course!

title: Awesome!
comment: This place is consistently awesome. The staff are so sweet and attentive. Although they don't have many wines by the glass, they are well selected and the ones I've tried hold up really well to the spicy food. We've worked our way through a good chunk of their menu and it's always really good.

title: my favourite restaurant in the area
comment: Amazing food. I eat here regularly and would say it's my favourite food in the area. Extremely lovely staff. Always smiling . You won't be disappointed by food although you might have to wait for a table these days as it's getting more and more popular. I always have the grilled chicken or beef because it has a tasty sweet/sour sauce. Can't recommend this restaurant enough and good value too !

title: Awesome thai, awesome food!!!
comment: Visited here with my family a few weeks ago and was very pleased. Awesome thai has it all... great staff,service, pricing and marinated lamb!!! Cant wait to visit again soon :))

title: Ok
comment: Been to this place after reading lot of good reviews  But according to me it's nothing different  It's not bad but not excellent

title: AWESOME food and service with a smile!
comment: We recently ate dinner at Awesome Thai on two different occasions - and it was FANTASTIC! We had wonderful meals, the atmosphere is great, the service was outstanding and every employee there greeted us with a big smile! On both visits, we were given a free sample of a dish they made that day - the Curry Duck, Pad Thai, Crispy Chicken (a special dish they made for us) were delicious - the Thai Tiramisu was out of this world. We have eaten Thai food for more than 20 years, at many restaurants around the world, and this was the best we have ever had - EVER! Awesome Thai lives up to it's name, if I lived in London I would go there every week!

title: Absolutely awesome!
comment: The food always delicious, service polite and very friendly. Nice atmosphere. My favourite Thai restaurant in London! Basically every dish I ever ordered was very very tasty! Can't wait to go back.

title: Awesome
comment: Been to this restaurant 4 times now in the space of a month, it's the best thai restaurant I have been to that's not in thailand  The pad Thai is the best I have ever had and everything I have ordered has been exceptional  Will be sure to be going back many times hope it stays the same

title: Excellent post cinema dinner
comment: We went after going to the cinema opposite. Delightful staff, excellent menu,Great food. Good idea to book - it's often full. We went on a Tuesday night and it was still full. However they fitted us in and our non-Thai food eating friends really enjoyed it.

title: Good Food, Friendly Service
comment: This was our first date so we were looking for something romantic. I asked to book the most romantic table which was only available at 21:00. On arrival, our table and the atmosphere were rather underwhelming. Not really romantic at all. For starters, we ordered the soft-shelled crab which was deep-fried and covered with too much crispy batter which stifled any flavours and textures of the crab itself. However, the main courses were far better...very fresh and tasty and we could not fault them for anything. The restaurant is basic but the food is very good, the restaurant is clean and the staff are extremely polite and friendly. If you are looking for a romantic spot this probably isn't it but if you are looking for a good Thai meal in a clean and friendly environment then this is perfect. We would definitely return once the honeymoon period of our relationship has passed!

title: Awesome Thai really is awesome!
comment: Have been twice now to this lovely Thai restaurant. Staff are very attentive, food is delicious and very well priced. Order the Lamb Massaman! On our first visit they even gave us a free desert and tea! Best Thai food I have had outside Thailand (and Australia). I will definitely be back soon.

title: Great food, great service
comment: Booked Awesome Thai for my partner's birthday. We've been here a few times and really enjoyed ourselves. We received a warm welcome upon arrival and complementary sesame toast. The food and attentive service was great, as usual. When I made the reservation I mentioned it was for my partner's birthday. Tony ensured he had the correct spelling of her name and we were treated to a complementary tiramisu with her name on the plate. Everyone in the restaurant sang her happy birthday! I would definitely recommend this restaurant and will return.

title: Best Thai food I've eaten
comment: Amazing meal. Lovely staff fantastic service. Couldnt have asked for more from a restaurant we just stumbled across.

title: Excellent Thai experience
comment: Found this restaurant on TA and booked a table for 2 on a Saturday evening. The staff are extremely friendly, from booking on the phone to dealing with us at the restaurant. The food was superb...had a sharing platter to start and then Huge prawns and a green thai curry. It was very reasonably priced and will 100% be returning!!

title: Quick bite to eat on the way home from the wildfowl and wetland trust...
comment: Popped in on the way back to Hammersmith on a sunny evening. Delicious, fresh food with excellent service. Highly recommended!

title: Great Birthday Celebration
comment: Finally after so long returned to this wonderful Thai Restaurant in Barnes, London to celebrate my partners birthday. This hidden gem celebrates it's 5th birthday in 2016, more staff and as always very busy so make sure your book well in advance to avoid disappointment.  Happy to see all my favourites are on the menu with some added touches complimentary of the Chef for all dinners. The food is tasty, fresh, hot and hot plates are added to tables to keep your ordered food hot.

title: Great little Thai!
comment: Stumbled upon this little Thai restaurant in the heart of Barnes village on the way to the Olympic Cinema. Very happy that we did! Nice staff, great service and excellent value. Make sure to try the Green Chicken curry which was excellent!

title: Took my girlfriend out for her birthday..
comment: ..and it was amazing. The atmosphere was great and the service was perfect. The menu was clear but nothing really stood out in particular. I ordered the lamb and mint grill - which was quite tender and tasty - and my girlfriend ordered Thai noodles which smelt and tasted fantastic.  The highlight of the night was when the staff sang happy birthday and brought out a cake made from homemade Thai tiramisu! A fantastic way to end the night and an all round great service.  I recommend the place to anyone who enjoys Thai food.

title: Delicious Thai food in the centre of Barnes
comment: I visited this restaurant one evening over my Easter Holidays. The menu was varied and the service was extremely friendly. The food was very fresh and delicious. I shall definitely be returning here sometime. Thankyou.

title: Memorable Visit
comment: Ate here last night after a film at the Olympic. The mixed starters were superb with a good range of dipping sauces. Four of us all chose different main courses and we were all delighted with them. The bill was reasonable so all in all would highly recommend the awesome Awesome Thai!

title: Great Thai
comment: Pleasantly surprised and will definitely be back! Absolutely delicious Thai food. A winner! Green curry one of the best I've had. Very friendly and polite staff

title: Great food and super friendly staff
comment: We visit this Thai just opposite the Olympic nearly every month - it never disappoints. The food is fantastic and we are always greeted with big smiles and great service. Really convenient pre or post the cinema.

title: Second visit - as marvellous as the first!
comment: This remains the best Thai in London. Wish it was closer to where we live but we can now visit en route to Heathrow. Fabulous fish cakes Great noodles. Got lovely complimentary pannacotta kiwi fruit dessert which I would order next visit. If you're ever in Barnes don't miss this great restaurant

title: Not so awesome food unfortunately
comment: I really want to give Awesome Thai a good review, because the atmosphere is lovely, and the waiters/waitresses are really very welcoming. Unfortunately the food is just not up there with supreme quality Thai restaurants.  The Tom Kha soup was too sweet, and devoid of colour - almost as if the life had been sucked out of it. The rest of the food was also much too sweet, and also had some strange after tastes as if there was an imbalance in the amount of garlic/herbs used. Unfortunately a forgettable experience as far as the food goes.

title: Lovely food + great service
comment: Me and my girlfriend Just moved to Barnes and since we love Thai food we decided to Have a go at Awesome Thai. The food is good and the price correct. What makes the food even better is the service. The owner and his wife are very friendly and always serve with a smile. After my first visit,my girlfriend and her parents went there aswell and they also thought the food was very Nice and the service even better. If ever in Barnes and feeling like Thai food, go to Awesome Thai!

title: Awesome Food!
comment: Family of 6 went to Awesome Thai for reunion dinner. The staff were welcoming. The menu was extensive, well described and good indication of how hot the dishes were. We ordered a variety of dishes to share (the way to go!). The deep fried soft shell crab was delicious. Well prepared and delicious dishes. The service was efficient.

title: Lovely food and vibrant atmosphere
comment: Barnes can be quite quiet in August but you wouldn't have known it here. Lovely food. Really enjoyed the 'awesome platter'! Will be back

title: Brilliant Food and Service
comment: Popped in here on a whim and had a beautiful dinner.  They were really busy but did everything could to accommodate us. We had the starter platter (highly recommended as we couldn't decide between starters) and then a Thai green Chicken Curry and prawns with Garlic and Pepper - all were delicious and not too heavy/greasy. We will definitely be coming back'

title: Amazing!!!
comment: Comfortably the best Thai in London! Exquisite food, amazing staff and a homely atmosphere. Have been a few times now and it only gets better! Don't miss this one!

title: the name says it all , it was awesome indeed ,
comment: i took my american friend to dine at awesome thai in barnes after the embarrassing and below par lunch at ethos resturant just off oxford street, hoping he will like it ,he was over the moon, the moment you walk through the door you are treated like royalty, food was fabulous ,service second to none, not 5 but 6 stars simply because the owners themselves serve and take care of their clients always happy to help also explaining each dish and spice , none of the boring and corporate resturants, will definitely go back again , a big thank you to the awesome team at awesome thai

title: James
comment: Hi I'm so happy to discovered and find (Awesome Thai).it is not just the food the staff are very attentive to your knees. customer service and food 150% worth your money and your taste buds will be tingling for more. it is one if the best and is on my top 5 restaurants lost. 9.5 out of 10 Thanks

title: Lives up to its name!
comment: Truly awesome. Wonderful fresh food, perfectly prepared. The staff are attentive and friendly. Can't over recommend it

title: Awesome Thai really is awesome
comment: Had a fantastic dinner here with friends on a Saturday night. The place was packed as I imagine it normally is; the only thing that supersedes the food is the exemplary service. The hosts are extremely attentive and work hard to cater to all their repeat customers.  The varied menu offers many authentic Thai dishes, as well as modern twists on classics. I ordered a dish that wasn't on the menu and it was sublime.

title: South East Asian surprise in South West London
comment: Grilled meat was cooked as requested (the cut was not fancy but good value and flavour). Tasty green curry nicely spiced as promised; my guests wanted medium and it is what we received. The pad thai was fresh not gooey (too often this dish has rubbish gooey sauces while this approximated ones I have had in Asia). Definitely one of the best Thai restaurants in London.  They were generous with the prawn crackers but I wish they were hot these seemed to have been made earlier in the day.

title: yes, it's true! it's awesome
comment: I ordered shrimps and asparagus with some coconut rice and it was delicious! Cook heavenly, simple dish but powerfully tasty. Staff was awesome and we finished in less than 45 min. The only problem tho is that you need to know the address because it's not so central and you need to take a cab, but it's worth it. I hope to come back really soon.  One of my best top 3 thai restaurant! ;-)

title: awesomeness
comment: great lunch . had the special fish fillet wrapped in panda leaf and my partner had jungle curry which wasn't on menu but they made specially for her. both were very tasty and good portion size. great service very friendly and was given a dessert on the house that was very nice. great value too. would recommend highly

title: Local Gem
comment: We have always enjoyed great food and friendly, attentive service at the Awesome Thai. Their grilled dishes are a particular treat. It's well worth a visit.

title: A very fitting name!
comment: My gf and I went for a meal yesterday after looking for some new Thai in the area. Boy, were we in for a treat! The restaurant is small, but the decor is lovely, and the atmosphere is warm, cozy and friendly. We started off with the mixed platter and the scallops. Those scallops were amazing! - full of flavour and the mixed platter was fresh and crispy and delicious! For the mains, the pad thai and the grilled marinated lamb - both unbelievable dishes. The flavours were intense, and the lamb melted in your mouth! The thai tiramisu sounded like an interesting combo - and it was amazing! Homemade too! The panna cotta was great - the kiwi sauce is to die for! We will definitely be back and recommend anyone looking for a great meal in lovely quaint Barnes to eat here! Throughout the meal, we were always served with the utmost care and attention - and the complimentary prawn toast and tea were a lovely touch! The restaurant did look busy - so book your tables!

title: Simply amazing
comment: I have visited Awesome Thai with my friends a few weeks ago and we were treated royaly. Pam, Lert and the team were so welcoming and kind like family. After great food recommendations from Pam, we enjoyed the most amazing thai food we've ever had. Our favouritere were the sharing platter as starter and the grilled main courses. My friends loved it so much, they went a few days later again with another friend, who loved it too. Well done Awesome Thai team for making our dinners so special!

title: Exquisite food from an excellent host!!!
comment: I order takeaway from this restaurant quite often since my office is close by. The food is excellent quality and cooked to perfection whenever I have ordered from here.  The owner is an extremely approachable guy who is always polite whether he's taking your order over the phone or in person. I particularly like the Keak Yang which is the grilled lamb. Tiger prawns are always a good choice as too is the soft shell crab. Would gladly eat there every day if I could afford to.

title: Review
comment: One of the best restaurant experiences I’ve ever had.  Attentive but not invasive service that go to great lengths to make sure you get exactly what you want - made us a vegetarian dish with no hassle.  Delicious and fresh food.  Great value.  We could not recommend it enough to couples, families, everyone!

title: Amazing food
comment: We went for my sisters birthday. There was quite a few of us. Staff were very friendly. Didn’t have to wait long for the food and was great. We all really enjoyed it.

title: Check it out!
comment: This place was the silver lining on a miserable afternoon with a missed flight connection at Heathrow. Stranded for the night, I found this place right up the road. Incredible Punjab cuisine. Extensive drink list and food menu. The server Punam was a gem. Highly recommend to fellow weary travelers who want to opt out of the airline’s comp hotel meal.

title: Lived it up to its name
comment: Dangerous business calling your restaurant "Awesome" ... so could it live up to expectations? A resounding yes! Quite small but cozy place, lighting appropriate for evening meal. Clean & tidy. Service very good - one waitress in particular was ever so friendly & attentive. Prices very reasonable. And, finally, the food ... delicious! Very tasty little veggie spring rolls followed by a veggie & bean curd sweet & sour which was also really good. The other half very much enjoyed the thai satay followed by a mild chicken curry. Not normally excited by dessert in Thai restaurants but mildly curious about the "Thai Tiramisu" on the menu - wow! Had a smidgen of coconut in the taste & the base was sort of biscuit rather than the traditional sponge but all of this added to the enjoyment. So, all in all, a really good meal & can't wait to go back!

title: Excellent!
comment: What a fine food experience ! Went there with a colleague for supper, the food was excellent, the service too, such friendly people, totally worth the 20mins drive from the hotel. We'll be back for sure !

title: It really is awesome.....
comment: What a find, a charming restaurant in Barnes. The welcome and service was refreshing, smily, helpful staff, nothing was a problem. The food was delicious and there was something for everyone. Sadly our first visit was a short visit, as we were going to the amazing Olympic cinema, but next time we shall take friends.  We will definitely be returning !!! Thank you

title: A cut above ...
comment: Located opposite the popular Olympic Cinema, this restaurant is popular and booking is recommended. We had an excellent meal, served swiftly, with the mixed starters and then an aubergine based dish and Pad Thai, both of which were excellent. The meal was topped off by the most delicious banana fritters and ice cream - 4 could share this dessert! We will definitely be back.

title: Great food and service
comment: Service was amazing, everybody was very friendly. The food was delicious! I went for the sea bass and was not disappointed.

title: Good food and friendly atmosphere and great value
comment: Had dinner for 2 on Sunday evening. The food was great, great flavours and the staff were very friendly and attentive. Also very knowlegeable regarding gluten free options. All for less than £20, absolute bargain. Will definetly be back.

title: Very friendly & great food
comment: Living nearby means we've come to this Thai on many occasions and it never disappoints! Very friendly & attentive staff, complimentary nibbles to start with and always very tasty food. Thai yellow curry is a favourite and great for those who don't enjoy much spice!

title: Awesome Food
comment: Best I have eaten in Barnes in a long time, will definitely go back, great value, very fresh, coconut rice was lovely, as was everything else. Thank you

title: Great
comment: The restaurant was well decorated and The  food was so tasty . The staff was friendly . We had a Great Experience. Highly Recommended

title: Best ever
comment: I took marinated lamb and it was best lamb ever i tried.. Staff was very nice and helpful. Can't wait to go back again!

title: 50th Birthday
comment: What a superb venue. The place is absolutely fantastic. The food was excellent along with first class service. The staff here at Madhu’s went out of their way to accommodate our needs. I don’t normally write reviews but the evening at this gorgeous restaurant was top class. I highly recommend taking a visit to Madhu’s to anyone who likes Indian food. I can’t thank you enough for the good food you served us and first class customer service. Thank you.

title: A very high quality restaurant in an unexpected location.
comment: Fabulous Indian food and service. The menu offers plenty of variety. The service was prompt and polite. Our waitress, Punam, was very helpful and attentive. The food was excellent.

title: Absolutely the best restaurant of all time!
comment: I must say The food was amazing without a doubt! I loved the ribs cooked by Charam and the staff were so keen and helpful especially Anmol. Who took care of me. Very friendly and kind. And thanks to the manager who also checked up on me regularly. Many many thanks and I will definitely dine again. I would recommend this place to anyone including my family.

title: Super yummy and fresh food!
comment: This is THE BEST Thai restaurant for sure. The food is exceptionally good and the staff create a wonderfully warm atmosphere. I'm vegetarian and the selection is very good. Even if you are just picking up take away, the staff are always friendly. Don't hesitate to book a table today :)

title: Fantastic restaurant!
comment: The reviews make this place sound amazing and they were absolutely correct!! The staff were so friendly and helpful, and the whole time were super attentive. Filling water and wine glasses, checking things were OK, opening doors and just generally polite. The food! Best Thai I've had in London, hands down. The massamun curry was devine, the lamb melted in your mouth and I literally spooned up all the curry sauce at the end. I'll certainly be back for that massamun. We also had the prawn, mint and cucumber rolls which were fresh and delicious also. My friend had the red curry which she also loved. To wash it all down was a good selection of wine, the NZ Sauvignon Blanc was delicious.  Price was exceptionally reasonable, and the atmosphere and decor was great. Fantastic restaurant for dinner, I can't recommend strongly enough.

title: Thai Tiramisu- homemade tiramisu with coconut
comment: First of all, ask for their salted seaweed when you arrive! It tastes amazing, and you can nibble it while you decide which dish to order.  The papaya salad and phad thai, in particular, stood out- although all the other dishes were amazing as well!  For desert, the Thai tiramisu was the best hands down- it was homemade tiramisu with a coconut twist. On the other hand, the pandan flavoured dessert really tasted good, it even came with ice cream!

title: Not that Awesome
comment: Cute place with excellent service. Unfortunately food while okay was just not spicy enough. We choose Thai cuisine when we want to eat something spicy - this was just sweet and sugary. If you can't take spices and want Thai this is the place for you. Not for me!

title: Ok
comment: Been here after looking at the fine reviews  But unfortunately it's not worth this hype  We tasted lot of starters and mains and one thing was common i.e. Lemon,which make food look like freshly made but it was not the case

title: Great friendly service and good Thai food
comment: We just moved to Barnes and this was our first stop at Awesome Thai. But it certainly won't be our last. The service was extremely friendly and the staff was getting out of its way to make us feel welcome. The food is classic Thai food well prepared. It is simply a good default place for a casual evening Out. We will be back.

title: Very good service, great food!
comment: The staff is accommodating and welcoming, they offered complimentary entry and dessert as it was our first time. Food definitely super tasty and coming in big portions. Both me and my partner never had Thai food before and we will definitely come back to Awesome Thai!

title: Fantastic discovery and delicious food
comment: We had a fantastic meal with friends. Service was friendly and the food from start to finish was delicious. Good value. We will definitely return. All covers were full - it is a victim of its own success and we had a timed table between 7 and 8:30. We went for dessert at the red lion almost opposite which we also enjoyed.

title: As awesome as the name
comment: Great service and staff overall.  5 Star. Good value for your money. I have been here a couple of times and on each occasion I've rated the service 5 star.  Great location too.

title: The taste of Thai food across the globe
comment: This restaurant create a unique characteristics that attract many people in England. The taste of food was really tasty and their services was really nice. This Thai restaurant provide more than the services but also the care to the customer. I can say in this point that you will never disappoint in this restaurant, and they will make you meal valuable. All of their material were prepare and kept in the way that enhance the benefit to the customer by using all fresh meat and vegetable to serve their customer. In Thai people view, customer was the god that they have to respect and that was the reason why they are the one and always be.

title: The little details made it out favourite restaurant in W London.
comment: The service was great and this is our first time we have eaten in. I mentioned that I liked Jasmine tea to the gentleman, did they have any and that I may wish to order some later on the meal, forgot and then the whole table of five were bought some out on the house at the end of the meal. It was Fortnum and Mason too so not just any tea.  The sauces are exquisite, I opted for the lemon scallops and I rarely get to the point where I actually wished that I could somehow eat all the sauce left on the plate- I could have picked up the dish!! The Penang curry is wonderful too. I have been to Thailand and the dishes were as nice as any authentic eatery. Lovely relaxing atmosphere in which you are encouraged to take your time and enjoy the food rather than just being thrown out of the door. Thank you and we will be back again soon.

title: Family supper
comment: This restaurant is a real neighbourhood gem - great food, friendly service, reasonable prices - what more could you want?

title: Great food and service
comment: Went for a Sunday lunch with the wife, had a mixed starter, papaya salad and a green curry between us. Food was very fresh, portions big and staff very friendly. Room is bright and atmosphere relaxed. Already looking forward to our next visit to try a few different dishes.

title: Brilliant Barnes secret!
comment: This restaurant doesn't look awesome from the outside, but when you are inside... It is. The service, the food, the wines are all Awesome! Favourite dishes are duck in Tamarind sauce, pad Thai, large prawns grilled, prawn and fresh salad pancakes, chicken red/ yellow curry and beef salad with coriander & lime. All good is fresh, with gorgeous herbs and spices...They often give you an appetiser as a little gift. Booking is a good idea as they do get busy. It's my favourite restaurant in Barnes!

title: Amazing food and service
comment: We have experienced a great attention for customers, good recepies and ingredients. From the main dishes to the dessert it has been amazing. super recommended!

title: Great food for reasonable price.
comment: This is a family favourite and excellent for Thai food without breaking the bank. Good service and the curries and shops are outstanding.

title: Mr
comment: Good food, great service. Friendly staff.  Very good value for money.  We found the restaurant purely by chance and it was a very pleasant surprise.

title: Simply Amazing!
comment: This place offer you an authentic tasty food just like you were in Thailand. The Panna Cotta with Giwi sauce is soooooo amazing

title: In shock and awe...
comment: So, we decided to dine tonight on my birthday, me and my boyfriend. My boyfriend and myself both work in restaurants And enjoy an Indian regularly and we were just shocked at just how good the food and service was, if I’m honest, my boyfriend felt a little embarrassed that his workplace just didn’t get close. I’ve never been so blown away at a meal, I’m not sure how you get that much flavour into meat and just how mind blowing the gulab Jumam was... Lastly, Punam was lovely, she did more than expected and did something special for me for my birthday, bringing out a slice of cake with a chocolate message. We will be back!

title: Sunday Thai Lunch-hidden gem.
comment: Enjoy my Pad ka paow dine. The Lamb-thai-fusion dish's sooooo goooood*repeat*sooooo gooood with the mix of mince and thai spicy sauce- this one is highly recommended. My aunti'd a cute lunch box that it came with the green curry-very common dish for Thais but im so in love with how their lunchy menu represented. It s on my list to visit again when im homesick for Thaifood!

title: Awesome by name....
comment: Truly exceptional food. Possibly the best Thai food I have ever tasted. The staff are utterly delightful too. We only popped in for a quick pre-cinema meal but were tempted to order more starters after finishing our main courses they were so good!

title: I absolutely love it here.
comment: I absolutely love it here. My favourite cafe ever. So friendly. So clean. So many great dishes. Thank you for the great food.

title: A wonderful new discovery
comment: We went to Awesome Thai following a string of good reviews here and the recommendations of friends who live nearby, and had a great meal.  It's quite small and friendly (seems like family-run), with a local clientele who clearly value it and we could see why. The food is delicious, freshly made and of a very high standard. We had the same in each case: spicy seafood soup followed by prawn green curry with steamed jasmine rice, and both were outstanding. They certainly didn't stint on the (very large and delicious) prawns, always a good sign. Prices were very reasonable, too, and (perhaps because it was our first visit) we were brought jasmine green tea after the main course, and then a sweet to share, which was really kind. And a small thing, but significant: when we were ordering, we said maybe two servings of rice; the waitress said maybe one, and we could ask for another later, if we needed it. We didn't, but what stuck in the mind was that she hadn't tried to get us to order more than we needed just to make the sale. As I said, it was only our first visit, but it certainly won't be the last. Very highly recommended!

title: Thanks for a magic evening!
comment: Beautiful people, beautiful food, beautiful place!! Thanks so much for our lovely meal and really wonderful, friendly service. You made our day!! :)

title: Another fantastic meal.
comment: Really great. The best Thai I have ever eaten in outside of Thailand. Really great food. Fantastic staff And such good value Starters. Main courses.  and drinks. And a complimentary desert. For 60£ for 3 people.  So good.

title: Deserving of its name.
comment: We visited awesome thai for the 2nd time tonight. We had been there a year ago and had such a great meal we wanted to re visit it on this trip to London. If anything the meal tonight was even better.  Fantastic fresh flavoured food. Great choice. Lovely friendly staff. Some lovely treats of starters and desert given in true thai generosity. It's a truly welcoming restaurant and they value their customers support.  We will definitely return.

title: Nice enough; quick fix
comment: I have to be fair to AT: Having lived in Thailand and Thai food being one of my favourites, and with family out there, I am extremely difficult to please when it comes to Thai restaurants. The food is nice but - at least for me - truly nothing special. On the other hand service is friendly and efficient, atmosphere very enjoyable, prices reasonable. So is it a destination restaurant? No. But is it a nice restaurant to have nearby 'just in case'? Yes, absolutely. If you are hungry, want a pleasant evening, some good food, with nice people, without fuss, and dont want to remortgage the house for the courtesy then this is a nice spot.

title: Awesome Thai really is awesome!
comment: Since moving to London two years ago I've been searching for good Thai. I'm so pleased to say that I've finally found the best Thai in London. We had the tom yum soup, chicken kra pao and beef penang - all were super tasty and top quality.

title: Great Thai and great service. Thanks
comment: ecellente food atmosphere and service. Friendly staff intimate atmosphere great tastes. Spot on. Go there if anywhere near.

title: Great dinner, great service!
comment: We saw the good reviews online about this Thai restaurant in London, and it was even better than expected!! The service was really good, as they exchanged our plates for clean ones after every meal! The food was really good, the pad Thai was my favourite The dessert was definitely Instagram-worthy! Will definitely recommend and come here again!

title: A lovely evening
comment: 8 of us had lovely meal over Easter weekend at Barnes Awesome Thai. The staff were very friendly and accommodating and we would be returning soon.

title: Favourite cafe
comment: Adore this place. The food is always spot on. The coffee is great. Caters so well for vegetarians. Kate, Sam and the whole team are so lovely and always go above and beyond. The atmosphere is always vibey. Thoroughly recommend and will miss not working locally to have this as my local anymore. Thank you guys

title: Best cafe in town
comment: This cafe is by far the best place I’ve ever been. The people are so lovely and the food/drinks they serve as just as lovely. Kate & Sam, thank you! <3

title: The best Thai restaurant.
comment: The services is really good and the food come out very fast, so we don't need to wait for a long time. Also the food taste is really similar to Thai food that I ate in Thailand and it makes me want to go home in Thailand.

title: CAFFE-BREAKFAST-LUNCHTIME
comment: Best caffe-breakfast-lunch-meeting point! Thanks Sam for being there  Definitely recommend this coffee shop which is more than just a coffee shop.if you are looking for a tasty coffee its perfect,if you are looking for some food that is different from the normal fare that the big coffee chains serve then this is a good place to try.

title: The name says it all..
comment: Hands down the best Thai I've ever eaten. My girlfriend and I very much enjoyed our meal and the customer service was 10/10. We will definitely be back for regular visits.

title: Solid local Thai
comment: Not fancy by any stretch of the imagination but the service is always solid and the food quality consistent. Probably a little crowded in the front room and they could do with creating more space by taking just one table out. However all said it's a delight to have such a charming small restaurant serving good food on a consistent basis at reasonable prices. The location - being right opposite the Olympic Studio Cinema - is also very handy.

title: my favourite local Thai just got downgraded ....
comment: poor tom kha hed .... Have been ordering food from this restaurant for the past 2 year now and always had the feeling that I am as close as possible (in London) to a genuine Thai kitchen . My last order consisted in 3 dishes - one tom kha hed , one thai fish cake, one pad thai- nothing fancy, quick and easy dinner for one-ish.. Massive disappointment with the soup - 5.50£ for what was a clear broth with exactly 2 diced white cup mushrooms - where is the value? taste was OK, nothing to write home about. I could have done that at home for less than 1£. Ugh, sorry Awesome Thai , I shall rethink my order next time I am hungry .

title: Love this place
comment: This is a regular for us, having tried it for the first time in 2015. Have visited countless times as well as having takeaway and never been anything but completely satisfied. Curries are delicious, creamy and full of tasty morsels, starters and soups also super. Favourite though is lamb chops- absolutely superb!

title: Nice but not great
comment: A little cramped...GREAT service...food good..bit pricey. I probably wouldn't go again as there are better Thai restaurants in sw19.

title: enjoyable quick thai local
comment: Had a quick lunch here on our travels, enjoyable green curry and noodles were excellent as well we all enjoyed our food and would go back to try more things on the menu,

title: Great Thai
comment: Found this little gem quite by accident . Food was top notch, probably the best Thai we have had and service was great, can't wait to visit again. Thoroughly recommend it.

title: It gets better and better
comment: Still awesome as they are even better than the last time we visited. Just make sure that you ask for real Thai level of spicing and not the mild version.

title: Friendly Service & good food
comment: I regularly get a takeaway lunch but have also eaten in. The food is always good & the service very friendly. & efficient

title: A Thai restaurant as awesome as it sounds!
comment: Awesome thai restaurant in Barnes. I went here after a friend told me about it, yet I had never heard of it even though it is just around the corner from where I live. After trying it I cursed why I hadn't found it earlier and have been a regular ever since! The food is as awesome as the name of the restaurant suggests and the owner is chatty and polite and so are the staff. My favourites are the grilled sea bass special and the papaya salad, although almost everything on their menu is awesome. It's better than any other thai restaurant I have tried in London!

title: Excellent
comment: Great food, friendly owner, not too expensive. More variety than most Thais. Had a delicious desert on the house. Close to 5 star

title: A prawn feast!
comment: Enjoyed the food here, from the spring rolls to the prawn Thai salad and the Tom yam prawn soup - spicy and delicious! The wine was pretty good too. Fast service and affordable. Not fine cuisine by any means but a winner!

title: Still simple, and still simply very good
comment: Excellent evening. Nothing too fancy in the decor, but great food + good wine + excellent company = very good evening. Long live family restaurants!

title: Lovely, tasty food! Would recommend!
comment: Thoughtful staff (spotted my girlfriend accidentally touching a hot plate & brought her some aloe vera). Tasty food, lovely setting. Go!!

title: It is the best!
comment: 2nd visit with family is still second to none thai restaurant. My favorite is grilled marinated lamb, superb! Rest of family had green curry, duck with tamarind, pad thai, asparagus with king prawns, and beef salad. Such a great combination of wonderful dishes. Service was great and classy. Nothing better than this. Highly recommend!

title: Best Thai meal in London to date
comment: I benchmark all the Thai restaurants in London by their red duck curry, which is my favourite dish.
