comment: I’m still sat here now as I’m that full I cannot move, it’s our first time here and will not be our last, we were welcomed by a really friendly waiter. The starters were quick as were the mains which was surprising as the restaurant was full. Whilst eating I’ve tried picking faults but I cannot find any, the food was hot, really tasty and lots of it. Can not recommend this place enough.

title: Excellent food and service
comment: We went last night 5 off us  Service is too class We oder chicken anarkoli spice curry chicken kala puri. Tandrooy mix grill Lamb bhuan sag aloo all of dish very  Tesyy.  We come back Again

title: Excellent Food
comment: Excellent and service from Mr Khan. Wonderful Chill Tikki and beautiful bombay aloo. We may move to Chingford because of this place! Strongiy recommended

title: Excellent all round experience
comment: Had a delicious meal with friends. Mr Khan showed us excellent service. Would highly recommend this restaurant

title: Delicious
comment: Excellent food and exceptional service. Very much enjoyed our meal here... would recommend to anyone.

title: Best Indian I’ve been to
comment: First coming here and will definitely be back! The food was great and the customer service even better - Thank you mr Khan! The lamb bhuna and king prawn puri were to die for! Can’t recommend enough.

title: Scrummy food
comment: Best in Chingford. Great service. Amazing food. Came all the way from Manchester. We'll be back next week for more.

title: Lovely restaurant
comment: I’ve been coming to this restaurant for around 8 years and i can say the staff here are so welcoming and go above and beyond to make sure their customers are happy. The food is always lovely and always comes out in the perfect waiting time. Highly recommend this place!

title: Mr Kahn thank you
comment: Came here with some business acquaintances, and feel lucky that I chose this restaurant.  Very friendly service and exquisite food.  Would highly recommend.

title: Unbelievable value
comment: Have eaten here four times now and it’s been consistent good. Great food, really friendly staff and unbeatable value.  Sam.

title: Amazing fresh food
comment: Mr Khan and Shah looked after us wonderfully . The food was amazing and fresh and we will be back next week. Their recommendations were excellent too . This place will get my custom going forward . Thomas

title: Amazing Thai food and service
comment: I’m a Thai food lover and I was impressed the quality of Awesome Thai! The staff is very kind and joyful! Check it out

title: Will definitely return!
comment: We had a wonderful evening on Monday as we were sending off our nephew who was over from the States and who is a chef. We were all impressed! The service and the food was excellent. Our neighbour recommended this restaurant and we had to agree with him it's definitely a great place to have an evening out with friends and family.

title: Visiting Gilwell
comment: One of the best curries had recently Great service friendly staff and excellent value for money. Cant fault it.

title: Spicy Bite on a Monday Night
comment: We visited spice station on a Monday night after a recommendation from a neighbour regarding chef. My nephew was over from the US and really fancied Indian food on his last night before returning. The food and service were excellent well prepared and presented. The service was attentive and not overbearing and the portion size were filling .One criticism would be that the decor needed refreshing.

title: Friday night feast!
comment: Me and my partner are regular customers of Spice Station and we enjoy the food & service every time! The flavours are delicious and the hospitality always leads us back for more! It’s a perfect treat on a Friday night! Highly recommended!!

title: Take away
comment: Just had a superb take away .. as usual. Very tasty and piping hot. Absolutely perfect. . Alway gratefully receives. Thanks  .

title: Best Chingford Indian restaurant
comment: Spice station is one of our all time favourites. Great value for money, cheaper than the other local Indian restaurants. The staff are all friendly, polite,helpful and knowledgeable. It has a warm relaxed atmosphere. We really look forward to our weekly visits. The food is excellent, you won't find better value for money anywhere.

title: Bubbish Food
comment: As a chingford resident, I've been popping in to this restaurant every now and then for a curry since its been open. The staff are always friendly and welcoming and the food has always been ok. After my last visit as few months ago when they served up a dissapointing meal, I was in two minds whether to return this evening, 25th Oct, especially since 1 The Avenue is only a short drive. For convenience, a 2 mins walk from my home, I returned with 2 other diners. All three of us agreed the chicken was way too dry. The mushroom bargi was awfull, definately not fresh. Mushrooms are supposed to be juicy. They were chewy! How can you ef up mushrooms? Microwaved? Even the papdoms were'nt crispy. Very poor all round. I definately will not be returning again, ever!! Frankly, I recommend you give this place a wide birth. 1 The Avenue at Highams park has never served me a bad meal and the Indian Ocean at Theydon Bois serve good food.

title: Best Indian in Chingford without a doubt with the most friendly service!!!
comment: Quality of food is amazing with big portions. You can’t fault the service, they go above and beyond to make your experience the best! Would highly recommend

title: Visit with Friend
comment: Exellent service from Khan. He was very informative and welcoming from start to finish. We had an enjoyable meal and were cared to, to perfection. I would highly recommend this place. Food was fantastic.

title: Avoid this place!
comment: My sons chicken was cold, wasn’t cooked. It was red inside and I hope he won’t get food poisoning. The delivery was postponed a few times and we had to wait over an hour. My food was too sweet. We haven’t even got a refund. I’m worried that they do not follow safe food preparation rules. Avoid this place.

title: Awesome - It’s in the name
comment: This was our second visit to the restaurant having been meaning to come back for a while, with everything just as good if not better than the first time. The staff were incredibly welcoming and made us feel as though they couldn’t do enough for us. The food and speed of service was excellent and the atmosphere just right for a date. Without question one of my favourite restaurants in London.

title: Lovely!
comment: Excellent service as always! Well Recommended. Best Indian in Chingford. Chicken tikka and sag aloo is the best

title: Superb food, super service, highly recommended
comment: Always welcoming and a wide range of dishes to choose from on the menu. Never lets you down for a great evening of food and drinks

title: Amazing curry with helpful service
comment: When entered i was greeted with respect and while waiting for my starter there was someone there to ask for more drinks and things, when food was here not only the smell was amazing but food too. I had also ordered more food while my main food was here and there was no complain from the staff, usually there is in other restaurant.

title: Lovely food.....on a regular basis...
comment: Have been eating at spice station for about 10years....lovely food consistency...and service is really good too..

title: Curry club with the lads
comment: Been using this restaurant for 10 years, still the best Indian in Waltham Forest! Outstanding food and service, and one of the most reasonably priced in the area. My man shaha has always been more than welcoming to me and all my family when any of us visit. I’ll look forward to more future visits

title: Love it Here
comment: Having been loyal customers at another Indian Restaurant for many years about years ago we changed our allegiance to The Spice Station and have not looked back. Everything about the place is just right. The staff, led by Shah are so friendly and welcoming and nothing is too much trouble for them. Service with a smile and very attentive. The restaurant itself is well appointed and always spotlessly clean. Most importantly though all of the food is absolutely delicious from the Poppadoms to the slices of orange at the end. We have had many meals here since our discovery of it, and cannot believe what we have been missing. We normally go as a foursome and not one of us has ever had anything other than a superb meal at a reasonable price. Also the house wine is very good and incredibly reasonably priced and compliments the delicious food perfectly. Highly recommended.

title: First visit - impressed!
comment: Visited whilst staying in London for a few days, very welcoming and friendly atmosphere. Our waiter was very attentive and offered us a free drink after our meal.  Food was lovely and very reasonable prices!

title: Mum’s birthday celebration
comment: Outstanding food, Outstanding service, Value for money. Best Indian food in Chingford. We recommend this restaurant. My Mum was made to feel special on her birthday.

title: Food good but too cramped
comment: I went for dinner with a friend. Good was very good. Staff very attentive. When we first got there it was fine apart from the very strong smell of some sort of airfreshner. When more people arrived it was quite uncomfortable as the tables were very very close together. It would be much nicer to not be inches away from the next table.

title: Father’s Day dinner
comment: Come to a spice station for a father’s day meal - lovely food, quick service. Friendly atmosphere. Would come again

title: Well recommended
comment: Amazing atmosphere, friendly staffs, polite, food amazing taste, very fancy... 100% recommended and price was very good too. So it’s worth a try.

title: Real Thai food
comment: Real Thai food for a good price. Here you can find some unusual receipts out of the typical touristic dishes.

title: Authentic Thai cuisine
comment: Second visit here after being recommended by a friend. By far the best Thai in the area... in London in fact. The food is amazing but the service is second to none. Complimentary crackers & prawn toast on arrival which is unheard of these days. Served with a smile. Beautifully presented and food as good as in Thailand. HIGHLY RECOMMEND

title: Nice meal
comment: We booked for a saturday even and was very full when we arrived. We did not order starters however they brought mini prawn toasts free of charge and was very nice. Had a chicken stir fry and asked for spicey and was not at all. So asked for extra chilli Efg fried rice was not really egg fried rice. Table beside us sent theres back for that reason. However food was good and staff nice

title: Tasty food and service
comment: The meals we've had here have always been to an excellent standard, full of flavour and cooked perfectly. Service is great and very friendly. Looking forward to our next visit.

title: Nice curry after Christmas
comment: The food in this restaurant is outstanding and portions are large. King prawns are to die for. Very reasonably priced and drinks too. Will go again soon

title: Lovely restaurant
comment: This is a lovely little restaurant by chingford station the food is great and reasonably priced the service is friendly.I would definitely recommend this place if you fancy an Indian.

title: Best curry restaurant
comment: Really great food at a very reasonable price. The manager and staff are very helpful. It’s better to book as it gets busy as it’s so good

title: My go to restaurant!
comment: My go to restaurant as always guaranteed good food and service & reasonably priced.  The sag panir and tandori king size prawns are just so yummy. The take Away is also so good but a nice treat to dine there. I love that the owner/manager always gives you a handshake and welcomes you so well & looks after you. Keep up the good food

title: Great meal
comment: Had a great meal. I recommend the tandoori chicken and Ada chicken. Great service and all staff friendly and helpful. I don’t go anywhere else for my curry!! .

title: Banging curry
comment: Great curry, loads of variety and really friendly staff! Beers were nice and cold too! Definitely recommend if you feel like a cheap curry!

title: Incredible
comment: High quality food and service. Extremely friendly staff. The food was of the highest quality. Would recommend

title: Good night out
comment: Had a family dinner with my wife and daughter. Great food good service and good price. Couldn’t fault it.

title: Allison
comment: Have tried lots of restaurants in Chingford and this is the best. Friendly welcome, great service and delicious food

title: Authentic
comment: Visited this place on a number of occasions for a lovely Ruby Murray. Food is very tasty and service is fast. Friendly staff but not too overpowering. Mood lighting is nice and relaxing whilst eating, tasteful decor. Would recommend!!

title: Good food, great staff even greater beer.
comment: Great birthday dinner with friends. Cold beer and friendly staff. Good food, large portions, maybe a bit too large as I would have liked to sample some more but had no more room. Extensive menu with loads of dishes to choose from.

title: Best Indian Restaurant
comment: I have visited lots of Indian restaurants and the food here is outstanding, it never fails to disappoint. The staff are incredibly friendly, I visit or get a take away time and time again.

title: Great food great service
comment: Can’t fault this place in anyway! Everything was amazing and we will defo return!  Staff were very accommodating and it’s always busy so defo book

title: Lovely food
comment: It’s was a fantastic night at Spice Station,food was fantastic and service was very good.we will definitely come back again.

title: Just incredible!
comment: We were in Chingford for a spa day and didn’t know where to go for dinner. After Google searching and finding Spice Station, we gave it a go! All I can say is I’m gutted I live so far away otherwise this place could easily be a weekly trip for me! The food was so tasty, so much spice and flavour. We had four different main dishes and I couldn’t figure out which one was the best as they were all amazing. The service was also fantastic and when they noticed it was one of my friends birthday, they offered us complimentary drinks and a cake. Very reasonably priced and the sauces for the poppadoms were good! Highly recommend this place! The staff were very friendly!

title: The best Indian around ... promise!
comment: This Indian has the best food, amazing ambience and the best service. Last night we visited and it was their 7th Anniversary and the food was free. Can you imagine any other restaurant doing this? We go to this restaurant every week and we have always had an excellent meal. The chicken is so tender and the vegetables are amazing. I love it here - and it’s great for all the family. Best Indian restaurant for miles!

title: An exceptional restaurant and bar.
comment: This is very much a favourite restaurant of mine.There is a wide selection of dishes on the menu and the portions are generous. I favour Chicken xacuti which is aromatic with deep flavours. The staff are very attentive and the owner ensures there is a high standard.

title: Disappointing
comment: First impression of this place was that the waiter was quite abrupt. Seemed a bit put out and not too bothered about taking our order. Food was ok.....not the best we've had. The massalla was very red which was off putting and the panir was tasteless. Pretty disappointing. Won't be going back and no we didn't tip .

title: Excellent food, good service
comment: A lovely meal out with friends. Service was fast and very warm. Starters and main were all brilliant, very tasty and good portions. Would definitely recommend

title: Very good
comment: As far as Indian restaurants go this one is very good. Clean Good service All dishes very good Very reasonably priced  Would recommend  Would return.......infact it's one of our regular eateries now. Long may it reign.

title: Amazing place
comment: Great food free shots fun and cheap! Can’t ask for any more. Celebrating an 18th birthday would defo recommend.

title: Best Indian food in Chingford & furtber
comment: Best Indian food in Chingford by miles. We have been coming to Spice Station since it opened. The food is always so fresh, couldn’t recommend more.

title: Appalling meal.
comment: Got there 8pm and we were seated upstairs where there were very few people. Took ages to take our order and after being there an hour we asked where our starters were. When they eventually arrived they were stone cold. The main meal was mediocre.  We complained to one waiter who said it wasn't his fault but the fault of another waiter. When another couple left the restaurant they told us to watch our bill because they had been overcharged by £15.00. Overall a horrible experience.

title: Beautiful evening
comment: Had a lovely meal at Spice Station with my family. We was given the table upstairs which was great as we had children with us. The food was great flavour on the right point, so was the waiters they didn’t rush us to order and gave us time. Complementary drinks was offered and chocolate given to my children really made me feel welcome from beginning to end.

title: Spice Station
comment: We visit Saturday night Spice Station in North Chingford,The food is really good and service was fantastic.I recommend this restaurant to everyone.it was our first visit to Spice Station definitely we’ll come back again.

title: Fantastic food
comment: Food is very nice and fresh,lovely decor great service.they look after us very well from start to end.we will come back again.

title: Evening with friends
comment: The food is so good I’ve been here two days on the trot amazing service fantastic food, this has got to be the best place in Chingford to go for a curry.

title: Recommend this place
comment: This was recommended by probably the fussiest person I know. And he was right. It's exceptional. Food was tasty value for money, good service and above all very clean. Good size portions. Enjoy !!!!

title: Fancied a curry
comment: As far as curry houses go this is a great little place. The food was very Good, the service was excellent. It as very clean and very reasonably priced. All the dishes we had were enjoyed by all our group.....the vindaloo.....the jalfrezi.....the dansak......the biryani....... the tikka... no complaints at all.will make this our regular. Shame it's not close enough for a midweek take away.

title: Mother’s Day meal
comment: Lovely food and friendly service as always. The food always tastes so nice and freshly cooked. We go here quite often as a couple or with family and friends.

title: Valentine’s dinner
comment: Celebrated Valentines this year at Spice Station and it was a lovely experience. The restaurant was filled with balloons and there were love hearts decorated all around, I thought this was a really nice touch to add the the atmosphere. The food was lovely and cannot complain about the service. They even gave me a red rose and complimentary glass of prosecco at the end of our meal. Thank you for making our Valentine’s Day special!

title: Great food, nice surroundings.
comment: This place is fairly unassuming from the outside but their food is really good. They have a great range of food and the service is really good. The portions are generous and unlike a lot of restaurant they don't rush with the courses you can take your time. It has a nice atmosphere but is quiet enough to be able to talk over dinner. The prices are reasonable and what you would expect to pay for the quality of food.

title: A better experience than The Voujon......
comment: Nice decor, good atmosphere, friendly but efficient professional service without being smarmy or pushy. Food came on time and all dishes were very well presented. Food content was ample and it's quality excellent. We weren't asked 5 times "Is everything ok?" (I hate that), we were just left to enjoy our meal. No hidden extras or mistakes on the bill either. Recommended !!!

title: This visit surpassed our last......top drawer cuisine!
comment: Chicken Shashlick - gorgeous chicken , tender and so tasty. Lamb Biryani - succulent lamb exquisitely cooked in excellent rice.  Nice Veg Curry too. Sag Lamb - another perfectly cooked dish with succulent tender lamb with tasty spinach and dryish sauce. All dishes were good in quantity with plenty of meat and excellently presented. All dishes were moderately priced and great value for money. 10/10 - perfect !!!

title: Tasty food
comment: Cosy atmosphere and lovely food, freshly cooked. Reasonably priced.  Waiters can be a bit overly familiar, if you are a regular so keep them at arms length.

title: Highly recommend this Indian restaurant
comment: Travel all over the world filming & researching & when I get a great meal I always post a review as is the case when I'm not so happy. This restaurant was a great find ! Friendly , clean , fresh Indian cuisine the starter was a simple onion bhaji it was a light fresh batter with a fresh diced salad & mint yoghurt side just right on the pallet. Followed by a fairly hot curry ! Chicken jalfrezi with my choice of lemon rice all very well presented and after asking for some natural yoghurt to ease the heat it was plenty for one person and one of the best curries in a while so 10/10 for " Spice Station " Chingford Essex.  Slices of orange and a wet wipe to finish and an after dinner mint. Very nice great work Spice Station. William Windsor-King  August 28th 2017

title: Great Indian food
comment: Great Indian food, good service, reasonable prices. Always enjoy the freshly cooked food. Can recommend to visit. Friendly with kids.

title: Really Great
comment: Visited here many times. Staff and attentive, food is great. Downstairs looks classy with the waterfall wall. Always get liquor on the house at the end and the bill always seems better value than any other Indian in North Chingford. Really Great!

title: Was a lovely curry!
comment: The interior of this place is pretty cool and they have ample of space up and downstairs for large groups. Food has lots of flavor and the staff are on point!

title: Fantastic Food
comment: This was our second visit to Spice Station, returning again during our annual visit o the Scout Reunion at early Gilwell Park. The staff are professional, friendly and helpful, the food is simply amazing and the overall service is second to none. Our party of nine were catered for collectively, with no-one waiting for food and every dish served piping hot. At the end of the night we were each treated to a complimentary drink of our choice from the well stocked bar. This Indian eating house is well worth a visit and won't disappoint.

title: Amazing
comment: Have been here a few times and have always had great service and really good food as of tonight was no exception brilliant service attentive waiters and food was excellent as usual would highly recommend this establishment never been disappointed always on the ball thankyou so much for a perfect meal and perfect night

title: Be sure to check your bill!
comment: Awful place, spent the whole evening delivering the wrong dishes to the wrong tables, and added an extra £15.95 to ourbill. When we asked what it was for, because no dish was actually written nex5 t9 it, they claimed it was a mistake, for which they offered nothing but an apology and a claim of ‘human error’. Don’t be misled by the seemingly plush interior- we got seated upstairs and it’s a dump, especially the nasty brown carpet.

title: The best
comment: Amazing service and good vibes. Celebrating family birthday and was lovely. All very quick too. Definitely recommend.

title: Great food
comment: Overall amazing place, food is lovely and service is great, can’t wish for any more. Would recommend and was given free shots.

title: Amazing place
comment: Great place, vibe is unmatchable. Celebrated 18th birthday couldn’t think of anything better. Would recommended!!!

title: Top notch Indian restaurant
comment: Had a really great curry here. Wanted to try something different and the waiter suggested something on the menu which said "really, really hot! I said that I couldn't eat anything stronger than a jalfrezi, and he got the chef to prepare the meal to that strength. Well it was spot on. Not too hot or too mild. I would definitely recommend and will return when next in the area.

title: Spice Station Motivation
comment: I have to be motivated to write a good review. Well my first visit to The Spice Station was the motivation. Friends took us there, they had been before, so there were four of us dining on a busy Saturday night. Poppadum’s were crispy, always a good sign! The accompanying chutneys were delicious and there was an extra green one which is their own recipe and different, tasty and original. I like touches like that. The menu had quite a few dishes you don’t see in your average Indian and that told me we were off on an adventure. I never order duck, only in Chinese, but was intrigued by their “Duck Jalsha” Lean duck pieces first crisped over charcoal then mixed with mango and ginger, then cooked on fairly strong spiced sauce with bay leaf and coriander, garnished with strew potatoes and coriander.  There was a long wait from the poppadum’s till the mains turned up, but that tells me someone is cooking the food fresh and I am happy to wait. It was superb, as was the vegetable sides ordered and I would give 5 stars to the meal. As I say, if you want fast service and eat what everyone else is, go to Mc Donald’s. I’m happy to make a night of it. Clientele were quiet and atmosphere was friendly and calm. Service was attentive and caring and a drink on the house was a nice touch at the end with the hot towels and After Eights. All of us enjoyed our choice of food and the bill was very reasonable. Definitely going back. I could be a regular.

title: Meal out with my wife
comment: Fantastic meal out chef did something not in the menu tastes great always friendly staff great atmosphere

title: Excellent food, great value
comment: We eat here often. Food is always good, service is great, prices are reasonable. Highly recommended for both eating in and Takeaways

title: Amazing
comment: Amazing food & flavours they also adopt option to vegan & are all lovely & helpful,reasonable priced too.

title: Fantastic customer service!
comment: Friendly staff willing to provide anything for you. Food is really tasty and good large portions, definitely my favorite Indian in the area. Good atmosphere with a lot of customers.

title: Dinner before TV day
comment: Excellent food. Great popodums - quick service and big portions. Very friendly service and all done with a smile. Excellent table wear and attentive staff my Indian of choice in NE London

title: Top quality as always!
comment: We've eaten here a few times and regularly have a take away, last Saturday we attempted to try a different Indian restaurant (Very close by to this one) which was a disaster.  We hadn't booked a table and upon arriving the restaurant was really busy, however, the attentive and polite staff greeted us immediately and got us seated. Food and service was amazing as always. Staff are extremely pleasant and the complimentary drinks to finish are a lovely touch!  Lesson learnt.... stick what we know is good!

title: Watch out for the chill's!
comment: Me and my son used to eat here all the time once or twice a week friendly staff on the ball with the service good food my son loved the Chicken Korma i tend to go more spicy ordered madras came up with untold amount of chillies in it blew my 'Y' fronts off!! but still left tip because everything else was good. So we go back order same again but ask them to ease up on the chillies, again to many chillies it filled the rim of my plate up all the way round. Being a glutton for punishment we go again thinking third time lucky no chance. We now eat in the Indian 2 doors away with no problems you need to listen to your customers more to keep their custom chaps .

title: The Best
comment: We eat here regularly and it never disappoints. Best Indian restaurant in the area. Can get extremely busy at the weekend so service can be a bit slower but we don't mind as we don't like to rush.

title: Great curry
comment: Great food, service and staff was very good, butter chicken and naan was delicious! Swill definitely return!!

title: Great meal
comment: Had some great food and drinks. Definately reccomend, best in chingford - han was a great waiter very good.

title: Excellent service and food
comment: I haven't had service this good for a while. Had the spiced lamb shank but I'm sure everything is good. First class thank you

title: Looks Good but ...
comment: On Bank Holiday Monday in Chingford there was very little open to have dinner, so we decided upon Spice Station. It is a contemporary Indian restaurant whose décor is really good and very appealing from the outside. We ordered beers on arrival and poppadoms. When they arrived with a tray of four dips we couldn't eat them fast enough, they were delicious. We then shared a Tandoori prawn starter which was good too. I then went for the Duck Peshwari which stated it was cooked in coconut and nuts, as per the naan. However, when it arrived it was stacked with red peppers - my pet hate - and lots of onions. We had this with plain rice, motor paneer and lau bhajee (pumpkin with spices) and my husband had the Special, which was balti lamb tikka, chicken tikka and tiger prawn. The prawn didn't really fit with the rest of the dish but he did seem to enjoy his meal, unlike myself who didn't like the main. The lau was nice but the motor paneer was very gooey with no proper lumps of paneer in it. We were given a complimentary drink after dinner which was a nice touch. I would probably try it again in there, but not have the same dish or if so, would ensure that it was what I ordered, although the bill did say it was duck peshwari so ... Was OK Foxyfox10

title: Nearly excellent
comment: Very good / polite service and excellent food so why not 5*? The background music was more suited to a teenager's party, there was a badly damaged bench seat, the desserts looked like they'd come out if a freezer and all the main courses contained a whole garlic, why? Cost £25/head and I would strongly recommend.

title: Very Nice Food and Reasonable Prices
comment: The food here is very tasty and full of flavour. The prices are very reasonable also. We visited in June, 4 of us. Had a lovely meal, No Starters but we all had a main meal with extra side dishes like potatoes, mushrooms, etc etc and a few rounds of drinks. The bill was just short of £65. Which was a pleasant surprise considering it's North Chingford. The staff were very friendly and the place was very clean. We will visit again in the near future  8/10

title: A little bit special
comment: If you want a special night outthis is the place for a good Indian meal. Lovely meal , good friendly service, I couldn,t fault it.

title: Outstanding
comment: I am very fussy when it comes to Indian meals, ordered two starters (chicken tikka and calamari) absolutely gorgeous flavours. Ordered Chicken Vindaloo with special rice (not everyone's taste) and garlic nan (well 2 Nans in the end) and have to say it's the freshest tastiest flavoursome meal in a LONG time... Wish I hadn't gone to the Chinese up the road last night... Will certainly be recommending this place to my colleagues....

title: Dinner before a media day
comment: The welcome was warm. The food was served quickly and was tasty but not over spiced. The flavours were fragrant and measured. The food was also served hot and well presented. A excellent meal

title: Fabulous food & staff
comment: This restaurant has gone from strength to strength. Beautifully executed food from a interesting menu. Service attentive & friendly. Thoroughly deserves to be busy and pleased that it always is.

title: Love this place. Go every week.
comment: We're lucky enough to live locally so we go here at least 3 times a month. The food is fantastic, excellent value for money and the service is fabulous. They treat us like royalty every time we visit.  Love them.

title: Take-away was excellent
comment: Only had a take-away from here but it was excellent. The phoned in order was ready when I got there, the price was very reasonable and the food was delicious.  I will get Indian food from here again.

title: friendly staff
comment: the team here are really friendly and try to make your experience good. I find the food a bit greasy for me, but some of my friends love it.  Word of warning though big parties tend to block the kitchen, but if you are a small group it's a nice place to spend the evening.

title: Excellent - As Always
comment: Eat in Spice Station twice this week. Both times the food was constant and excellent.  Shah is a great Manager and clearly knows how to run an excellent restaurant. The food is tasty, good value and well presented.  Keep up the good work guys!

title: Great service..... Food hygiene ratings 3 out of 5 Oh dear me
comment: It looks very nice inside this restaurant and waiters are friendly. The tables are far to close together for my liking .  The wine prices are very reasonable.  We had a good meal here a few weeks ago, so I thought it would be just as good. We both had king prawn balti's which is what we ordered and enjoyed before. This time they were very oily, and had a very sharp taste of lemon, not the fresh type, it was so strong as if someone squeezed one of those plastic bottle types all over them, then forgot they did it and squeezed it again into the meals. I do like a drop of lemon, but this was bitter acids, we left the sauces.  I think maybe the chef was away, that would explain it. I wouldn't return, as I have just looked up there Food hygiene ratings 3 out of 5! . Needs to be 5 out of 5.

title: Lovely food
comment: Have had a few meals here and all have been great. Always get great service and very reasonable prices. Would definitely recommend.

title: Lovely place to go!
comment: My favourite restaurant of all time - we visit at least twice a month. The workers are lovely and so friendly, food is excellent and it has a lovely surroundings. I would never go to another local curry house if the choice was my own!

title: Fabulous
comment: My favourite Indian of all time! Food is delicious and the staff are friendly and make an effort to remember you. If you want a dish slightly hotter it's never a problem. Modern interior with music to match.

title: Great food & price
comment: This restaurant is very good value for money with main dishes between £5 - £6.50 which is cheap for London. The food was well cooked and meat tender, Naan Breads were traditional fire baked which added a great taste to the meal. The Cobra beer was cold and on tap.

title: Great tasty good
comment: First time at the Spice Station, and I'm really impressed. The food was outstanding and with a service to match.  Very well decorated, definitely worth a visit!

title: A fantastic meal on a very busy NYE!
comment: A full house as it was NYE but the staff coped really well, never looking stressed and always with a smile. The food was delicious for all 9 of us in our party, a nice table with plenty of room. A faultless night which is great going for how busy they were, well done to all their team, we look forward to going back soon!

title: Good food, great value
comment: We do love an indian........and this place is very good, décor a bit hit and miss but its clean, the service is good and the food is great and very reasonably priced. Will be going there again.

title: Disappointed
comment: Have been to this restaurant many times before and found the food and service excellent. However, went there yesterday evening (20 September) and was very disappointed with the service. We had to ask for the table to be cleared and when this was done some food was nearly spilt on a friend. When we asked for desert menus, we got '"one" for us all to share, so we did not bother with desert or coffee. We went somewhere else for a coffee. I normally always leave a tip, this time I did not. I will give the Spice Station one more visit and if it has not improved, that's it, i shall go elsewhere. Waiter did not seem very happy, enthusiastic or helpful the owner was not there, perhaps this was the reason for sloppy service.

title: GREAT RESTAURANT GREAT FOOD GREAT SERVICR
comment: Came here with my son, my friend and her son for a meal before going to the cinema. As always, a lovely meal and extremely good service. I recommend that you try this restaurant.

title: Friendly service but shocked to find out food hygiene rating
comment: Have been eating here for a couple of years, always had good service and food has been good. However bit shocked to see that they only have a good hygiene rating of 1 meaning major improvement is needed and this was on their last review on June 2014. Makes me think twice about eating here being quite OCD about cleanliness!!

title: Fresh food,excellent service
comment: Went with few friends for a meal at Spice Station there was lovely environment and friendly staff with delicious food.

title: Excellent Tasty Food , Good Service
comment: We visited this restaurant and found it overall to be a great experience , the food was very tasty indeed , mix platter and prawn vindaloo I would recommend , excellent value, the service was very good and friendly , I would recommend this restaurant and will visit again very soon.

title: Great Indian
comment: Me and my family all go to this restaurant and myself up to a couple of months ago went every week as we lived very nearby and we never got bored of the food as it's got a big selection. As I say we moved to Epping a couple of months ago which has a lot of restaurants to choose from and we as always do Indian was our choice and I now realise how lucky we were to have the spice station on our doorstep as there's no comparison.So guess where we was this week the Spice Station chingford and even though it cost us £30 round trip in a cab it was worth it,Epping is great but would be fantastic if they could pick up the spice station and put it in Epping Gary Lee & phoebe keep up the good work lads

title: Great Food - Service Could be Better
comment: I have been to Spice Station a number of times. I was originally introduced to the restaurant by my friends. We have returned on numerous occasions. I hadn't been for a while and I have to say that this visit left me rather disappointed.  The food is excellent quality. The balance of flavours and heat is just right. My favourite dish is the Chicken Pasanda, however, you can can't beat the Chicken Tikka with a nice cucumber salad. The service is usually great, sometimes a little to personal, however, on this occasion the service really let the restaurant and the management down. Everything was fine until we were asked if we were ready for our mains. We said yes, and the table was cleared, but we had to wait at least another 20 minutes. I have no objection to waiting, but when you are asked if you are ready and you say yes, you expect it sooner rather than later. I will be returning and would encourage others too. I just hope the service is slightly better.

title: Great service served with wonderful coffee
comment: Came in to supervise my daughter as she came here for a friends birthday. Have to say sat down had the best coffee ever filtered served with cream which is just the way I like it at home. No one serves coffee with cream anymore. Totally surprised and really happy had to write a review about it. Also the staff were very friendly and attentive really impressed.

title: Our favourite local restaurant!
comment: Me and my husband have a take away from here once/twice a month! It's by far the best Indian food local to us and the manager is so welcoming and friendly which makes it that extra bit special. I always have king prawns and they give you the best butterfly prawns & are so generous. I hope they stay good as so much competition around now.

title: One of the best
comment: Spice Station is one of four Indian Restaurants in North Chingford and when it opened, a year or more ago, we thought "why bother". But we tried it, and the food was fantastic - head and shoulders above the others and we have frequented it ever since - at least once a month and several takeaways. Lots of local Indian restaurants pad out their meat dishes with tomato and onion to bulk them up and reduce their costs: But (so far) Spice Station has resisted this; and the number of people eating there have proved that quality counts.

title: Warm welcome
comment: Visited with friends who live in Chingford and they raved about it beforehand. Often when that happens, the hype doesn't match the reality. Not so here. We couldn't have been given a warmer welcome and more attentive service throughout the evening. The interior is modern and sophisticated and nicely lit. The starters were great; shami kebab was delicious as was the prawn puree. I had a really tasty duck curry - very unusual to see that on the average Indian menu. All in all, a very good evening out.

title: Great service, great food
comment: Went here on a Friday evening with friends. The service was friendly and efficient, but they didn't rush us at all. The food was delicious - I can recommend the fish bhuna, but would ask for it with a little less oil next time. They are really adaptable and will alter dishes to suit your palate spice-wise. Great value too. We had plenty of wine to accompany our meal and it came to around £25 per head. Don't sit upstairs - lacks atmosphere up there and it's really just for overspill if it gets too busy downstairs.

title: DEFINITELY NOT A CARLSBERG
comment: Carlsberg maintains it is probably the best lager in the world, whereas Spice Station encourages you to savour, relax accompanied by exotic taste, fresh ingredients and are passionate about food. Whilst I agree with the first proposition about Carlsberg, I certainly would entirely dispute the second. It was probably amongst the worst curries I have in endured in my life and I have been retired for over a year now. My wife and I had a takeaway early on the evening of Saturday 7 September 2013 and looked forward to enjoying our two (?) complimentary poppadoms, along with their four dips. Whilst the mango chutney and raita were comparatively pleasant, the same cannot be said about the other two, which were tasteless green and white coloured liquids. My wife commented that she thought the poppadoms were stale, I thought merely salty.  For her main course, my wife had a chicken Spice Special Pasand which she describes as bland and tasteless, although she did have sufficient chicken. As for myself, push the boat out I thought, so I opted for the Station Special Biryani, which is described as served with pilau rice and sliced tomatoes. Given its name and price naturally I presumed it would be served with bits of chicken, lamb and prawn, just as “special” biryanis are elsewhere. How wrong I was. It was served with an omelette on top, no tomatoes, practically no meats, and such scant amount as there was were just small bits of unidentifiable meat, no chunks, the rice was brownish in colour, fried and oily, whereas everywhere else pilau rice is white, boiled and not at all oily. It can’t be that bad, I thought as I added some of the vegetable curry to the biryani, so I took a small first mouthful, which turned out to be most fortunate. The biryani was revolting and my whole meal ended up straight in the bin. What a waste of money. I then went out and treated myself to a kebab, at a fraction of the cost. For 40 years now I have enjoyed curries so I think I am sufficiently experienced when it comes to judging curries If I could give a minus star rating, then I would award -10

title: Great food with service to match!
comment: We went last night as a family to celebrate my mums birthday, the food was excellent flavoursome and plentiful! The service was attentive and nothing was too much trouble even doing a half portion for my young daughter. Will defiantly be back.

title: A long time coming
comment: We ordered a take away meal from Spice Station tonight at 8pm. We were told that they were busy and that we should phone back in 10 minutes to see how long it would take. we could not get through untill 8.30 and we were told that the food would not be ready until 9.15, but we should come in to the restaurant now slowly.The story about the delay changed two or three times and the plot became clear that we were being lied to. They were not prepared to start cooking the food until they had been paid! We drove to the restaurant and only when we had paid did they actually start to prepare the food. we waited for over 45 minutes in the restaurant for our food and eventually got it at 10.30. When we got home we found there were two dishes missing and the quality of the food was not very good. There were plenty of onions and chillies, but precious little meat or prawns. We phoned up and reported the missing items and were told to come back to the restaurant. Do not order take away food from this restaurant. While we were waiting in the restaurant we also observed plenty of diners without food looking fed up.  £75 poorly spent!

title: The Best Curry in Town !
comment: We are local people who enjoy good local food and I must say that the Spice Station team are very friendly and attentive people and the modern style of the restaurant provides a great backdrop for really excellent food. There are too many dishes to choose from but in particular the chicken biryani is great and so are the king prawns tandoori. The food is served with precision and I have never had a bad meal in this restaurant.  The chef will taylor your requirements and if you ask they are more than prepared to offer you a variation.  There are several other restaurants in North Chingford but none of them touch the quality of Spice Station and so I do congratulate them on offering a very modern take on traditional food seven days a week !

title: Beautiful layout and friendly
comment: I have been coming to Spice Staion for my dinner for the past year I found the food lovely and really delicious. I will highly recommend to people to come in and enjoy the friendly atmosphere and the customer service. I ordered many dishies from Spice Staion but my favourite is King prawn kalpuri because it is full of indain flavours in every bite I took. waiters and chefs now me and recommends me dish that I may like when I come to eat. I have pre booked and gone with my friends and family and the staff made it feel like home. the owner of Spice Staion called shah always gives componentry drinks before I leave.

title: You won't go hungry here!
comment: This was our first visit here and it certainly won't be our last. We reserved a table for 5 at 7pm on a Saturday night and were glad we did as it was very busy. The portions were large and were of good quality and tasted very fresh and there was a good range of choices. The onion bhajis in particular were light and tasted so fresh. The complementary drinks at the end of the meal were appreciated and the service was very attentive.

title: Dreadful Service' don't eat there
comment: booked a table for 7.30pm for 14 friends to celebrate my 40th, the evening started well. However it became apparent quite quickly that the staff were not in rush to take our order. Several times we had to ask for someone to take our food order. It took over an hour for the starter to arrive, in the mean time the staff where happy to take drinks orders. By 10:15pm the main courses still had not arrived, it was annoying as other tables around us who arrived after us had had there food. At 10:15 I spoke to a member of staff to ask where our food was and his response was 'it's coming' No one apologised or offered an explanation as to why the food was late. This experience spoilt the evening and we left hungry. If your planning a celebration I strongly recommend you do not book a table here. The lack of customer service was staggering, they didn't seem to care.

title: Great Indian Restaurant
comment: Lovely food with excellent service. A local restaurant for us and one which we will return to many times. Food is beautifully prepared with very generous portions.

title: Faultless
comment: I have been to Spice Station time and time again and will continue to go back. The food is just delicious! Everything is cooked to perfection and every time you go back, everything tastes just as good as the first time you had it. The service given by the staff is just exceptional! They are extremely attentive and see that your every request is met. Without question, this is definitely the best Indian around.

title: Lovely meal
comment: Fab food fitted us in although very busy we loved our visit and will be coming back again top class restaurant xx

title: Strongly recommended - very nice food
comment: We found this place opposite the railway station in Chingford. It was a rondom stab that worked out very well! A warm welcome is assured, and there is an extensive menu from which to choose. And the food is excellent quality. This place is fantastic!

title: Excellent service, food really good
comment: We were recommended the spice station, but was hesitant to try as we have always been loyal to oue favourite indian restuarant in buckhurst hill. However, tried tonight and will definitely return. The food was extremely good as was the service from the attentive waiting staff. This will now be our favourite indian restuarant and we will be recommending it to others.

title: Spicy , Fresh & Friendly
comment: I have lived in Chingford for 6 years, we are spoiled for choice with a variety of restaurants. Spice Station is one of many. My wife and I now favour S.S over all the others. Thai , Italian etc.. Decor is fresh and contempory, Staff are genuine & friendly. Food is excellent , plenty of interesting specials as well as the classics. My brother never chooses off menu, just asks the chef to make something up ;) Have a couple if large round tables with 'banquet' seats, so good for groups Tiny bit of constructive criticism is that I would like to see a bit more meat in portion, saying that Mixed Thali last time was tasty and decent size.

title: Excellent food and service for takeaways
comment: I regularly order takeaways from OCK and have generally never been disappointed with their service or their excellent food. Recommend without hesitation.

title: Best Indian Food Around Bromley and Orpington
comment: I have been a regular customer of Orpington Citi Kitchen for almost 2 years now and the taste is just amazing and the quality has been top notch! Kudos to Mani bhai for running it with quality. Also, the way the food is prepared is amazing and is healthy as well.

title: Best in the area.
comment: Best takeaway. Wouldn’t go anywhere else now. Proper curries and delicious starters and they deliver. Win win :)

title: Authentic Indian food!
comment: One of the best Indian food restaurant in the area. Have tried multiple times and never been disappointed. Taste, presentation and service is always upto the mark. Prices are reasonable. Being vegetarian our favorites are methi malai mutter, paneer butter masala and aloo gobhi adrakhi but in general all food items on the menu are good. Keep up the good work Chef Mani and team!

title: Amazing food and excellent service
comment: Best Indian Food Around Bromley ,Orpington and Beckanham  I have been a regular customer of Orpington Citi Kitchen for almost 2 years now and the taste is just amazing and the quality has been top notch! Mani bhai is running very good quality and sane test Also, the way the food is prepared is amazing and is healthy as well. I highly recommend this amazing food and them service

title: Truly Indian
comment: We order takeaways very frequently. After trying a lot of other restaurants in and around Bromley/Orpington, we found Orpington Citi Kitchen to be quite reliable. We always enjoyed the perfect Indian flavour at a reasonable cost. Definitely worth giving a try.

title: Excellent, authentic food
comment: We often order a takeaway from here and the food never disappoints. Butter chicken, dal makhani and kofta are our favourites but everything that we have tried on the menu has been consistently good. Will keep re-ordering.

title: Consistently good
comment: Love this place. Consistently great food. The papadums and chutney selection presented in the beginning are great.  Service always very attentive.

title: Great food always
comment: We regularly order takeaway and always enjoy our food very much. The chilli chicken is a favourite of ours.

title: Really nice food
comment: Really nice food fantastic flavours used the whole family use this restaurant in this area  Highly recommended

title: Great and consistent food.. everytime..
comment: Been ordering for over 2 years from the chef Mani.  Courteous, kind, accomodating and best of all always provided a free dish which usually is a winner of the rest of the course.  Prices could come done slightly in my opinion may be a quid , but otherwise we always have loved his preparation and the range of available dishes. Awaiting the next new menu update.

title: Dinner
comment: Best food in the area.You pay quite a lot but the food is impressive.served to the best quality prepared in front of you. The service is top class and always happy to help. This restaurant has the best tastes that I have never found anywhere else. First class worth a visit

title: Dinner
comment: The restaurant serves top quality authentic Indian cuisine. I love eating here as I get to enjoy real vegetarian dishes. Tonight I requested a vegan vegetarian meal and specifically mentioned 'no meat, chicken or dairy', but was surprised when the dish came, it had Yougart and hidden in a spinach dish pieces of cheese. I was rescued by 'Preet', she was very attentive and as she was passing by she told me of the pieces of cheese in the spinach dish. I am thankful for her alertness. I received an apology from the duty supervisor and he changed the dish to pure spinach dish. Excellent team and service. I will still visit anytime I am here because it is just simply the best.

title: Birthday Dinner
comment: Me and my partner went to madhus 19th September for his birthday meal. And the food and service was excellent (as always). We was looked after by the lovely Punam who was so very kind and helpful. Thank you Punam.x

title: Excellent Indian Dining Experience
comment: Having been advised that the restaurant was fully booked I went along anyway, it was early evening. Joy greeted me, very kindly and found a table for me. Unable to decide what to have from the exciting menu, Punah was on hand to advise. A very enjoyable experience, all the more so because of the kind and helpful service along with the delicious dining experience. I hope this will not be my only visit.

title: Very good food
comment: And great service - everyone was so nice, food was fab and really well spiced. Ask if you're not a chilli fan.

title: Superb Indian restaurant worth a special trip
comment: While staying at a nearby hotel, I visited Madhu's after reading good reviews on Yelp. It was a spectacular experience, with great food, good ambience, and excellent service by Punam. Though it has a phenomenal grill, I decided to order the Vegetarian Thali, consisting of a multi-bread starter with three chutneys, rice, and 5 small entrees including a couple of specialties. See the attached photos with the menu for details, and the dishes themselves. A Cobra beer was a good accompaniment. This was a superb dinner for a fair price.

title: Excellent
comment: First time I have used this takeaway. The food was Delicious and will certainly be using again. Highly recommended.

title: Outstanding food and excellent service with absolute promptness
comment: Mani and his team organised superbly tasty vegetarian feast without onion and garlic in a very short notice for 12 people. Not only he delivered the warm food in time, he made sure that the portions are plenty for the number of people and verified a few times. Knowing the occasion of Ganesha festival, he delighted us with his special kheer on the house. Recommend them any time and for any occasion.

title: Great food, quick delivery
comment: Food came right on time and was piping hot on arrival. Large portion sizes and affordable prices. Would deffo recommend!

title: Excellent food
comment: Our friend and us loved the food. The service is prompt and hassle free. Would surely recommend this place.

title: Awesome Indian food
comment: Been here many times. Food is authentic and exceptional. Amazing place with fast service, friendly staff and great ambience.

title: Good food, food service
comment: Have been going to this place for a while and can definitely recommend it for good delicious Indian food. The prices are very competitive and the service is very quick. I have always done takeaways and never eaten in their restaurant but it looks clean and organized.

title: Awesome Authentic Indian food
comment: Tasted excellent, exactly like the taste you get in India. We ordered the Dal Makhani and it was the closest we have had in the UK to the ones you find in India. We also got the Veg Manchurian and it was super tangy and mildly spicy. Great to share.  The roomali roti is a must. The size and texture was amazing. It was super soft.

title: Great food, lovely service
comment: I've ordering from them for some time now. The food is amazing, with on time delivery everytime. The person is very polite on the other end of the phone and ensures to call back and take feedback for the service. Cant recommend more if you're looking for delicious Indian meal.  Keep up the great work !!

title: Our favourite restaurant!
comment: We love everything about this restaurant. Authentic dishes, fresh flavours, good portions, speedy service. I am a huge fan of their Indian Chinese dishes, but their dal makhni and punjabi tikka masala is sublime too. Cannot recommend them enough to people who appreciate really authentic Indian food. We have been ordering pretty regularly overlockdown and I especially appreciate their adherence to cleanliness and hygiene standards.

title: Best Indian and Indo-chinese in London
comment: This is our go to place for Indian and Indo- chinese food. We have tried the samosa and the chat which was excellent. Loved the food everytime we have ordered. The staff is lovely and so polite. By far this the best Indian in town.

title: One of the best restaurant around
comment: Quality is consistently very good. For people visiting Orpington, this is a must visit restaurant. Not many restaurants maintain consistent quality for takeaway but you can be confident they will maintain the quality. Keep it up. Try my favourite punjabi style chicken masala, you won’t be disappointed.

title: Excellent food
comment: I am a regular at Orpington Citi Kitchen. I love the starters a lot. Chicken shashlik, papdi chaat, chicken Manchurian etc. Mains and side dishes are great too. Biryani and Chinese dishes like noodles and shezwan rice are my favourites. We get free poppadoms and salad to go with our meal. The meat is Halal.

title: Excellent food and service
comment: Have been regular at the place, food was excellent and so was the service. Had asked for the food to be spicy and was perfect to the taste. Must visit.

title: Outstanding Food and Service!
comment: Honestly the best Indian food our family has ever had. Ingredients are always fresh. The owner is happy to accommodate any requests to changes and size, and able to cater at short notice. I have ordered numerous times outside of their opening hours and always happy to prepare for us. All I can say is that if you are in the area (or not!) and haven't tried the food, make sure this your next meal. You will not regret. Prices are very reasonable, and always something extra thrown in free of charge.

title: Take away
comment: Authentic Indian food. Delicious, love the roomali rotis, Dal Makhni amongst other dishes. Very friendly and accommodating service too. My go to for Indian takeaway.

title: Ordered a delivery for the
comment: Ordered a delivery for the first time last weekend. We selected a wide variety of dishes and all were faultless. Really tasty food and excellent service. The manager rang a few hours after the delivery to check in on us- a lovely touch! Will definitely be ordering from there again! vishal

title: Excellent food always
comment: This is our favourite Indian take away in the area. Each time we order the food is always delicious and cannot be faulted. The service is very good and they are very flexible and cater for all requirements. We have also recommended this place to friends, who have really enjoyed the food. Highly recommend!

title: The best one in the area
comment: I tried citi kitchen in a party and I always wanted to have it again so I asked my friend for the contact. You can order via WhatsApp which is very convenient. Delivery is quick and price is reasonable. Everything we tried so far are amazing! Very authentic. They will be our future party food supplier too. Thanks a lot.

title: Takeaway
comment: Ordered a takeaway from Orpington Citi Kitchen again. The quality, quantity and taste are simply superb. Service is always very good. Very happy and will definitely return

title: Amazing food as always !!
comment: Authentic chicken curries ... butter chicken is just yummlicious..  we loved Dal Makhnni too , very rich and tasted what you get back in Delhi

title: Breakfast
comment: This cafe is our favourite!!! My husband and I love the food, atmosphere and service, brilliant value for money!!!! We are there at least twice a week!!

title: INCREDIBLE
comment: So I've been coming here for a while now and the coffees here are incredible! Flat white is made as perfect as it possibly could be! Just try! When I eat I go for the home-made need burger or the Cajun chicken wrap, honestly couldn't recommend it more, the prices are very reasonable too, this is a just try, freshly made on the day everyday, this place is at the heart of Beckenham and is a must try for anyone who is a coffee lover and if you enjoy a good home made burger then Definitely give this place a try! I promise you won't be disappointed, to add - the customer service is better than anywhere I have ever been, very friendly and inviting

title: Excellent indian food in Orpington
comment: By far- the best Indian restaurant in the area! They offer fresh and delicious food, both vegetarian and non-vegetarian. We specially like their manchurian and paneer tikka masala Very good catering service too. I had ordered their food for my son’s first birthday  The service is very friendly and quick.

title: Super food
comment: Really enjoyed the food we ordered last night. We do order often from Citi kitchen and enjoy the food Everytime. Good indo Chinese. We ordered hakka noodles, fried rice, chilli chicken and chilli paneer.

title: excellent food and courteous
comment: good choice of indian food. Excellent quality. Ordered takeaway which was delivered in time. Food was customised to our taste.

title: Authentic Indian Cuisine restaurant
comment: We have ordered multiple times from Orpington city kitchen and have never been disappointed. Menu is quite varied with lots of tasty curries. Customer experience is also good.

title: Good quality food
comment: Absolutely love their food , it’s less oily. I have ordered lots of times for small group parties at home and everybody loves it. I love their truck wala lamb , butter chicken, Hakka noodles, manchurian and their rotis are just like homemade ones.

title: Tasty Indian food
comment: Freshly cooked, spicy and delicious Indian food delivered every time. Definitely recommend it. We also had a ladies Christmas party last December in this restaurant and we had a great time. A bit tight for space for 30 ladies but staff were very accommodating and food was very tasty..We had a great time.

title: Tasty, friendly and clean
comment: We've been eating here regularly for about a year before lockdown. The staff are very friendly, and ready for a chat if they are not busy. They have reopened with table service now, following a few months of takeaway only. The measures in place (taking our temperature, recording our name and phone number, only bringing cutlery and crockery once we have ordered, staff always wearing face coverings and gloves) seem in line with what is recommended for restaurants. They serve quite a few dishes that are unfamiliar in most Indian restaurants, although some of the familiar dishes are available. They recently changed the menu, but have still allowed my daughter to have her favourite (Malai Tikka starter - much milder than the normal Chicken Tikka), which is no longer on the menu. Some of the food is a bit hot for me, or very rich and creamy, but working through the dishes I think Achari Panner and Kadhai Murgh are both very good. They don't have an alcohol licence, but are happy for you to bring your own. They do serve soft drinks and lassi. They also have Indian desserts, which are very good (and very sweet).

title: Gary brown
comment: I have just recently started using orpington Citi kitchen, and so glad I did the food is awesome, I been eating currys for 30 years and this is up there with the best I've ever tried,Mani Singh is one top chef,,

title: Yummy
comment: Great taste and friendly staff . Authentic indian cuisine. it is our place to go for feast. highly recommended

title: Authentic Indian food around Orpington
comment: We have been ordering food from OCK.. great taste, value for money, decent quantity, good variety and excellent service by the chef.. with the limited options available,OCK is a good choice to order Indian food

title: Biryani
comment: Biryani is very good. This the restaurant we can get the biryani of Indian style.I recommended this for others.

title: Excellent food
comment: This is one of the best Indian restaurants in Orpington. We take vegetarian take aways and love the food.

title: The authentic taste of India
comment: As a Delhiite I always had this ache that I never found the same taste in any of the Indian restaurant through London. Having spend a lot of time in Wembley and Ilford this crave for eating authentic North Indian food continued. A common friend suggested about Orpington City kitchen and that day the search stopped. The food is not only incredibly delicious but also the same taste as back home. Absolutely marvellous work from chef Mani Singh. A very nice chef and and incredibly humble person. We are so regular to the place now that we end up visiting or ordering weekly. We have recommended to many friends who now vouch for Orpington Citi Kitchen. I wish Mani Singh opens another restaurant soon in near Bexleyheath as I have to travel 30 minutes one side every week to enjoy his food. But still..... Totally worth it.

title: Very nice food.
comment: Had take away from them quite a lot of times. Never disappointed. Very tasty food in and around Orpington.

title: Orpington city kitchen
comment: Ordered a takeout for 8 friends-hot food delivered on time  Very tasty veg and non veg food at a very reasonable price  .good portions as well Thoroughly recommend it !

title: Priyanka
comment: We ordered a home delivery. Our food arrived in 40 minutes time and was still hot. Very efficient service and lovely food.

title: Fantastic Food
comment: Quality and taste is next to nothing at this place. Also the chef is very accommodating with any special requests.

title: Amazing food
comment: Such high quality with real freshness in all dishes ordered. I have my personal favs but the biriyani is amazing and saag chicken . I have been ordering for over 2 years now and never am I disappointed with quality of food. Great food consistently delivered.

title: Uncompromisingly Indian and the best Indian in town
comment: We never order Indian as we unfailingly compare it to what we have eaten growing up in India and most of the restaurant don't even come close. This however was a delight. I started by just trying a the pan Asian menu and oh boy it was perfect Indo Chinese we have been used to in India. We gradually moved to trying all the curries and starters over a few months and have concluded that if we have to order Indian, this is the only place we will..  I have been so impressed that my son's first birthday and our first Diwali party at home were catered by OCK. Everyone was full of compliments for the food and most of my guests have ordered from here thereafter. I am glad there is one place that is uncompromisingly Indian and its just a phone call away.

title: Excellent Indian food
comment: I wish to thank the Orpington citi Kitchen for authentic Indian food. It was extremely delicious and children who normally don’t eat Indian loved it. I don’t think we have many fantastic quality Indian around in South London. This is great for anyone wanting an Indian! All the way 5 stars!!

title: Best authentic North Indian in Orpington
comment: Glad to have a local serving authentic North Indian food. Chef Mani is the real thing bringing a bit of Delhi in Kent

title: Amazing food
comment: Highly recommended restaurant and take away . Love the lamb biryani and chicken lollipops. Jamuns are way beyond .. :)

title: Best Indian takeaway
comment: We started using Orpington Citi Kitchen during lockdown and I have to say we thoroughly enjoyed all the dishes we ordered. Mani Singh has put together an eclectic mix of Indian and IndoChinese dishes and he has maintained the authenticity in all these dishes. Lamb dishes in particular are out of the world! Thoroughly recommend.

title: Great northern food
comment: Different from the normal food one of the best Indian restaurants I have been too. Nice staff menu really different great chef

title: Family meal
comment: Fantastic food and fantastic services  And value for money  The restaurant is well presented tidy and menu is excellent

title: Awesome Food and Super Awesome Customer Service
comment: Amazing food, especially seasonal ones like Raseele Aloo and Kadhi Pakoda are to die for. Biryanis are awesome too, so is Papdi Chaat. Spice levels are perfect and they are kind enough to accommodate based on individual requirements. Portion size is also generous.To finger-licking flavours, add the un-precedented customer Service and you get Mani's Kitchen. It is a great find and we are lucky to have it local to us. Orpington's pride and other's envy :)

title: Authentic taste, amazing service
comment: Orpington City kitchen catered for our party of 30 at very short notice. The food was amazing, 100%authentic taste and service was very attentive. Strongly recommended.

title: Orpington Citi Kitchen
comment: We used to order from citikitchen. Food is fabulous especially the curries, biryani and pav bajji. Worth a try.  Would Recommend.

title: Take away - Authentic Indian food
comment: Truly Indian food, amazing taste and friendly staff and Chef. Our go to place for Indian take aways. Prompt delivery service.

title: Authentic Indian Taste and Highly Recommended !
comment: I have been doing takeaway orders from Orpington Citi kitchen since the day it started. I must say it’s the best Indian food around Bromley. We always order for any events or parties for t this place. The kids just love chicken lollipop and Butter chicken.  Highly recommended and reasonable too.

title: ***Authentic Indian food***
comment: If you want authentic Indian food , Orpington Citi Kitchen should be on your speed dial . Love their lamb Chettinand curries - best outside India. Garlic naans are light and garlicky not heavy or flavourless. If it past my mum’s critical eye we know we are on to a winner . Great telephone service and prompt deliveries . Drivers place food at your door step and wear masks . We will be ordering our usual next weekend .

title: True Indian Food
comment: Chef Mani is a great foodie and his depth of knowledge about Indian food is astonishing. I have enjoyed many lovely meals from Orpington City Kitchen. This my place to go for a true Indian meal. Great flavours of amazing India. While writing this review my mouth is watering and I would love to have many more meals from this beloved restaurant.  Keep doing well, keep cooking with love and same passion.  Many thanks

title: Authentic Indian food, superb taste
comment: We are regular customers of Orpington citi kitchen. The food has authentic Indian taste and is delicious! We also order for parties at home and our guests always appreciate the food. Would highly recommend it!

title: This has to be best India takeaway !!
comment: Being an all out foodie for Indian food I am very fussy about selecting “genuine” Indian food restaurants. This is one of the best take away and delivery restaurants in South London by a mile. The chef is brilliant and he looks after our individual taste and I recommend it thoroughly. One of my favourites. Keep it up guys.

title: Authentic, real Indian food
comment: So many times we have ordered food. Great vegetarian choice. Meat dishes also cooked so well. Really authentic north Indian cooking. Chef Mani Singh is well known across London. Healthy dishes with very little oil, but very tasty food. Vegetables are so fresh and ingredients are sathvik (harmless/therepeutic) to the body.As doctors/GPs ourselves we are particular about this. Have also ordered for our surgery meetings, my colleagues and friends have all become customers now. I would also add that the pricing is very appropriate for the quality you get. My favourites are veg biryani, dal makhani, veg manchurian, aloo tikki, papdi chat, samosa, sag paneer, paneer butter masala, masala kulcha and roomali roti. Thoroughly recommend Orpington Citi Kitchen

title: Order takeaway
comment: The first time I ordered from there... my daughter went, “why didn’t we order from them before. Where were they”. For me City Kitchen caters the best Indian food. Best indo Chinese. There veg koftas are just toooo good. I have met the chef personally and he is so humble. Customer service 5 star. And food ... simply Wao!!

title: Excellent food
comment: Never disappointed by mani singh at orpington citi kitchen . Our all time favourite restuarant in orpington. Please try them for sure you wont be diaappointed.

title: Truly Authentic
comment: Highly recommend OTC if you are looking for authentic Indian Vegetarian food! Chats and Dal Makhni are our favorites.

title: Collection and delivery
comment: Amazing food photography uth authentic flavour and taste. Our go to place for Indian food :) Highly recommend!

title: Awesome Food
comment: The food is awesome .Some of my favourite dishes are Lamb Biryani, Chicken lollipop, Gobi65, makhmali kofta, Peshwari Naan, Fish Koliwada, and coconut gosht curry.

title: Best North Indian Restaurant & Takeaway in Orpington
comment: I have been regular customer of Orpington City Kitchen from last more than 1 year and can confidently say its one of the best Indian takeaway/restaurant in Bromley neighbourhood and on top its way too affordable. Would highly recommend.

title: The best authentic indian food in all of Bromley
comment: I have been eating food from this chef for over 2 years now and i have never been disappointed. Whether its been a party or a small gathering at home or even just for my weekly fix of indian food, its always lip smackingly delicious! My favourites have been his indo-chinese food- Manchurian, chilli paneer and his classic indian food- paneer tikka, black dal, koftas, aalo tikki, kadi, rajma, sheek kebab...basically anything that he makes is outstanding! Hygene levels are good which is very important for me.

title: Delicious Food
comment: We ordered food for a small gathering on the weekend. The food was really delicious.  I highly recommend the Keema and the Chilli Chicken.  Mani Singh has made some really amazing dishes.  The quantities are decent and so it is very good value for money.

title: Curry
comment: A very good curry. We tend to get a takeaway from here about three times a month, and have been doing so for over a year now. Never had a bad experience. The food is always delivered within the delivery timescale and is always hot.

title: Our favourite Indian ever
comment: Our favourite Indian ever ! Even my kids eat it and their fussy! You get what you pay for and there food is always spot on ☺️

title: Amazing takeaway food- authentic indian
comment: Among the few authentic Indian restaurants with amazing biryani, roomali roti, great dishes . Could work on improving service

title: rajiv
comment: Order £70 worth of a selection of dishes and I can say everything was excellent. The kids liked the noodles and the never taste better so will diffently order again.

title: Best Biryanis
comment: We’ve always been very happy with their food . Have loved their biryanis , chicken lollipops and paneer chillis . Excellent service and the quality and taste of the food is simply outstanding . Chef Mani Singh never disappoints.

title: Authentic Indian food in Bromley
comment: The food at the restaurant is always full of flavours and delivered on time. The service is good as well. Highly recommended.

title: One of the best Indian takeaway in Orpington!
comment: We have ordered multiple times over the last 2 years and we have never had a bad experience.  We have also catered twice from them for parties and the guests loved the food.  Highly recommended !

title: Tasty
comment: The food at orpington Citi kitchen is always good. Good service as well. They could include more options for vegetarians but tasty food.

title: Badudha
comment: The food from Orpington Citi kitchen was absolutely finger licking. I have never had a schzwan noodles(indo chinese) so tasty in UK.  Just too good.

title: The best Indian takeaway ever.
comment: The best Indian takeaway I’ve ever had! Absolutely divine, I had prawn purée for my starter & it tasted amazing! It wasn’t greasy & prawns were not over cooked. I’ll definitely be ordering again

title: Speedy Online Takeaway!
comment: We had the mixed grill (which we had asked to be mild rather than super spicy), as well as chilli chicken, sag paneer and mushroom rice. The samosas were delicious and the chicken tikka starter was very succulent. Everything had lots of flavour and was thoroughly enjoyable. Would recommend highly!

title: Excellent
comment: Very lovely dishes, great service. Chicken chilli is absolutely delicious. Best Indian restaurant by far!

title: Excellent
comment: Our new favourite for an Indian takeaway. The head chef Mani Singh has put together a varied menu and dishes like the Dal Makhani and Prawn Moilee stand out. There are lots of authentic vegetarian choices too and all prices reasonable. The new front of staff person Kiran was very knowledgeable in helping us pick dishes that everyone enjoyed.

title: Our third takeaway from Citi
comment: Our third takeaway from Citi Kitchen since lockdown. Food is absolutely delicious and lots to choose from.

title: Excellent
comment: Very lovely dishes, great service and one of our favourite Indian take aways in Orpington delicious variety of foods and falvers.

title: Excellent
