comment: Best indian takeaway in orpington , excellent service and authentic Indian food at great price highly recommend

title: Great, authentic food!
comment: Local, family run, Indian restaurant. The food is 'home style' cooking. Not made for the market but as you would have it at home! Generous portions (!) Very fragrant and beautifully spiced. A small dining area and quick and efficient delivery locally. If you enjoy real Indian style food then I recommend a visit, even a takeaway. You will not be disappointed .

title: Impromptu visit
comment: 1st time of trying here. The restaurant itself is a little small with lots of through traffic for take aways, however the food was absolutely delicious! They don't serve alcohol, which was not a problem, but you could bring your own, should you wish to. The food was tasty & flavoursome. Staff were helpful & service was great. Will definitely be back!

title: Great takeaway
comment: Very good authentic food, as my Wife is Indian She is usually fussy about our local Indian Takeaways (most are too oily or curries have too many chopped onions). Citi Kitchen food is very well cooked, lamb is tender, spice levels are just right. Highly recommended.Shame I don't live a little bit closer to save on delivery charge! We have not yet dined at the restaurant.

title: Food was amazing, so fresh
comment: Food was amazing, so fresh and distinctive difference in dishes like madras and jalfrezi! The hostess couldn’t have been more accommodating! Really lovely evening with great food

title: Won’t use again...
comment: After waiting almost 2 hours for our delivery to arrive and numerous phone calls chasing our order we cancelled it...no apology or good phone service.

title: Top Indian restaurant
comment: It really is a huge move forward for Cotmandene restaurants catering for the locals and the chef is top class.

title: Perfect
comment: My husband and I visted this caffe for the first time last saturday, and we were both very impressed it was very good quality food and service. We will definitely be back.

title: What a great little find!!
comment: We popped in recently for some lunch on a weekday and what can I say- I was delighted with the food and service we received and will defiantly be back instead of our usual cafe! I had the American pancakes which was fresh and Tasty, the egg was perfectly cooked and my partner enjoyed his chicken shish skewer. The staff was very attentive and it is such good value! There is plenty of choice on the menu and would defo recommend to friends. We didn’t have much time so we literally ate and ran but the whole experience was fab! We will most certainly be back to eat there soon!!

title: I’m a regular in this lovely
comment: I’m a regular in this lovely cafe the staff are very friendly and helpful, the ambiance is great cost and comfortable.  I had a flat white with oat milk it was delicious and I had the healthy avocado with extra halloumi and I recommend this highly! To top it of Sam the owner was a very lovely man. We will be returning 5 stars all round ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

title: Best Cafe in Beckenham
comment: Been going here for couple of years and best cafe in High Street. Great food selection whether it be breakfast, lunch or coffee/cake and very friendly service from the lovely owners of this small but very welcoming place.

title: Lovely Thai restaurant
comment: Really tasty food and friendly staff! The Papaya Salad and Red Thai curry were excellent, will definitely go back again! :)

title: Delicious vegetarian Thai
comment: We had a real treat here. Food was delicious. Great care and consideration taken by staff over our vegetarian choices. They surprised my husband with a birthday candle in complimentary dessert, singing included! Suggest you book though - it was happily busy.

title: Most Awesome!
comment: Really friendly, local Thai restaurant in Barnes, SW London. Excellent, authentic Thai food and very reasonably priced. Would recommend their Thai ‘Bento’ style lunches at approx £10 per head for a quite substantial & tasty meal!

title: David
comment: One of the best if not the best genuine Thai restaurant in SW London. Food is always delicious,service is quick and staff is friendly and welcoming. We go there regularly and we have never been disappointed! Quality and service are consistent! Really recommend to anyone looking for good Thai food!

title: If you love real thai food, this place is a must! So authentic!
comment: Hands down the BEST thai restaurant I have been to in London (and I have been to a fair few!). The staff of this family run business are so welcoming and lovely it was a joy to be there.  Their service was impeccable. The intimate settings was perfect for a nice birthday dinner with my husband. I am so glad we found this little gem. All the curries were so yummy and I can't express enough how authentic it all tasted.

title: Delicious
comment: First time visiting Awesome Thai last week, the red Thai curry with prawns was delicious, I do not like my food too spicy. The curry was not hot but full of flavour, just as I like it. Service was quick and staff were friendly. Will definitely visit again very very soon.

title: Truly awesome!
comment: Went there from Germany with my sister on a family trip to visit our other sister who lives in Fulham now for many years. On a Sunday evening we decided to look for a Thai restaurant, one our "local" sister did not already know but not too far from our holiday home in Fulham. We found Awesome Thai on Trip Advisor and read the many many good reviews. And: our sister did really not know it! It was a really awesome experience. The meal was excellent. We all had different currys and everyone of us was totally happy with it. After we thought there would fit no scrap more into us, we got as a gift from the house a piece of Thai Tiramisu. What shall I say... we ate all of it, could not leave anything behind The team of the restaurant was sooo friendly and we had a lot of fun! We all heartily recommend this location ❤

title: Excellent Service and Delicious Food
comment: Fully recommend that you try this place - The service was absolutely lovely and the food was excellent! Possibly the most attentive service we've ever had in London: To begin with they opened the door for us, they then took our coats and made sure we had a table we were happy with, they brought us a complimentary starter (on the house) and made sure to tell us in detail about all the dishes. They checked up on us regularly to see if everything was ok and refilled our drinks. They also made us laugh a lot which is a rare occasion in London. When we were leaving they got our coats and opened the door for us again. We both left beaming, they were warm and engaging throughout.  The food was absolutely delicious and really good value for money. Definately the best Thai food we've had in London. The Duck Red Curry was a rare treat - particularly on a cold October evening. Very impressed and they deserve all the 5* reviews they get! We'll definitely be coming back soon :)

title: Amazing food! Best take away
comment: I had a take away from this restaurant last night with my daughter and I realised again why it’s my favourite restaurant.  I absolutely love this Indian restaurant and take away. I travel all over England and no one does a curry like spice station! Their sag panir, prawn tikka to even their popadoms etc etc is just the best! Absolutely my favourite food  Such good value too. Lucky to have up the rd from me. I would have it once a week if I could. Lovely manager and staff that work there also. Always give you a mint chocolate when order a take away or if wait long a beer. I love that ☺️ my 9 year old also said it’s her favourite take away too :-)

title: Brilliant food and service
comment: The food is amazing and the staff are always very friendly and attentive. Great price for a great nice out!

title: Excellent food and great service 👏🏻
comment: Our waiter khan looked after us all night, felt very clean and safe during these times. Food is great and complimentary wine topped it off!  Will definitely come back again

title: Best curry in Essex
comment: Have been coming here years and is hand down the best Indian I’ve had. Lovely food and friendly service, would recommend to everyone. They even gave us a free drink too after dinner. You won’t be disappointed!

title: Great food and friendly service, A+++
comment: Great friendly service and thoroughly looked after by Khan! Tandoori and naans are especially good, beautiful meal overall - would recommend ask for a bit more spice if you like it hot hot!! Will be going back!

title: Great food
comment: Great food and great service. I would definitely recommend and will be back again soon for another lovely meal!

title: Lovely food, we all enjoyed.
comment: Lovely food, we all enjoyed. Great service, the staff were friendly and helpful. Really nice atmosphere. Definitely would recommend!

title: Great.
comment: Food was lovely and had very good service. Always enjoy it here. They say spice station and boy are they right!!!!

title: Tom
comment: Brilliant service waiter has a memory of an elephant did not forget us two years on food was amazing as always!!

title: Evening Meal
comment: Honestly the best curry house i have been to. Great music, unreal service and most importantly unbelievable food.

title: Lunch.
comment: Just had a lovely lunch in this restaurant sitting in the garden area luckily with a roof covering.good Italian food,kids had pizzas rest of us main courses which were all good. Will definitely return.

title: Best restaurant in Teddington
comment: It always a joy to eat at La Dolce Vita, the food is amazing and varied and Maurizio is a great host, chatting to the clients and making them welcome.

title: Traditional Italian restaurant 👌
comment: We visited this restaurant yesterday evening. The food and service was excellent! Traditional home cooked Italian cuisine. Thank you to the staff and management for a wonderful evening.

title: Lovely meal
comment: Great meal and friendly service. We all enjoyed our food but my highlight was the Panacotta for dessert, the best I can remember having!

title: Enjoyable meal
comment: First time at La Dolce Vita.Started off slightly disappointed as the Prawn starter was served only slightly warm. But from there onwards everything we had was delicious and superbly cooked. Will definitely be back,a great find for us.

title: Family meal
comment: Fantastic little restaurant! Wonderful atmosphere and staff very friendly and genuinely made me laugh! The pizzas are enormous- had to be boxed up as couldn’t finish it all! Plenty of mussels on the seafood spaghetti! Love the extra little touches! Definitely worth a visit!

title: Italy in Teddington
comment: My family went for lunch here today; the last day of eat out to help out. Firstly, we called late to book and we were squeezed in which showed great hospitality. The greeting we received, given we’ve never been before, was so warm and welcoming. The service, food and ambience was amazing! I’d especially recommend the homemade fettuccine with mushroom and speck - it was awesome! The restaurant was nicely busy but anything we asked for The staff would respond immediately! Let’s support this place post gov scheme! It was like taking a trip to Rome from the comfort of Teddington! Massively recommend!

title: First visit to this restaurant.
comment: This was our first visit to this restaurant, Delicious food, lovely friendly service. Will definitely be returning.

title: Great authentic Indian food
comment: I've been coming here for ages and love the food here. Tastes authentic,the guys here are happy to tweak it to your tastes, the service is great, very reasonably priced and one of the better Indian restaurants in the South East of London. Highly recommended!

title: Couldn't have been better
comment: Under covid regulations and with the help of Maurizio, who went above and beyond, we were able to put together a birthday celebration for a small group. The superb  food, hospitality and atmosphere made us feel we were in an Italian home. Service was slick and attentive but discreet. All in all a wonderful experience. Thank you Maurizio and the team....see you again soon.

title: Celebration Lunch
comment: I was invited to a special birthday celebration lunch on Saturday at La Dolce Vita. Everything was just perfect, excellent food and service with a wonderful ambience.  I could have been lunching in Italy! Thank you to the chef and the whole team.  You spoiled us hugely! I hope to visit again very soon.

title: Italy in Teddington.
comment: Italy in Teddington. Food and service was impeccable. Pappardelle al Ragu di Cinghiale perfect. Will definitely go back there.

title: Great restaurant with amazing food and a plethora of choices.
comment: This restaurant has exquisite food with great mains and desserts. The service was very fast and the restaurant was inviting and it was very welcoming and the staff were very helpful and friendly.

title: An excellent meal. The arancini
comment: An excellent meal. The arancini and prawns for starters were delicious. My husband and boys had the wild board pappardelle which was as good as the one we had whilst on holiday in Italy and my salmon was perfectly cooked with a crispy skin and a pile of fluffy buttery mash. The owner was helpful and polite and service was prompt. I would thoroughly recommend this restaurant.

title: First time visit - will be back - great local italian
comment: First time visiting, and I’m annoyed I’ve never been before even though we’ve lived in / around Teddington for 15years!! The food was excellent - good portion sizes and good value for money (the wild boar ragu was outstanding!). The service is very attentive, very friendly and the staff were brilliant with my 7yr old daughter.  Glad to see they are doing well post lock-down and we will definitely be back!

title: Best pizza in Teddington!
comment: Gorgonzola and walnuts! What joy! Just got my Deliveroo, perfect pizza!! Thank you Dolce Vita! Nice crispy base, balanced topping x

title: A successful dinner at La Dolce Vita
comment: I invited my friends at the restaurant for an important event celebration a few dai ago. I reserved a table outside in the garden. What a beautiful atmosphere! We greatly enjoyed the Arancini, the Frittura di pesce and the grilled Sardines plus the mixer seafood Spaghetti, Salmon fillet and the Parmigiana di melanzane. Finally the Tiramisu was superb! Everything was well cooked and served in right Time. The Italian food flavours and the professional service Made that evening a memorabile one for all of us. Thank you Maurizio and your capable team! I strongly recommend this restaurant! We will definitely come back soon!

title: For authentic, well made,
comment: For authentic, well made, authentic Italian fare look no further than La dolce Vita. The servers recommendations were spot on. Will definitely be going back to sample more of the dishes on the menu.

title: I absolutely love this place
comment: I absolutely love this place and often visit on a Sunday afternoon with my husband the prawns are outstanding to start with and the gnocchi main is second to none love it

title: Jhack
comment: A fabulous meal - delicious food and we were made very welcome; very attentive waiter with a lovely sense of humour - this really made the evening. Wish we lived nearer as would definitely visit often.

title: Night out with wife
comment: Service was great and food was excellent recommend this place the wild bore was awesome. Starter was arancini and was awesome sitting in the garden and would definitely come back

title: Great restaurant
comment: Visited here yesterday evening for a birthday celebration. The food was wonderful the atmosphere was lovely and the waiter was great and extremely funny

title: Pleasant evening in local restaurant
comment: Came with husband and had a pleasant evening sitting in back garden on a warm night. Food and wine were good although the seafood spaghetti could have had more seafood. A few (small) mussels and clams but no prawns or any other fish. I see from the photos on this site that there used to be prawns in the dish. Service was a bit slow to start as there were only two waiting staff for the busy restaurant but we were not in a hurry, and our server was nice. It needed an extra person to help. Challenging times for restaurants so happy we supported a local independent.

title: Never disappointed!
comment: This was our first meal out since lockdown. After lots of delicious takeaways it was great to be back. Our table was in the garden and they were all well spaced. The food was yummy and the service excellent. It was such a treat to return so thank you to all the staff!

title: Birthday lunch
comment: Just a big thank you to all the staff at La Dolce Vita For making a significant birthday lunch a pleasure. The food was delicious and was all served up together At the same time nice and hot. Outside in the covered garden was a pleasure in the sun I have been going there since it first opened and have never had a bad meal. This restaurant has been a success from the start and May it continue. Please try

title: The lure of the vegan menu.
comment: I chose this restaurant primarily because they have a vegan menu, a rare treat in any restaurant. Had lunch with my husband, two daughters, granddaughter and dog Saturday, the restaurant was very quiet, which worried me slightly, but I’m glad I trusted the reviews, the food was excellent, delicious parmigiana, perfect pasta and gorgeous gnocchi, sadly we were on a tight time line, but will definitely come back for a more leisurely meal and try more dishes. Very charming host also. I was so glad to hear the restaurant was fully booked in the evening. Highly recommend

title: Again, just perfect!
comment: I visited la dolce vita again after a lockdown break and have to reiterate how great it is. I took my mother and we both had sea food spaghetti as its our favourite. The staff (salvatore and francesco) are genuine and excellent as always. Mixed seafood starter is a delight.

title: Birthday dinner
comment: This restaurant is very special. Service is superb. The food is out of this world. Pizza delicious, pasta amazing and good kids menu. Thoroughly enjoyable

title: Exceeded expectations
comment: Thank you so much for a fantastic evening on Friday when we came to La Dolce Vita with three generations as part of our silver wedding anniversary celebrations. We had read the reviews and so expectations were high but a combination of the fantastic service by Luca, and amazing food cooked by the wonderful chef (Francesco?) meant that our high expectations were exceeded! Despite being very busy, the service was prompt, efficient and most importantly friendly. The food was all cooked to perfection. We are just sad that we do not live closer to visit frequently! Hope you are still around when we celebrate our 50th wedding anniversary!

title: Fabulous dinner
comment: What a little gem of a place! The atmosphere was lovely. Very nice setting in the back garden for a summer evening dinner. Service amazing - very attentive and friendly. The food was outstanding, especially the arancini balls and garlic pizza bread. The friendly and personally touch from the staff made for a fantastic evening. Highly recommend!

title: Tony
comment: Fantastic authentic Indian food! The Lamb Biriyani and Chicken 65 were amazing. Can't wait to try the other dishes.

title: Amazing food, amazing service, fantastic experience!
comment: I can’t get enough of La Dolce Vita! This little restaurant is a local gem serving great Italian food and drink. Always consistent with service and Maurizio and his team are always so attentive even during busy periods. If you’ve not been before then don’t hesitate, book and experience this place for yourself!

title: Best curry
comment: No other Indian restaurant comes close. The food is consistently amazing. Fresh, beautiful favours. Every dish on the menu is great. Highly recommend this restaurant. Thanks Citi.

title: Mr
comment: Ordered again, still the would recommend to anyone you will not be disappointed. Spent £80 for a family of 10 . We are vegetarian and not a lot of places can cater for our tasty food we make at home but the restaurant does welldone. Raj

title: Lovely jalfrezi not too hot
comment: Lovely jalfrezi not too hot and lovely and fresh - onion bhajis nice and crispy and a choice of 2 sauces with chopped onion as well such a generous amount I had to halve it and I’ve got the rest tonight really good value!! Thanks

title: First visit
comment: I've never been before, even if friends have always told me how good their pizza is. so now maybe because I'm feeling the need to support local businesses I finally had the chance to take away our first pizzas and like promised they were really good, well cooked and with the perfect toppings! Thank you, we will definitely come back again but next time for a sitting dinner to enjoy also the nice atmosphere.

title: Just Excellent
comment: Food is great and service very friendly. Excellent restaurant. We had take away and it was just ready and warm when they told us.

title: Fabulous food!
comment: Delicious pizza! Authentic Italian food! Friendly staff! Much better than few years ago! Highly recommended!

title: Outstanding and Authentic Italian Matched by the Hospitality
comment: First time visit to this local restaurant but will certainly be back soon. Delicious and authentic Italian food that doesn't break the bank balance. Nice ambiance in the outdoor seating but the meal was made even better by Luca who couldn't have been more helpful or fun as a host. Really made a difference to the experience. Even spoke to the chefs in the kitchen who were the same.  Highly recommended, fully deserving of the plaudits and ratings it has already. Adam & Pratima

title: A nice surprise!
comment: Our first meal since lockdown and our first visit to this restautant. We followed the sign leading us to the garden and found a lovely little garden courtyard with plants and socially distanced tables. The servce was so good - quick, helpful and friendly. The food was lovely, large portions and nicely prepared. We come from the other side of London but have said that we will make the effort to return when in the area beause it was so nice to eat simple, good Italian food in such pleasant surroundings. The friendly service was the bonus!

title: Very tasty & welcoming!
comment: Great family meal in the garden. Typical frittura de pesce starter and delicious wild boar pasta. Huge and tasty calzone. Well looked after by the staff. Highly recommended

title: Absolutely fantastic!
comment: The staff made us feel so welcomed from the minute we walked in to the moment we left. This was the first meal we have been out for since the lockdown, and we walked away absolutely delighted and very very full up! The meal started with some lovely olives and bread brought to us whilst we read the menu. We then had the prawns (amazing!!) and melazene to start with a delicious cold bottle of rose.  For mains, I had the dolce vita pizza which I couldn’t recommend more, and my partner asked for the calzone with lots of added jalapeños - this request was completely fulfilled. He absolutely loved it and the portions were huge!!  We then finished a meal with a baileys which to our surprise was on the house!  We couldn’t have had a better first evening out, made completely fantastic by the great staff and lovely food.  Thank you Dolce Vita!

title: Great food and service again.
comment: Great food and service again. Thanks for a great afternoon, the whole family loved it. Highly recommend

title: Another great takeaway pizza night :)
comment: Delicious as always! Gorgonzola pizza the favourite but Napoli and picante also great. Can't wait to come and enjoy the restaurant again properly when we can, but frequent takeaways will do for now

title: Amazing home delivery.
comment: We are first time customers and had a home delivery. It was amazing! You certainly have our loyalty going forward. If only all takeaways looked and tasted like this. Through such tough times currently too,La Dolce Vita are still able to serve the community at a brilliant standard. Well done!  We can't wait to get a chance to eat in after this covid pandemic. Just to add...The portion sizes for what you pay are great, our children shared the carbonara and both had plenty to fill them up.The chicken in mushroom sauce must be a permanent fixture though. I will be ordering that time and time again

title: Pizzas
comment: Delicious pizzas! We ordered here via uber eats - two vegetarian pizzas and garlic bread, all of which was delicious! the pizzas had a perfect thin crust and the toppings were all delicious and fresh. would definitely order again

title: Delivery from la dolce vita
comment: Really quick delivery through uber eats, fantastic service on the phone and absolutely delicious pizza. Greatly recommend this local business, especially during these difficult times!

title: Small cosy place with great service and delicious food
comment: I've been going for over a year since I moved in nearby and I now I get my pizzas ordered and collected seamlessly. Same delicious food, it's only how I eat it that has changed. My favourite pizzas are Calzone or Dolce Vita (or Aubergine + goat cheese when I feel Veggie). Lasagna is also outstanding, will have you craving for more. And the Arancini are lovely too. I'm already hungry after writing this.

title: Takeaway Pizza.... Best in Town
comment: Fantastic as always. Had a take-out Pizza (actually 4 of them)! Friendly and welcoming service, with a good price to match. Highly recommend for family, friends, or kids a like.

title: The ideal quarantine delivery!
comment: Quite frankly: 1) we made a mistake with our Uber Eats order which La Dolce Vita helped us resolve kindly and quickly  2) the restaurant even called back quickly to let us know that our nice hot pizzas would be with us in 5 minutes  3) the pizzas were all DELICIOUS. Finding this hidden gem has made lockdown bearable. (from an avid pizza lover:) as close to authentic Italian pizza as I have experienced for miles!  Thank you to the staff at La Dolce Vita for your efficient service and incredible food! Very happy family this evening.

title: Calzone as good as you find in Florence!
comment: Real Italian fresh thin pizza takeway like you find in Italy! Alwasy fast friendly service from Maurizio and team.

title: Nice experience
comment: I went to la dolce vita for my anniversary dinner. I called them and say it was my anniversary, they prepared some nice details for us. The food was very nice, the service impeccable and we had our dinner in the back garden, which is very pretty. I recommend la dolce vita, it was overall a very good night.

title: Pizza takeaway
comment: We have been trying to support local restaurants during lockdown. We have been going back to La Dolce Vita time and time again! The pizzas are ready really quickly and they taste amazing. So fresh and fantastic toppings! Would highly recommend. The staff are really friendly too which is always a bonus!

title: Collection
comment: Been meaning to eat at La dolce Vita for a while due to the reviews . So decided to get a collection during the COVID closure. Really good pizza. Tasty and fresh.

title: 😍
comment: Ordered again, amazing food as always. Arrived on time and wasn't cold. 10/10 would recommend to friends/family.

title: Amazing as ever
comment: So happy this restaurant has reopened. Had the most wonderful evening at Dolce Vita - the team there deserve more than five stars for their food, welcome and service.

title: Best Indian food
comment: Every dish we’ve had there tastes different and it’s the most authentic food by far. The staff are super friendly and helpful. Restaurant is clean and the service is quick and efficient. I’ll be only eating and recommending this place for great, authentic Indian food.

title: Best pizza in Teddington/Twickenham!
comment: Eaten in at this lovely authentic Italian restaurant a few times but last night we ordered take out.. what can I say, super efficient friendly service, ready in ten minutes to collect, good value for money and perfectly packaged.. thank you team it was the best Napoli and Calamari and we will be back very soon ... Clare and Kevin

title: Great take away!
comment: We have watched this restaurant grow and thrive. In order to support it in this difficult time we ordered a takeaway. I had fish stew and my husband chose lasagne. The food was ready in half an hour. The food was delicious and despite not having the ambience of a lovely restaurant worked well. This will be our Saturday treat in the coming weeks.

title: A lockdown treat
comment: We love this restaurant and would probably have gone their with our in laws for my wife's 60th birthday yesterday. So instead we ordered two delivery meals - for two addresses - on Uber Eats and tried to make our dining room look like the inside of LDV ! Given that the movie of the same name was made in the year of her birth - 1960 - it all seemed very appropriate! The food was hot and just as good as you get in the restaurant - and came within 40 minutes of ordering via the app. Sardines, the wild boar pasta and the most wonderful tiramisu. And our daughter loved her pizza.  I really hope this great local restaurant survive the current crisis and I'd urge you to give them a try on Uber Eats.

title: Perfecto
comment: This is what you need to pick you up in this depressing time. Food cooked to perfection, such a treat at the moment and a welcome break from cooking.

title: Restaurant quality takeaway
comment: I miss my favourite local restaurant so was really pleased to be able to get a takeaway. We had our usual order, three pizzas and my favourite aubergine parmigiana. The quality was just as good as if we were in the restaurant. It really cheered us up in this strange time.

title: Takeaway
comment: Lockdown takeaway treat. Fantastic quality and service. Authentic Italian pizza instead of doughy cheese stodge served up the chains. Would recommend highly.

title: Excellent take away for lockdown
comment: Excellent take away for lockdown, such a great place this, definitely the best pizzas in town and always super friendly. Recommend

title: Just eat
comment: La Dolce Vita is our favourite restaurant. The food is amazing, We go there every week, but unfortunately the virus stopped us going there for a while, but we are very happy to find out you can order trough Just Eat. Guys We miss you very much and we really hope everything will finish soon and going back to the normal routine. Keep strong and we will see you soon.

title: Fantastic start to six nations day
comment: I have brought many customers and friends as guests to this establishment. The reception we receive from Maurizio and his brother is a genuine as if you were visiting them in Italy The food is just exceptional and well priced. He also has a great memory and a caring touch asking about a friend who visited last year with me and who unfortunately is not well at the moment. We shall return at any given opportunity and am sure this will be with my pal as well  Regards Eddie

title: While the Virus is around I was delighted to have Just Eat deliver our lunch today.
comment: Maurizio has found a way to beat the virus, We can now get his outstanding food through the Just Eat App. We had the liver, Salmon, and seafood spaghetti delivered to us today at lunchtime and all three dishes were as fantastic as always. We have been regulars at La Dolce Vita for the last 10 years and are so pleased we can at least still enjoy the food and support this wonderful restaurant and it's staff during these uncertain times. I cannot recommend the highly enough. Many thanks Mourizio.

title: Great food ( just eaten at home )
comment: La Dolce Vita is our local Italian and go-to restaurant to celebrate family events. Not wanting to be beaten by the virus we ordered our favourite starters and pizzas but for collection and ate at home. Same high standards and distinctive flavours - will be back soon.

title: Last Lockdown Takeaway
comment: With tonight’s (20.3.20) announcement that all restaurants, cafes and bars must close, I thought it only right to get what could possibly be my last take out meal for quite a while. Having been a customer of Maurizio’s for the last 8 years, there was only one place on to go. Although one pizza will not make a difference in the grand scheme of things, I wanted to show Maurizio that we will support him and the rest of the industry, through these difficult times. As always, the pizza was exceptional and I will be back as soon as this crisis is over for a celebration meal and cheeky limoncello.

title: Molto bene! Great neighbourhood Italian - eat in or takeaway
comment: I’ve been coming here every week for the last two years and can wholeheartedly recommend Maurizio & co. Great service, great food - a proper neighbourhood Italian. They do great takeaway, too. Molto bene!

title: Fantastic restaurant
comment: Amazing food, great service and lovely atmosphere. Would highly recommend and we can't wait to come back soon!

title: fantastic
comment: we just had a fantastic take away from this restaurant. IT was simply fantastic, with just eat you can order the whole menu. i will call them again tomorrow.

title: Lovely restaurant, worth supporting
comment: Delicious, great quality food. Very welcoming under usual circumstances, and a great takeaway option in today's coronavirus climate - particularly if you love pasta but can't find any in the shops! Really hope Dolce Vita goes the distance and is still around when we come out the other side of this pandemic.

title: Fantastic Takeaway Service - please support them
comment: In this difficult time, we wanted to support our local restaurant and so ordered a takeaway from them. We could have anything we wanted from their restaurant menu. The food was ready in 20 mins from making the call. Food was great, as is the service. Will be using a lot in these coming weeks.

title: The best pizza in Teddington!!
comment: It took us 7 months to discover this restaurant and now there is no turning back. We were extremely happy with our order, including the gorgeous panna cotta which had been made in the morning. The staff were really friendly and cheerful both when ordering and collecting the order. We will be back!!!

title: Our second delivery order
comment: Our second delivery order since lockdown. Delicious! Our favourite local restaurant! So pleased we can support them in these times! The pizzas are amazing and the truffle and speck pasta is my favourite dish ever. Always friendly, can’t wait to visit when we’re allowed out!

title: Still the best pizza in the borough
comment: Great food and the best service from magic Maurizio. A true takeaway treat. Highly recommended. *****

title: La Dolce Vita - what life and food is meant to be!
comment: Had a fabulous anniversary dinner for two at La Dolce Vita. Had the pasta with mushrooms and truffle sauce - out of this world! Francesco was amazing and delivered excellent customer service. We will be back.

title: Another Delightful Experience
comment: This was our second visit to this delightful Italian restaurant. We happened to be there on a rugby match day, but this had no impact on the standard of service or the quality of the food. Fortunately, all the rugby fans left soon after we arrived. The traditional Italian atmosphere was restored.  The food was delicious, more than satisfying the older Italian members of our party! The meal was rounded off by a charming gesture for the birthday girl accompanied by another kind gesture for the older members of the family. All together, as an Italian, I would highly recommend La Dolce Vita, either for a special occasion or for a casual bite!and look forward to returning there soon.

title: We had the most lovely time!
comment: We had the most lovely time at La dolce vita on Sunday celebrating my Mums 70th birthday. We’ve been here many times before and it is our favourite restaurant in Teddington by far. The food as always was amazing! Clear plates all round! Seafood spaghetti the best I’ve had. Maurizio was as usual a brilliant host. We were allowed to put balloons on the table and they were also very accommodating with my 6 month old baby, having a table we could fit the pram next to. Would highly recommend. Thank you Maurizio!

title: Superb
comment: What a great evening we had at La Dolce Vita,friendly staff, goergeous food and lovely atmosphere thank you

title: Lovely Italian Restaurant
comment: We have visited La Dolce Vita several times over the last few years. This is a lovely restaurant for all the family.  Maurizio and the team are always friendly & attentive and the food is consistently excellent. I particularly like the wild boar pasta and the pizzas, but the fish and liver are also regularly ordered and praised. Highly recommended.

title: Lovely
comment: We came with my kids this time, they loved it. Pasta alla bolognese and fish shape pizza. Is a very nice place to go..

title: Went for birthday dinner with
comment: Went for birthday dinner with family, starters of prawn in butter sauce were great , cooked just right , moist and soft The pizza’s were good and wife’s risotto was very tasty. Dessert of cheese cake was great as it was light and fluffy, Finished with limoncello drink on the house. Everyone enjoyed the food.

title: Enjoyed an excellent evening
comment: Enjoyed an excellent evening meal at this authentic Italian restaurant. The warm greeting set the scene and our drinks order taken and brought promptly while we perused the menu. The food arrived on a timely basis despite the restaurant being full. Our party ordered a range of starters aIl of which were great, particularly the arancini, the mains were also wonderful particularly the ragu. A good range of deserts is on offer if you can manage after the generous earlier courses. A reasonably priced bottle of Chianti accompanied the food. The complimentary lemoncello is a nice touch. The waiters were great. We shall return

title: Very friendly service, excellent foor
comment: Although very busy due to international rugby England v Ireland nearby, the service was excellent with the staff being particularly personable. The food was excellent - highly recommended

title: Family dinner
comment: great atmosphere, friendly staff, didnt feel rushed and delicious pizza .. came with the kids who loved not just the food but the staff interacted with them making it fun experience

title: Perfect restaurant
comment: Very good customer service food top quality tast pufect would highly recommend coming with the family and friends for a meal been here 3 time and no disappointment oh yeah and the food is made to order fresh Owner maurizio best guy make you feel at home and wanna come back every time

title: La Dolce Vita has been a family
comment: La Dolce Vita has been a family favorite for years. Today Maurizio and crew exceeded expectations as our party of 16 celebrated my mother’s 90th birthday. The food was delicious, served promptly, and with warmth and friendliness.

title: Motto Delicioso!
comment: Always friendly always delicious food. We highly recommend La Dolce Vita... a very local restaurant we frequent to enjoy company.

title: amazing
comment: We had one of the most amazing dinner on tuesday evening at La Dolce Vita. very friendly owner, and outstanding food..thank you

title: Amazing food and friendly atmosphere!
comment: Popped in on a Wednesday night with no reservation. Food was very good. Between us we had salmon, fish stew and sea bream. All were very tasty.  Francesco looked after us very well. Good friendly service. Will definitely come again.

title: Great café!
comment: I just happened to stop by Dolce Vita for lunch while my clothes were in the wash next door, and I know I made the right choice. Maurizio was very friendly and even remembered meeting the friends who recommended the café to me; the restaurant also had a nice ambience with lovely music and a beautiful setup. The calzone was divine: delicious, filling, and of perfect size and presentation, it was an amazing lunch. I already know I’ll be coming back soon, as the food reminds me of home back in New Jersey, and the personnel are the most welcoming people. I love Dolce Vita!

title: Must visit the best of the best
comment: Excellent service, friendly, clean, wheelchair friendly, good place for business meeting, thank you very much

title: Must visit!
comment: A lovely independent Italian restaurant, great customer service, tasty food and reasonably priced. The restaurant was fully booked but they kindly squeezed us in anyway. Would highly recommend!

title: Samantha Curtis
comment: Have been to this lovely restaurant a few times now and will definitely be going back again the staff are amazing the food and atmosphere is outstanding and great value for money would definitely recommend the la dolce vita Italian restaurant to anyone who is looking for great food and a lovely evening out

title: Lovely italian restaurant
comment: I visited La Dolce Vita on Sat 8th March with a couple of friends & was blown away by it. Absolutely fantastic food in a lovely venue. I have the arancini as a starter & the spaghetti pescadora as main & they were both amazing. I would highly recommend & will go back when I'm next in the area.

title: Lovely food with great service.
comment: I visited la dolce vita in February on a Friday night. The restaurant was busy as expected and we were served by Francesco, who was genuinely excellent. Hard to pick a main course as the menu is excellent. Thanks and see you again.

title: Lovely restaurant with great service and atmosphere
comment: Met up with family and grabbed an early dinner on Friday the food was stunning, one of the best meals I have had in a while. The restaurant looks great and and the service was spot on I would recommend this place everyone. Thanks

title: Love this place!
comment: Love this place! Whether eating here with whole family or date night it never fails to disappoint! Fresh tasty authentic Italian food, served by friendly and attentive staff - all very reasonably priced! Excellent!

title: We loved it! Francesco is
comment: We loved it! Francesco is an absolute star ... what a great place for a birthday meal and fond memories!!!

title: Lovely meal
comment: We enjoyed a lovely tasty meal and our waiter was friendly and helpful. Would definitely go again and recommend to others.

title: Consistently tasty food.
comment: Consistently tasty food. Good value with friendly service. Maurizio is an excellent host. Ditch the ubiquitous Italian style chain restaurants and head here for a real taste of Italy.

title: La Dolce Vita Restaurant Teddington
comment: I have been living in Twickenham for a year now and this is the best Italian restaurant in the area. Went there tonight (19/02/20) for another excellent meal.If you are in the area just go! But you may need to book.

title: Great place
comment: The food was delicious, great service ( Francesco) and very nice atmosphere. We will come back ! Congratulations!

title: Our First Choice.
comment: Whenever my wife doesn’t want to cook our first thought is “let’s go. Dolce Vita.” Always great food and good wine. The Sangiovese is excellent.

title: Fantastic
comment: What a find in Londonderry an amazing place with amazing food and amazing service and food. This was a date night and it was an a amazing time with everything first class. Will be back and we’ll done to the team

title: Buonissimo
comment: Very good food in this amazing restaurant, fantastic service and lovely atmosphere. We will be back ..

title: Gemma italiana
comment: Excellent dinner in a friendly location, we had an amazing time here with some of our friends. We really enjoyed the italian food, especially the pasta. The portions are generous and the service is also excellent.

title: Amazing food and lovely people!
comment: A must if your teddington. Amazing food and atmosphere. Definitely on my favourite list of place to eat! ❤️

title: Amazing Italian cooking
comment: La Dolce Vita is in an out of the way part of town in a parade of shops that is nothing special. The restaurant decor is homey and only remarkable by the personal touches and lack of designer input.  The menu reflects a range of Italian cuisine and reads like everything you would want from an Italian restaurant. However, the food is incredible. We were a table of four and everything was special, not just good. The service was personal, attentive and unhassled but prompt. We will definitely be back to explore the menu further.

title: A gem in Teddington. Fabuloso, gracias!!
comment: Impressed with this restaurant. My partner and I were looking for a local and cozy place to have a nice time. Dolce Vita and the people who work there make the restaurant the perfect place to spend a pleasant time with very friendly and professional service. The food is delicuous, not only the pizza is super tasty, the starters and desserts are also excellent. Thank you very much for everything, we will be back soon for sure.

title: Great experience
comment: Very good food in this wonderful restaurant, amazing food and lovely atmosphere... Fast and convenient service..

title: lovely atmosphere
comment: lovely food and hostess qualities. great atmosphere, we went for my mothers 50th and the food was perfect. wine choices excellent. highly recommend it.

title: Amazing atmosphere and amazing food !!
comment: I shall be returning for my first Valentine's with my partner this year. What a great place for food and great atmosphere defo highly recommend

title: NICE PLACE
comment: Best Cappuccino I ever had at Ladolce Vita made by Micheal. Amaizing Cocktails especially the Passion Mojito...Will definitely Recommend my Friends there. The Latte Design so Amaizing.... Over roll Great service and Staff so Friendly...

title: Best Restaurant Ever
comment: It's Very Welcome Restaurant. The Meals Are Very Delicious  It's Not To Cheap And It's Not To Expensive It's The Right Amount To Spend With Your Family's, Friend's And Love One's. I Would Recommend For You To Try The Best Meals. Thank You Maurizio For Welcoming Us.

title: Excellent authentic Indian food
comment: Food was excellent and so was the customer service received from Keiran. Looking forward to trying other dishes in the near future.

title: Excellent birthday dinner
comment: Excellent birthday dinner - will definitely come again. So glad my man found this lovely restaurant.

title: Christmas Meal
comment: Had a Christmas meal with a group of friends. As usual a fantastic meal in a fantastic venue and fantastic value for money.

title: Really good
comment: This was the first time for us and we enjoyed every single course. Prawns were superb, the swordfish in a courgette crust and the lemon tart..very very good

title: Fantastic
comment: I don't live locally but everytime I'm in the area I come here, the high standard of food and service never change, is always the top. Thanks again.

title: Excellent food, for a big meal!
comment: Excellent food, for a big family meal. Mauricio the Maitre’D promised quick service for us, Pre the Big Game at Twickenham. He did not disappoint; no compromise on food, or service. Prompt service of great authentic Italian food. Thank you.

title: Moira Hawkins
comment: The most amazing family meal and very friendly you will be made very welcomr I can recommend this resturant for family meals and romantic meals

title: Good authentic Italian
comment: Good value authentic Italian trattoria experience. Varied menu with generous portions of great flavoured dishes. Fish and wine quality above average. Only slight drawback is the ordinary café atmosphere.

title: Great food and lovely atmosphere
comment: Went for a birthday meal with family just before Christmas. The food was delicious and we appreciated the range of options available, even on the vegan menu. The staff were really warm and inviting - the guy even put on some birthday tunes for me :) Really nice atmosphere, tasty food and great service - will definitely be going back again!

title: Amazing Business Happy Hour
comment: A great night for our business partners to come together with amazing food, great wine and spectacular atmosphere. Maurizio and his team were on top of everything throughout the entire process of planning the event to pre-ordering food to making us all feel at home. Our business partners could not thank us enough for wonderful evening! Maurizo & Team we look forward to seeing you again soon on our next trip to town in early 2020!!!

title: Hidden treasure in Thamel
comment: Not only was the food impeccable, along with the appreciation for international cuisine - the stunning array of wine that was at stake, this was truly an experience worth sharing with someone dear to you!  Our customer service attendant, Negh Raj, has reminded us that good service can be experienced at all the right moments. His attentiveness and care for his role in the company oozed in his passion to ensure we experienced the best of hospitality from Nepal If you would give yourself the chance to experience this Italian sparked zest of life in the business of Thamel - it is an experience you will not forget.

title: And again
comment: Usual high standard in this restaurant. Great place to go lots of fan and outstanding food. See you next week

title: Best Italian ever
comment: Delicious food, real Italian menu. Excellent wines and drinks. Very friendly and efficient service. Perfect way to spend an evening with friends.

title: Excellent food and service
comment: We came across this restaurant and decided to give it a go. The food was authentic Italian and really excellent, so delicious with fantastic service too. Clearly a popular neighbourhood Italian! We can’t recommend it highly enough!

title: Good food but no atmosphere and well overpriced!
comment: The food itself was good and they have a good choice of pasta but the price was definitly too high! For a starter of Bruschetta 30bze plus taxes is way too much. The music was so loud that you could not talk to eacht other in a normal way.

title: Mr
comment: My son and I had another very enjoyable meal at la dolce vita, the butterfly garlic prawns are awesome and my son loved the pappardelle with duck ragout, pizzas are amazing! Great atmosphere, great service, great food! Thanks Mauritzio

title: Such good food! Really delicious
comment: Such good food! Really delicious pasta and pizza and wine as well!  We had the gnocchi, pizza and salad. Service was very good. Nice atmosphere. Came back twice during my stay.

title: Better and better
comment: I have been coming here for the last two years or so. The food is getting better and better and the service is very kind and polite. Nice atmosphere.

title: Very nice friendly restaurant
comment: Very nice friendly restaurant which always delivers excellent food. My five sisters and I have been several times and we have all enjoyed our choices from the menu.

title: Excellent
comment: I, along with 11 friends had the most lovely Christmas lunch at Dolce Vita today. The Christmas menu was excellent, the turkey escalope was delicious as were all the other courses. We are very lucky to have such a great restaurant on our doorstep.

title: Divine Dolce Vita
comment: Yet another fabulous lunch at La Dolce Vita. I started the New Year determined to break out of my habits and try doing something different. So although we decided to go to one of our favourite places for lunch I did choose something different on the menu, which is also a new addition. The tagliatalle vongole with pistachio chilli and garlic. I think this is a southern Italian/Sicilian speciality. It may seem an odd combination but it is divinely moreish. I used to have the boar ragu which is also delicious but a craving for seafood usually means you need something it offers. The clams were plump and meaty and melt in the mouth and the combination of flavours perfect. My family loved their pasta with swordfish and seafood special, the corn fed chicken with mushrooms, huge thin real italian pizza and we started with perfect calamari and prawns - not greasy or chewy but crisp and perfectly cooked. Bread and olives are also complimentary unlike some places which sadly overcharge for this. House wine is fine. As ever Maurizio is the perfect host and you cannot get a warmer welcome. The ambience is lively and a real mix of clientele. Looking forward to a return visit when my resolution will probably go out the window!

title: Best lamb chops.
comment: Always great food. Love the lamb chops. Have ordered them to take home. Don’t live local. Will always try to come when in area.

title: Milan
comment: Awesome food and to top it up awesome service by Preet! Nice table, and the suggestions given by Preet was excellent.

title: Parag
comment: Excellent service and food, Preet the waitress went over and above her duties to look after us, Food was excellent and location is perfect. Food choices are excellent

title: Bimal
comment: Very good service and food is great value for the price .impressed . Will make sure to recommend to others worth it.

title: Delicious Italian Food
comment: This is a lovely friendly restaurant serving great food at reasonable prices. Good selection of food and drink plus a Set menu and a Chef's special to choose from. Should you want a take away meal or just a quick coffee, they provide it  Maurizio and his staff are always attentive and helpful. There is a cosy atmosphere both inside and outside. The patio at the back of the restaurant is very popular in the summer months. Should it rain, it is not a problem as the patio is under cover.  Enjoy

title: Brilliant family run restaurant
comment: Great food , great wine list , great service ....our favourite Italian ....they met all the criteria for a most enjoyable experience.

title: 40 Happy Students!
comment: Thank you for a wonderful lunch event for my students. We enjoyed excellent food served with a super-quick service to make our bus. Great pizza & highly recommend the calzones. Thanks Maurizio & the gang

title: Made for a very Happy Birthday
comment: We had a lovely time at the Dolce Vita. Our visit was made smooth by the owner who suggested a starter platter for the 14 of us so we got to try a range of the starters which were all very good. The food was authentically Italian, delicious and substantial!! The evening was rounded off with the staff playing the Congratulations song for the birthday girl. A lovely place to go for wonderful warm and funny service, I really recommend the Dolce Vita!!

title: Lunch Stop for a passer by.
comment: I stopped in here on my way to uni, for a bite to eat and a coffee. I was seated and served instantly by Francesco. The menu had a wide range of vegetarian options which was perfect for me. I ordered ordered an aubergine pasta dish and a coffee. My waiter Francesco instantly brought out a complimentary break basket, olive cup, and water glass, along side my coffee, and my main shortly followed with impressive timing. The portion sizes were extremely generous and I ended up taking some home. The good was magnificent and the service was incredible and I will definitely be making a trip back here again. Every need was looked after, and the staff went above and beyond to cater for me. 11/10. Perfect experience.

title: Really nice
comment: Really nice food, chilled atmosphere and overlooking the street. Great people watching spot. Would come again.

title: Friday Night Date Night
comment: My wife and I have just enjoyed an amazing meal at La Dolce Vita. We shared a garlic bread and fish starter and then enjoyed the boar pasta and lamb dish, all of which were yum yum and made even better, washed down with a lovely bottle of red wine. We’d highly recommend a visit.

title: Really really good food and service
comment: Tried this place based on all the great reviews. Very glad we did. We chose it for my daughter's birthday dinner (she said she wanted to find some really good Italian food). From the moment we walked in we felt welcome. The service was amazing, friendly, engaging, witty and prompt. Even though it got very busy we were not kept waiting for anything. The food - oh wow the food! Everything was cooked perfectly and delicious. Starters, mains, dessert all fabulous. The pizza was wonderful and the tiramisu was light as air. I am partial to Sicilian wines so it was nice to find a tasty Nero D'Avola in the wine list. The place looks a little dated but is very clean and homey. Reservations recommended especially on the weekend. Looking forward to going back again.

title: Excellent venue!
comment: My family and friends, fifteen in total, all enjoyed a fantastic meal on Sunday 17th November. Everyone thoroughly enjoyed their different meals. Wonderful atmosphere and very friendly service.I would strongly recommend this restaurant.

title: Tremendeous Success, Great atmosphere!
comment: I am a regular guest at La Dolce Vita Where I preferably go whenever I travet to London. I have recently been there with my family, living in London,to celebrate the birthday of my niece. It Was a tremendeous success full of emotions particularly at the Cake Time when also all the other guests joined us singing Happy Birthday together with the Owner Maurizio next to us! The Food was very healthy tasteful and yummy. The service was excellent creating a great atmosphere. Thank you Maurizio and Team. You Made me and my Family a happy and remarkable day! We Will be back soon!

title: Our spot
comment: La Dolce Vita is our only place to go from now on. This is our third time and what can i say...we just love it....food, service, atmosphere. .10/ again for us.

title: Birthday Dinner
comment: We dined here for a midweek birthday dinner have never been before so was pleasantly surprised a little Italian in a quiet parade of shops. We were made to feel welcome from the minute we arrived and the restaurant quickly filled up. Francesco was attentive the whole evening delivering the best service and chatting to us, he recommended some dishes and we were all very pleased with our food aubergine Parmigiana others had lasagna arrabiata and all enjoyed would recommend the arancini so good! He even gave my daughter a scoop of ice cream with a candle and we all sang happy birthday she was delighted. Would return again.

title: Always Delivers
comment: Amazing food and service. Always consistent each time we go. Tried the new menu and the new thali - which was great as it allowed you to try lots of different dishes. Great execution! Above all, service was fantastic and would like to mention Punam who was excellent from start to finish - great hospitality and a great asset to Madhu's. Look forward to going back soon!

title: Very good pizza and great service
comment: My boyfriend and I were in the area after visiting Hampton Court and found this small italian restaurant. We were very pleased with our choice as the food was really good and the staff very polite. Pizza was lovely and crispy and there are quite a few interesting choices on the menu beyond the classic Margherita. The Gorgonzola e Noci and Dolce Vita pizza were both very tasty and light. The Sicilian panzerotti we had for dessert were delicious and not something you find in many Italian restaurants menus. Recommended!

title: Lovely little Italian
comment: I took my family for Sunday lunch. We really enjoyed it. The food is very good. The atmosphere was superb. The staff are superb. Liver & a bottle of Barolo knockout. Will definitely return.

title: Great lunch once again
comment: Great food, wine and service, always welcoming. Tiramisu superb and lovely complimentary Limoncello. Thank you Mauricizo for another wonderful meal.

title: Large family group, all happy bunnies!
comment: A belated review of a summer celebration, where this was the ONLY place I could find in the area that would guarantee a table outside on what was forecast to be a hot day. Maurizio even confirmed that morning if we still wanted outside as it was hazy, but it was a beautiful day later & I'm glad we stuck to our plan.  So all of that was a plus, but the food itself here is really good - simple Italian dishes cooked well. Love the scallops. The service was excellent, the wine flowed, it was a lovely place to have a birthday lunch. Thanks to Maurizio and team!

title: Wonderful Anniversary meal
comment: After a very long day at the Harry Potter Warner Bros Tour, we wanted an Italian meal to end our anniversary in style. As I was heading back towards our hotel in Hounslow, my wife was on Trip Advisor and found this little gem not too far from the hotel. Every thing was superb. The staff so polite and nothing was too much trouble. We really liked the fact that we were given water on arrival without having to ask. We had free olives, and the most light and fluffy bread. The garlic bread was light and crispy. My wife had spaghetti bolognese, I had fettuccine with mushrooms and speck. Both were delicious. The only downside was not having enough room to have dessert! Next time we visit London we will definitely be back.

title: Attentive
comment: Small restaurant in calm Teddington street. Not super fancy interior, just standart, but you have that cozy family cafe feeling there. Waiter, also I think owner of the place, is very welcoming. He is super fast on online bookings, very helpful and tries to do extra to meet your asks. I value that attitude a lot. Locals also love this place, even on Monday evening there were quite a lot people. So book a table beforehand! Food was very tasty, italian wines great. The parking was a bit tricky, I was told there were free parking places on the road, in reality only permit parking and all sides occupied full. I was lucky to find one place near uninhabited home.

title: Great family lunch out
comment: I took my family here for lunch for the first time. What a great restaurant! Friendly, warm greeting with lots of help and advice about the menu. The food was delicious, drinks were quickly brought to our table and the tiramisu was creamy heaven in a dish. The whole family enjoyed it which is a difficult thing to achieve. Only twenty minutes away from home, so we will be coming back again soon.

title: Another fabulous family dinner!
comment: We love this place! It’s a rustic, authentic Italian. Delicious food, a very warm welcome... Maurizio and the team make dining with three little ones extremely easy. It may look rather plain and simple, but the food speaks for itself. Well worth a visit. We have already booked our next one!

title: Wow!
comment: My husband and I overnighted at the Sheraton skyline before heading home. We are not very familiar with Indian food so we asked our lovely waitress Punam to suggest what we should try. Wow were we impressed, the flavours and variety were amazing! We were both so full but couldn’t stop eating. Punam was so lovely and helpful. Next time we are in London we will stay at the Sheraton just so we can go back to Madhu’s.

title: Hidden gem in Teddington
comment: Great place and value for money.  Lovely Italian restaurant in Teddington,  worth a visit. Pasta is delicious and the starters big portions.

title: Anniversary meal
comment: What a really nice quaint restaurant. Food was amazing cooked to perfection staff were really friendly. Overall great little restaurant

title: Amazing meal experience
comment: Amazing meal experience having tried real italian pizza, delicious starters according to the season and panzerotti filled with sweet ricota cheese and pistacio cream meeting even highest expectations.Cosy and relaxing atmosphere to have you dinner in the weekend. I highly recommend Gavi di Gavi wine from Piemonte region for true wine lovers.

title: Absolutely amazing!
comment: Food is absolutely delicious! I'm very picky eater and trust me I loved all 3 courses! Great quality, amazing flavour... definitely recommended! I can't wait to go back for another meal. Very nice and professional stuff, just great place Thank you!

title: Taste experience
comment: Great place, family run and a good atmosphere. Food is typically Italian and a good selection of drinks. Lovely sitting out the front in the summer, you could be on holiday

title: Amazing fresh pasta, pizza and delicious desserts
comment: That type of restaurant where you never get disappointed. Always fresh and tasty, once you try la dolce vita you'll keep coming back

title: Great Little Bistro
comment: It was worth the trip to Teddington.  Was recommended to us by our Italian friend. Great food, great hospitality, lovely people. Authentic Italian charm. Will def go back to try the pizza. Maurizio, grazie per la cena!

title: Best Restaurant
comment: I recently returned to La Dolce Vita. The specials had the best lamb chops I ever tasted and the service was as perfect as always. Thank you!

title: Excellent
comment: Two vegetarians and a meat eater. The food is great. Mains, and sweets were perfect, coupled with a really nice wine. We'll be back.

title: Lovely birthday dinner
comment: Went for a family dinner (2 adults, 2 kids) for a birthday at this neighbourhood Italian based on positive Trip Advisor reviews. We were not disappointed. Had an excellent meal. Pizzas were thin and crispy with good quality toppings. My wild boar ragu was melt in the mouth delicious. Service was excellent and friendly - just what you hope for in a small family run place. The house red from Sicily was also a very pleasant surprise. All in all a great experience: thank you, Francisco!

title: Wonderful
comment: One of the nicest pizzas I've ever had! I took my mum for lunch and we thoroughly enjoyed ourselves. Really friendly service. Great food. We will be back (we live close by now so very happy to have found this place so early into our new home). Perfect for a family lunch or dinner, the outback seating is very pleasant in the sun.

title: What a gem
comment: I read the reviews on this restaurant and decided to book a table when a friend was visiting. What a treat! The choice of food was excellent and the food lived up to the menu. It was wonderful. This is such a friendly restaurant great atmosphere. I Will recommend to all my friends and look forward to a future visit so I can work my way through the menu.

title: Great meal
comment: Small traditional family run restaurant with good food. We had a family get together and all of us were very pleased with the choice of restaurant.

title: Superb Food - Superb Evening
comment: Food was incredibly rich and tasty, felt like it was being cooked in an Italian village restaurant, service was also great! cant wait to go back!!

title: And again..
comment: We had another amazing meal in this amazing place..really good food and outstanding service...Thank you soon much

title: Superb meal, atmosphere and staff!
comment: We were at La Dolce Vita on Saturday night (7th Sept) and had the most gorgeous meal. We all had something different but I had the beef strips in a spaghetti sauce but it was much more than that. It was absolutely fabulous. We had started with Bruschetta Contadine and that was lovely too (and with added delicious bread). We even had a Dessert and one of my daughter's and myself had the Pear and Almond with chocolate which was to die for! We absolutely loved the whole evening. The atmosphere, friendliness of the staff and the food was tremendous. We had a fabulous evening and we shall remember it with such joy.

title: meraviglioso
comment: We had a great night at this ristorante :a lovely place, friendly staff and great food. A little Italy outside Italy

title: A taste of Italy
comment: Freshly prepared and cooked food which was exceptionally tasty. Good sized portions, reasonably priced. The creamy risotto was just that and perfectly cooked.  Our host was just great. We received a warm welcome, was well looked after and offered a 'limoncello' as a farewell. It's a really intimate restaurant which has an authentic feel to it. No onsite parking but side streets nearby.

title: Family Meal
comment: We had a family meal and the service was excellent in the build up and during the meal. We were seated outside, which was lovely, we were very lucky with the weather! Sharing platters were lovely and everyone enjoyed their main meal. Highly recommend.

title: Great Dinner
comment: My parents and I researched somewhere local to eat for dinner and I read very good reviews on La Dolce Vita on TripAdvisor. We went tonight and had a splendid meal. Lovely hot and fresh food, great service, a good selection of wine and drinks as well as a nice complimentary limoncello to finish off the meal. Being a Tuesday it was a little quiet but there was still great atmosphere and a real vibe of friendly and relaxed locals. I thoroughly recommend this restaurant if you want easy, fresh home-cooked Italian food. I like the fact that it’s not frivolous, there is a great selection of food and drinks and you know it’s all been freshly cooked. The host was very kind and charming. It is also realistically priced and the menu varied, so there is something for everyone. My family and I will be returning and looking forward to it!

title: Extraordinary
comment: I was on a business trip in the Heathrow area and convinced a colleague to go out and have Indian food before our meetings the following day. My personal mission was to eat lamb curry. Initially I was quite challenged with the menu not being familiar with Indian dishes except for Tandoori. But waitress Punam (hope I spell her name correctly) did an excellent job to advise me and my colleague. The result was fantastic food paired with caring service. Quite an experience and absolutely recommendable -

title: Excellent
comment: Quite unsure of what to order, as there were several things I wanted to try. I was greeted by a very friendly and efficient staff that created a small combination dish for me. The dish included a little bit of everything lamb, veggies, chicken and much more. The food was excellent and the combination of flavours soothing spicy or sweet depending on the dish. The server punam was very friendly as we're all the others! Very highly recommend.

title: A Real Italian experience
comment: This restaurant is excellent, the food is fresh and tastes great. The atmosphere is good for a party, but worth booking as popular. An added bonus is the garden on Summer evenings, where you can drink a nice glass of red with your meal. To top it off, the service is some of the best I have encountered, they went out of their way to accommodate and add a personal touch which makes you feel as though you are valued customer rather than another number. Best Italian in the area.

title: Lovely Evening!!
comment: My fiance and I were looking for somewhere to go on to celebrate our anniversary. We had seen the amazing reviews for La Dolce Vita so decided to give it a go and we weren't disappointed. Great welcome, despite being the only people in there when we arrived! Lovely service, wine & the food was absolutely delicious. We had arancini, the Atlantic prawns followed by duck ragout from the specials and wild boar pappardelle. Everything was stunning! The complimentary limoncello went a long way to finishing off a wonderful evening! Thank you for your great hospitality, we will be back!

title: Manzi
comment: Food was excellent as was the service. Definitely 5 stars from us. The seafood pasta was delicious and the chocolate fudge cake is to die for

title: Amazing
comment: The food was amazing, the chef is very nice and the experience was very memorable thank you all of the staff that work there.

title: Lived up to the expectations
comment: A lovely meal with great service. Free bread butter and olives whilst we waited then a great starter of carpaccio and arrancini balls . For mains we had cod tagliatelle and fettuccini with smoked ham and mushrooms. Both were perfectly cooked and delicious . Dessert was also fantastic as was the coffee which was amazing. Service was attentive and very friendly. Everyone leaving could not speak highly enough of the food. It was to die for. Wish we lived closer !!

title: Fabulous little restaurant!
comment: We were looking for something small and intimate to celebrate our Wedding Anniversary and found this little gem on TripAdvisor with rave reviews and we weren't disappointed! We booked a table online which was ready when we arrived, service was fantastic and the food absolutely delicious! We had the Salmon and the Lamb as mains courses which were cooked to perfection and opted for dessert rather than starters (gone are the days we could eat all three). Like a previous reviewer said, "the Chocolate Fudge Cake is to die for" and the Caramel Chocolate Bomb was fab too! We had such a lovely chilled evening, thank you, we will definitely be back!

title: Feel at home
comment: Traditional trattoria restaurant, real food with a home taste. The service is great and if the weather is good they have a very good all fresco dining area. Ideal for groups or just a nice dinner for 2.

title: What a Gem 💍
comment: On a not so impressive street you will find this little hidden gem of a restaurant. If you really want the best seats on a lovely day book early for a table in the courtyard. However, no matter were you sit the food is gorgeous. Between the four of us we had pizza, goats cheese fettuccine and parmigiana and all were fab. The waiter worked very hard and looked after us so well. Highly recommend a visit. We came down for rugby at Twickenham and hope we get tickets again so we can come back.

title: Very friendly place with generous portions of freshly cooked food
comment: We were a family of four and came here for lunch. Service was very pleasant and prompt.The bread and olives served on the house were very welcome.We were also offered a liqueur on the house at the end .I'm not sure what that was as we didnt have it. The pasta dishes were just what we wanted and the desserts were also good. Will be returning !

title: Great food and friendly waiter/owner.
comment: We booked online to get a table after watching England at Twickenham. I booked after reading the good reviews, we were not disappointed. We were greeted by the wiater/owner, who was very friendly. All the food we had was fresh and tasty. Definitely would recommend a visit to anyone visiting the area.

title: Amazing
comment: We stayed at this hotel and had dinner here one evening. It was amazing. The service was great and the atomsphere was perfect. We really enjoyed ourselves and our meals were excellent. We will eat here again.

title: Special summer birthday dinner
comment: On the hottest night of the year, La Dolce Vita was the perfect setting for a joint birthday dinner for my husband and daughter. It's not easy to find a restaurant that has something for everyone, but this restaurant lived up to all the favourable Trip Advisor reviews. We sat in the garden and everyone (from both generations) enjoyed their choices from the menu. Special mention to the fritto de pesce starter and the sea bream (from the specials menu) which were both delicious. Thank you to La Dolce Vita team for helping us celebrate a special family day with a memorable dinner in a lovely Italian restaurant.

title: Superb
comment: What a fantastic meal in the garden last week Superb service Mauricio is a gem  A must visit if you have not been there before.

title: Graduation Celebration
comment: A perfect place to celebrate my sons graduation. This family run restaurant produced the best Italian meal I have had for years. Everything was fresh and delicious and the service friendly and quick. My only gripe is that we don’t live closer, so we could visit more often. I hope we have the opportunity to visit again soon.

title: An excellent venue for a major celebration
comment: To mark our 50th wedding anniversary we booked the entire capacity of the reastaurant for a celebratory lunch with friends. Maurizio and his team were excellent. The whole meal was just as expected and drew a great deal of praise from all who attended. The atmosphere in La Dolce Vita is so welcoming - the food well prepared and rapidly served. This restaurant, one of the most convivial in Teddington, is going from strength to strength. Highly recommended for major celebrations as well as for a quiet evening meal.

title: Good food. Great service. Five stars.
comment: From the first time setting foot into La Dolce Vita one thing has been apparent; the staff are always providing an authentic and personable service. In combination with really good food, it's evident why they are rated so highly in the local area. Having come here with people from all over the world they've all agreed that the food, service and atmosphere are great. Thank you!

title: Great place
comment: Visited yesterday evening and the place lived up to its reputation. Fantastic food and great service. Definitely gong back

title: Beautiful family run Italian.
comment: Amazing staff, Fantastic food, Great atmosphere, Look forward to returning soon. highly recommend visiting if you're in the area

title: Amazing
comment: We went to this restaurant last night for a family celebration and the food was amazing. We sat in the garden area and everyone raved about the food they had. Great for gluten free options too. Best Italian I've had in ages and I've had a lot!!

title: A little gem in Teddington
comment: Went here on the recommendation of friends and we were not disappointed. Outstanding food great service by friendly staff. Booked to go again before we left.

title: Wonderful experience at La Dolce Vita!
comment: The food and service was excellent. The ambiance was excellent and I could sense the passion that went into ensuring I had all my needs met. Thank you for helping me experience the good life!

title: Authentic Italian food
comment: Just has a fantastic dinner outside. Service and food were outstanding and really tasty! The outside sitting is really lovely and we had a really lovely time! We will definitely back again and I will highly recommend to everyone! 10 out of 10!

title: Meraviglioso
comment: Simply wonderful food and amazing customers service once Again. looking forward to seeing you Again soon

title: Family night out in the back garden
comment: As it was so hot we booked for the rear garden on a Saturday night. I really do not like leaving reviews that are not glowing ones but I do have to be truthful. Average is the best description of this place. We had been once a few years ago and really enjoyed this restaurant but unfortunately all 6 of us agreed it was nothing special. £250 for 6 of us, service charge included, not heavy drinkers seems a little steep even for Teddington. Specials at £21, £6.50 for a small glass of Kir Royale. The food was average and the garden area could have done with a clean so overall distinctly underwhelming for us as a group. The waiter did not seem that friendly. On the plus side there were a few people in so the atmosphere was quite good. A real pity as I love supporting good local establishments.

title: Great restaurant!
