comment: Always a good choice, whether for a big family celebration across three generations, lunch with friends or for an intimate dinner. Good honest Italian food, my favourite dish is calves liver, always just right, though I do like to try new things too. The service is good, even when busy, and there is a good selection of wines.

title: A family christening
comment: Excellent service. Amazing food and great ambiance that gives you an homely feeling despite being out.

title: Excellent Italian food
comment: Had a very nice meal with my partner. Food was very aunthentic to the Italian flavour and portion size was good. Very friendly and attentive staff. Family owned and run with good atmosphere, the food was excellent. We will be returning.

title: A fantastic evening
comment: We had a party for 23 people in the garden, which we had to ourselves, and everything was perfect. The ambience was lovely and the service from Luca was amazing. Nothing was too much trouble and he was efficient, friendly and fun. All our guests raved about the food. A huge success.

title: Great place
comment: Came here for a few drinks and a quick bite and we left extremely satisfied. The staff were really nice and our burgers were perfect.

title: Delicious meat
comment: Very professional service, tender stakes, delicious desserts. No waiting time for starters and mains even if the place was full booked.

title: Omg the calzone
comment: This restaurant is wonderful-we sat in the garden area and it was so nice. The staff are happy and genuinely want the customers to have a good time. The food is fantastic - I had the calzone- huge. I want to go back.

title: Great food!
comment: Had a great evening at this restaurant! The food was amazing and the waiter talked about our dishes when we got them.  We sat outside and unfortunately were the only ones so there wasn’t much of an atmosphere (no fault of the restaurants). Music choice in the garden would be our only recommendation to change as we listened to a mixture of pop music.  Truffle and sweet ham fettuccini was delicious!

title: Great lunch as ever
comment: We love this little authentic Italian! We had pizza, pasta, seafood and more. Cannot recommend enough

title: Amazing!
comment: We went here for dinner and everything was awesome (even the bread and olives before the starter were tasty). The food was beautiful - I had the fettucini with mushroom and it was one of the best pasta dishes I've had. Our waiter was so friendly and lovely. We sat outside and it was lovely and peaceful. The pizza garlic bread and brucetta for starters was yum! I could just go on.... recommend!

title: Stunning
comment: Stunning restaurant!!! I'm glad we choose La Dolce Vita restaurant. We went last night, the restaurant was packed, but service and food was just amazing. This was the first time but not the last.... See you soon!!!

title: Lunch
comment: What a find!!! There is real talent in the kitchen at La Dolce Vita. This was my first visit and I will be back as often as I can.

title: Excellent!
comment: Ate here with friends on a busy Saturday night. The service was superb and genuinely friendly. Very good wine list with quality wines of real value. The food was first class. Lots of choice and it was genuinely difficult to choose. Certainly the starter and main courses were excellent. My pasta with wild boar was superb and my friends were equally enthusiastic about their pizza and fish risotto respectively. Would love to go back and try more of the menu. Highly recommended.

title: Why did we wait so long?
comment: We went there for dinner yesterday - a first time experience for the 4 of us. It was one of those lazy Bank Holiday Monday last-minute decisions and the consensus was Italian. But where to go? Some clever person suggested the place on Waldegrave Rd that none of us could remember the name of but had a great reputation. A quick search on Trip Advisor followed by a call to the restaurant and we were on our way. The many glowing reviews seemed almost too good to be true so we kept our anticipation in check. First impressions were very encouraging - a warm welcome from the very helpful Luca who provided excellent service throughout. The food was excellent - quality ingredients freshly prepared - and there hardest part of the evening was deciding which dish to go for. Would I recommend La Dolce Vita? - absolutely. Believe the reviews - this place is a gem and we'll be back. Why did we wait so long before checking it out?

title: Unbelievable restaurant
comment: I came yesterday for the first time reading their great reviews and from today i will trust T.A. Where ever I go.. One of the best meal in our entire life. I had scallops to start and pork fillet tenderloin as a main, my husband had frittura mista and sea bream, both cook to perfection. We live in kingston and definitely we will visit again...

title: sunday lunch
comment: I cannot believe the quality of this restaurant, it really is superb. We just turned up at 3 pm on a Sunday and all 5 of us had a wonderful meal. We sat in the garden and 2 hours passed very quickly...just one criticism....only joking. It was perfect for a lovely summers day thanks to all the staff

title: Excellent in every aspect
comment: Booked a table recently and we were running ahead of schedule so we telephoned the restaurant to see if they could arrange a table earlier. The restaurant was very accommodating and managed to fit us in earlier. The level of service was fantastic and the staff were very efficient and friendly. The food itself was superb, the majority of our party opted for steaks and they were high quality cuts cooked to perfection. We opted for a variety of deserts on recommendations from the staff and again they were amazing. A great way to round off what had been a fantastic day for us. I would definitely look to return the next time I visit London. Thanks to all at Buenos Aires for a superb meal.

title: Good restaurant
comment: Excellent food Good Service Great Ambience oh and the review must be a 100 characters long so here’s more.

title: Giovanni is amazing
comment: Brilliant service, great attitude, even better food! Me and my girlfriend went here and giovanni was so happy to help us and the steak was perfect, i will highly recommend this steakhouse.

title: Great food excellent service
comment: I cannot recommend this restaurant enough we had great food and excellent service from Christina we will be back very soon

title: Amazing Food!
comment: The Steak here was to die for! A little more on the expensive side but definitely worth it! For that food and service you would definitely expect higher prices.

title: Great food, service and great proce
comment: Thank you for a lovely dinner. Enzo was a star and made us feel very welcome. The Sampler platter was perfect as sharer for two.

title: Beautiful Food!
comment: We visited this place for our wedding anniversary. The customer service was fabulous. Food was sensational - especially the steak! Extensive wines list to choose from. Atmosphere, inside and out, was great. Will definitely visit again if we are in the area

title: Great food for a reasonable prize
comment: Very good steak restaurant, delicious steaks and fries at a very reasonable prize. Really quick and friendly waiters. We loved it and will go there for sure the next time we are in London.

title: The food is amazing, the service is excellent. The price is very reasonable.
comment: The food is amazing, the service is excellent, the price is very reasonable. The kids menu is one of the best I have ever seen.

title: Fantastic
comment: Great service and super food. 9oz rib eye cooked exactly as ordered medium to well. Don’t normally have dessert but the Mango cheesecake was one of the best desserts I have ever tasted and I have travelled to many countries and visited many restaurants. You have to try it !

title: Great little place
comment: Fulll of atmosphere with great food and service. Not large but service with style. What's not to like?

title: Wonderful food and atmosphere
comment: Was on a business trip and picked the restaurant through Maps. The food was authentic and delicious. Service was great and staff was friendly and attentive. We were so happy we picked it for dinner!

title: Gorgeous food
comment: I never ever had a such a good food like in this place.. Guys if you still didn't try just go.. You want regret.

title: Deserves its top rating
comment: Excellent neighbourhood Italian. Chose this place based on the excellent Trip Advisor reviews and it lived up to its top rating. Attentive service. Excellent food. A must for lovers of Italian food.

title: Fantastic lunch and incredible service
comment: Went with a big group of 30 people to have lunch at this restaurant and I can easily say that it was such a smooth delicious experience. Food was so yummy, organization with the place was very straightfwd and easy, our host for the day Giovanni Cisiu was so welcoming and very accommodating to our needs and everything was very organized. Even when extra people than the 30 booked showed up, Giovanni was calm and dealt with the situation and accommodated us all. Highly recommended restaurant by all means.

title: The best service ever by Giovanni
comment: Giovanni is one of the best waiters I've met in my life. Today is my birthday and he made my day unforgettable. Giovanni will be my friend forever. I ate two great Argentine steaks, the absolute best steaks in the city. Thanks Giovanni you made my day unforgettable.

title: Wonderful service
comment: my experience today at buenos Aries was amazing. My girlfriend and I came to enjoy a nice dinner out in our local town and we were very happy with the service. Our Waiter Giovanni made sure we was well welcomed, kept conversation flowing and made sure we was in a perfect environment. The food was delicious and the atmosphere was calm and peaceful. Giovanni was a perfect waiter! Thank you so much for your service.

title: we all had an amazing experience:) we were a big group with multiple different orders and everyone was so nice 😍
comment: Giovanni Cisiu was super awesome, all the orders were on time, and we all had dinner together. He was very friendly and made us feel very welcomed .Thank you Giovanni:) Everything was more than perfect.Thank you for an awesome experience.

title: Great place - Food is brilliant, staff are genuine, fun and very good.
comment: I took 12 people here for an event and could have wanted a better experience. It was rugby related so everyone ordered their favourite steaks, and everyone was impressed with what they received. Add to that the staff were great and engaging and all in all I have to give this place a solid 10/10.

title: Delicious steaks
comment: We ate here on a Sunday evening before going to see Jimmy Carr at Richmond Theatre. Food was really good but the speed of delivery let it down a bit particularly as the booking makes a thing about you only being able to have the table for 1 1/2 hours. We shared some starters which came quite quickly but we had a very long wait for our mains. We all had steaks - 2 rib eye & 2 fillet - very tasty. The wine we had was lovely a Malbec called Tapiz. Will definitely be back.

title: Just lovely
comment: What a wonderful evening we had at La Dolce Vita; very warm and friendly hospitality and the food was absolutely delicious. The best pasta I’ve had outside of Italy, and the scallop starter was also superb. A fantastic and authentic restaurant and myself and my colleagues were looked after brilliantly (thank you for the complimentary port, what a nice touch!) I’d recommend without hesitation.

title: Supper Food and busy place
comment: Flew in to London to see son and other family. Son lives in Chiswick and recommended as been before. Food was fabulous and the place was buzzing. A couple of minor service issues which the manager was extremely apologetic about ( am sure it was because they were so busy) and gave those in our group that wanted a desert , on the house. If you want a super steak in a place that has a great feel and atmosphere,visit.

title: Best Italian Restaurant
comment: I always enjoy a meal here, whether for a family occasion or a meal with mates. Because it’s family run and not a corporate chain. And you can feel the difference. Bravo!

title: Lovely family meal
comment: Visited this restaurant due to the good reviews, it did not disappoint. Fantastic food coupled with fantastic service. Thank you Luca for the amazing service. Hopefully be back soon

title: Amazing italian
comment: Owner run very friendly great food!  Recommended by friends thought we would pop in and glad we did, will return

title: Superb
comment: Visited over the Easter weekend and it was very busy. However, as always the service was superb and the food was very tasty. Whenever I pop in I’m always made to feel so welcome as are all of their customers. Would highly recommend this gem of a restaurant in Teddington.

title: Fantastic restaurant
comment: We went to the steak house for my son's birthday. Great service-Very attentive staff. Especially Manager-greeted us by the front and very accommodating throughout the evening.  Excellent food! Steaks were amazing-cooked to perfection! Great atmosphere!  We had a great time. Will definitely come back!

title: Gorgeous food from a great neighbourhood trattoria
comment: The Fettuccine Porcini e Speck - absolutely lovely! A busy, convivial local trattoria, with great staff. It's quite difficult to get a reservation here at busy times....guess that speaks volumes.

title: Fantastic Evening!
comment: We went to Buenos Aires to celebrate a birthday, and our waitress Giada was lovely and ensured that we had a fantastic time! The food was amazing and the service complemented it perfectly. We will definitely be returning to Buenos Aires soon.

title: Giovanni Wonderful Service
comment: I have visited the place with my better half yesterday, and will surely come back! The atmosphere was amazing, warm lights, nice design and flawless service. Giovanni was exactly what you would expect from a good waiter, smiling, helpful and knowledgeable. His spiral cut rib eye steak was a great suggestion, delicious!  All of the above is important but the steak quality is the main reason you should give it a try!

title: Great steak great service
comment: Food are excellent, we come here 2 times here in 5 days Staff are super nice and helpful especially Giovanni.

title: Never fails to impress!
comment: Had my second meal tonight at this cosy steakhouse in Chiswick. Suffice to say the food was of great standards and what adds to the experience is the amazingly warm and friendly staff (served by radwane tonight)... highly recommended!

title: Wonderful meal
comment: Had a wonderful meal here with my parents. On entering we were asked if we were celebrating a special occasion and I told them that it was my parents 50th anniversary soon and they were on an anniversary trip to London. We were greeted at the table with free bubbly for them. Our steaks were cooked perfectly and the service by Giovanni and team was superb. A very enjoyable evening. Thank you.

title: Happy mother's Day!!
comment: Lovely meal with my daughter and son on mother's day, great food and fabulous service as usual, thanks Maurizio

title: Meal after rugby
comment: Had a very nice meal with my wife. Very friendly and attentive staff. Family owned and run with good atmosphere, the food was excellent.we will return.

title: Good food. Friendly, welcoming.
comment: I've just had another lovely lunch at la Dolce and thought I'd share. I'm splitting my time between Rome and London at the moment and I enjoyed my carbonara much more than one served served to me two weeks ago at a Roman restaurant who are famous for their's. I guess the food is tweaked a bit for UK tastes which in practice means that it isn't eye wateringly salty. Mussels and clams with spaghetti and an 'off menu' spaghetti agli-olio were just as good in recently. Friendly service and a decent espresso complete the picture. Recommend.

title: Real Italian - Almost as Good as Mom’s
comment: Being away from home I was really craving an arrabiata sauce like my mom makes. They didn’t have it on the menu but I thought I’d ask which sauce was comparable. My waiter instead just had them make their own arrabiata recipe.  It was FANTASTIC. Really, I cannot explain just how lovely this meal was.  I will be forever grateful for this experience. You will not regret a visit to La Dolce Vita.

title: The best dish I've had
comment: We went last night after seeing the rating on tripadvisor. We hadn't heard of the restaurant but this is definitely the best kept secret in teddington. The wild boar parpadelle was incredible. The prawn starter nice. The service was excellent. Will definitely be a place to return to.......

title: Bella Vita
comment: Very happy that we found and tried this small beautiful Italian place! Nice warm restaurant with excellent staff and wonderful food! Simple as that! The pizza garlic bread was freshly made you could feel it right away. The special dish of the day pasta e ravioli was full of flavors. Our pastas for main were excellent and the grilled vegetables as a side dish properly made. We will visit again for sure! P.S. Try the tiramisu!

title: A wonderful birthday dinner
comment: We just had a great dinner at the restaurant. My family booked a table there in order to celebrate my birthday. We ordered starters, main courses and dessert. I picked the scallops as starter, jumbo king prawn and cheese cake. All food we ordered were very tasty, especially the seafood. They were perfectly cooked, juicy and very fresh. We had a very happy meal there. Must go again!

title: Enzo was fab!
comment: Enzo, what a guy! Great waiter and with perfect recommendations. Had a platter of steaks and we’re all exquisite Definitely recommend

title: Incredible service!
comment: A cozy place with very good food, and the service was excellent! We came in without booking and immediately got a table when the place was almost full, the staff was very attentive and kind always, absolutely great :) I would definitely come back!

title: Casual Tuesday night dinner
comment: Love this restaurant! Been here a few times now and the food has been exceptional every time. The pastas especially are on pointe. Tried both the seafood spaghetti and the strips of filet beef spaghetti. My partner had a calzone tonight and it was huge!! So juicy with lots of filling. Quick attentive service and the complimentary bread and olives are a lovely addition. We are so lucky to live so close!

title: Birthday treat for my MIL
comment: What a wonderful experience. Firstly the welcome and service was great, was made to feel very welcome and was seated straight away. Unfortunately the other members of my table were 15 minutes late but I was never made to feel this was a problem. I was brought bread, butter and olives within the first 5 minutes and while I waited I ordered some drinks for the table. The waiter recommended a beautiful red wine as I wanted a smooth and medium red and it definitely hit the spot, it was very easy to drink and my mother in law and I drank the whole bottle with ease!  When the other guests had arrived we weren't rushed to place our order and this was a nice touch, it was very relaxed and we were able to have a little catch up before placing our order. We chose starters and mains and even asked to make a couple of substitutions which were happily met with a smile.  The food was well presented, great quality, and tasted like authentic Italian cuisine. The portions were a decent size too. My MIL's lamb was cooked to perfection as was my husband's salmon and we were all very happy with our choices. There was a little mix up with our orders but the staff were very apologetic and later gave us free ice cream and discount which was a lovely gesture. By the time dessert came around I opted to stay clear as I was bursting by this point but my husband and MIL chose gelato ice creams and sorbet which they both loved. I tried some of the pistachio gelato and it was delicious with nice chunks of pistachio nuts mixed through... yum.  As it was my MIL's birthday the restaurant brought the ice cream out with a candle and the whole restaurant sang happy birthday which was lovely. The restaurant is small but cosy with a nice community feel.  The only thing I would suggest to the restaurant is to make sure the jugs of water placed on the table are fresh and placed once everyone is seated and to make sure the jugs are shiny and clean as hard water can often leave a limescale look on the glass when not dried properly and unfortunately this was the case with our jug.  This however would not prevent me from revisiting and I would definitely recommend La Dolce Vita for anyone wanting authentic Italian cuisine and service with a smile.

title: Bravissimi!
comment: Best Italian restaurant that I've been outside Italy!!! Amazing food, environment and really kind waitress. Totally recommend!

title: Absolutely delicious, authentic italian food with outstanding service!
comment: We were in the Teddington area and fancied Italian food in particular, and having seen the reviews on here, decided on La Dolce Vita.  Luca, the restaurant manager, greeted us as soon as we arrived, showed us to our table and provided olives and fresh bread & butter. He was very friendly and welcoming throughout, made us laugh and was very attentive to any and all dining needs. The food was delicious, all fresh, and full of flavour, with generous portion sizes. I highly recommend the scallops to start, and the tiramisu dessert is to die for... 100% must try this restaurant if you love authentic Italian food and a nice atmosphere, absolutely nothing to fault about this place... We can't thank Luca enough for a fantastic evening, we will be back again soon!  (Daniel & Danielle)

title: Late Lunch for Three
comment: I and two friends relied on the reviews for this restaurant to visit for a latish lunch last week. We were happily relieved to be able to join with others in praise of LDV. Welcomed by Maritsio ( I have O Level latin but no Italian- I hope he forgives as easily as responds to his new customers). We did not have time to explore the menu in depth . We agreed to share a double sea food starter and went for pizza. The delicious, lightly battered squid prawns and whitebait was hot on the plate but disappeared quickly. Complementary olives had come with drinks ( of necessity I had to ask for alcohol free beer - I wish I could remember the name of the "bavarian" brew- I will have to call ). As new customers , the size of our pizzas was almost daunting. The thin crust was crispy . Topped out with excellence. I could not quite finish but my friends left with a box, readily provided with advice that some oven time would re-crisp. No room for dessert. If i lived local I'd go again. My friends may well.

title: Excellent Italian dining experience courtesy of Maurizio and his team.
comment: Visited on a freezing cold night, to be given a warm welcome from Maurizio and advice on the menu and choice of wine. Opened with a healthy starter of aubergine and tomato rolled together in a light sauce then on to pasta with wild boar ragu, a dish that had been recommended by a friend. Accompanied by a delicious Montepulciano red wine, this really was an excellent dinner, generously sized helpings and great value for money. I have no hesitation in recommending this fine restaurant to all Tripadvisor readers.

title: Average is what it was
comment: My husband and I visited here as we are fairly new to the area and as this is number 1 on TA we felt it was time to try it. I’m afraid I was a little disappointed. The food on the whole was OK nothing more. I had the scallops to start and the OH had the mussels. The scallops were cooked perfectly and tasty but my husbands mussels were definitely over cooked. I don’t think any of them came out of the shell whole they were very stringy and small. I had the fish stew which was lacking in depth of flavour and of course I too had the same problem with the mussels. The prawns were cooked perfectly the squid was a bit chewy and the stew was only lukewarm. The serving plates were cold which didn’t help. My husband did enjoy the flavour of his tagliatelle vongole which he said had just the right amount of chilli kick. So overall it was only average in our opinion.

title: Amazing!
comment: We went there for our mum's birthday and it was amazing. Great service, fantastic hospitality and wonderful food. Will definitely be going back soon!

title: V friendly
comment: Nice selection of food on the menu,a nice family feel to the restaurant with very friendly hosts. It's nicely located near the Oracle as well

title: Great Value for Chiswick
comment: I have been there twice now and although don't usually leave reviews, in this case i had to. Food in most restaurants over last couple of years has deteriorated and in many cases its pot luck. The steak, service, ambience were both really great as well as the Malbec. Looking forward to going again soon. Not many places you can get a tasty, tender steak for £15.00 these days.

title: Amazing Food
comment: Such a brilliant restaurant with a great environment. Amazing range of steaks as well as other food such as burgers and fish all amazing quality. Lovely staff and a great atmosphere.

title: Buon Appetito Birthday Bash
comment: Due to the success of my birthday meal at Dolce Vita last year, it was a given to go there once again. And as in 2017, no one left disappointed. Unfortunately, Maurizio was not there, but his trusty Lieutenant, Luca, did an absolutely sterling job. We all had a variety of starters, mains and desserts and once again the food was on point, with virtually every plate being licked clean. Standards are always high when we visit and I could not find fault with the service or food and we will no doubt be there for the ‘threepeat’. Indeed, my wife is now looking to celebrate her birthday there after such a great evening. Family friendly, great food and great service, what more could you ask for?

title: Excellent welcome and meal
comment: Visited here with friends, while in staying in Richmond, to watch the big rugby game between England and Wales. We always dine in an Italian on the Friday night, and have visited many Italian restaurants across London over the years. The welcome by Maurizio and the rest of the staff was warm and friendly, and they attended to our every need all evening. I love my fish dishes, and the mixed seafood starter set up the rest of the evening. I followed it up with the fish Stew, which is as tasty a dish as you'll eat anywhere. The restaurant is cosy and authentic, and it was like visiting Italy. By 8pm, it was full, and they were having to turn away very disappointed customers, such is its popularity. I'm glad we booked well in advance! Altogether a wonderful evening, and look forward to returning in 2 years time. Perhaps I should book now, to ensure I get a table.!! Thank you Maurizio. We'll definitely see you again.

title: AMAZING RESTAURANT & STAFF
comment: Highly recommend this restaurant.....If your looking for a traditional Italian restaurant with delicious food and excellent service this is the place to visit. I booked La Dolce Vita to celebrate my wife’s birthday while visiting the area with friends. The food was excellent and the wine was very reasonably priced. From the moment we arrived the waiters made us feel so welcome (unfortunately I cannot remember all their names) and they made sure it was a special night. As I have a gluten intolerance I’m usually limited to what I can select from a menu...but not at the Dolce Vita....although not advertised they will adapt most dishes to your dietary requirements. We ordered the beef carpaccio salad and scallops starters which were both delicious...probably the best scallops I’ve ever tasted..... and for main course I can highly recommend the beef ragu pasta or the calf’s liver. I don’t often write reviews but this restaurant definitely deserved one. We will definitely be visiting La Dolce Vita next time we are in the area.

title: What a gem!
comment: My husband took me to La Dolce Vita for dinner on my birthday and how we - after nearly two years in Teddington - have missed this little treasure of a restaurant is a crime! Absolutely beautiful food, wonderful staff and my birthday dinner couldn't have been more special. Utterly charming and we look forward to visiting again many times in the future. Truly wonderful!

title: First rate dining experience
comment: From the friendly welcome, to prompt and efficient service, to a varied selection of beautifully presented Italian dishes, La Dolce Vita excels in all respects. We have been frequenting this restaurant for some years now and it has gone from strength to strength. For intimate dining, or group bookings, this local restaurant is ideal. There are so many favourite dishes it is difficult to select a recommendation, but all the seafood dishes are first rate. If you haven't tried La Dolce Vita yet, then do - you won't be disappointed.

title: Perfect pizza as always!
comment: "So good that I couldn't stop eating. Please can I have the recipe?! (Luca age 10)". We have been coming here for 7 or 8 years and it just gets better and better..Thank you Maurizio x

title: Excellent
comment: Excellent, homely restaurant. Great menu. Awesome food and fabulous service. Will be visiting again.

title: Fast and pleasant service
comment: Food is absolutely delicious. Came in 8 minutes before closing and Was served promptly. Staff is really friendly and accommodating to dietary needs

title: Splendid, As Always
comment: Went with a group of 8 of us and everything was perfect. Service with a smile and tolerated our slightly raucous nature, but everyone was joining in.  Food was up to the usual high standard and most of us had the Parpadelle with Wild Boar Ragu, which is now famous amongst all our friends.  Excellent home made cheesecake and Irish coffees to finish, all for a reasonable £55 each (we drank heaps of good red wine!). Can't wait to go back.

title: Birthday celebration
comment: Chiswick accommodated our party of nine, at short notice, when the Richmond branch couldn't honour our reservation as their re-decoration work overran. The manager and staff were very helpful when we booked and looked after us brilliantly on the evening. The food and service were excellent and it really made my daughter's 18th birthday a very special occasion.

title: Perfect
comment: Nice food. Friendly staff. Lovely deserts. Wonderful place to eat and enjoy Italian food. Will visit again.

title: A great steak house!
comment: What a treat, tender fillet steak from Argentina and a warm welcome and staff looking to delight he customer. Would go back any time! Giovanni and Giuli are great

title: Best pasta I ate this year
comment: Propper Italian food with amazing taste! Staff really friendly and the house wine is a verry good choice!

title: Delicious dinner and wonderful waitress called Christina
comment: I have been meaning to write a review for this restaurant for some time now as we live locally and regularly have dinner there. Every time we arrive the wonderful wonderful waitress called Christina remembers us and is chatty, welcoming, always smiling. The food is consistently very very very good my partner has steak and I have the lamb chops, which are cooked to absolute perfection. The empanadas are delicious as well as other starters. Overall I cannot recommend this restaurant enough and if you visit ask for Christina to look after you!!!

title: Top of the class
comment: Great range of steaks, cooked to perfection & friendly staff.  One of the best places in Chiswick, especially if you are like or know steak

title: Very good Steak
comment: Good food and reasonably priced for the area. Was very busy but the service was still good. Not quite as good an atmosphere upstairs but would strongly recommend.

title: Says what t does on the tin
comment: If you like steak and red wine this is a good place to visit. Excellent meat. Good service. Great location. If I could change one thing is that the reservation should be longer than 90 minutes - if I am going out for a relatively expensive meal I expect to be able to relax and enjoy the event. They actually never chase me out but I would be happier if we could know we had longer

title: Positive on the hole
comment: Overall a positive experience, the food was good at a fair price. Nice atmosphere, most the staff friendly. The waiter that served us seemed to want to rush us at every opportunity. Not much time to order with only 3 menus for 8 people. They did however make it mostly pleasurable for my wife who’s birthday it was. One steak was very fatty, they did eventually remove it from the bill. The restaurant is ok and I would probably return, some of the staff do need customer facing training.

title: The best steak house Chiswick
comment: I have been here before and the experience from last time was the only reason why I went there again with my friends!! Service was really good Giovanni is an amazing person he suggested us what to order and the food was really good too!! I would highly recommend going there..if you are looking for some really good steak!! Really a nice place!!

title: Delicious food, good service
comment: Was really surprised at how nice each course was! Thoroughly recommend the gambas to start and the rosemary grilled potatoes as a side! Our waiter was lovely too

title: A solid choice.
comment: My sister and I were craving steak and as it was Tuesday we decided on here as they do 241 on mains when you order a starter. I had the empandas for starters which were yummy and my sister had the calamari. For mains we both had the steaks. These were perfectly cooked and good quality. I do love this place it's local, good service and good food.

title: Dinner at Buenos Aires
comment: We loved the food at Buenos Aires. My husband said his steak was great. I had the Stone Bass with chimichurri sauce, very tasty. The best seal of approval was from our 6 year old who said the burger was the best he’d ever had! Giovanni offered great service and was so polite and friendly. Everyone was very nice and helpful. Plus the prices were very reasonable for a steakhouse in London. This is definitely one of our new favorites.

title: A perfect family meal
comment: We have visited the restaurant today and we have had a nice relaxing family meal . Our starters were full of flavours as we went for a selection of them to share . We really enjoyed the empanadas , chorizo al Malbec and provoleta . Our mains ....The steaks were absolutely delicious , tender and tasty , congratulation to the chef for a perfect delicious food . And of course I have to mention Giovanni a really nice guy who looked after us being sure we enjoy our meal there . Service to perfection .

title: Absolutely amazing!
comment: I love this restaurant! I found it by chance through a google search and now come every time I’m in the area. The food is incredible, the service is perfect- all of the staff are very friendly and helpful. I’ve loved every dish I’ve tried and they are very authentic. Highly recommend!

title: First Time Visit
comment: First time visit to this restaurant and really impressed. Only slight problem was a very bright light over some pictures shining directly in my eyes, but without us even having to say anything, a waiter immediately showed us to a different table with no fuss whatsoever. Food was excellent and the staff were just lovely. Will definitely be making a return trip - this is one of our regular venues from now on!

title: birthday luch
comment: went for my birthday food was great, kids menu was great too, coffee was cold, otherwise we had a great time.

title: Great steaks in West London
comment: Reasonably priced, great tasting Argentinian steaks. The menu offers more than just steak and is complemented by a range of good wines. The staff are very friendly and attentive.

title: Fantastic authentic steak experience!
comment: Had really great steak; have been to Argentina and the steak is almost as good, which means that it’s one of the best in London! Also very good wines, and the blue cheese salad is delicious! Had great service by Giovani who recognised that we were in a hurry and got our steaks done quickly, and gave great wine recommendations!

title: Best choice
comment: Great food, wine and friendly staff specially Giovanni!! Good option in Chiswick for a great dinner!!

title: Amazing food and service!
comment: Booked a surprise meal for my partner’s birthday and was amazed by the food and service that we received. From the beginning to end, we were looked after by Giovanni - very friendly, helpful and made our night extra special. The steak was beautiful cooked and delicious. I strongly recommend and will definitely be back again!

title: Grazie Mille Giovanni
comment: This restaurant has the best ancho I have, best stake ever. And Giovanni, the manager assistant is on the spotlight, he will makes the experience amazing!

title: The best steak ever!
comment: Want to eat the best steak in Chiswick?! Buenos Aires restaurant! The food is always great, and the steak never disappoints. The service of the staff is very good and a highlight to Giovanni, who is very kind and nice with the customers!

title: Best steak in the city
comment: The anchor steak was so soft that no knife was needed. The wine was amazing. Giovanni's service helped the night to be perfect

title: Thank you Luca
comment: We went to eat out for our 10 year Anniversary and am so happy we ate here..Every thing from the welcome.food, atmosphere and kindness of Luca was perfect..We felt at home straight away and will have no hesitation going back again and again..If you like great food in a lovely relaxed place then go to La Dolce Vita as you will not regret it..Thank you Luca for making us feel at home..Sarah and Danny :)

title: Nice lunch
comment: Maurizio and staff are very friendly and helpful had fantastic lunch with delicious food and wine see you soon Thanks

title: Friendly restaurant, welcoming and good food.
comment: Good authentic Italian food, very friendly staff, good welcome. Should have been more people there for Sunday lunch.

title: Birthday evening
comment: Wonderful food, best authentic Italian we have had in a long time. Excellent hospitality from Luca. Will definitely come back

title: Great food and Service
comment: Visited for the first time on Saturday night - our waiter Giovanni was lovely! He gave us recommendations and was very attentive.  Would highly recommend.  thank you!

title: Relaxed
comment: Just moved to Teddington area and my first diner out was to this beautiful little gem.  Maurizio is a wonderful host, food was good, atmosphere relaxed ..  what else can you ask for !

title: First time visit, but not the last
comment: I normally visit places in the high street so this was my first visit here. Nice and cosy and not too large. Service was good. A nice menu and the portions were large. Olives and bread were complimentary. We had a nice bottle of Red with the meal which was all very reasonable.

title: Good Value
comment: We had a dinner for two. Table I reserved was confirmed by email but not reserved in the system. We finally got a table. Food, drinks and waiters were excellent as always. This location is very noisy, therefore a rating 4.

title: Giovanni
comment: Web spend a really nice night, Giovanni was so kind in Everything, nice guy. The meet wasn't too good but it's okey. We're argentinian so of Course it's not going to be the same.

title: Superb as always
comment: Have been again for my son`s birthday dinner and we enjoyed the food, the staff and wine. It was great as always and my son was pleased.

title: Friendly, great atmosphere, lovely food
comment: Chiswick is a trendy London suburb and Buenos Aires Argentine Steakhouse perfectly suits that trendy, chic vibe.  We were welcomed warmly and escorted to a cosy “booth style” table.  Our waiter, Enzo, was very cheerful and helpful, guiding us towards the house recommendations but also making us aware of potential cost saving tactics (two for one starters and main courses)  The food was well presented and very tasty. My steak was particularly good, cooked exactly to my specification and “fall off the knife” tender...well worth the nearly £25 price tag.  All in all, a very pleasant evening.  We would recommend.

title: Always amazing
comment: Great steaks, Malbec and atmosphere- what not to like! Even though we live in the USA now we still visit this great steakhouse when in London! Thanks for a super evening!

title: Lovely evening
comment: The service was absolutely brilliant, including Juan the manager who was excelent, we accidenty booked a table for 2 even though there was 5 of us and he made us very welcome and sorted us a table within a matter of minutes. 2nd to that he brought the birthday girl a glass of prossecco on arrival.... only downside, the starters were a little on the small side for the price and we made a complaint about the sirloin steak about it being quite fatty, however, soon later Juan sorted us out with another 250g of sirloin on the house. Amazing! On top of that, one of us spilt a whole glass of Malbec, then the waiter brought over another glass, again on the house - even though that was a mistake on our behalf. After the meal, a waiter came over with a cake and a candle singing happy birthday which was a lovely touch. To finish, Juan brought us over some lovely port on the house. Absolutely brilliant service, lovely, friendly staff. And an overall, enjoyable evening.

title: One of my favourites in Chiswick
comment: Excellent Argentine food. The sausage starter , a steak or the steak salad are my favourites. A Saturday lunch time favourite. We always receive excellent service very friendly.

title: A Genuine Find
comment: Been looking to go to an Argentinean steak house for sometime now, and we couldn't get into Gouchos, so this was a nice find. The service was excellent, friendly and knowledgeable which was a pleasant surprised.  Overall the food was excellent, i can recommend the black pudding starter its certainly not like our black pudding, so definitely worth a try. The steak was excellent and I supposed as I should have expected. My wife had the burger which she thoroughly enjoyed, it was beautifully cooked with flavour and not dry as is the case with many burgers. The deserts where very good and different, again would recommend the Argentinean cheesecake, its different but very good.  So overall a really nice restaurant well worth a visit and I will certainly be returning.

title: Great restaurant
comment: Ended up here by luck, by doing a TripAdvisor roulette. Great atmosphere in the restaurant, nice and professional staff and great food. Excellent.

title: Have been before, will go again.
comment: Great food, great wine knowledge (I know less than nothing!) and great service.  We went for my birthday. There were 9 of us and we were well catered for and looked after.

title: Slow cooked
comment: A very disappointing evening with friends and kids. The main issue really was how long the food took to come. It was pretty much 1 hour after we'd ordered. Tables around us, who had arrived after we'd ordered were getting served, and until we chased (twice) we were pretty much forgotten about. When it did arrive my steak was rare, not medium rare as requested. It tasted fine and i couldn't face sending it back given the time it took to come.  Lamb chops were nice apparently.  Won't rush back.

title: No words to describe but excellent
comment: Happy with my spiral rib eye they cooked it best! I had chrispy chips they're nice cant get enough..

title: Great food
comment: Good food and great service would highly recommend.steaks are fantastic...and you get good wine too.enjoyed had great time

title: Fantastic steakhouse highly Recomended.
comment: Having a busy day of work and it being Friday me and my colleague decided to check out the Buenos Aires Argentine steakhouse. We where very happy with the service exceptionally polite very helpful ! The food was fantastic best steak Iv had for a long time. Good size and the order was extremely quick. Coffee is also great I highly recommend an espresso here. Will be returning.

title: Best restaurant in Chiswick
comment: We always love to come to this restaurant. Amazing food, great ambiance and the staff is always really friendly. Our kids also love to come here, for the food and the staff. Everytime all the staf is super friendly to our kids. Thank you buenos aires Chiswick

title: Wonderful food and service
comment: The food was amazing. Service (by Enzo) absolutely first-rate. We came on a Tuesday, not realising there was a deal that night, and Enzo helped us get the best value. So attentive, prompt. And the steak in this place is better than anywhere in London. A great birthday outing for my wife and our kids. Really friendly, wonderful place.

title: Extremely friendly and good place to eat
comment: We have enjoyed eating here over the years and have always had a good meal. The staff are extremely welcoming and it is a good place to eat in Chiswick

title: Brilliant
comment: Just brilliant. They called in advance to confirm booking, earlier in the day. They were understanding and accommodating about time. It was my partners birthday - we were greeted with smiles and processo. Giovanni was lovelyyyyy - he recommended both for my partner and I steak and a cocktail and it was superb. Steak was cooked wonderfully. Finally we had a little birthday treat which was also lovely. Thanks! Will definitely come again!

title: Lovely Valentine's Dinner
comment: My boyfriend booked this restaurant for Valentine's day as we both love steak and it had good reviews. We weren't disappointed, the setting was lovely, the restaurant had clearly gone out of their way to make sure guests weren't crammed in like sardines, a nice rarity given the date. The food was delicious, our waiter Giovanni was so accommodating and friendly and it was (in our view) really good value for the quality and amount of food and drink we got.

title: DELICIOUS!!!!!
comment: Went there with my bf for valentines date and it was just what we wanted! Food was fingerlicious good! Steak is something else and the wine selection was off the charts! Great atmosphere and super nice staff! Juan (manager) was an amazing host and totally made our night! Will definitely return! Absolutely LOVED IT!

title: Very glad we moved here!!!
comment: We were in Chiswick for business and a local recommended that we visit the Argentine steakhouse for a late lunch. Great spot, good wine, delicious bread and chorizo sausages recommended by Giovanni, steaks grilled to perfection for all. Highly recommended and thanks Giovanni, we are moving in and will be back!!!

title: Best service ever!
comment: Born and raised in Argentina. Moved to Italy 15 years ago and living in London since 2014. This is the first time in years that I have a proper Argentinian meal. The food was delicious and the service excellent! Giovanni got us a lovely corner tablet and he took care of us during our dinner. He recommended most of the dishes as I was so excited and couldn't choose one! Brilliant team and beautiful, cosy restaurant. Highly recommended!:)
Amazing food. Giovanni helped us choose the perfect steak and was a perfect host. The 12ounch fillet was probably the best I have ever had.A must visit.

title: Love this restaurant
comment: Food is always fantastic with a great atmosphere in the restaurant with friendly and helpful staff.Love it

title: Brilliant every time!
comment: Brilliant with friends, family and as a couple! Lovely food and wine every time! Great staff lovely restaurant!

title: Beautiful meal
comment: We booked this for my partners birthday. The food was beautiful a very relaxed atmosphere. Was all together a lovely place

title: Great Night
comment: Great service and a lovely restaurant. The restaurant decor was set up immaculately and the fillet steak that Giovanni upsold us was a great suggestion. One of the best ive had. He was attentetive and made sure we enjoyed it enough to return regularly.

title: Perfect night at La Dolce Vita
comment: Food and service absolutely excellent. Fish and meat dishes were outstanding. Great atmosphere, friendly staff - all 6 of us enjoyed every aspect of this gem of a restaurant. Will definitely be returning soon.

title: Delicious food!
comment: Everything here is amazing. Food....service.....atmosphere....all fabulous. My only comment would be that when you sit upstairs it can get really noisy which can be difficult.

title: Brilliant Cow and staf
comment: The 400gr taster was pefectly cooked, a medium rare was medium rare.. staff gave good starter and wine tips with good humor and a smile.

title: It’s ok!
comment: Visited this restaurant on someone’s recommendation, I spend a lot of time in Italy and in Italian restaurants so for me, food-wise this wasn’t what I’m used to but can appreciate this is a nice local restaurant with a good atmosphere. I think the customer service here is great, the guys that run this place were amazing - all very friendly and helped make the evening memorable.

title: Amazing service
comment: Amazing food and service at the Chiswick branch. High quality steaks and attentive service. Our waiter Giovanni was very helpful and friendly. He made our night!

title: Fantastic!
comment: It was our first time and we were not sure what to expect, we just googled "Best Argentinian restaurants in London" and without a doubt we picked a great place to go celebrate my very fussy Argentinian husband's birthday.  The food was simply great, steak cooked to perfection, they have a very vast wine selection, empanadas are fabulous and dulce de leche desserts will blow your mind! Service was fantastic, well timed, extremely friendly and attentive. Giovanni and his staff were simply amazing. Highly recommended. I'm afraid we will become regular customers here!!

title: Brilliant food and service
comment: The food was absolutely amazing, followed by a great service from our waitress Giovanni, he was very helpful and kind. Highly recommended!!!

title: Incredible food and service
comment: I couldn't recommend this restaurant more! Our evening was made by our wonderful server Giovanni who looked after us so well and the food was just as brilliant. Definitely worth a visit!

title: Jay's birthday
comment: We've been here a few times now the atmosphere is always fantastic and great service too! Food is great and we are always looked after by the staff. Thank you and see you soon

title: Good food and nice people
comment: Very welcoming staff, we go regularly and the food is good and price is about right. You can be a quick in and out if you let the staff know, or enjoy a longer dinner.

title: Absolutely Amazing!
comment: I can not complement this Resturant enjoy, the food, atmosphere, service and attention to detail was 100%. Thank you all for making our Saturday lunch an excellent and memorable experience.

title: Best Argentine in town!
comment: The quality of the food is great, you obviously go there for the steak and it doesn’t let you down!The atmosphere is suitable for both family and friends gathering (I’d even suggest you could have a small meeting in this place)Isn’t pretentious as its competitors and its friendly staff sets them apart.Deals/offers are a great option if you go there during the week.I re-visited this restaurant taking friends and guests.I highly recommend BA!

title: BEST IN EVERY WAY
comment: Lovely staff, great atmosphere.The food is excellent. Try the lamb chops. Wine is delicious. 8 can’t fault it.I’m going back on Friday........... yippeeeeee x

title: Lovely meal
comment: My husband and I had a great meal in Buenos Aires last week. Our steaks were cooked to perfection. My husband had his medium rare and mine was medium well - so both ends of the steak spectrum lol. It was my husband’s birthday so he was treated to a surprise birthday desert which was a lovely thought. All the staff were very friendly and helpful but Jio was particularly attentive. We live fairly locally so will be returning, but it’s worth a visit if you live further away. It’s about 1 minute from Turnham Green tube.

title: A great steakhouse
comment: Great lighting and atmosphere. The sharer options are great value for money. Staff are great and the cocktails are definitely worth a try

title: Great Meat Restaurant
comment: Fantastic food, wine and sevice, what more could you as for from a Steakhouse. Great for all occasions.

title: Love it
comment: We can’t have enough of this great restaurant, the food and hospitality are amazing.We are big fans and we go at least once a week to enjoy the delicious empanadas:)

title: Fantastic food and service
comment: Having stumbled across the Richmond branch we thought we try the Chiswick one. Went twice in November and was thoroughly pleased both times. The midweek offers are great. They help make it more appealing mid week but also still great value when full priced. As good as other supposedly great steak houses if not better and also cheaper. This has now become a regular for us and friends as well!

title: Brilliant food and great service
comment: We have eaten at the Wimbledon and Richmond restaurants and this one was our favourite. We are huge fans of the food. This restaurant was very romantic and we had great service, thank you Giovanni your recommendations were amazing.

title: Poor service detracted from tasty food
comment: We visited at 1.30 on Mother’s Day for a family lunch. We ordered starters and mains and for the first course shared olives, chorizo with Malbec, shrimp, fried squid and my vegetarian partner had an aubergine escalope. The food was nice, with the chorizo in Malbec my particular favourite. Plates were cleared away and we sat back to wait for our mains. And waited, and waited. Our waitress never looked in our direction to explain the delay, but soon we were being reassured by someone I assume was the manager that our food “wouldn’t be long,” then that it would be “5 minutes,” then that there was a “slight problem in the kitchen” then that he would sort us something out, ”don’t worry”. Best guess, they had forgotten to put the order in and/or to start cooking it.  So, we sat down soon after 1.30 pm and our mains arrived at 3.00pm.  I had the 8oz fillet, two of us had 9oz sirloin steaks and one of us had the stone bass. We also had a variety of sauces and sides. My fillet was lovely, almost worth the uncomfortably long wait. I also tasted the stone bass which I would have been happy to have ordered.  The manager offered our desserts free to compensate for the long delay but even then my sister ordered a chocolate tart and a large piece of chocolate cake appeared. When queried, we were told they had run out of the tart. So, service wise,they couldn’t even be bothered to let us know they had run out of what had been ordered and offer us a chance to choose differently. I had chocolate filled churros which I found disappointing. Crispy outside as you would expect, the inside felt undercooked even allowing for the chocolate it contained.

title: "Best Argentinian restaurants in London"
comment: "Best Argentinian restaurants in London" is an understatement, his is one of THE BEST RESTAURANTS in London, full stop! Between the 4 of us, we had Fillet Steak (cooked to absolute perfection) with a very peppery peppercorn sauce, Pork Belly, Sirloin and a packed Mozzarella Burger. The wine selection, coupled with the expert advice from our server Giovani, meant that we enjoyed cocktails and a Pinot Noir with our meal, which set the whole evening off nicely. The service was second to none, and all of the staff were extremely friendly, from the moment we walked in right until we left. Would recommend and definitely come again soon.

title: Would recommend
comment: Packed on a Monday night! Great atmosphere, delicious food. You enter the restaurant via a narrow entrance to a cavernous restaurant full of life and bustling tables. Will definitely go back.

title: Delightful steak dinner
comment: My MR fillet was slightly underdone, but overall, we had a superb experience. It was my companion's birthday, and I had mentioned it on the booking and we were greeted with a glass of Prosecco and finished with a complementary piece of lemon meringue pie with a candle. The atmosphere was perfect - relaxed but still felt special. The restaurant itself isn't that large, so while it felt buzzy it still felt intimate. Service was fabulous. Overall, a lovely steak dinner and would definitely visit again.

title: Fabulous steak house
comment: We had a lovely meal this evening, all the three of us had the rib eye and Giovanni recommended the spiral cut for me which was truly delicious.  The steaks were perfectly cooked to our liking and the food and service was first class. A special mention to Giovanni who made us all feel very welcome and his recommendation of the cheesecake was a great hit with my daughter.  Will certainly be back and would highly recommend this restaurant if you are looking for somewhere to eat near Turnham Green.  Thanks

title: Good food and great staff
comment: My partner and I visited in order to celebrate one of our anniversaries. Most people only have one anniversary but we celebrate when we first met, our getting back together and moving in together as a couple to name but 3 that we celebrate. This visit was celebrating 2 years living together. We have eaten here before but tonight was our first evening visit and it was great to see a busy room even though it was a very cold night only a couple of weeks after Christmas.  Because we eat out frequently we were both taken aback by the upfront attitude of our server, Giovanni, who strongly advised us on menu choices. It is not our way to take that advice but, surprisingly, we did or at least partially.  OK, let's go to the food. My starter of Chorizo al Malbec was excellent. The spiral-cut rib-eye, recommended by our waiter was good and vindicated his choice. My partner had the fillet which was cooked as she asked and we decided later it would have benefited from a sauce, as those of you who know your meat realise that it is a nice cut that is invariably soft and tender but you do need to put the flavour I to that cut for best effect. All in all a very good meal as the Malbec we drank set off the meat very well.Finally, a special thank you to Giovanni for attentive service, good knowledge and his recommendations.

title: Great steak
comment: We came in last night for dinner - loved the warm fires on entering but definitely wouldn’t have sat outside! We were shown to our table and our waiter came over quickly. We ordered two Caipirinhas (which were delicious), a bottle of Malbec, two rib eye steaks and spinach. The food was amazing - the quality of the meat was spot on and although my steak veered on the rare-blue than medium rare I didn’t bother to challenge my food as it really was great steak. The service was good, I still feel that there should be way more chat and up-selling of the meat - this is a fantastic steak house - be proud of what you are selling us and talk it up!

title: Special diner
comment: We were welcomed by Giovanni, a very pleasant guy who is always trying to make you feel special. We all enjoyed our Argentinian steaks and everything was absolutely great. Enjoyed my stay and will absolute come back to this place. Genuinely and friendly staff, would definitely recommend this place!

title: A little Argentinian escape
comment: Looking for something different in London, I stumbled into this Argentina restaurant. The steak was done perfectly and the service was amazing. Kristina and Giovanni really took care of me (and the rest of the floor). Will definitely be back for more. PS the malbec was perfect too.

title: One of my favourite restaurants in London
comment: I've visited this branch of Buenos Aires Argentine Steak House three times now and each occasion has been exceptional. For my last visit with my father on a Tuesday evening in January, the restaurant seemed surprisingly busy for the time of year. I guess that business in January is the sign of them doing things right. Despite this, service was friendly, attentive and quick (special thanks to Juan and Giada for looking after us). Food came out without delay and was absolutely delicious as always. For starters, we had beef empanadas, provoleta and Malbec chorizo. All three were done to perfection but those empanadas have a place in my soul. For mains, I got the 400g spiral cut rib-eye and my dad got the 200g rib-eye - both with fries. This is still consistently the best steak I've ever had. I don't drink but my dad ordered Juan's Malbec recommendation and loved it. I thought I'd over ordered maybe but still ate everything and had room for churros for dessert. It was too delicious not to take full advantage of the occasion. As for the bill, it isn't the cheapest place to eat but certainly is reasonable and the quality of what's put in front of you is second to none. Couldn't recommend this restaurant enough.

title: Great steak, good service
comment: Best place to get a steak in Chiswick. Always delicious, as are the starters and the chips. Good service too. Highly recommended.

title: To recommend
comment: The Steakhouse has been a surprise. Good location, tasty meat and also menu for kids. Giovanni and the stuff have been great host and gave us very good support during the dinner. If you like meat and South American taste, that is a place not to be missed.

title: Servie and meat fabulous
comment: The service was amazing as the lady accomodate all our request in really fast and propositive way. The table was on top level of restaurant where is really calm environment. Sure we will be back.

title: We just strolled in
comment: Sooo we made a reservation at a completely different restaurant- a pub, a good one at that. But when we were discussing what we felt like eating- steak was what we wanted/needed  So I suggested that we go to the Buenos Aires steak house. The man at the entrance cancelled the reservation for us and we sat down at the bar because the restaurant was fully booked- no surprise there!! We had a couple of cocktails- one with Fernet branca and the other with elderflower cordial- yummy and we were lit  Then we ordered a starter comprising of aubergine, goats cheese and tomatoes. Of course we had a sirloin steak and spinach and fries. They offered the steaks in different sizes from 6oz - ladies size and up to 14oz Huge... It was so good better than I had expected. I have been there before and it was so la la - nothing to write home about. But in this instance- great  The service was excellent as well  Keep up the good work Buenos Aires crew !!

title: Truly Disappointing
comment: Having a reason to celebrate we decided to pay our first visit here. A mistake, the cash I had saved for an evening out was wasted on a very disappointing experience. Our table was small and we were in a busy narrow thoroughfare. Our waitress was polite but did not recommend anything or have any conversation at all.  The empanadas were greasy and tasted of oil that needed changing. Chorizo sausage was tasty but overly greasy.  The steaks (sirloin med rare) were fatty and as the lighting was so dim it was difficult to avoid the fat which was horrible. The side of chunky chips was such a disappointment..tasting again of well used oil from a fryer and rather like inferior frozen chips . Salad tasted fresh but with an added dressing that would have been nicer on the side. I really wanted to like it but we left feeling very flat and £100 lighter - a meal that we won't remember fondly.  When we left was no goodbye from staff and we had to retrieve our own coats from the cloakroom as there was noone at the front desk. I unfortunately was very ill when I got home and that sealed my night as a huge disappointment and not to be repeated.

title: Special evening!! best food!!
comment: It was my first time in this restaurant. The staff was very welcoming and friendly , the service was great and the food was amazing!! Had a great there with friends I would highly recommend this place to people and would like to come back again here!! Cheers ( thank you jovani for all your help) see you soon

title: Great food, service and atmosphere
comment: I went early in January with a friend of mine, we had great food (I recommend the fillet), great wine and the waiters were extremely kind and gentle. We had really great time. The ambience is also really nice. I highly recommend it for any type of company :)

title: Great food great service
comment: We have been to this steak house several times, with a large group and family. The service is always friendly, the food is excellent. I loved the bread basket, with olives. I tried the empanadas, nice. The main courses - I had the steak sales as I don’t eat large steaks while my husband and son had the proper steaks which were all well cooked and flavoursome. We came for my hisband’s birthday. I told them in advance. My husband was greeted with a complimentary glass of champagne and we ended the meal with a lovely complimentary dessert with a candle, complete with the birthday son. All nicely done.

title: Fabulous
comment: We arrived with a party of three without reservation but they made a special effort to accommodate us even if we were a bit in the way of the service.  We ordered steaks, of course and it was absolutely excellent. The argentine merlot was delightful.  Charming, prompt and attentive service.  Hugely advised to go there. We will return at the next opportunity.

title: Excellent
comment: Really nice place with a great atmosphere. Very helpful and attentive staff. The steaks (both of us ordered the rib-eye) were reasonably priced and very high quality, and the accompanying sauces really enhanced things. A lot better than some of the more expensive steakhouses in London. If we are in the area again, we'll definitely go back.

title: A Restaurant that fits perfectly the environment and ambience of Turnham Green Terrace.
comment: What an amazing place! The lighting was perfect, a brownish ambience with American Far West, or Argentinian Cowboys theme. I've made reservations online and 10 minutes later there it was, confirmed! Best table at the house. The meat was amazing and the sidings too. One special remark for Hristina, so nice and happy in her job. The main highlight, though, is our (new) friend Giovanni. From the moment we sat down to the moment we had a very nice toast with an Italian, Port-like wine he never ceased to make sure everything was ok and that we were confortable. Thank you for making our evening unforgettable, dear Giovanni.

title: Grey food great service
comment: My boyfriend and I decided to come here and we greeted very kindly and professionally. We were then taken to our table which we had made a reservation for which is where we met Giovanni, our waiter for the night.  Giovanni has exceptional customer service skills and he is extremely knowledgeable in every aspect. Giovanni recommended what type of steak we should order and he also recomended that we have it medium well done which tasted absolutely delicious. The entire experience was amazing and it was all down to Giovanni. He even offered to take pictures of us and was super friendly and welcoming and honestly I have never received such 5 star quality service from a single waiter alone. I would recommend this restaurant a million times over because of Giovanni. The other staff were amazing as well, but as Giovanni was our waiter for the night this review is aimed at his good work which should be celebrated.  Thank you Giovanni for an amazing night!!!

title: Feedback
comment: It’s been an amazing Argentinian experience, made more enthusiastic by Giovanni  We will come back for sure

title:
Very good value for money and great service-
thank you Giovanni!
comment: Very good food at reasonable price and the service is very friendly-a big thank you to the waiter Giovanni but also the rest of the staff is great!

title: Fantastic
comment: We had a great time at the restaurant. We all loved the food and also the brilliant and ethusatic service we received from Giovanni. We would love for him to be the president! He really made us feel welcome. We would definitely recommend this place to our friends and family. Don't miss out and make your way down to this awesome place!!!

title: Family birthday celebration
comment: We arrived at the restaurant at 12 noon when they opened, a party of six, the youngest 1 year old and the eldest 83. We had a lunchtime steak which was really good and only cost £10. The service was very good and Giovanni was particularly good with both the 1 year old and 83 year old. A good venue, good service and good food. I will definitely come back.

title: Great
comment: The steak was really good, the waiters were nice (thank you Giovanni) and overall it was a good experience, will come again.

title: Perfecto!
comment: Giovanni was an awesome server! Whole family had a great time- not to mention the authentic cuisine. This is one of the best places we've been in London!

title: Lovely Lunch
comment: Ate here at lunchtime. A friendly, well decorated restaurant with warm atmosphere. Well priced menu with special steak and chips offer. My son had a 6 oz steak with chips for £10, a bargain in London. I had a lovely steak baguette, very tender and ample portion. Good house red at reasonable price. I would recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for a tasty lunch at reasonable cost.

title: The Best Steakhouse in West London
comment: 3 of us visited this restaurant on Friday 21st Dec. Juan and Giada were both awesome in looking after us, the food and service is the best I have seen in a while. We will definitely come back as promised.

title: Boxing day
comment: Top food and very friendly waiters. Nice atmosphere and warm welcome. Very friendly for our youngest boy of 5 years old. We hope to back.

title: Fabulous evening
comment: Had a very nice dining experience at this restuarant. Good vibes from the front desk. Seated with minimum fuss and was well looked after by Giovanni. His recommendations were spot on and the meal was very nice. Would definitely be back.

title: Great Argentinian restaurant
comment: We have been to this restaurant a few times The food and wine is consistently excellent, with a good value kids menu. All the staff are very friendly and professional. Giovanni, our waiter tonight, was great. Looking forward to returning soon.

title: Must visit
comment: Great Restsurant. Really nice ambiance, fabulous steak cooked to exact specification. Special thanks to bubbly Giovanni who was absolutely wonderful in ensuring we had a great experience.

title: Great food and great service
comment: Everything was so good from start to finish. Giovanni from the moment we walked in looked after us. The food was delicious. Definitely won't be the last time visiting Buenos Aires!

title: Birthday celebration
comment: We were celebrating my daughters 18th birthday during our trip to London. The steak here was the best ever. Highly recommend the sharing platter. Our server Giovanni was fantastic! He made my daughter feel very special on her birthday. Thank you Giovanni!

title: Great Food Great Service
comment: We had our business dinner here and the food was really nice.. Service and hospitality was excellent. In particular one of the waitors Mr. Giovanni went out of his way to make our business evening really enjoyable. Many Thanks for the great evening. Great food Great Service.

title: Brilliant, friendly and a great buzz
comment: Staff couldn’t have been more welcoming or helpful. The restaurant was busy, but service efficient and the steaks were great. Very reasonable and recommend the ribeye and chimichurri sauce.

title: Excellent Fare
comment: We called into this place for lunch during a recent visit to London. We were given a lovely reception and excellent service. The food was outstanding and we look forward to returning to this place when ever we are next in the area.

title: Great food, charming staff
comment: We had a wonderful experience. We had steaks, chicken and salads and were very happy with all of them. Giovanni took great care of us, and was very knowledgeable of the food. We were recommended very good wines for food and dessert. Great food and atmosphere, and Giovanni, Adwan and the rest of the staff made the experience even better! 100% recommended!

title: Excellent
comment: Fantastic meal, ribeye steak succulent, delicious and cooked to perfection. Giovanni the waiter outstanding.

title: Dinner
comment: Giovanni was fantastic. Really great food and excellent service. I dine here regularly and find this a lovely atmosphere

title: Birthday meal
comment: As always food excellent and service brilliant, staff very attentive, good choice of cocktails and steaks cooked to perfection

title: Best steak I’ve ever tried and best service. I promise
comment: I had such a good time in Buenos Aires Argentine Steak House. I tried the best sirloin in London here and the service it is just amazing. Thanks Giovanni for taking the time to make us feel like at home. We will come back for sure. Wait for us next Saturday Giovanni!

title: Super food and great service
comment: We decided to go for a nice piece of meat and we were definitely not disappointed. The food was well prepared and the steak taster was really nice with 4 different cuts. Also the Chocolate Curros were just gorgeous, and not to forget the Buenos Aries coffee.  Our Waiter Giovanni was outstanding!
Giada and Julia,and Jiovanni best staff ever!!!Very good service and very good argentinian steak!!!!

title: Amazing steak!
comment: We went here recently with a big group for a meal in the evening. The service was good, the atmosphere was relaxed with good ambience and wonderful decor. Starters were good, but the steak was out of this world - probably one of the best I have ever had. I haven't given it 5 stars because I felt the starters were good, but not outstanding - however it's certainly worth going just for the steak.

title: Amazing Restaurant
comment: Very nice place, delicious food, fantastic service, Giovanni was very friendly. I really recommend!!

title: Good food, amazing service
comment: Since we arrived to live in Chiswick we have very nice experiences at Buenos Aires Argenite Steakhouse. Although the steak is juice and tasty, the staff is a outstanding point of the experience. All of them are really nice, funny, efficient and helpful. A great note to Giovanni that is really a point out of the curve in service manners.

title: Wonderful service and even better food
comment: We love coming here as the food never disappoints and the service is second to none.  Particular mention to Jada and Giovanni. Thank you and see you soon!

title: Another superb visit
comment: I have to admit bias, I love this restaurant. It is not just the good food, it is the staff that make it a great experience. They are polite, friendly, efficient but will also make you smile and have a bit of a joke if they judge it right and this evening they were spot on. I took my son’s friend for a catch up, after ge has returned from Uni. He loved the atmosphere and thought a steak would be wonderful. Our waiter on arrival was Enzo, he was great, and plyed at taking offence when I said my favourite waiter wasn’t on. The service was excellent as ever and Giovanni helped with the service And joked along as well. The starters were excellent as the calamari is my favourtite whereas my friend had the chorizo in malbec. The steak was cooked to perfection and everything was done with minimum of fuss but the attention and checking that everything was ok at was the right level. When we left my friend said he loved it. He liked the firebdly waiters and said he would be taking his girlfriend there as it was just so nice. The staff take this from a really good eating experience to a complete pleasure to visit. Thank you.

title: Sublime steak
comment: I joined three friends at Buenos Aires for lunch before going to the England vs South Africa rugby match at Twickenham. The meal we had alone would have made the outing worthwhile. Service was excellent, the ambiance was great - but the steak was absolutely sublime. I am a steak lover and, growing up in South Africa, have had plenty worth raving about. I can safely say the steaks we had at Buenos Aires are the best I can remember having - ever. We opted to dispense with starters (although a tempting selection) and try the "steak taster" option, which comprises 4 steaks per pair sharing - one each of sirloin, rump, ribeye and fillet. Every one of them was melt in the mouth tender and oozing flavour. The charming and friendly Argentine waiters also treated us to a complimentary slice of pie. Not being a dessert person I'm not certain what it was, but the flavour was superb and the gesture was greatly appreciated. In short, I cannot recommend Buenos Aires enough if you are looking for "write home about it" steaks with great service and will make a beeline for it the next time I know there is one nearby.

title: Finding a great steak in London...
comment: I have been living in London for a few months now, and finding good steaks in a new city, is always a journey... Buenos Aires has an awesome waiting staff (you truly feel that everyone is there for you), great steaks (quality vs price ratio) and, a great atmosphere. So far, I have tried their sirloins and the ribeyes, and I can honestly say that much more expensive steaks I have tried in London’s “fine” restaurants, are not comparable to BAs ones (the lesson learned is that price is not always equal to quality and taste).  Tonight we just had such a nice experience, that I needed to come here and recommend this great place hidden in Chiswick, London.

title: Good food
comment: Good location and food fairly priced. Service good as well. I would recommend for meat eaters not enough variety for veggies i felt

title: Great place, food and service
comment: We recently held a lunchtime party for around 40 adults with children and had a lovely time. Juan, the manager, was incredibly helpful and accommodating throughout. On the day the venue looked good and tables were well presented. The service was brilliant with staff being around all the time ensuring all our guests were looked after. Everything was done with a smile and nothing was too much trouble. Most importantly the food was delicious and well cooked. Unlike other places we looked at, everyone got a menue of four main courses to choose from on the spot, rather than having to preorder. Children also had a blast as the ground floor is divided into two levels which allowed kids to run around whilst we were enjoying drinks. All in all a great place to have lunch, dinner or host a good sit down party! Our thanks to all the staff there and well done for maintaining such good quality of food after all these years of operating in Chiswick.

title: Hidden gem
comment: Great steak house and easy to miss. Near the Turnham Green station it’s up a small ally way.
