Steak all round and I have to say a really good steak with possibly the best peppercorn sauce I’ve had in a long time. This restaurant caters for coeliacs who are on a gluten free diet. Very reasonably priced given the locality. The staff were absolutely fantastic, really pleasant and polite. I will definitely eat here again.

title: Giovanni for president!
comment: Had a fantastic evening at the steakhouse tonight, food was excellent (I'd recommend the sharing steak platter) and our server giovanni topped the evening off with a warm, professional and friendly service!!

title: Great steakhouse
comment: Lovely restaurant, fantastic food. The staff were friendly and attentive. Would definitely visit again if we were in the area.

title: Birthday meal
comment: A lovely evening. Excellent food and brilliant staff. A birthday celebration and we were given a glass of prosecco and a mini birthday desert

title: Fabuloso
comment: The premises is decieving as you cannot see the restaurant from the front but we took the gamble and wow what a result, the place was packed which is always a good sign particularly that we were there on a Sunday night. We were greeted by Juan Pablo who explained that we could wait at the bar where he advised on a good Malbec. Once seated we were met by Giovanni who was our waiter. I chose the swirl rib eye from his recommendation which was delicious and my wife had the pork belly which she says was one of the best she ever had. Have to say staff were so friendly and efficient, food/drink excellent and surroundings perfect. Thoroughly recommend for all occasions.

title: Anniversary Dinner
comment: Fantastic Food & Service. A really great atmosphere around. Staff attentive and willing to please. Have been to this restaurant now a number of times and have never been disappointed with the results.

title: Brilliant evening!
comment: Visited on a busy Saturday night with my husband! We were promptly seated upstairs and introduced to our fantastic waiter Radwane!  Service was prompt, friendly and very informative! He discussed the wines and menu with us and despite being very busy, nothing was a problem. We had starters of bread and chorizo, followed by two of the tastiest steaks we have ever eaten! The meat was so delicious that I didn’t need any sauce. The only downside was the skinny fries which were slightly overdone but this was just a minor complaint to our overall meal. I can highly recommend the ribeye steak and the Pinot Grigio they have.  We will definitely return and this is equally in part to the fantastic service we received, in addition to our delicious meal.

title: Anniversary Dinner
comment: My husband took me in this beautiful place to eat the best meat we ever had in London. We live in Chiswick and we will definitely come back. We had 2 starters and 2 Lomo, red wine and an amazing dessert to share, because we were too full !!! Thanks to Giovanni,for the service, an amazing and professional waiter!!! Definitely recommend.

title: Great food
comment: Giovanni is the Best chef town. Great steaks! Best steak house in London with best service. Will get back there!

title: Birthday Dinner Success
comment: Ask for Giovanni, he’s excellent. Great food, great service, great time. Would recommend, would go again

title: Dinner in Chiswick
comment: A rather stereotypical steak House nothing more or less. The interior is dark and has a cowboy theme. If you like steak you will have no problem here. The menu does however, have a range of additional items. We went with steak and they were well cooked but under seasoned for my taste and the sauces lacked punch. Service was good and experience overall was enjoyable.

title: Excellent service and food!!!!
comment: Giovanni our waitor welcomes us very good and we always love to come to this restaurant because of the excellent service. Apart from the service the meat at this place is phenomenal!!! Best place to eat in London!!!

title: Awesome experience
comment: The service was fabulous, the food authentic and delicious. It was a great.  recommended to all and definitely we visit this place.
Beautifully cooked steak, excellent service. Happy n friendly staff.A small negative was that I had to wait a while to get my cocktail .

title: Excellent dinner!
comment: Yesterday I had dinner with my best friend in this lovely restaurant in Chiswick. We’ve been served by Jada, our sweet waitress, she recommend us a good wine to match our steak. Food was amazing, at the end of the meal we were too full but we order a dessert as well and we were not disappointed. Def will come back!

title: Average to very good
comment: This steakhouse is recommended but it won’t knock your socks off.  Slightly overpriced and slightly disappointed with the starters.  The prawns weren’t up to scratch with me but it is a steakhouse after all. So I moved on to the steaks.  I ordered the sampler of steaks between my partner and I.  The steaks were delicious and very good. All fresh steaks.  Recommend this dish along with the creamed corn.  The wine is divine. Lots to choose from for every palette.  The staff are excellent and service is at a high standard. All the staff are friendly and lovely towards the customers.  If it’s your birthday, the staff make a plate for you with a cake saying Happy Birthday. This was a lovely touch.  It was very busy so you must book.  I would come back.  Recommended.

title: Bravo Giovanni!
comment: As ever, lovely experience - always amazing food and always fabulous service - tonight by our waiter Giovanni!

title: Fantastic food, off the beaten track
comment: Special menus during the week are really good value. Beef cooked to perfection. Get the chicken, it’s to die for!

title: A real authentic Italian!
comment: Had a pre rugby meal here with a group of colleagues and it didn’t disappoint.  Everybody really enjoyed their pizza and pasta dishes. Service was excellent and a great atmosphere like any Italian trattoria. I’ll be back..

title: Great experience! Thanks to Giovanni!
comment: My friends and family got together here for my mum and dads 25th wedding anniversary. Giovanni went above and beyond to ensure we had the best experience. Already some of our friends and family have booked to return as the food was out of this world! From the day I booked the table until the moment we left the restaurant we were looked after. Even helped in the day to help decorate the are with balloons etc to make it more personal. Thanks for making it a memorable night!

title: Fantastic
comment: Giovmmi was a brilliant host food was amazing and couldn’t ask for me. We will defo be returning best steak in the town

title: Excellent customer service ever
comment: This one of the best customer service i ever received in a restaurant... the service we received was fantastic and warm. couldn't expect better> Giovanni was amazing and very careful with with us. we had a best birthday celebration there thanks to Giovanni and the rest of the staff. 100% recommend this place for a celebration. price is also affordable and the food was excellent.

title: well trained professional staff
comment: Excellent steaks- all cooked correctly- blue was blue and rare was rare, wine and service- a well run if somewhat murky lighting

title: Incredible food, fantastic service!
comment: Excellent food, service, and wine. We were really impressed with everything. This is fast becoming one of our favorite places to eat in town (we just moved). Our waiter was fun and great recommendations, he didn’t pick the most expensive wine, but the best one!

title: Excellent
comment: Me and my boyfriend came for a dinner on a busy Saturday night,We had a very good time. The place is beautiful, the food was amazing and the sevice was excellent especially from our waiter Giovanni.We will definitely coming back.

title: Lunch Special
comment: We were greeted by Giovanni and made us feel so welcome! ordered the lunch special with salad it was lovely cooked just right! Service was admirable, thank you Giovanni for the great experience. Highly recommended

title: Lovely restaurant
comment: We decided to try this restaurant based on the views on TripAdvisor and we weren't disappointed. The food was great and the staff friendly. Will definitely be back.

title: Good place
comment: I was there for a business dinner. Meat is obvioulsly the main part of the menu. Good choices, very well cooked and prepared. Large choice of appetizers and good choice of wines. Personnel is very kind and prepared.

title: The best.. as usual!!
comment: Took our neighbours there last nite..and they are now fans too..great food great wine and great service..a gem that is always buzzing!!

title: Simply excellent
comment: An amazing place to enjoy a delicious meal! Cool location & very polite staff, our waiter Giovanni who took care of us, exceeded all our expectations. We will definetly come back soon!

title: Amazing food and staff
comment: Extremely enjoyed this delicious dinner. Highly recommended as the staff is very polite and the food is excellent. Our waiter Giovanni took care of us perfectly. We will definitely come back soon!

title: Great steak, classy setting
comment: Me and 2 of my friends got the spiral argentine rib-eye steak and it was pure perfection Cooked just right, seasoned well, awesome taste. We also ordered the chorizo and cheesy potato started and it was glorious. A comprehensive drinks menu is also available and our waiter (Giovanni) provided top notch service with no fuzz 10/10 will eat here again. Well recommended

title: Perfect
comment: Came here for my partners 22nd birthday and it was amazing. The service (a young girl took care of us all night and she was brilliant) was on point and was made to feel very welcome from the moment we walked in. He's very fussy about his steak and loved every last bit of it. When Giovanni discovered we had come for his birthday they put together a complimentary cake with a candle and sang for him, which I loved. Will definitely come again next time we're nearby!!

title: Birthday meal with girlfriend
comment: Even as soon as I arrived I knew it was going to be amazing the service is absolutely outstanding and the food is second to non I am a kitchen manager who is very fussy about steaks where ever I go but this is by far the best steak I have ever eaten I would advise anyone to eat her it is fantastic I would like to thank Giovanni for making my birthday more special by bringing out a cake and singing happy birthday and with champagne amazing place cannot wait to be back eating here again FANTASTIC

title: Succulent steaks and mouth watering wines
comment: As expected in any self respecting Argentinian steakhouse, the steaks were sublime. The mash potato was a tad under seasoned (I love my butter) but thoughts of the chorizo starter still make my mouth water. Giovanni also helped us with our wine pairing and was attentive and made us feel very welcomed. We left well fed and with big smiles on our faces. Definitely will come back.

title: Great dinner
comment: Our dinner was amazing. Giovanni suggested us a perfect selection of food, wine and dessert. We had great time, with great food, with great service, definitely recommended!

title: Amazing customer service, best waiter
comment: Absolute best experience, Giovani the Italian Stalian made our night magical. We just moved here and after a lovely night with him, we will absolutely be coming back

title: Birthday weekend
comment: Nice friendly relaxed atmosphere serving lovely well cooked steak. Service a little rushed but didn’t spoil the meal. I did mention the Falklands once but I think I got away with it .

title: Great steak, great wines, great service.
comment: The meat was outstanding and our amazing waiter Giovanni recommended the most delicious wine for our price range. Overall great experience.

title: Yummy
comment: Always good but you have to try the excellent value sampler meal with 4x100g steaks and a side. The fillet dissolved. You dont need teeth. Yummy. All served by Giovanni who could not have been more attentive or helpful. Good man! Definitely coming back. Kids loved it too.

title: Excellent every time!
comment: Can never fault this place, great service and tasty food! Great location and ambiance. If you like a steak then this is your place

title: Mini Break
comment: Came here for our first night meal on our break after reading reviews on TripAdvisor.Can say was not let down,the service was friendly and helpful.And the steak,wow that was some taste.Will come back for sure next time we come to London.

title: Still very good
comment: This is one of our favourite places to go unfortunately our favourite server Radwan has moved on, still turned up to this venue in the evening with no reservations , seated and served quickly decent steaks as always. Always happy to return

title: Nice food, friendly staff
comment: Hi  We went out for a family dinner yesterday and the experience at Brunos Aires Argentine Steakhouse was just amazing. The meat cut was delicious of a really good quality, and since I’m on a very strict diet I find it very difficult to eat out, so I asked not to marinate the meat or the salad with any sort of dressings and they just did it perfectly the way I want. The restaurant atmosphere was full of good vibes. We sat on the first floor balcony and it was warm but the staff , specially Giovanni, was so apologetic and turned on the air con as he was very concerned about our comfort. He offered the 4 of us complementary still water and dessert wine. I will definitely come back.

title: "Amazing food excellent service"
comment: I strongly recommend this place with not doubts; to come with friends, family o just for a romantic occasion. The service was excellent, thanks to the manager who kindly recommend us just an exquisite selection from their menu. We've just loved it and we'll definitely come back.! Alejandra :)

title: Giovanni and Stephanie provide excellent service
comment: Great service from Giovanni and Stephanie! The food was 10/10 as well couldn’t of thought of a better place to go for lunch or dinner

title: Superb!
comment: I have eaten here many times and the steak is excellent! Not forgetting lovely starters, sides and sauces (my favourite being the blue cheese sauce).  The regular staff and manager are always friendly and accommodating. Highly recommend, you will not be disappointed.

title: Great food
comment: Great meal (specially the meats), dessert and service! One of the best restaurants I’ve been in London! Worth the visit!!

title: A great steakhouse in Chiswick
comment: A very friendly service combined with properly cut and cooked meat. This is consistently a great argentine steakhouse with good value for money. Don’t miss the Tapiz Malbec Mendoza

title: Best steakhouse in the area
comment: This is one of my favourite restaurants in London (and this is from someone who frequently visit a lot of different places). The staff is always so kind and attentive. Radwane is always so cheerful and helpful when my husband and I go there, it always makes our visit special and we look forward to coming back. The menu offers a large variety of starters, steak and desserts!

title: Wonderful evening at Buenos Aires and amazing service from Giovanni
comment: I came here last week with a couple of friends to celebrate my birthday. It was a last minute decision to come here and knowing it was a weekday I did not think it was necessary to book a table... well I couldn't be more wrong.  It took a while to get a table ready for us but the staff is very welcoming and they looked after us really well. I have been to other branches but this is by far the best service I have received. Food was delicious and Giovanni was looking after our table and he did an amazing job, great sense of humour and attention to detail. I would definitely recommend this branch.

title: Very good steak
comment: Went here for my birthday lunch and I was pleasantly surprised. Steak was cooked nicely and fries were fresh. Our waiter Giovanni was very efficient, friendly and professional.

title: Best Steak/Grill House
comment: I’ve eaten at Buenos Aires in Chiswick many times, and the food and service is always exemplary. Until recently I’d only tried their steak and lamb chops. During my last visit I tried their spatchcock chicken for the first time, and wow . They have also have superb Argentinian wine to compliment. I leave there every time hoping they never realise how good they are, and put their prices up .

title: Perfect steak
comment: Perfectly cooked and beautifully seasoned steaks. Lovely staff. Will definitely be coming back here!

title: Amazing birthday
comment: We visited the restaurant last night 14/09/18 for my daughter's 16th birthday and had the most amazing time. I finished work a little later than expected, which made me late dor my reservation. When we arrived at the restaurant, we were a little flustered and the staff were very accommodating in making sure we got ourselves well settled before there was any pressure to place orders. We had quite a large birthday cake with us and our waiter Giovanni kindly got us a small table to display the cake on. Throughout the ordering process, Giovanni was helpful, patient & knowledgeable at all times. He was able to recommend dishes to us and knew the menu perfectly. Whilst waiting on us, he sweetly made sure that he always spoke to my 10 month old son, it meant alot to us that he wasn't left out at all. We were a party of 17, so the order was quite large, I was very surprised to see that all of our food arrived together. No one had to wait for food, the waiting staff were polite & courteous and the whole process was fantastic. All of the guests were perfectly satisfied with their food, the quality & standard of food was excellent and amazing value for money. The menu offers good of different price ranges which was great for a big party, it meant everyone could stick to their own budget and eat well. Our total bill was only £391, between 17 adults, such good value for money. When it was time to have birthday cake, Giovanni said he was happy to help with the process. Whilst we sang happy birthday, the waiters joined in and encouraged the other diners to also celebrate. As a mother celebrating a child's birthday, I was extremely happy that my daughter's birthday was made so nice. I will definitely be returning to the restaurant and would highly recommend others to also.  Thank-you so much for making my daughter's birthday such a happy one.

title: Amazing food,outstanding staff.
comment: The whole journey was amazing, from the moment I entered the restaurant I knew it was going to be an amazing experience. We had chorizo al malbec, prawns in garlic and provoleta as starters, saying it was good is not enough, the mix of flavours was great and the taste and texture of each plate was perfect. The steak was perfectly made, we had a malbec salt to put on top that made it even better, the humita was very tasty too. To accompany this amazing meal I had a glass of red wine. I will definitely recommend this restaurant, the manager was not only nice, but very polite, had a lot of knowledge about the menu and was very handsome. Thumbs up for this place, will for sure come back!

title: Amazing fancy monday
comment: We had an amazing time at this incredible restaurant. The location is optimal and the food is absolutely delicious. My ribeye was perfect and we also had a very nice dessert with a base of dulce de leche. Highly recommended.  Also the service is on point and the waiters are very friendly. A special thanks to Giovanni that made our visit pleasant and comforting.

title: Just a Sunday evening
comment: Fantastic evening. Great service (grazie, Giovanni), fantastic food, everything perfect. Happy for us to sit on a table outside with our sweet little Jack Russell, which was what we were looking for. Recommended red wine was excellent, the dessert Malbec on the house was to sanctify, the "Coffee Buenos Aires" was an alcoholic treat to round off tge evening. I suppose I should say that the steaks were absolutely as one ecpects, but the salads and fries were well beyond normal expecrations in London. Salads day fresh, excellently selected, al dente and bitter sweet. The fries a hard gold crusted confection of perfectly cooked potato and oil. Will return!

title: Great food and fantastic service
comment: Just went for lunch: great offers (wine was half price today) on top of great quality food. I recommend chorizo with malbec starter! Service was really kind and knowledgeable (thank you Giovanni for all the tips and advice). 100% reccomended!

title: Such a great dinner!
comment: Great food but most of all great experience with our WAITER Radwane!!! A must visit in West London we will definitely come back.

title: Steak not cooked as ordered, upselling staff
comment: My husband and I went on Wednesday evening. I'm 6 months pregnant and ordered my steak medium. The first half of it was but the rest was rare meaning that I couldn't eat it. I mentioned this to our waiter (Giovanni) when he came to collect the plates. Whilst he agreed with me that it was not the usual medium, he didn't do anything to correct the situation. We also felt there was considerable up-selling by the waiting staff which became annoying after a time. Overall, fairly average experience. Will go to Charlotte's Bistro a couple of doors down next time.

title: Excellent food and staff
comment: Went there for my birthday and the experience was superb. I had booked a table for two but it turned out that we were four as my girlfriend had orchestrated a surprise with some friends. They welcomed us with glasses of prosecco and brought the dessert with a birthday candle! The staff was brilliant but Giovanni in particular was very friendly and patient with us, he even sang the 'happy birthday' with us!

title: Amazing service and wonderful food!
comment: I took my family for my dad 65th birthday and the staff were so wonderful to us. Radwane, our main waiter was an absolute gentleman! Thank you so much for a super awesome evening!

title: Delicious steak and extra special service
comment: Visited for my husband’s birthday and the food was faultless. We had the sharing steaks with sweet potato fries/mash and cheesecake for dessert. Every course was delicious and the house wine went down really well.  Special mention to the servers who really went above and beyond with service to make our day extra special. We were really well looked after which was a massive bonus. Would definitely recommend a visit for steak lovers.

title: Steakfest
comment: Post gin tour meal! Love steak and three of us had the sample meal 4 different cuts one went for a burger! Let’s get her out of the way first, she said it was the best burger she’d ever hadenough said. Let’s now move on to the steak , wow they were all fantastic, beautiful cuts cooked to perfection. Definitely worth it and not stupidly expensive, great service, I would recommend and would go again.

title: "Exceptional"
comment: Myself and my partner visited this restaurant last week and we cannot wait to come back. The service was outstanding, I would like to praise the waiter Giovanni on his outstanding service throughout this dinner date. His knowledge of the menus was exceptional, he made our experience better with his charisma. He made me and my date feel extremely comfortable; it was our first. We cannot thank you enough Giovanni, and you are exemplary of the standards expected from waiters.

title: We will Return...
comment: Excellent outstanding food in very personal ambient. Steaks were cooked to perfection, deserts and starters were unconventional, but extemely tasty

title: Dinner
comment: Hi All Went to dinner here Saturday night and was lucky to get a r=table, my advise is book Service was good although we did find I waiter to be a cocky while he was trying to be funny, there really was no need? Ordered an our meals, one was the Lamb Chops the other a 8oz Sirloin both cooked lovely but I have to say when you say grilled potatoes do more than a half a Jacket? If you served a little veg on the plates too it would be perfect along with a rich jus or gravy instead of blue cheese, mushroom or peppercorn sauces.  Would recommend try it its good but far better steak houses in the area

title: Lovely food, staff are brilliant and atmosphere is great
comment: Me and my partner regularly visit this steak house. The staff are so friendly and really take pride in there job. The food is delicious and although very busy there is never a long wait for service. Special shout out to our waiter Radwane for making my partners birthday on our most recent visit extra special! He was absolutely amazing so polite and ensured all of our requests were sorted out perfectly! Thank you so much again! Can’t wait for our next meal!

title: A gem!
comment: We have walked past this place for years and not tried it until recently - we were missing out! It is set back from the street, so you don't really get a sense of the ambiance and the setting without going in. Friendly staff, great food and fun atmosphere. We loved it. They have some promotions during the week Sunday - Wednesday, which they mentioned for our next visit. The food and wine were great - reminded me of wonderful food when we were last in Argentina. Glad we finally went in, we will be back!

title: Fantastic steak
comment: It’s probably the fifth time we’ve been to this steak house, it never disappoints. Ordered the chorizo sausages and the home made bread to share, followed by various steaks. Kids also loved it.

title: Mr Jones
comment: Absolutely fantastic rump steak Great atmosphere  Mouth watering sauces Nice cold beer Great food Great stuff Five stars *****

title: Early evening steak
comment: We visited this restaurant for an early evening meal, lovely greeting by the staff and made to feel very welcome.  Our meals were very good, my rib-eye steak was cooked to perfection and was beautifully seasoned. My wife had the baked Stone Bass and that was also delicious.   Good family friendly (several family groups came in while we dined) restaurant with excellent customer service and very good food. Also has a range of delicious cocktails

title: Great hospitality and food!
comment: We found this restaurant via Trip Advisor and it lived up to all the expectations! It was a cold, wet Sunday lunchtime and in contrast we were warmly welcomed. The food was excellent and very good value. If we lived nearer (not 250 miles away) we'd certainly go again!

title: Wild boar for everyone!
comment: I came here with my friends a few times, and I'll keep coming without any doubts. The staff (Luca, Maurizio, Francesco the chef and everyone else in the kitchen) are absolutely amazing and very very friendly. Food is great quality, properly made like my mamma (I'm Italian) would make. Price is affordable for everyone, and the daily specials are always great. I recommend this amazing restaurant to everyone, both Italians (you'll feel like home) and other nationalities (you'll learn many things about the Italian cuisine). A must have is the pappardelle al cinghiale (wild board pappardelle), it's just delicious! Mamma mia!

title: BEST STEAK EVER!
comment: I went there with my cousin on the last day in London. We ordered steak from their lunch menu. It was so delicious, that meat was melting in my mouth, would definitely recommend to everyone! Also, staff was great, Giovanni was very friendly and professional and his colleague on a shift, I unfortunately forgot her name, was lovely. I forgot my phone and she run on the street to return it to me, which was such a good gesture! Thank you

title: Monday dinner
comment: Me and my best friend came for dinner on a monday evening and had a lovely night. The steaks were cooked perfectly and the service was amazing. Thanks to Giovanni for looking after us!

title: Great lunch time venue
comment: Had the lunchtime special of steak and chips with a mixed salad. The food was very tasty, steak cooked to perfection. Our waiter Giovanni was very attentive and the food came quickly. Great value for money

title: Great food
comment: Giovanni was a great waiter and served up some lovely food! Would really recommend the pork and we will definitely be back. Cheers!

title: RDh
comment: Great food and service. Visited for lunch and would strongly recommend the steak.All the staff were very friendly and efficient especially our waiter Giovanni who gave us a really warm welcome and was very attentive.

title: Oustanding service.
comment: We were doing friends dining in this restaurant on Sunday evening. We were really amazed about the service level from Giovani and Stefania and Radwan. would recommend it highly to every looking for good dining in this area.

title: Best possible Steak and Service
comment: I have been to many restaurants and never back with such awesome feeling. Radwane is star of the restaurant and gave us top quality service. His personal recommendations and that personal touch made all the difference. We has Steak and Burger with wine and ended with awesome cheese cake. One of the best afternoons I have had. Thanks a lot for making my afternoon so special with my son and making us feel special. I will defo be back again and again. Highly recommended.

title: Lovely surprise
comment: We went to the restaurant early evening and were received warmly and efficiently. We were advised on wine and food by the very charming and charismatic Giovanni. Both food and service were great! We would recommend this restaurant to anyone in the area!  Thanks Giovanni :)

title: Outstanding
comment: Outstanding customer service , amazing food , great atmosphere , stunning restaurant ! We had a reservation for myself and my partner, but last minute we made a change to our booking and decided to bring our son with us , rang then up and they were able to accommodate us in the best possible way considering they were fully booked and such short notice .. but food didn’t take long to serve , clean and friendly environment and great menu . Highly recommend !

title: Excellent
comment: Excellent meal in a lovely, relaxed setting. We thoroughly enjoyed our different starters and loved our main courses of sirloin steak and parmigiana di melanzane, all cooked to perfection. Sadly, we had no room for dessert. Service was friendly and very good. This was our second visit to this restaurant and it was just as good as the first time. A very enjoyable evening.

title: Lunch and learn
comment: Excellent service from Giovanni and Radwan. Even received a free hot chocolate at the end Delicious  Emily

title: Ms
comment: Extraordinary service by our waiter Radwane. Food lovely great atmosphere I would highly recommend this resturant soo good.

title: Great Experience!
comment: I had a wonderful lunch with my mother served by 2 wonderful waiters Giovanni and Raswan. Service was great and quick and staff was very polite and helpful.

title: Great Steak served by wonderful staff
comment: Wonderful lunch ... great ambience and fabulous service. Thank you Giovani and Radwane so kind and attentive. See you soon.

title: Family lunch
comment: Overall a wonderful experience. My family and I loved the food and atmosphere. Giovani and Radwane were our servers and they were very friendly and funny from the start of our experience till the end. The restaurant was clean and it smelled like coffee where we sat. It was great. If I ever return to London I’ll do my best to come back to this location.

title: Giovanni was fabulous
comment: Hello we visited tonight. The food was excellent and Giovanni was a joy! He was attentive and full of cheer - excellent service from the team. We will be back!

title: Great food friendly staff
comment: Great experience. Had the rib eye steak. It was excellent.  Service was top notch. Our server Giovanni, was amazing, friendly, helpful and made the night.

title: Great food and fantastic service
comment: Amazing atmosphere and fantastic food (well what the had for vegetarians)!  Our waiter Giovani provided excellent service and was all round fantastic guy. Very positive and a laugh every time he approached our table.  Would definitely return:-)

title: Excellent steaks
comment: Good restaurant, good food, excellent steaks and services, Giovani was very friendly, will visit again... adviced.

title: AMAZING
comment: Visited with my sister,niece and girlfriend for a nice sunday afternoon steak. I will definately be returning. The steak was exquisite and the service even better. THe waiters Giovanni and Radveanet were fantastic and provided excelent info on the wine selection and steaks. I highly recomend thia place and the service.

title: Excellent!
comment: Been there on Monday and it was quite busy.the food was really tasty and the manager was charming and funny. My first visit but definitely not the last one.

title: Great steak but that’s it
comment: Food: The fillet steak was excellent. However, everything else was pretty bad including the tasteless prawns, oily side fries, boring wilted salad, chewy chorizo and dry churros. Also, I asked for medium rare and my partner for medium and they were both the same. Service: Friendly but doesn’t compensate for the food. My advice: go for a steak and some red wine and somewhere else for dessert.

title: Absolutely The best stake house in London
comment: Amazing foods and great services with very friendly members. In over all, You cannot find anywhere better stake house than here in London.  Thank you very much for the lovely evening xxx

title: Steak
comment: Excellent food, steak cooked to perfection. Staff was very attentive and welcoming. Highly recommended.

title: Lovely Steaks and Great Service
comment: Lovely atmosphere, good food and great service. Thanks to Giovanni who served us and recommended some dishes that were superb. Definitely my go to place from now on when I’m in town.

title: Great Argentinean steakhouse
comment: Enjoyed great steaks, and good service especially from Giovanni who was friendly and very helpful. Nice atmosphere and I would higlhy a visit.

title: Tasty and fun
comment: Very good and characteristics location. It's an Argentinian journey without the stress of the flight. Very good music in background. Staff very nice and skilled. Our waitress Giovanni was so friendly and helpful for the perfect combination between main course and wine. We will came back soon!

title: A beautiful dinner & wonderful service from Giovanni
comment: I am a huge steak lover and was in London on a business trip and staying in Chiswick so found this restaurant by searching steakhouses trip advisor. I dined alone was very well looked after by the staff, especially my waiter Giovanni who asked what I liked and gave me his recommendations- the steak was perfectly cooked and the desert was amazing (Dulce de Leche cheesecake - I had no idea what it was and still don’t but Giovanni said it was his favourite so I gave it a go at it was stunning). Very reasonable prices and a 3 course set menu on a Wednesday which is great value. I look forward to coming back next time I am in London. Please open a restaurant in Cardiff - Giovanni can come and be the manager!

title: Malt vinegar to die for
comment: Best malt vinegar in town. I joke.  This place is great. Very friendly and attentive staff. The steak is top notch.

title: 10/10 would recommend
comment: Went to this restaurant after work by myself. I had the rump steak lunch offer and calamari. The food itself was delicious, beautifully presented and served very quickly! The steak was melt in the mouth so I will definitely be back to try some of their other steaks.  The service was impeccable, Giovani was so friendly and attentive, but not intrusive. He really is a credit to the restaurant, and definitely made me want to come back again. Thank you to Giovani for the kind dessert and for making me feel so comfortable!

title: Best steak in Chiswick
comment: The only place to go for steak in the area. Fantastic food and service. Giovnni made a particular effort to make us feel well looked after.

title: Great steak, great value
comment: If you're looking for a great value steak lunch, look no further. Friendly service from Giovanni and the team, and well seasoned steak with tasty condiments. You've raised the "steaks"!

title: Family First
comment: Always has space for our large family get-togethers! Steak is cooked to order well and enjoyable. Giovanni and Radwahn were fantastic hosts too. Could have more options on the lunch menu for non-meat eaters in the group

title: Amazing stake house!
comment: Lovely experience! The place is very charming, huge collection of wine bottles and relaxing atmosphere inside and outside.  Our waiter, Sebastiano, was very happy to give us suggestions regarding food and wine to combine with, he gave us an excellent service, professional and friendly.  The food was brilliantly cooked, just the way we wanted, the taste was proper quality, fresh and soft meat. Starters were traditional Argentinian dishes, very tasty as well. Definitely a good place were to taste good wine & food. Highly recommended!! We'll be back there soon!

title: Great lunch
comment: We had a great lunch and great time at Buenos aires on Wednesday. Giovanni was extremely welcoming, nice, and the food was simply gorgeous.  And today Friday we are back actually it might become our place!!! Yeay!!!!  I would recommend this place not only for their special but also for their welcome and kindness. Thanks Giovanni

title: Dinner
comment: A great vibe. And the food was really fresh and tasty. Giovanni was a great energy. Made us very welcome.  Highly recommend

title: Lunch time meal
comment: This my second time having lunch here and both times the lunch has been outstanding the steak was well cooked how I liked it perfectly and it came very hot. From the moment I arrived there I felt like I was vip the smiles the welcome and being seated anywhere I wanted to sit.  Giovanni made sure that my meal and drinks was always topped up. The pudding choices was very good but I was way to full to have one. Maybe next time when I am back in Chiswick I will definitely force myself to eat one to myself.  I can not wait to eat another steak there and definitely recommend trying Buenos Aires.  Be back soon.

title: Great staff and dinner
comment: Had a great meal. Ordered the sirloin and it was cooked perfectly. Giovanni our waiter was great! Thanks!

title: 5 star service!
comment: Our waiter Giovanni was exceptional,I was there for my birthday and was treated to a glass of prosecco and dessert. He was so friendly and kind and provided Michelin star service. The food wes amazing and he made the evening very entertaining! Thank you

title: Top evening
comment: Came along for my girlfriend’s birthday. Food was incredible. The sharing plates are brilliant value for money. Giovanni was especially welcoming and an excellent host. We have just moved into the area and we will definitely come back!

title: The best steak you can get in London!
comment: Genuinely one of the best steaks I have had in a long time! Steg is just fabulous and understands in full detail what great customer service looks like. A 100% recommendation and we’ll be back for sure.

title: Great Night
comment: Warm and Welcoming ...with a great steak and a great Malbec. Super service and great patience at the end of a good night

title: Great steak and great service
comment: We were party of 7, most of us had steaks which came out perfectly done to our order. I liked the fact you can try the tasting steak menu and can try 4 different types of steaks which were wonderful (min for 2 people). The quality was great and the price reasonable! Also pork belly and chicken Milanese were really nice. However the starters and desserts were just good, not great (my chocolate fudge cake was too dry). The place is not huge so definitely book in advance. The toilets need updating. Our waiter Giovanni couldn't be better! Very nice, friendly, attentive, always there when we needed him. All in all very pleasant evening!

title: Absolutely Fantastic!
comment: The steaks were melt-in-the-mouth! Just a fabulous meal - thank you! We had the most delicious steaks - cooked to perfection, and the most attentive waitress - wonderful.

title: Birthday bliss
comment: HUGE thank you to Juan and the team at B.A. Chiswick for somehow accommodating 18 of us at short notice when he already had two big birthday bookings on a Friday night. Great night, awesome food and drink!

title: Friends reunion
comment: We booked a table at the restaurant a few weeks in advance as we (5 couples) were getting together for an annual reunion staying at the Lensbury. The food and service was excellent, even though the restaurant was busy and we were a big group. The bill at the end was very reasonable and the walk to and from the hotel was very pleasant. Would thoroughly recommend this restaurant for an informal and relaxed evening

title: Delicious meat with perfect wine association
comment: Have been there several times and have never been disappointed. Great service in a cosy atmosphere. The food is great, meat delicious and combined with good Argentinian wines makes it a perfect meal. Strongly recommended

title: Perfecto
comment: Steak was amazing, and very reasonably priced. Great atmosphere - staff welcomed us like family and service was friendly and unobtrusive throughout. Radwane was brilliant, and the drinks on the house capped things off perfectly at the end. Highly recommended

title: Great food and service
comment: We go here regularly with our toddler and baby for lunch. Food is very good with lots of kids friendly options. Service is excellent. Everyone knows how to deal with and entertain kids and are very helpful. Giovanni especially entertained and even sang a song for our baby boy when he was crying so that we can some peace to eat! Such a nice place to bring kids to.

title: Great service
comment: Me and my family ate at this restaurant two evenings in a row. We were very impressed with the service, and in particular a chap from Morocco and a man from Sicily. They both looked after us very well, and when combined with great food, ensured two wonderful evenings. Would definitely frequent again.

title: Best Waiter
comment: Such a nice restaurant and the best waiter. Giovanni was so bubbly and funny and took care of us all evening. We will definitely be coming back! Also the food was delicious of course

title: Outstanding steak, wine and service!
comment: My boyfriend and I had an absolutely amazing time at Buenos Aires! The whole experience was made all the more special with our wonderful waiter, Ashkan, who gave the best recommendations for food and the very best Malbec and treated us to his great sense of humour and personality! We were looked after all evening.  The steaks were absolutely outstanding, cooked to perfection and of the very best quality - worth every penny! Great first time and we will definitely be coming back!

title: Overall a great experience and great steak!
comment: My partner and I went to Buenos Aires yesterday for my birthday. The environment was very warm and hospitable. The food and the service was exceptional. Our waiter Giovanni truly made this a great experience with his suggestions on food and wine and with his personality. He took great care of us. Will be certainly coming back and highly recommend!

title: Good steak in London
comment: I was in Chiswick for business and after a "heavy day" thought I deserved a good steak (sorry for vegetarians :) ). Found this on TripAdvisor and managed to get a place by chance as it was full (good sign). I had a very good steak. maybe a little too coocked for a medium rare but still tender and juicy. I will surely return

title: Mrs
comment: Excellent place for meat lovers, lovely atmosphere and very friendly and efficient staff in particular Radwane!

title: Dinner
comment: Excellent device Very caring staff Excellent food and wine  Great ambience  Will come here again  Giovanni and team were excellent

title: INCREDIBLE service, Very good food, and great value for money
comment: We had a really nice experience.  What's so good about this place?    Incredible service.  Good food.  excellent value for money. I'll start with the service. We were very lucky to have a chap named Giovani as our waiter (He was so exceptional that I asked for his name to write it here). The guy was professional, lively, amusing, charming, and knew exactly when to let us be and when to drop by. I swear, at one point a baby next to us started crying, he came to the table and made the little one laugh in a matter of seconds. The rest of the team was also really nice, and all in all, the atmosphere is relaxed, while the energetic team makes sure everything ticks. We went on a Wednesday, and took the business meal. I'd say 20 quid is a very good value for money for a quality steak a starter and a desert plus a glass of wine to on top of it. The Steaks were high quality meat (and if you come to a steakhouse, this is what the place is measured by) but the starters (we went for the aubergine with mozzarella and the Calamari) and the deserts (ice cream and cream caramel) we enjoyable as well. All in all, a fine evening and we will defiantly be back.

title: Brilliant
comment: Great food, brilliant service from Giovanni and co. We had the sharing platter...absolutely delicious

title: Great service from Giovanni and team
comment: Delicious steak, perfect service, lovely ambience. We will be back! The food was great and the service was excellent. A hidden gem in Chiswick!

title: Amazing!!!
comment: Delicious food! Excellent service! Staff was amazing and very friendly especially Radwane! Definitely coming back

title: Late lunch
comment: We have never been there before, went there for late lunch during the week, fairly peaceful, music not too loud, interesting decor and ambience, food not bad, small but interesting selection of Argentine desert wines, very friendly service from Radwane, highly recommended.

title: A pleasant surprise
comment: Looking for a place to eat with a table for one on a Saturday night in London was going to be a challenge I thought. However I was pleasantly surprised with the welcome offered by La Dolce Vita. The staff were genuinely enthusiastic about their food. Were keen to please and service was prompt despite the full house in this popular family friendly restaurant. The food was excellent and my surprise at being welcomed as a single diner was complimented by a very enjoyable and satisfying meal.

title: Wonderful service and delightful food
comment: We had a fantastic evening with Giovanni as our waiter. His wine suggestion was delicious and the steak was flavorful and cooked perfectly. To finish it off, we enjoyed some tasty chocolate churros!

title: Outstanding
comment: We went to Buenos Aires Argentine Steakhouse for my 30th Birthday Meal with Family. We were greeted upon arrival and seated on a table near to the bar to accommodate the 6 of us. Everything from the food to the service was outstanding. Our waiter Ashkan was very welcoming, offering recommendations from the menu & making the time to talk to us all. As soon as he was aware it was my 30th there was not a moment where there wasn’t an additional drink, on the house, for me, on the table of some sort! The speed of service was excellent with starters and mains arriving in timely fashion. With the likes of CAU & Gaucho’s closing it is great to see a steak restaurant like this provide exactly what you want when you go out for a meal. The cost was reasonable for the 6 of us and we were delighted our trip from Guildford to Chiswick was worth it. I look forward to visiting again in the future

title: Poor service
comment: I have been to this restaurant a few times at lunchtime.It was my 75th Birthday and my Daughter asked me what restaurant I wished to go to. I chose la dolce vita but was very disapointed with the service. The waiter asked if anyone wanted wine, when we said no but we wanted other drinks, he nevr came back.No salt & pepper where offered for our dinner. Had to ask for milk for our coffees then no sugar was given, had to ask again. When the bill came a service charged was added.WHAT SERVICE.Will not be going again

title: Display the best
comment: This is the best restaurant in Teddington in my opinion. We are going there for the last 7 years and we never had and complain about their food and service. Keep up the good work guys!! See you soon!!!

title: Birthday Celebration and excellent food
comment: We went for our son's 18th birthday as he loves the steaks here. We had the two for one on main courses and the food was delicious, the waiter was fun and attentive without being too much and we all really enjoyed the evening and we thought it was reasonable for what we had. I would recommend Buenos Aires.

title: Amazing food and service!!
comment: We ate here last night on a spontaneous walk-in and so pleased we did! The food was absolutely incredible and one of the nicest steaks I've had in ages, matched with delicious sides and wine. But what totally won if for them was the fantastic waiter Radwane - what a legend!!! Great advice on food and wine, chattty, friendly and just so lovely! It was a birthday and he made it really special for us. Thank you!!

title: Very good dinner
comment: I visited for the first time recently and was really impressed. We both had one of the specials which were great value and delicious. Definitely going back!

title: Excellent food & service
comment: The location, just off Turnham Green Terrace, is good & the décor is okay. The staff were very friendly & knowledgeable. The food was very good, especially the platters with a great variety of meats. They have some excellent wines on the menu too.

title: Superb.....
comment: If you like steak and local then dive in.. Popped in by accident wife business meet and eve meal. Great place, great service and food equally so. On my list when local again to pop in hear. Would I recommend, simply, yes...

title: Excellent service, fantastic steak, impeccable service
comment: Wonderful meal while visiting friends. Service was excellent from arrival at the front door. Our waiter Radwane, in particular was fantastic - really friendly and attentive.  The menu has lots of options, but why would you choose anything other than the steak in an Argentinian steak house??? The meat was top quality, with choice of cut and size. Perfectly cooked and well seasoned with a good choice of sides and sauces.  The place is also terrific value - bill for 4, including wine and liqueurs was under £180.  Will definitely return - highly recommended

title: Not bad
comment: This place is not bad but it could be better... Meat was really nice and tender but Chimichurri was tasteless and too much Oil in it thats why the lack of flavour...Empanadas were amazing but waitresses a little bit annoying....but the overall experience was not bad.... but very expensive...

title: Total package
comment: I had a date and right from the moment I walked in, the ambience, the temperature and the cleanliness impressed me. The waiter Radwane tried as much as he could to keep me company before my date arrived.  He made the experience a positive one. He was as friendly and cheerful to the other guests, as he was to us. The food was amazing as well. Radwanes recommendation was just the right order.  We will definitely be coming back here.  Thank you Radwane!!!  Ps: let me know if my Date comes back there with someone else ;)

title: Great place for a steak
comment: Once again BA delivered the goods. We turned up early and they found us a table immediately. We then lingered late enjoying our family meal and at no time felt under any pressure to vacate the table.   All in all another enjoyable experience which explains why we keep coming back.

title: Great steak, Amazing service
comment: Excellent pre-evening meal. Good steak? well cooked med rare. In particular service from waiter Giovanni was fantastic - good wine recommendation, attentive but not intrusive.

title: Faultless
comment: Took my parents there fur a little celebratory dinner and it truly exceeded or expectations. A totally unassuming little restaurant turned out to be a truly 5 star experience. The staff are wonderful, polite and knowledgeable. The menu is simple and the food is outstanding authentic Argentine cuisine. Louis become one of our favourites.

title: Rare is it that a restaurant is due a five star review...
comment: This has to be one of the best eating experiences in London, and comparatively speaking is non too shabby price wise either. Falling in at under 65.00 including wine, this great, off the beaten track steakhouse, is real value for money. The food, service, and place would dictate a much higher rate: we are talking here about a neck of the woods where a pint falls somewhere between 5 and 6 fifty.  From the street - there is nothing special about it. A blink and it could be passed without notice. It has some outdoor seating, nice enough, on a street that feels and looks like part of a village. But indoors, the steakhouse is very sophisticated - looking every minute a posh nobby eatery one would find in the city environ. A note has been made to return to this, and the George IV pub by the two venturing to this divine place. Return custom here is guaranteed.

title: Great food and service
comment: We love this restaurant, we certainly think they have the best food and service in Chiswick. The atmosphere is super cool , the food is great and the staff , and manager are more than helpful and cheerful. So if you don’t know where to have a great dinner amd time in Chiswick, just head to Buenos Aires Steakhouse with no doubt!

title: Amazing steak, very professional staff
comment: We went for Friday dinner and drinks and we are so happy with our choice! Very pleasant environment, staff is so proffesional and service to the point that you feel appreciated to be there, and the food... Just amazing. Steaks are mouthwatering, sides and starters help complete an overall great experience. Cocktails are very refreshing, a nice alternative to the good variety of wines available. Definitely going again, definitely recommending to meat eaters!!!

title: Steakalicious
comment: An amazing atmosphere from the moment you walk in. Outstanding service from beginning to end! Our starters were gorgeous and i could quite easily have eaten 2 of them just because they were so delish. The main event was obviously the steak! I have eaten many in many parts of the world and this was pure melt in the mouth delectableness! 100% book up and go...i am going to make the trip back to Chiswick just to go here again!

title: Great food, great service
comment: Dined in with friends who were visiting from overseas. Service was efficient, friendly and professional, providing great menu advice. Starters came quickly and were well portioned and tasty. And when mains came, well, there were no empty plates left at the end of the meal. Suffice to say there was no room for dessert. Overall, we had a great meal and would consider returning if in the area and can recommend.

title: Good lunch experience even with 2 children
comment: Great beef, lovely empanadas and delicious dulce de leche deserts. The staff is cordial and the ambient is good.

title: Nice dinner and stakes
comment: We had visited 6 persons this steakhouse for dinner, everything was really good, especially the service, waiter explained everything about their menu and was really friendly. Will visit again.

title: Lovely evening
comment: It was our son’s 18th birthday recently  Food was amazing  Staff were very attentive  Everything was cooked as ordered  Nothing to great for them to do  Even a slice of cake with a candle on top  Perfect evening

title: Great food & service
comment: Attentive & efficient service, great tasting authentic food, nice ambiance. Would recommend and return again.

title: Tuesday night slice of South America
comment: Now I know I was In Chiswick not Buenos Aires but this gem of a steakhouse is fantastic. Beautifully sized portions too. I liked the fact there were 3 different sizes of steak (rib eye for us both) and the meat was well seasoned (as it truly should be gaucho style). The starters were large and you can choose carbs or salad to accompany your meat. The waiters were fantastic and the decor was in a “barn style”. The restaurant had a casual vibe for a Tuesday night but I would not hesitate to come here for a special occasion either as the food was of such a high standard!

title: Perfect meat
comment: Their meat from Argentina is simply perfect, the personnel is very nice and taking good care of customers. I really recommend to go there if you want to enjoy a very good stake house. Starters and desserts are very good as well

title: They know how to cook a steak!
comment: A couple of nights in London found us staying in the area. Bueno Aires popped up on Trip Advisor. Steak is our fave dinner so we turned up. Only 1 table available suggested it would be good....and it was. They apologised for taking 10mins to take our food order....we couldn’t see it was a problem. We had drinks served and time to choose dinner.  We chose empanadas and the black pudding as starters....both were great, but the cheese & ham empanadas were particularly delicious.  We both chose a rib eye steak for main. It was one of the best steaks I’ve had. Cooked to perfection and totally delicious, no sauce or extra seasoning needed. Perfect cooking. Very nicely dressed mixed salad to compliment. Absolutely cracking meal, lovely, friendly staff. Wish we had this restaurant near us at home! Wholeheartedly recommend.

title: Midweek steak
comment: Fantastically cooked steaks. Worth considering a sharing platter to sample each of the steaks on offer - all are worth trying.

title: Breakfast was incredible
comment: I was searching for somewhere a little bit different for breakfast, not your usual fry-up, came across this place and saw the menu and straight away knew it was for me. Steak and Eggs for breakfast is always a winner, the steak was cooked perfectly, the coffee was some of the best I've had in a long time and the service was brilliant. The server was attentive and keen the assist without being over-bearing at all. As far as value for money goes, it's up there with the best of them.

title: Still a good place to return to!
comment: I've been here a number of time: still a great place for a good steak. The menu covers a fair bit of ground, but at the end of the day you come here for the steak... friendly service too, so little to complain about.

title: Oustanding experience
comment: Oustanding experience. This is the fifth time I come to this steakhouse within a month, I consider myself a regular customer. Service is great, food is awesome! Some people already remember me and call me by name and their price is quite fair, nonetheless there are weekly discounts now which is a good plus for savers. Overall I think it’s the best steakhouse in the area, highly recommended!

title: Great value steakhouse
comment: If you go at lunchtime you might be able to get their 10 pounds meal, which includes a steak, fries and salad.

title: Amazing everything
comment: Wonderful steaks, amazing deserts, all served by lovely friendly happy staff. My husband and I go there regularly and the standard is always the same (very high).

title: Fantastic meal
comment: Fantastic meal with friends good service and atmosphere the restaurant was alive good menu choices and the selection of wine was superb the steaks was outstanding

title: Wow!!!!
comment: Got to say I'm a bit reluctant to tell you that this place is as good as it is in case I can't get a table again!! Superb welcome from the moment we approached the front door to the moment we left. Cannot fault the food.....delicious steaks (massive choice of cuts/sizes) tender moist chicken and all that after wonderful starters of calamari, chorizo and others. Well worth a visit. Clearly very popular as busy from when we arrived (19:30) to leaving (22:00). Book early to avoid disappointment.

title: Great evening out!
comment: What can I say? Good food, good environment, good service. Highly recommend. Steaks are so good and the garlic prawns fantastic

title: FANTASTIC!!!!
comment: Went for the first time with my other half (who is a steak connoisseur) and absolutely loved it! I’m fairly new at proper steaks (and quite picky to be honest), so I was very impressed with the fact that our waiter (Radwane) listened to my complicated description of “how I like my steak”. And omg my fillet was MELTING in my mouth, so good - we will definitely be regulars! My parter also was very impressed with the quality of meat, service and how welcome we felt the moment we walked in. The price is nearly half comparing to most famous steak restaurants in london, so YES 100%

title: Far too Much Salt
comment: We went for a meal and were sadly disappointed. The steak was covered in salt and I had to send mine back as I found it inedible, by the time they served a new steak my husband had finished his, not really an ideal situation. The manager handled the situation reasonably well, but suggested I mention I don't like too much salt when ordering, I have never really had too many problems in the past, but I am getting increasingly fed up with restaurants that cook or cover (prior to serving) food in too much salt.  My other comment would be the restaurant was terribly dark and reading the menu was impossible without using the torch on our phones!!

title: Pretty good service
comment: Was my first time in England and went to this place, it's awesome, the food is delicious and the service from guys there is perfect, there are really nice girls from spain and argentina, also I want to thank to RADWANE, he was so nice in my stay there. Saludos de Mexico pronto estaremos por alla RADWANE somo los business men !!!

title: Lovely birthday meal and great value!
comment: We went here for my mums birthday and they gave her a free glass of Prosecco which I thought was a lovely touch. The staff were attentive but not overly so which I like. The food was delicious and generous and the bill was surprisingly good value as they had 50% off drinks when we visited. All in all really very good, we have a lovely birthday meal and we will be revisiting and recommending!

title: Passing through
comment: Initially we had intended for a change to try Cotes next door but were put off by the table , attitude and proposed table wait came instead back to here for a very quick bite, no reservation obviously restaurant was busy as always. It was pointed out to us that we could have a different table but that it was reserved in an hour time, explained that we were just after a quick meal so they happy set a table up for us. We had the pleasure of the brilliant Radwan who as always had brilliant suggestions of what to order, plus a very charming old fashioned world approach of suggesting a drink to the wife with the caveat that if she did not like the drink she did not have to pay for it, trivial I know but the courtesy, consideration and manners displayed puts many a five star restaurant to shame. Lovely food again , excellent service great time, good value yet again. A special thanks and mention to Radwan who treated and greeted us like old friends after a period of about six months absence. Although this is a chain restaurant, his attention and engagement to customers in my opinion is exceptional and is another reason to be return customer

title: Fab night out!
comment: Staff were great, food and wine was excellent, recommendations were made and we even were able to try a tipple or two to find our ideal....Will go again.

title: Fantastic 30th birthday lunch
comment: I booked Buenos Aires Chiswick on the 7th April for lunch with 20 of my friends to celebrate my 30th birthday. We had a private room which was fantastic and gave us plenty of space and privacy. With so many orders it would have been easy for things to be missed or the quality to drop, but this was not the case at all. All the food was cooked exactly to order and was absolutely delicious. They also took note of where everyone was sitting which made service and paying the bill at the end seamless.  Thank you so much to every one on the team for looking after us so well. Buenos Aires is without doubt one of the best restaurants in the Chiswick area.

title: Very good food to match very good service
comment: What a lovely experience, great food, great atmosphere and a willingness to share the type of Olives and wine they were selling. Loved everything about this place particularly the staff.

title: So good on the Friday we tried to book again for the Saturday
comment: Excellent menu, friendly & professional staff. Very relaxed atmosphere and the food simply divine. We both had Argentine spiral cut ribeye - delicious and cooked to perfection. Our lovely waiter recommended a Malbec to accompany it. It was a perfect match.  After a short break I decided to tackle the pudding menu. Spoilt for choice I went on the recommendation of our waiter and had Chocolate Churrors. I was not happy that my other half decided he wanted to try them. I wanted them all for me and if I’d elastic waisted trousers on I may have gone for seconds Visit Buenos Airies you will not be disappointed.

title: Fantastic birthday meal!! Value for money
comment: Location was great as very near to Turnham Green station and the bus stop. The waiters and waitresses are fantastic!!! We were served by Franca (sorry if that’s wrong) and she was so lovely and bubbly that it made you feel welcome straight away. As I said on the booking form that it was my birthday me and my boyfriend were given a free glass of prosecco to start off which was lovely and unexpected. The food was fantastic!! Couldn’t fault it. It was so tasty!! We had the calamari to start which was yummy and I had the sirloin steak 8oz which was enough and was soooo tasty!! Nicely seasoned and so tender! I like my steak medium so it was still juicy. Just the way I like it! For dessert I ordered the churros which was YUM! When our waitress gave them to us there was a candle on top of the ice cream and she sung me happy birthday which was lovely! I would def recommend for bday meals and date nights as it was a very romantic vibe too. We were seated upstairs which was so nice as it was more private and nicely lit. Downstairs looked really nice too but if it was for a date night I would suggest sitting upstairs. Fantastic experience and I will definitely be back. Great value for what you get and how well cooked and the great service that you get.

title: Ask Redouan as a waiter, you won't be disappointed!
comment: I found the restaurant through an online research about restaurant in Chiswick. We all wanted to have a steak as dinner and decided that, that place sounded amazing. Upon arrival, we were quickly welcomed by Redouan. We were all very amazed at the fact that he spoke French. Although English would have been fine, it is always appreciated to speak your mother language when being away. Redouan led us to a table for a party of four. As we were taking a long time to decide and order, he didn't hesitate and quickly advised us on what to take. He explained in very simple words and in his perfect French what every meat was. For each meat, there is an advised baking. We followed his advice, and took the meats with the desired baking. Throughout the whole evening, Redouan was helpful and always asking if everything was okay. He wasn't invasive at all, he just made sure everyone had what he expected and enjoyed it so far. What made it a TOP experience for us, is to see that even in London a warm welcome in French is possible. The next day, we decided to go again and had the same amazing experience with Redouan. Pelase, if you decide to eat there, don't even hesitate to ask for Redouan, he is one of a kind and will make sure everything is okay all along the evening.

title: Good place to meat . . .
comment: Visited for early dinner (for two), at 4:30 No diners, so excellent service . . Good menu Chose the 'steak' sampler, at £23.95 EACH. A dish comprising four different steaks - fillet, sirloin, rump and rib-eye, with either salad or fries/thick-cut chips. It's a sharing dish so be sure you both want the meat cooked the same way. DELICIOUS. Really different. I typically go for fillet but here the rump was best by far. So full of flavour and succulent. Plus peppercorn and mushroom sauces (£1.95 each) Steak has never tasted so good! Portions are generous; we took home a doggy-bag At peak times understand it's very busy, so booking is advisable . .

title: Birthday surprise meal
comment: Was surprised by my husband for my birthday and the staff were excellent, food came out quick and tasted fantastic will definitely be making another visit soon.

title: Good vibes
comment: Wonderful food, good service by friendly staff and a very chilled vibe. Would certainly recommend and visit again

title: Amazing sharing platter
comment: Had the steaks sharing board and altho it is expensive it’s well worth it. One of the best meals I’ve ever had. Warning the drinks are all doubles so cocktails were very strong lol. Great place for a birthday or special occasion.

title: There’s a Reason This is Our Regular
comment: This has become my family’s regular Sunday lunch spot. Perfect steaks, great setting and wonderful staff. Whether it’s Radwane or one of the others, the service is always exceptional. Couldn’t recommend it more.

title: Good food
comment: As always good food , Sunday night very very busy service was a bit stretched but that was down to the number of customers it seemed that everyone was celebrating a birthday and each time the staff did it with enthusiasm. Plus the staff speak French and Italian fluently

title: Cracking Steaks
comment: Visited the Buenos Aires Argentine Steakhouse for my Son's 19th Birthday.  Amazing Steaks/Food and Great Service. I'm one of those guys who likes  his Steak well done (bordering on cremated) which I'm sure upsets various Chef's  no end. Anyway, listened to the professional advice, explaining that I don't like the sight of blood on my Steak. The helpful chap suggested I try a medium T-Bone and  all of a sudden I have a new go to Steak. Well done is dead, long live Medium.

title: Grandad's 95th
comment: In March, we went as a family (5) for my husband's 37th birthday and we had a wonderful time.  So it was only natural for us to decide to take the rest of the family there for my granddad's 95th birthday. We were 29 in total, ranging from ages 6 months - 95 years old. We had the private dining area upstairs to ourselves and the staff had gone the extra mile by decorating with balloons and confetti on the tables. It was set out as a very lovely sit down dinner with chairs for adults and high chairs for the younger children. The food came out very quickly as we pre-ordered using the spreadsheet sent to us by Juan (the manager).  even though the restaurant was full, we had a very good number of waiters, catering to our needs.We also had extra orders on the day, the staff graciously took them and made them as quick as possible.  Over all a great experience for the whole family and Grandpa who say's it was one to remember.

title: Excellent food and service
comment: Always good service and food is very tasty, we both love this place keep coming back and always very enjoyable. Staff are very friendly

title: Delicious food-friendly team
comment: It is really nice place. Delicious food and friendly staff, especially Giovani. Thanks to him, it was easy to order and we were super happy.

title: Excellent food
comment: Just had our first meal here and it was every bit as good as these reviews suggest. Food and wine excellent, staff attentive and professional, and atmosphere bustling. 3 courses and a bottle of wine came to £40 per head which was reasonable. The only way it could have been better is if they had dimmed the lighting down a touch. Definitely going back.

title: Mr
comment: I just got out from this wonderful restaurant. Astonished to find an Italian restaurant with this quality in Teddington. Professional and friendly service. After having been in Italy several times, I can say that the dishes I have tried today are like a real trip to Italy. Fresh and incredibly tasty products.

title: Fantastic Italian food!
comment: As always, had a very enjoyable meal at La Dolce Vita. The food was excellent - particularly the Frittura di Pesce which we always order! The atmosphere was great for a busy Friday night but despite that the service was very good and we wanted for nothing. We have eaten here a number of times, during the week as well, and regardless of the day, time or size of the party I would highly recommend this restaurant to anyone!

title: An absolute find!
comment: Very welcoming! Warm and attentive service and the best Italian food we have eaten in years, Definitely coming back Thank you guys!

title: Overpriced
comment: Food is good. There’s no denying, but it’s overpriced and the place is cramped. Didn’t feel comfortable in there from the off.

title: Great quality food!
comment: Great quality food, friendly staff and affordable prices! What more can you ask for? Recommend the pizza!

title: The best calamari on earth!
comment: You may think that it's strong statement but I know what I say. Im huge lover of sea food, had calamari in Greece, Italy, Spain, Denmark, The Netherlands etc. I take it always in any restaurant I'm eating. The way how it's served here is top class simply the best! Not only food is amazing, Mauricio the manager and best waiter I ever meet is always there when you need him. Always professional and smily! I'm here today alone as my Italian fiance is having her hen party in my city Gdansk. Mauricio make me feel welcome and wish me all the best in married life. Even that I move out from the area I still love to come back and have a moment of La Dolce Vita! Sweet life and amazing food is coming here together for everybody who eats here. I recommend this place to anyone.

title: Nice Italian
comment: Good menu well prepared by the chef. Fettuccine with pesto and clams were very good and also arancini as starters. Fettuccine with speak and mushroom delicious. Good service in a real family Italian managed restaurant

title: Delicious meal
comment: My wife and I had a thoroughly enjoyable evening here on a Friday evening. We chose the restaurant because of the good reviews on TA and made a short journey to Teddington. We were not disappointed. The restaurant is modern and relaxing decor and the tables far enough apart not to feel packed in. I had the sardines to start which were great. For main I had the special of the day which was sea bass and mash which was delicious. My wife had the pasta which she said was perfect. Looking around most of the others in the restaurant were eating pasta and I was wondering if the pasta was what the restaurant is renown for. My wife said hers was delicious. The white wine Sauvignon Blanc was smooth and reasonably priced. Finally my wife had the tiramisu for desert which she said was to die for. The service was friendly and attentive without being intrusive. The bill came to £70 for two of us which was a little more than I anticipated but with such s lovely meal and evening it was well worth it. Highly recommended.

title: Best pizza in Teddington
comment: If you want to have a real good Italian pizza go to Dolce Vita Margherita was crispy and with good mozzarella; vegetarian pizza quite original; diavola great Good service nice atmosphere

title: The Sweet Life indeed
comment: We had a very enjoyable lunch today at La Dolce Vita which began with a warm welcome from Maurizio who remembered us and our favourite wine (Gavi di Gavi DOCG). We shared a Frittura di Pesce followed by Halibut (exceptionally good) and Ravioli filled with calves' liver which was excellent and such a change from the usual ricotta and spinach. It's a refreshing change from the many chain restaurants to see an interesting and innovative menu and eat food prepared with the best ingredients by chefs who really care.  Highly recommended.

title: Excellent food - great Calzone
comment: Often eat here and it is always great but had a Calozone today that was good enough to prompt me to shout about it on here. Highly recommended.

title: EXCELLENT from start to finish!
comment: Service was excellent from the moment we arrived. My girlfriend was wished a happy birthday by the man on front desk, he then kindly offered to take some pictures of us overhearing us say we should get some pics.  We were shown to our table which was one of the best in the restaurant and within moments given two flutes of Rose Prosecco on the house. Such a kind thoughtful gesture from the restaurant!! They talked us through the menu and advised us where possible. Throughout the meal the service was excellent and Enzo was an absolute legend!! We were a little tipsy so I encouraged my girlfriend to climb up on the saddle which Enzo ran over in a panic to help and steady. Not sure the saddle is meant to be climbed on so we send our apologies to Enzo and the team haha.  Excellent value for money considering we had 4 juicy cuts of steak (ribeye, sirloin, rump and fillet) for £56 in total with sides of chips/fries included and it’s London! The steak is grass fed, incredibly tender, flavoursome and cooked to perfection. We ordered all four cuts medium rare.  Alhambra beer on tap is crisp, refreshing and so easy to drink. Thumbs up!  The churros were simply delightful.    The decor combines a sense of warmth, comfort and casual vibes with enough elegance to host a special occasion.  NEGATIVES: there were none!! but if I’m really picky the double espresso was average in flavour and taste. Slightly over-tamped and harsh bitterness over-pronounced.  OVERALL: I’d certainly return if I’m ever in Chiswick again. Just found out there’s one in Horsham which is nearer me so I’ll be trying that much sooner. EXCELLENT MEAL. Service 10/10 Value for money 10/10 Food 10/10 Decor 9/10 Atmosphere 8.5/10 OVERALL 9.5/10

title: Gorgeous place!
comment: Love the friendly staff, decor is beautiful and food is cooked to perfection. Took my friend here for her birthday and they brought out a cake ( I didn’t even ask them to)! Great location too!

title: Nothing at stake...except fine steaks
comment: Super steaks, good atmosphere and attentive service. One of the best steaks around, highly recommended.

title: Excellent food, lovely staff
comment: My husband and I visited the steakhouse for Father’s Day - whilst I do not eat meat, my husband is a big steak fan and this place certainly delivered even for me. We both really enjoyed our starters of calamari and empanadas followed by steak and chips and king prawn tagliatelle for me which was very nice. The price is reasonable and the staff are so friendly and accommodating, we had our new born with us and they ensured we had a great table with lots of space for the pram. They also gave my husband a bottle of wine on the house as it was his first Father’s Day! So sweet- all these touches matter - we live nearby and will definitely be making this a regular.

title: Amazing
