comment: We went for first time on Saturday and I felt like at home. Amazing food and amazing service by Mr. Enzo, very friendly and professional at same time. I'll come back for sure.

title: Great hospitality!
comment: Very friendly restaurant with great service. They knew it was my son’s birthday so put candles on his dessert. Food was amazing and the manager was very accommodating. Would definitely recommend.

title: Excellent steaks, good service and love the Monday night wine deal
comment: Booked online very simply  Despite it being a Monday night the restaurant was busy and had a good atmosphere. Felt quite authentic in terms of decor  The wine recommended by the waitress was excellent, and not one of the most expensive. All of the food was delicious. Loved the empanadas, the steak selection for two was fab. And now also had the broccoli with chilli which was a nice touch We will definitely be back when we’re next in the area

title: Very very good
comment: Steak cooked to perfection with a decent price and absolutely fantastic service, I thoroughly recommend the ribeye steak done medium with mash and buttered spinach, superb
Fantastic place for couples. Food is 5/5. Quiet inside but relaxing and romantic. The starters are 5/5

title: It was alright.
comment: After our favourite steak restaurant closed down.. We needed to find another and decided on one close to our hotel as opposed to in the centre. We ordered the selection of 4 x 85g of each cut and the amount was great. They needed some seasoning but were cooked to our liking. We complained that both our chips were cold but she bought us one portion and told us to share. My mushroom sauce was cold too. Service was OK. They were busy but could have been better. Its London. It should be expected that its busy.

title: Absolutely Perfect!
comment: Chiswick Resident: Food and service excellent. Absolute quality. Very enjoyable experience from start to finish. Wonderful steak! Try the Spanish Chorizo to start. We will undoubtedly return. Well done.

title: Best Steak
comment: Great nite , greeted with a couple of glasses of bubbly ,as it was our anniversary....sat on a great table and then along came Enzo .....the best waiter ever , , don’t look at the menu , Enzo will know what you want ,and he wasn’t wrong .....stunning steak ......I will be back

title: Good steak
comment: Good food the steak was excellent and good staf. We had a delicious couple diner. we will surely return

title: Great food
comment: The service was prompt and very friendly ! The food was really good and although slightly expensive it was definitely worth the visit- I will be going again!

title: Hidden gem in Chiswick
comment: A surprise discovery in Chiswick. This lovely steakhouse offers excellent quality at affordable prices. We visited the restaurant on Monday so it was a little slow around 2 pm. We opted for 8 oz sirloin steaks, calamari and empanadas. To accompany we ordered a nice bottle if Melbec at a 50% off as it was Monday. For dessert, we had pancake with dolce de leche and ice cream. The total came to 80 pounds. We consider good value and high quality food. Highly recommend.

title: Outstanding experience
comment: Wow wow wow! This is now one of our new favourite restaurants. The service was out of this world and nothing was too much trouble . Our Sicilian waiter made excellent recommendations and was very attentive . Enzo the assistant manager went out of his way to make sure everything was to our liking and added a very personal touch, introducing himself personally.we are real “foodies” and the menu choices are superb and very reasonable in price . We had the mixed grill for two which was cooked to perfection and the starter of grilled aubergine with goats cheese was the best starter I have ever had . Portions were huge and delicious . The ambience inside is wonderful... it is like a tardis ... looks small from the outside but huge inside with upstairs seating too. We really had a wonderful evening overall and can not wait to go back. Definitely worth a visit.

title: Treat time for foodies!
comment: Return visit with friends early afternoon so a bonus as was obviously quiet, would imagine can get busy in the evenings. Group had a selection of starters and then the shared steak platter for two and left it to prepare each cut to his choice. Starters all superb, steaks mindblowing, genuinely the best ever eaten outside of the last time we came here. Waitress perfectly attentive and happy whilst leaving us in peace to enjoy the food, pretty much a case of food sweats after! Restaurant has a lovely atmosphere to it, stylish decor and lighting so you can really relax whilst you eat. Not your average meal out and something to savour when there, would happily revisit again when back in London

title: Best steak in Chiswick and good offers!
comment: If you crave steak: This is your restaurant! As they have a real "parrilla" charcoal grill! I love theri 300 grms cuadril (rump) El Supremo Malbec is a good wine for that beautiful piece of meat and won't break the back at £23. They have great offeres, the mini-rupm and fries (or salad) for only £10 at lunch time.  Mondays is BYO wine! Also there is a day where you get two ain courses for the cost of one!  By the way, it is nice to be recognise and cheerfully greeted when we come in.

title: Fantastic hidden gem
comment: This restaurant was recommended to me by a local patron. My friend and I were not disappointed. The steak was outstanding, the atmosphere was cozy, the wait staff was friendly and helpful, and the overall experience left us happy and eager to return on our next visit to the UK. You cannot go wrong with visiting this restaurant! Definitely worth the time and effort it took to get here.

title: Relaxed, friendly and superb service...
comment: This was our first time to La Dolce Vita and we were very impressed. The service was impeccable and the food was impressive, tasty, well presented and good value.  I can an highly recommend La Dolce Vita for relaxed and memorable evening.

title: Amazing food
comment: Our first time visiting and we were not disappointed, the food was amazing as was the service will be definitely be back again 5 star service

title: A service with a smile and reasonably priced tasty steakhouse.
comment: A great find for a hungry family on a Sunday evening. The service was very friendly and our pleasant server Christina completed the experience perfectly. Not only was the food tasty but also resonably priced. Christina was very helpful and attentive, with a smiley nice attitude.

title: Birthday Meal
comment: We were coming from South Wales and had booked the restaurant for a family birthday meal before going to a concert at Hyde Park. Some of our table were very late arriving due to traffic. The restaurant was fantastic and offered superb customer service.The staff were more than accommodating and the food was absolutely stunning. We will definitely visit in September when we are back again.

title: Wonderful!
comment: What a meal at Beunos Aires Steakhouse! We were in London for 2 nights for Wimbledon and chose this restaurant due to recent reviews online - and were so glad we did :-) The staff are so attentive and it’s made clear that the restaurant definitely thrive on delivering a great service. I have a dairy intolerance..and also vegetarian (we visited this steakhouse for my partner!), so it’s usually a bit of a hassle to find food that caters for me, however the staff here (especially who we assumed was the manager), couldn’t have been more helpful; explaining each dish, sharing the allergy chart with us etc and even modifying dishes so I didn’t have to miss out - you don’t get this level of service very often, so it was much appreciated! My partner is a fan of red wine and left it to the waiter to choose his favourite Malbec, which he thoroughly enjoyed - thank you!  We got the marinated olives and rustic bread selection to start (however the manager brought me out balsamic and olive oil too since I couldn’t have the chimichurri butter), Broccoli courgette and Cannellini bean salad, 9oz ribeye and Malbec sauce, sweet potato fries and my partner had the dulce de leche Argentine cheesecake - looked amazing!! The food was delicious and although we didn’t have space for cocktails, they did look nice at the bar.  Ambience of the restaurant was good - quiet at the beginning (more attentive service though, which was great!), however it did seem to get a touch livelier after 8pm. Thanks again to Beunos Aires for such a lovely start to our weekend in London. We really appreciated the time taken to deliver such a wonderful experience and would love to come back if we visit Chiswick again.  Stephen and Katie x

title: Great steaks and ambience
comment: Highly recommend this restaurant, Great atmosphere and excellent service. Fab food and really helpful waiter. Great place to spend a Saturday evening.

title: Really good churros
comment: Dinner with the family , was great steak, calamari, prawns and desserts . Staff were very friendly and efficient. My daughter thought the dude with the green socks was cool.

title: The best steak night, ever!
comment: We were a couple visiting friends who live locally. Got a great table and were served by Enzo and his team. The steaks were from the sample-of-everything and were cooked to perfection. The meat was allowed to present its own flavours. A whole section in the wine list for Malbec only, fantastic, and our choice didn't disappoint. We were celebrating a 5oth so Enzo presented us with 2 small cakes with candles - perfect finish! We'll be back. John, Eileen, Cliona and Raj

title: My favourite restaurant ever
comment: The friendly, efficient quality of service is always the same. A cosy restaurant where you are always made to feel welcome and part of the family.  The food is absolutely delicious, as well as beautifully presented.  It is my number one Italian restaurant to go to.  Thank you Dolce Vita for making this evening wonderful as always ❤️

title: Fantastic eatery
comment: Amazing service and amazing food! Once you go once you'll want to go again and again- can't fault it!

title: Evening out
comment: Food is excellent and so is the service would go there again has quite a few different dishes and if you like something and not on the menu ask they will try to do it for you

title: A little bit of Italy in the suburbs
comment: We were staying with friends in Teddington, this is their nearest restaurant and close enough to walk to; a good idea considering we drank a lot... First up beef carpaccio with truffle oil and Parmesan shavings, and figs and goats cheese with Palma ham, the latter getting the nod as the prize starter. Our mains were guinea fowl with mushrooms and new potatoes, lamb in red wine sauce, and scallops wrapped in pancetta on a mint pea purée, all well-executed. Bottles of average Italian rose and red washed it all down. Panna cotta and Tiramisu rounded off the meal, with shots of Sambucca offered on the house by the friendly hosts.

title: Top restaurant
comment: Another excellent meal in this lovely restaurant. Food service and atmosphere 10/10. See you very soon!!

title: Amazing food - one of the best meals of my life
comment: The food just tastes incredible! Went for my boyfriends 25th birthday, we were given two glasses of Prosecco upon entry for his birthday which was a nice touch. We shared the rustic bread and the chorizo al malbec to start, which was very tasty. The bread complements the chorizo really well and it’s great to mop up the sauce with after. For the main we had the 100g steak shared platter which comes with each cut of steak and a side of fries. The steak and fries were honestly incredible, some of the best steak I think I’ve ever had, super tender and full of flavour. We had a chimichurri sauce and a peppercorn sauce on the side. The portion size is perfect. Next we had a dessert each, my boyfriend had the chocolate fudge cake and I had the churros, they wrote ‘happy bday’ with chocolate sauce on his plate which was a nice touch. My churros were incredible, I didn’t realise they were chocolate filled so I had a surprise chocolate attack which I thoroughly enjoyed.  The service was quick and the servers were helpful and nice, I think we were served by Enzo.  10/10 I would recommend to anyone for any occasion!

title: Excellent food, service 5 star from start to finish, would deffo recommend.
comment: Excellent place to eat, deffo go back again, good value for money, steaks are fantastic, lemon meringue was awesome, whole experience was faultless.

title: Brendan and Lynda Connolly
comment: We often visit your restaurants this is the 2nd time they tried to charge us full price when there was an offer of 2 for 1 on the main courses when we had 2 starters is this a coincidence?

title: dark atmosphere and poor food
comment: The steak in the salad was VERY well done instead of medium rare as it was promised. The salad leafs contained sand. The sauce was not impressive. The smell inside the restaurant wasnt pleasant. Empanadas were ok.

title: Great food
comment: Lunch menu is great, good value for great quality food. Steak is fantastic and the sandwiches are very big and tasty.

title: Lots of meat!
comment: Great for meat lovers - lots and lots of meat! Don't go if you don't want to eat meat in large quantities!

title: Average Italian Restaurant
comment: We were here a couple of weeks ago for Saturday dinner. The food is good but most of the dishes will be found on any Italian menu. I would suggest to give it a try if passing by. Will probably not rush to come here again. Prices a bit higher than similar restaurants nearby.

title: Great first visit
comment: Excellent small family run italian restaurant. Food was delicious and the service excellent. Although the restaurant was busy we were served quickly by friendly staff. Definitely a "find" and one for our regular night out with friends. Thank you La Dolce Vita.

title: Birthday Dinner
comment: We had a great evening celebrating my fiancé’s birthday. The most fantastic food every time & the birthday boy even got to meet the Chef. Service is second to none - nothing is too much trouble! We were well looked after from start to finish, with a special thanks to Giarda who was just an absolute gem! Amazing evening!

title: Birthday dinner
comment: I was a bit apprehensive before going as it’d been to the Richmond branch about a year prior on a day when they had an offer on and it was underwhelming.  I went to the Chiswick branch for my birthday with my wife and had a completely different experience. The steak was cooked exactly as I ordered and I thought the 11oz option was very reasonably priced for the quality of the steak. Quite a good wine list as well and there were plenty of nice touches along the way. Would certainly go back when fancying a decent steak again.

title: Overpriced and underwhelming
comment: First visit and unlikely to return...ordered the sharing steaks for three...nearly 90 pounds for four fair sized steaks dumped on the table and left to serve ourselves off a plate. Surely someone should be there to serve up/explain/present the food. Standard of the meat was good but hardly an enjoyable experience..disappointing

title: Dont really want to let you in to our little secret...
comment: ...you know when you find a little haven, somewhere which feels instantly homely and welcoming but also provides literally the best goddamn pasta you've ever tasted?! No - nor me, until my wife and I discovered this place. Anniversary night, date night, random any night of the week night, I would come here and have the Fetuccini Funghi with Speck and that Truffle Oil every night of the week. Go with the house red, go with whatever Luca suggests, relax in the knowledge that you're in safe hands, you may find you eat the best Italian food of your life and that actually your date should be the focus of your night... And don't for the love of this place go every week like us, or we might not be able to get a table next time!! Tiramisu for perfect end to the night - not to mention the heavenly starter of lightly fried calamari, shrimp and whitebait...

title: Excellent Steak and great service!
comment: Had a great meal at Buenos Aires Steakhouse in Chiswick. After we ordered the head waiter came back to say that he was not happy with the particular cut we had ordered that day and suggested we order a different cut. This type of honesty is rare and very much appreciated! Very happy with the steaks, the way they were cooked and the outstanding Argentinian wine suggested by the waiter.

title: Perfect & accommodating
comment: Turned up on spec and the Manager was able to fit us in (with a condition we only had 1.5hrs which was fine). Food was excellent, service good and value for money. Steak cooked to perfection. After 3 visits we say it’s the best steakhouse ever!

title: Richard from Yorkshire
comment: Excellent, as always ! Great staff, Great wine and of course great food. I highly recommend this steakhouse to all discerning diners.

title: Good value for lunch
comment: A friend and I went for a special lunch offer, 6oz rump steak and fries for £10.  We both had medium rare and fries and ordered a spinach for a side dish to share.  Steaks were cooking perfectly we asked for and chimichurri sauce was yummy. Don’t like the fries nor Spinach which was far too rich and had more cream than green.  Nice decorated restaurant, but one of the toilet seat is broken.

title: Real delicious Italian food
comment: We found this restaurant by accident when we were looking for a place to meet with my family for lunch, and we'll definitely be visiting again. The food is delicious, the owner was very welcoming and kind and the atmosphere was great. A really nice place to go with family or friends, for a quick pizza or a big Italian meal (big choice from the menu (pasta, fish, meat, pizza). I'll definitely recommend it

title: Steaks were brilliantly cooked, but the outstanding thing were the chips!
comment: Went here with a friend for an early supper. As you would expect the steaks were brilliantly cooked just as requested, but the outstanding thing about this meal were the chips! Crisp on the outside and soft in the middle - best chips I've tasted in a very long time. Service was excellent and the wine was very acceptable. The atmosphere excellent and overall a very pleasant experience.

title: Welcoming and great food and service.
comment: This particular restaurant ha become a real favourite of mine in the past 3 years. It never lets me down, it is always warm and friendly, service is excellent and fabulous food.

title: Excellent for lovely family Friday evening dinner
comment: Popped in managing to book at short notice for an impromptu family celebration. Good feel to the place, a great welcome and service was excellent, without being at all stuffy!  Steaks all round and no shortage of Malbec to choose from so perfect for what we wanted.  Steaks cooked well, good starters for the table and cocktails started the evening well.  Not over formal, and great steaks well cooked.  All round an excellent evening. We’ll head back again.

title: Great food
comment: The food was excellent and the service was good especially after we had to wait longer for our food after circumstances beyond the restaurant's control

title: Great food ambience and service
comment: As above - what more could you want? We went for a birthday celebration and were very well looked after by Enzo who was particularly attentive and amusing with the children.  NB - leave room for desert - truly to die for!

title: Cancelled on the same day as party of 20 due to arrive
comment: Was called less than 2 hours before booking was due to start, to cancel a party of 20 who have travelled across country to be at a family celebration

title: simply amazing
comment: Quiet place, staff friendly, they made a big effort to find us a bigger table, the waiter gave us recommendation and all food was excellent.

title: Great food, atmosphere and service
comment: Very nice evening with great service. The fried calamari and rib-eye were delicious. Enzo‘s recommendations on the steak, red Malbec and dessert were very much appreciated and the friendly and expert service was definitely a plus.

title: Excellent evening
comment: 4 of us dined here last night. From the moment we arrived til leaving a couple of hours later, our dinner and evening was faultless. We shared 4 deleicious entrees, then went on to a range of steaks, sides and sauces all coked to our personal preferances. They were great! Desserts were delcious too. The restaurant was very busy but service was very good. We never seemed to wait too long for anything!

title: Great steaks
comment: 3 of us had dinner here this week after the Sipsmith Tour ( do it). There is a good atmosphere here. We shared a couple of starters, the Chorizo in Malbec was outstanding. We ordered Rib eye and my mate asked for rare. The manager came over to point out, quite rightly that there is fat in a rib eye which does not work well when rare. He changed to a fillet which was excellent. My rib eye had too much fat and was not up to standard as Med Rare, so the manager had it replaced with one that was perfect. 10 out of 10 for service! 1 dessert and a couple of bottles of Malbec made up for an excellent night out. There has been mention here before about the chips at this restaurant.... the praise was not exaggerated... truly superb (I was forced to eat a fresh portion with my second steak)

title: Excellent 10/10
comment: Great food, amazing costumer service. Marian was amazing and really welcoming. We love to going there.

title: great steak and excellent service
comment: this place delivers exactly what you want , a great steak and excellent service what more could you ask for.

title: Good food Great service
comment: We always have a great experience at B.A. in Chiswick. The staff is friendly, smiling and very very pleasant indeed. There was a slight problem with my dessert - this was rectified immediately, along with a lovely conversation with the manager re. the ins and outs of lemon pie making, which was brilliant and enjoyable (think "2 foodies meet"). We'll be back for the next family birthday celebration in November for sure.

title: Good local restaurant
comment: We visit this restaurant from time to time and find it to be very good with a nice ambiance, very attentive staff and good food

title: Mouth watering
comment: We had dinner in a relaxed friendly environment. Our rib eye was mouth watering and the dulce de leche banoffee pie served in a glass was to die for. The wine list looked extensive. Pretty good value too. We will be back!

title: Pleased to have returned
comment: Although my wife and I are not big meat eaters, we're always happy to grab a steak at Buenos Aires as they never let us down, if you're going to eat meat, this is the place to go you won't find anywhere better!

title: Fantastic food and service
comment: A great night had by all. Extensive wine list coupled with excellent food and service. I especially recommend the sharing plates, as all of the steak options are great. Our server, Enzo, was particularly attentive and happy to answer any questions. It was our first time visiting but, living just five minutes down the road, I'll be sure to go again soon.

title: Perfect Steak and Chips
comment: Sometimes you just want a good Steak with Chips to match. Here is a good as any and better than most. Lively atmosphere and friendly staff with a kitchen you can see (always a plus in my book). First time for us but probably not the last.

title: 👍👍👍
comment: Very nice place, good service, booked via googlemaps. Perfect for couples, near tube station.

title: Excellent food, excellent service
comment: I’m so pleased we went to this restaurant! Booked because I’d seen it rated on here, but if you walked down the street you probably wouldn’t notice because the restaurant is set back. The fillet steak was cooked to perfection, the blue cheese sauce was incredible - definitely in my top 5 steaks of all times! The banoffee pie was excellent too. Would definitely recommend to friends and visit again next time I’m in the area!

title: Catered for Funeral
comment: La Dolce Vita is always consistent in its quality  Of food whatever the occasion lunch , dinner Or today as catering for a wake. It was so nice not  To have the usual sausage rolls and sandwiches  And Muritizo always helpful and friendly.

title: Local gem
comment: Delicious food, friendly staff, wonderful atmosphere. My family and I have been going here for lunch and dinner for 3 years and it's always great.

title: Team Dinner
comment: Excellent food and the atmosphere was great. Team was always flexible scheduling wise and accommodated our team of 25 people, even when we had to change the start time at the last minute.

title: Birthday dinner
comment: The food is excellent. We had 2 starters to share. Highly recommended the spinach empanadas. The meat is incredibile. We went for the share meat platter and every piece of meat was to die for.  The best part was the service tho. Because I mentioned was a birthday, they first gave us two glasses of wine and at the end they offered us a cheesecake and two more glasses of red wine. Truly unexpected and very nice

title: Shame About The Rushed Service.
comment: The restaurant could have achieved a perfect score. The food is truly excellent...and until the conclusion of the of the Main Course, it would have been. Sadly, however, it felt very much as though the main objective of the serving staff was simply to get payment for the food and us out of the door. This restaurant advertises that each booking has a two hour limit which is fair. At the end of the Main Course, we had been at our table for 75 minutes. We wanted a little time to allow almost a pound of red meat to digest before ordering dessert. We were approached four times in the space of 10 minutes for our dessert order and encouraged to take our coffee at the same time. Sadly this did impact on our overall view of the restaurant.

title: Very nice place!
comment: Try the ribeye stake, is one of the best I have tasted. The staff is very friendly and the place is cozy.

title: Delicious steak
comment: Taken to this restaurant for dinner by friends. I was surprised how busy the restaurant was. I felt the starters were poor, but the main courses especially the steak were excellent. The deserts ok. Drinks ok.  No champagne ! The staff very kind and friendly. The restaurant is warm and comfortable.

title: Awful fatty sirloin steak in a dark, gloomy roof space
comment: I went here as I was in the mood for a steak and had had a nice meal at their restaurant in Richmond. However, this wasn’t a patch. We were sat upstairs which is the darkest, gloomiest and awful place to be sat. No atmosphere at all and we couldn’t even read the menus as it was so dark. I ordered the 11oz Sirloin which was so full of fat and chewy it was inedible. I should have complained but I did the typical English thing of saying nothing. My girlfriend had the chicken melanase which was actually quite nice. Still it won’t be enough to bother going back again. I very rarely give bad reviews either so it must have been poor.

title: Hidden Gem
comment: Fantastic food, fantastic atmosphere, fantastic service. What more can you ask for?? Absolutely love this place!

title: Excellent food
comment: The only thing that disappoints is the lack of space whilst waiting for your table. We arrived 10 mins early and the only place to wait is in the foyer or tiny bar area with staff trying to get past you. The most important thing though is of course the meal which was absolutely first class.

title: Place to go for a good steak!
comment: I've been going to Buenos Aires in Chiswick for around 2 years now. It is my go to place when I want a nice steak!  Service is always goos as well, the staff is kind and attentive even on busy days. The only downside is that sometimes you have to wait a bit before getting seated even if you have reserved, as from the restaurant you can't properly see the reception so it's not easy to get their attention when the place it's crowded.  It's all worth it though!

title: Excellent Dining Experience
comment: The Chiswick branch of the steakhouse is superb. The staff are wonderful, accommodating and always helpful. I have been very impressed by the quality of the steak and wine available. A truly marvellous dining experience.

title: Birthday
comment: A nice, cozy place, I will return soon. Thanks to the boy who welcomed us and to Enzo who recommended the dessert, a very professional and charming staff. See you soon Cris e Sandra

title: Great steak, gamba's need more spice
comment: Was here on business trip. Great ambiance, service good, the starter was gamba's and they were flat in taste. I think it needed more garlic and spice like chili. The meat was perfect, and that is most important for an Argentinian Steakhouse. Will visit again when in London

title: Really good steak!
comment: Was suggested by a few friends to go to this restaurant, and damn was it good. Can highly recommend the steak, and the wine which was suggested was perfect with the meal.  Despite the entrance being tucked away, the entrance leads to a nicely decorated area with an impressive wine collection on the one wall. Definitely coming back soon!

title: Wonderful Birthday
comment: Amazing place, really well refurbished.  Kind and profesional staff with a note for Enzo: sociable and very helpful.  Thank you guys!!

title: Steak and environment are good but the starters horrible!
comment: The environment of the restaurant is ok, wood and dark lights which create some effect. The meat was great but the starters were bad-worst than the ones in a pub! The calamari overpriced, yet frozen with horrible egg flavour... Service was very kind.

title: Pre Rugby lunch
comment: All 4 of us had again a great time with great service and real home cooked food all at a price that is very reasonable based on the traditional Italian menu. Lemon tart was just the topping to a fantastic meal

title: Superb
comment: Amazing food. Amazing atmosphere. Luca and Maurizio were the cherry on top for a great meal in a fabulous restaurant.. not one of us had anything but great praise for all courses!

title: Pre Rugby lunch
comment: We were looking for a restaurant to meet friends at for lunch prior to heading to Twickenham for the Rugby. What a find! The food was excellent, the service efficient and friendly, especially given how busy the place was. We thoroughly enjoyed the meal, all the dishes were well presented and very tasty. We will be back!!

title: Faultless
comment: How does a restaurant in a nondescript parade of dull shops become this successful? By excelling in service, atmosphere and quality of the food.

title: Good steak and fish
comment: We came for lunch and ordered a rib eye steak and fish. The fish was perfectly cooked and delicious. The steak was ok, maybe just slightly too well done even for a well done steak. The service here is always decent and the manager is attentive. The ambience in the restaurant is also nice. Overall I would reccommend for lunch or dinner.

title: Birthday dinner
comment: My friends and I had an amazing time. The manager was so gracious and kind and the food was really good!

title: They have a mid-price wine
comment: They have a mid-price wine promotion, super great food, incredible desserts and unsurpassed attention

title: A must for any steak lover!
comment: This was my first visit to Buenos Aires and I’ll definitely be going back! Firstly, the restaurant is beautiful. It’s split over two levels, with exposed brick work, and the perfect mood lighting for dinner. It’s the ideal date place! We went at 6pm and I was surprised to see that it was already busy. Now I know why it’s so popular! The staff were so friendly and attentive, giving some great recommendations from the menu. We decided to have 3 starters between the two of us, opting for the chorizo, prawns, and provoleta, which were all delicious. And then for the main event - the steak! We were recommended the 400g rib-eye steak. and just WOW! It was cooked to absolute perfection and it was a really generous size. Any steak lover needs to go here! It’s worth noting that there are plenty of other options if you didn’t want steak, but I wouldn’t highly recommend that you do! We finished the meal with 2 delicious desserts, topped off with an espresso martini. My boyfriend is a self-confessed espresso martini snob and he said it was a great one so that says a lot! Overall, a stylish restaurant with a great ambiance, excellent service, and top quality food!

title: London-Churztrip
comment: Excellent. Good service. Nice beef! Awesome Ambiente. Good wine. Chorizo as a starter was a very little.

title: Husband’s 40th bday meal Buenos Aires steakhouse Chiswick
comment: Excellent experience. Food and drink were great so tasty, atmosphere was warm and fun and waiter was very attentive and made the 40th celebration feel special and was happy to present the cake. Would definitely return!

title: Great steak place
comment: Great steak place Restaurant is very well managed fill welcome atmosphere in addition great selection of meats and good selection of wines.Good service from all personal.

title: Birthday Dinner
comment: Excellent food and service with six people we enjoyed the night! We would visit the restaurant again!

title: Excellent
comment: Great service and atmosphere here - the olives and malbec chorizo were great. The steaks were cooked perfectly. Excellent value compared with some other overpriced steak places I wont mention

title: Great and lovely
comment: Great food and service. 5 star   I will recommend for friends and family night out Work christmas do- half great fun and really enjoyable moment Mwah

title: Mr Best
comment: Fabulous evening with great food and great staff. Food was on point, cooked to perfection and we were very well looked after. Juan was particularly welcoming and made our evening that bit extra special. Thank you and we look forward to returning. Paul

title: Mr simpson
comment: Fantastic meal and service. Very welcoming and the staff team couldn’t do more to accommodate us. The whole meal was excellent and I would highly recommend the steak which was cooked perfectly. I would definitely return to the restaurant. Thank you to the whole team for a brilliant meal and evening out.

title: Xmas do
comment: Booked here for our Xmas party. Food and service was excellent, especially Juan who went the extra mile to ensure all our parties needs were met. I would definitely recommend this place to friends and family. Thank you for a great evening! I will return.

title: Cozy
comment: Lovely environment to have a professional meeting or a lunch date. Waitress care about you and the food is AMAzING

title: Service from entering was
comment: Service from entering was perfect, food (steak) was what it should be. We ordered a sampler for 2 was perfect. Wine was a little expensive but was superb. We also had our 5 year old with us, no issues with this. I would return when I am in the area again.

title: Great Dining Experience
comment: At La Dolce Vita it was a memorable Dining Experience where I spent a great evening with my family started with a Kind welcome by the Owner. A large choice in the food menu let us appreciate the tipical fresh italian taste we were looking for and found! Compliments to The chef. The service was also Very accurate and professional. We all spent our time nicely with the promise to come back soon. Unforgettable evening! Thank you!!

title: Great place and high standard coffee
comment: Fantastic place and a nice garden. Great place to take a break and nice ambience. Hospitality is simply fabulous

title: Satisfied
comment: Starters were Not as expected but main course was delicious. Drinks were good. Service provided excellent and taken care of customer

title: excellent
comment: a very good welcome a very good meal thank you to the cook a restaurant has mostly not missed I recommend it to you

title: Lovely staff!
comment: Visited with family for my nephew’s birthday. Staff were attentive and accommodating. Steak sampler was tasty, wine delicious. Overall great experience and recommend for families particularly.

title: Perfect Steak
comment: Fantastic meal from start to finish. A very warm welcome from friendly and attentive staff. Could not fault the service throughout. The food was amazing along with the Gin cocktails and beautiful wine. I can highly recommend their Argentinian Gin. This was truly an enjoyable visit and experience. One of the best Steaks I've ever had.

title: THE best steak restaurant....really!
comment: This was my second visit to the restaurant and like the first time, everything was excellent, from the welcome as we arrived, all the way to the end of the meal. We were a family of 4, celebrating a birthday and received a complementary glass of Prosecco to start off our evening. The waiting staff were attentive and kind, especially when one of us (!) spilled most of the peppercorn sauce on the table - they cleaned it up and replaced it without fuss and without us asking for a replacement.  For starters, we had calamari, olives, patatas bravas and provoleta Argentina (a typical Argentine starter) - all were tasty and arrived at the right moment.  For our main course, we each had a 9oz steak, rib-eye and sirloin, cooked medium rare - they were perfect!! The meat was so soft, moist and flavoursome. I have not experienced steak like it since we bought steak directly from a beef farmer and that was the best steak I have ever eaten. This runs a close second!  Of course we made space for dessert - we had to since we were celebrating a birthday! And it arrived complete with a candle. Between us we had a variety of cheesecakes and a chocolate fudge cake.  A perfect end to a fabulous meal.  I highly (highly!) recommend this restaurant.  If you like steak, then this is the only place to go.

title: Great birthday lunch!
comment: We spent a lovely birthday lunch this last Tuesday at Buenos Aires, we went there after read the reviews and we were not disappointed. We had a great lunch thanks to the amazing Radwane who did everything to make me feel special. He greeted us with a prosecco and show us our table, explained us the menu and wines. The food was delicious, the empanadas really tasty and all beef from Argentine of course. We took the plate to share, where you can taste all 4 steak cuts, delicious!, the wine was also really good, recommend it by Radwane. We didn't have time for the dessert but he still found a way to give me a little cake with a candle, such a nice touch! We are definitely coming back, this is a lovely restaurant with great food and amazing staff.

title: Dinner
comment: Food was excellent and service was great-we will be back!it was a birthday celebration and starter mains and pudding lovely-had the mango cheesecake for pudding!divine

title: Amazing food and service
comment: I enjoyed my 30th birthday at the restaurant and the food was really good as well as the service. I would recommend to anyone

title: Good food, good atmosphere, friendly service
comment: Good venue with a relaxed atmosphere for a night out with friends. The staff are friendly and are always so welcoming, it’s so relaxing it’s like being in your dining room, but better, as there’s good food, wine in a nice welcoming atmosphere.

title: Fantastic service and food
comment: We went there st 10.55p.m. on 7th February and they made us feel very welcome even though they were closing at 11p.m. Went back tonight and were remembered by the staff even though they were busy. We cannot recommend it highly enough.

title: A real gem hidden in Chiswick!
comment: A real gem hidden in Chiswick! The steaks; the burgers; the chorizos and the cheese cake with dulce de leche were all excellent ! Service was great and so was the wine selection  A superb place !

title: Delicious
comment: Lovely restaurant,cosey and warm. Steaks are fantastic. Right beside Turnham Green metro station,very easy to get to. Will definitely go back.

title: A surprise, hidden away in plain sight
comment: Provided you don't mind being crammed in (there were seven of us squeezed into a table for six, very little leg room, constantly bumping into the backs of chairs on the next table), this is a gem. A hidden gem, hiding in plain sight in the middle of this residential street in Teddington. La Dolce Vita is probably best visited on one of those handfuls of warm evenings you get in the UK, because the nicest area (although then you also get smokers at the next table) is out back, right through the restaurant. Anyway, the main reason for coming out to eat is the food. And this food is good. No getting away from it, it's quality nosh, well presented, accompanied by good wine. We ended up paying just under £50 a head for starter, main course, pud and wine, which - these days - is acceptable for this level of quality. My sea bass was lovely; served on a big whoosh of mash. The starter of whitebait and prawns and calamari, lightly battered with tartare, was very good too. Other options include pizza and pasta. Pasta dishes are hearty, and cost between £12 and £14. So although it's not cheap, it's good value. Just don't imagine you'll get much elbow room, or space to push back your chair! But don't let that deter you.

title: Fanastic Meal
comment: Great family restaurant with authentic Italian food and excellent service. Look forward to our next visit.

title: Delightful dining and very gluten free freindly
comment: For Italian cuisine at its best this is the place to eat. For Gluten free options then look no further as nothing was too much bother and most dishes could be tailored for the gluten free diet.

title: Very friendly steak joint
comment: It was our first time at this restaurant and the waiting staff were very friendly. It was my birthday and I received a glass of bubbly. The steaks were delicious; we were there on a Tuesday evening and were offered one of our dishes for free and so the price was very reasonable.

title: 5stars
comment: I ve been to this steak restaurant many times and always the best service and the excellent food . The meat is the best meat I ve ever eaten, they are doing a great job. CONGRATS for the chefs and all the team. Many thanks.

title: Great steak
comment: This place does great steak and has a large range of Argentinian wines to try. I have eaten here a few times and have knocked one star off due to the fact that the table we had this time was right next to the bar and half way through the meal a group of men chose to sit on the bar stools meaning I had someone’s bottom inches away from my face while eating my dinner. Will make sure I get a different table next time.

title: Great evening
comment: We came for a family meal for my daughter's 18th birthday. The restaurant gave us a great table in the booth next to the bar and also gave my daughter glass of bubbly on arrival - nice touch. The meal was really good (this is a local to us and we have been several times before, consistently good food) and service was good too. We really like the atmosphere of this place and it always seems busy. For dessert they also brought a chocolate cake with a candle and happy birthday written on the plate - another nice touch. Thank you for a lovely evening!

title: Outstanding food and service
comment: It was my partners birthday, they made sure he had a superb time. I’m vegan and I had a perfect salad! Thank you for making it all 5 star!!!

title: Super friendly service simply delicious food
comment: Have been here before and popped in again recently and was still recognised by the manager. We were upstairs in the gallery which is a bit quieter and cosier. The staff were really on it. Very friendly and attentive though our waitress could’ve been a bit more knowledgable on the wine ! But it’s ok we experimented with an Argentine Merlot since I am not a fan of Malbec. It was sublime. In fact the wine selection is good especially mind you if you like Malbec ! As for the meat and food generally - why bother with Gaucho ? The empanadas were home made and generous and full of flavour. And the steak was sublime. Beautifully tender and each cut a little different. We had a very lovely dinner. We will be back !

title: Super attentive service
comment: Great food, great and super attentive service. We were there as a family of five for a kids birhtday. Radwane made sure we had an unforgettable evening and had good recommendations for us.

title: Pleasant coffee break
comment: I regularly pop in for my coffee and lunch breaks and today I was really pleased to see the new seating area by the shop windows. In fact, it’s now possible to enjoy the tasty food and good coffee directly facing the High Street. The combination of the food quality, nice service and the improved comfort really makes this place a special one in the area.

title: Amazing food and great service
comment: Fantastic food and great service, they, been take pride in serving customers, very friendly staff, fresh apple juice is great.Coffees are also v good.Been a regular visitor

title: Excellent reasonably priced cafe in Beckenham
comment: Always worth a visit this cafe is close to where I work so I have used many times. Good food, coffee and hot chocolate (very tasty). They will happily suggest variations when ordering takeaway sandwiches, wraps & ciabattas. They do a really yummy wrap with falafel and salsa, try it!

title: Best coffe and breakfast 👌🏼⭐️
comment: Really great coffe shop every type and served with smile muffins cakes and pastries are very delicious Flat white and hot chocolate the best! ☕️☕️  I wish I lived closer so I could visit here all the time !  Thanks for beautiful and nice morning☺️

title: very nice owner and staff , reasonable food and coffee price , clean area .
comment: I will recommend people to visit this coffee shop and I going to give 5 star. The only problem is parking spaces .

title: Rendez Vous Caffe - We are open for takeaway
comment: Rendez Vous is open for takeaway and it's great to see them open again! They have delicious fresh food for breakfast and lunch, amazing coffee, smoothies and fabulous cake. Go and try it!

title: brilliant Thai restaurant
comment: Saw the good reviews, and booked for a post-cinema dinner. We were not disappointed, in fact the restaurant was even better than we'd expected. Truly one of the best Thai restaurants I've been to in London (where I live) ; I have also visited Thailand several times on business and found this local Barnes place to be seemingly quite authentic. It was crowded, but the service was faultless and friendly, and helpful with advice when we asked. The food was tasty and sufficient; the recommended wine complemented the food and the price was modest. If I lived nearer, I'd be going there very often.

title: Very good food
comment: The food was very good and the staff are very friendly. Thai fish cakes are extremely tasty and the steak was excellent.

title: Birthday neal
comment: Great place to eat. Staff really friendly and couldn’t do enough. Food excellent and reasonably priced. Glad we booked. Even on a Monday night the place was full. Would definitely visit again.

title: Fantastic food with friendly service
comment: Had a great meal here at this local Barnes Thai resto. The Som Tam and Penang chicken were excellent and the young kids loved the Satay. We’ll be back here again!

title: Beautiful food and lovely service
comment: I’ve visited here twice this restaurant twice now and it has been fantastic each time. The food is great. I can recommend the salad rolls and prawn red curry which is divine.

title: Friendly staff, good food, good portions
comment: So why not five stars? Everything was was very pleasant in this busy and popular Thai restaurant. The staff managed to fit us in (book!) and were very efficient in bringing out our dishes, albeit not at the same time.  I thought the food was good but just lacking in that extra something that would merit five stars. It was (and I’m being a bit unkind here) as if we were eating really good takeaway fare. The taste wasn’t quite there but it was close.  The other guests seemed to enjoy their culinary experiences rather more than I did, having said that. I’m just not one for the bland.

title: First problem in years!
comment: First problem in years We usually go there every week and have loved the food and reasonable pricing, as well as excellent service. However 3 days ago we both dined on the spicy beef marinated fillets and we both got stomach upsets, my wife vomiting several times.  This has never happened before but we hope the restaurant will take this seriously and reviews possible causes.

title: Best Thai I’ve had in London.
comment: Best Thai I’ve had in London. Authentic ingredients, everything was incredibly fresh and perfectly cooked. Bravo!

title: Family Dinner 2020
comment: We have just finished our first family dinner of this year. Great food, very tasty. Thank you for prawn crackers.

title: Excellent food, Excellent Service and Kind Staff
comment: My title explains it all. The food is delicious and comes fast. The staff are extremely kind and the service is great. Hard to fault this place.

title: Really lovely service!
comment: Really lovely service and the food is amazing, the only curry house we go to in Chingford! Cant wait to be back 10/10

title: Birthday bhajis
comment: I've lived in Chingford for 37 years and can't believe I hadn't been here before! We tried it for the first time a week ago, and loved it..Well we are now their new regulars! ...(and that is a Biggie for us who have only ever eaten at the same Indian restaurant all these years) The food is delicious, the restaurant is attractive and the service is wonderful, yesterday was my birthday and boy did they make me feel special, so lovely especially in these difficult times interacting with staff. Thank you all see you soon ️

title: Prawn madras top bins, not
comment: Prawn madras top bins, not a better ruby Murray in chingers. shout out to the geeza Kahn. It was fantastikka, don’t leave in a curry. Big joey C

title: Excellent food and service
comment: Have been coming here for years and love it every time! So friendly and the food is great for an amazing price too! Couldn't recommend them enough xx

title: Great restaurant
comment: Amazing service, really fast too. Great food. Came on a Saturday night and I would definitely come back again.

title: Amazing food and amazing service!!!!
comment: Amazing food and amazing service!!!! The food was perfect and came very quick an tasted amazing!! So happy would deffo come again and recommend to other people!!! Xxxx

title: Bek
comment: Excellent service from staff, with good value & exceptional tasting food. Will definitely visit again. You won't be disappointed with this restaurant.

title: Sandy
comment: Lovely food, great service and nice atmosphere. Would definitely recommend this restaurant. Good location

title: Fantastic service - great
comment: Fantastic service - great home cooked traditional Italian food! Unassuming from the outside but delicious food!

title: Great food
comment: Been coming to this restaurant for many years with my family, great service & brilliant food  Thankyou The Green family.

title: Friendly atmosphere and excellent food
comment: i had the arancini followed by the speck fettucini, both were fantastic. Partner had prawns to start and the wild boar ragu which i would have also gladly had myself.  Good value for lovely italian food and friendly waiter. Garden was nice as i had a peek for next time.

title: Amazing quality Italian food
comment: Very good portions and truly Italian dishes. I had a cannelloni and my friend a lasagna. The waiter was very friendly and professional. The food is priced on the higher end of the spectrum of Italian food in the Middlesex area but it’s worth the money.

title: Wonderful evening
comment: Having been recommended this wonderful restaurant we were not disappointed. Fantastic food in a very relaxed atmosphere. We will definitely return in the future for another taste of Italy in SW London.

title: Birthday celebration
comment: Food was the absolute best. The seafood pasta dish was really yummy but the pizza also got a good vote. Lovely vibe and excellent service.

title: Lovely friendly dining experience
comment: During what is for all a stressful time it was lovely to dine in this happy environment - very attentive and lovely food

title: Always amazing
comment: Having held my wedding reception here we returned tonight for our anniversary and as usually the food was amazing! The service is always phenomenal and although I always forget to ask the servers name he is the best waiter We have ever met with our combined 15 years in the hospitality industry. I cannot recommend this restaurant enough. Thanks you bot a wonderful evening

title: 2nd visit - loved it
comment: It’s our second visit and about a 25 minute drive from us and it’s worth it. We visited Saturday lunchtime and sat in the outside courtyard. It’s pretty and secluded. We shared a bottle of house wine and garlic cheese pizza bread. The pizza base was lovely and fresh. I had the wild boar parpardelle and my husband had the lasagne both were delicious and big portions. We followed with Italian coffees and shared the special lemon tart which was tremendous. The service is great and it was nice to be remembered from our 1st visit. We loved it and will be back.

title: Excellence & Authenticity
comment: A very Italian affair. Great, authentic food and wine, charming, friendly and flexible service. Would happily return. Would be great to have more gluten free options other then Fusili!

title: Gharki yaad
comment: absolutely awesome food and generoud portion size. Chicken lollipop and Gobhi 65 is my abso fav. never disappoints. Maniji's food reminds me of proper Indian Dining taste. so very authentic.

title: Delicious food
comment: I was looking for a local restaurant with good reviews and obviously your reviews were good, so good I did think you may have written them yourselves but on ordering a takeaway this evening I have to say it was the best food I have eaten in a long time.  I lived in India for some years and these authentic flavours take me back.  I may expect this quality in Knightsbridge but you have excelled, Orpington is fortunate to have such a chef.  I don't usually write reviews but felt in this case it was necessary.  I will be back again, I usually stick to the same dish each time however I can't wait to try some different dishes.

title: Lovely meal
comment: I went to Citi Kitchen last night with my boyfriend and it was amazing!!!!! We had starters and mains and ate most of it ( only because we could not eat anymore) The service was lovely!!!!! 5* all round!

title: Value for money
comment: Mani is providing excellent food in Orpington citi kitchen.we have odered food from here multiple occasions and he has never disappointed us. Recently tasted his Diwali vegetarian menu which we have enjoyed thoroughly. Jackfruit biryani and pahadi daal is really great and different. Hope to get same taste and service in future. Thanks

title: Diwali Menu
comment: Diwali special meu was awesome. It really was authentic Indian food and reminds me of the food we had in India during Diwali celebrations. Spicy levels are absolute perfect to the taste. Also, it is COVID friendly takeaway.

title: Excellent and authentic indian flavors
comment: We ordered 5 different dishes for takeaway. The delivery was very prompt. The food quality was authentic and the portion size was good for sharing. The spice level was most appropriate. Would highly recommend lamb bhuna sharabi - absolutely delicious.

title: Delicious, authentic Indian food!
comment: We absolutely adore Indian food and over the years, we have had many, many Indian take-aways but can honestly say this is one of the most tasty, authentic and delicious meals we have had. The quality of the ingredients, the amazing tastes, and very good portions are by far the best. Would highly recommend.

title: Absolutely love their food
comment: I absolutely love their food and have no qualm in recommending it. I've had takeaway from the restaurant a number of times and have never been disappointed.  100 % authentic North Indian food, and generous portions. You get what you order, and a fusion of recipes. Very friendly staff

title: Fantastic Food! A new found favourite!
comment: My family and I live in the Chislehurst area, and are often looking for new takeaway/delivery restaurants to try. It’s often difficult in the area to find quality Indian cuisine at good value for money. The Citi Kitchen does just that! The food was fantastic the first time we ordered, and we decided to order from them again the following week, and once again the quality did not disappoint! The family really like it here as the menu has a wide range of dishes to choose from, both Traditional Indian as well as some Pan-Asian dishes. This is our new favourite spot for takeaways and definitely deserves 5 stars. We’ll keep coming back here as the prices are very reasonable. ⭐️ Great quality food ⭐️ Wide range of dishes ⭐️ Friendly customer service ⭐️ Large portion sizes ⭐️ Fantastic value  Many thanks again. Hannah

title: Lovely food and generous portions.
comment: After reading on Trip Advisor that they are the number 1 Indian restaurant in Orpington. We thought we’d give it a try and since then it’s been our go to place for Indian food. Generous portions and quality ingredients. Would definitely recommend.

title: A Wonderful taste of the East
comment: My friend and I hadn't spent time with each other for a while, so we decided to go to Madhu's, this turned out to be worth it. The meal was fresh, tasty and absolutely delicious. The spices were expertly blended.  The wine was warm, refreshing and full bodied. The colours and aromas of the dishes reminded me of an exhibition in a flower show; simply GOD Inspired!!! Now, to top all this up was Punam. She was more than we could have asked for in a waitress. Warm, polite, swift, efficient, very informed as to the dishes and extremely professional...She was a dream!!!  Thank you Punam, for making our evening out, more than just a meal.

title: Great authentic Indian restaurant!
comment: Although I am not too fond of hotel restaurants (especially chain hotels), I went as I was craving Indian food... and boy was I glad I did so.  The first good sign was, that the night before mostly Indian people came to eat. Secondly all staff is Indian, so this was another proof to me that it must be good and authentic.  The service staff was very very friendly, welcoming and fulfilled every wish I had.  I ordered a bit too much, but the quality of food was so good and delicious that I overate as I liked it a lot.  If you stay at the Sheraton Skyline Heathrow or in the vicinity, make sure you stop by here to eat... I definitely want to come back! Thanks and hopefully until soon :)

title: Delicious Indian food
comment: We had dinner here and were staying in the nearby Marriot hotel. Its a 2 minutes walk from there. We ordered the kebab platter, spicy chicken on bone curry and a punjabi sour yogurt curry with rice and nan. The nan and rumali roti were soft and perfect. The dishes were cooked to perfection and we felt just like we were having at home. They should serve Chaas which goes very well with the punjabi dishes on offer. Altough the prices are on a higher side, its worth it The serving staff was good and hard working  Definitely will head here next time if we are around that area

title: Very very good
comment: This is a really good Indian restaurant. The restaurant is vey luxuriously decorated, deep reds, elegant cutlery and glasses. Wine list reasonable and plenty of options between 20 to 30 pounds. The menu is quite confusing, its not obvious what are starters or man courses. However, we sampled some starters from the grill and the meat dishes were moist and so flavoursome. The curries were some of the best curries i have had. You get free car parking if you are eating there. Loved the place, deserves to be more widely known

title: Quite possible the best Indian in London
comment: Quite possible the best Indian meal I have ever had. Sea bass and prawn dishes are outstanding. 10 out of 10 from me!

title: Best Indian Ever!
comment: We are in our version of Indian Heaven. Our first bottle of Indian wine at the best Indian Restaurant we have ever eaten at in our lives. Punam welcomed us and quickly got us a great table. We had amazing Food, great chutneys and incredible service. This is a must try when in London! I know it’s the airport but Worth It!

title: Excellent quality
comment: With this restaurant being located at the Sheraton hotel, I would not normally have considered Madhu's. However it came highly recommended by a friend. The food is excellent, really top notch. Its more expensive than your average restaurant, but I was happy to pay the premium for the quality of food dished up. The only reason this is not a 5 star review is the service. We were ignored after being sat at our table, and it took 30 mins before we received drinks and placed our food order.Service was less than attentive for the rest of the evening. However, I am hoping this was a one off, as I will certainly be making a return trip, based on the food quality.

title: Expensive
comment: For the price that this place charges, I would have expected a better experience... The tables were wobbly, the left over plates are all stacked on full show to the side of the bar, the restaurant just felt a little messy. There is alot of potential in this place, but they do need to clean it up and sort out some of the issues. This place is not cheap, especially as you can get very good Indian food in restaurants close by. But the set menus are I guess reasonable value for money for a hotel restaurant. Most of the food tasted pretty good and in the set menus you get 4 small starters, 4 small mains and 4 small dessert so you do get to try a wide variety of things. The food isn't spicy (for me this was good) but I probably wouldn't visit again until they sorted the rest of the experience out.

title: Excellent food in great atmosphere
comment: I enjoyed it a lot, The waiter Punam provided excellent service and advice. Good food served aesthetically with nice dishes!

title: Perfect Date Night
comment: Reservation was made online and I got a confirmation on my phone. On arrival we were seated immediately. My steak was perfectly cooked(medium rare) and my wife thought her chicken was excellent. The waiter recommended a very nice Argentinian wine and we left full and contented. This was out third visit.

title: Business Dinner
comment: Booked a business dinner for 7.  First off, the staff greeted us, showed us to our table and took our coats and Immediately we knew this was going to be an excellent dinning experience. The restaurant is spotlessly clean and comfortable. The food was absolutely amazing.  Chicken Tandoori that was succulent and burst with flavor's. Lamb Cutlets that just melted away and Salmon that was just a delight. I highly recommend the Papri Chaat it was an absolute sensation. Then our mains wow. just wow. We had a mix of meat masala dishes accompanied by vegetable and rice dishes. The service from all staff that attended our needs was exceptional. Very well presented in smart uniforms and nothing was at fault.  A special mention to Punam, thank you very much for serving us. Overall an outstanding evening. Thank you Madhus.

title: Amazing
comment: The restaurant is amazing from the delicious starter to the succulent sirloin steaks, great customer service, very friendly and affordable, could not fault.

title: My favourite Chiswick restaurant
comment: There is so much to love about this restaurant. The staff are wonderful, welcoming and helpful, the food is delicious (especially their steaks), very good value and great atmosphere!

title: One of a kind
comment: Located at the end of a narrow alley off Turnham Green Terrace in Chiswick, the Buenos Aires has a unique atmosphere. The floor is of wood, the ceiling is remarkably high (there's a small upstairs seating area, too), and the wall facing you as you enter is decorated with an extraordinary number of wine bottles. So that's all good. But the food is even better. As you might expect in an Argentinian restaurant, the steaks are special. The best (and of course, most expensive) is fillet steak (identified on the menu also by the Spanish name 'lomo'.) No complaints either about the starters, the wine or the sweets. I once had a lemon meringue pie there, and have never tasted better. It's not cheap, but it's excellent value. I doubt that you could eat better anywhere. Give it a try. You won't regret it.

title: OUTSTANDING
comment: What an excellent way to have a first meal back after 4 months or so of Lockdown and no eating out.  The service was impeccable and Juan (front of house/manager) is an asset to the restaurant. What a guy!!! He even remembered us from our last visit a year ago.  We live in Sussex but as we visit London to see friends we often stay in Chiswick and this is officially our favourite restaurant in Chiswick.  The 12oz ribeye steak was succulent, cooked to perfection and all the sides and trimmings were extraordinary. Big fan of the blue cheese salad albeit strong flavours to the tastebuds.  Alhambra is quality draft beer and I only know one other place that serves it and it’s near me in Sussex in a tapas restaurant. It’s crisp, refreshing and a subtle sweetness.  Their risk management of COVID is well thought out and all tables well spaced out with minimal risk if you’re worried about a virus with a <0.3% fatality rate. Plenty of hand sanitizer everywhere and the toilets were super clean: saw staff going in for extra checks and cleaning.  Will 1000% be returning for another meal here.  Food 10/10 Drink 10/10 Value 10/10 Service 10/10 Setting 10/10 OVERALL 10/10

title: amazing steak place
comment: just a really good argentine steak place. Been a few times. Probably my favourite steak place in London. If you are a steak lover i recommend the spiral cut rib eye.

title: Best coffee shop in Beckenham
comment: We have lived in Beckenham for 2 years and this is the only coffee shop we keep returning to. Great staff, great coffee, great food.

title: Brunch
comment: Wonderful atmosphere with brilliant hosts Kate and Sam. They gave free sausage and water to our dog as we sat outside and they took our order. Brilliant fresh juices and great coffee. The kids said the American pancakes were as good as the ones we had in the states this time last year. Highly recommend both service and food.

title: Eggs benedict was excellent,
comment: Eggs benedict was excellent, and the staff are so friendly to everyone, I had an excellent experience and highly recommend this cafe to anyone.

title: Beautiful Almond milk cappuccino
comment: Lovely friendly staff and my favourite coffee in Beckenham. Whenever I order an almond milk cappuccino there is always a beautiful amaretti taste from the almond milk, and the coffee always comes through perfectly. Amazing coffee and service for a good price,

title: Habit-forming!!
comment: Beautiful food! Wonderful staff! It's place that becomes habit-forming. However hard I try to make myself go somewhere else for a change, I nearly always end up at Rendez Vous, Beckenham. And they keep letting me in, which is nice!! Sam and his staff provide wonderful service! Very often, a visit to Rendez Vous is the highlight of my day. Thanks everyone!!

title: Top quality food for a good price
comment: Top quality food for a good price. The cafe has a great atmosphere, with attentive staff and a lovely owner.

title: Our place of choice!
comment: Sam, the owner, is particularly friendly and compliments his business well. We go to "RV" often and absolutely love the coffee! All the staff are welcoming too.

title: Amazing food & amazing service!
comment: Amazing food & amazing service! First time coming here and it didn’t disappoint. The service was very friendly and warming. Seating both inside and outside. The latte was very nice and the breakfast topped it. Went for poached eggs on toast with salmon, mushrooms & spinach and it was lovely. Partner went for the pancakes which also looked really nice. Would certainly be coming again. Thank you for the lovely service.

title: Fantastic food and service
comment: This cafe is absolutely fantastic. Service was polite and efficient. Breakfast was delicious. Felt like an American style brunch. Very impressed!!

title: Excellent food
comment: Great food and friendly service. Always clean and tidy throughout. Very good food portions, and happy to modify from menu to taste, for example Bombay aloo with added cumin. Been a few times and i always recommend to people :)

title: Amazing Food & Customer Service
comment: This is a firm favourite! The food is worth our 40 minute journey and the portions are so value for money. The customer service is absolutely amazing from the first time you step in to your final goodbyes. Everyone is so tentative to your needs and the extras go so far! Thank you to the amazing owner who always makes me and my guests feel so welcomed!

title: 5 stars
comment: Best curry in town. Staff are friendly and they always remember your face. Every time I come they offer complimentary drinks, the food portions and flavours are never a let down.

title: Amazing Food and Service
comment: Amazing food!! The staff are very accommodating and go above and beyond to provide exceptional customer service. Couldn’t fault the food at all! It was AMAZING!!!

title: Amazing food & even more amazing service!
comment: Honestly treated like royalty! Service was incredible! Food was amazing, super tasty! Would 110% recommend, you will not be disappointed!

title: Must try Indian in Chingford
comment: Food, staff and atmosphere is amazing! Best Indian in North Chingford! Staff are so accommodating and the good is so delicious ❤️ Curries can be tailored made too!

title: Amazing! 10/10
comment: I had an amazing experience! 10/10 customer service, 10/10 food, 10/10 vibe! Thank you for a lovely experience Spice Station!

title: Mr Radoslav Velyov
comment: We used to come to this Restaurant at least once a week as we used to work nearby. Now we live around 20 miles away and still come here on every oportynity we have. It is the best Indian Reataurant I know in north east side of London. Food and service is always lovely, delicius. We always get complementary drinks. All staff are so fun to talk to and always so polite! Huge thanks to Mr. Khan for the service.  Deffinately recomend you to everyone!

title: Lovely meal
comment: Excellent service food and staff the food was amazing quality and very tastey! Will definitely come again

title: Outstanding service! Where
comment: Outstanding service! Where do I begin! Me and a friend were greeted by a lovely young man, but saying that everyone was lovely! All the staff were so nice and kind and genuine! If I can start there before I even mention the food! Service was literally gold star service! We ordered a few things from the menu... the food was lovely and tasty! Portions were more than enough and my friend had to ask for a doggie bag as there was so much food left!  We paid the bill! Service didn’t not end there! We were offered complimentary drinks! This place is awesome! Definitely recommend just for the excellent service! An absolute pleasure! Hope to return with my husband! Thank you... all a lovely team of people!

title: New Years Day Awesome Thai
comment: We visited as a couple. Friendly service. Gorgeous authentic Thai food. Green curry. Masaman. Pad Thai.  Warm. Cosy. Dim lighting. Everything you want from a Excellent Thai Restauarant. Complimentary fruit pudding for our first visit. If you can’t find parking. Go to the red lion pub. Have a pre dinner drink. Register and park there.  Lovely place to go whether couples. Family. Friends.  Recommended. 5 *****

title: Highly recommend
comment: The Thai red curry is the best I’ve ever had. It is great value and the staff are lovely! Highly recommend.

title: Awesome experience ; Aweful name
comment: Apart from its Aweful name, everything about this bustling restaurant is 5 star. Delicious cooking - soft shell crab, green curry, various tasty fishy concoctions and lots more to try. A selection of excellent desserts - we loved the panna cotta in kiwi sauce. Swift, friendly and efficient service from the same waitresses we see each time. We are used to paying over three figures for two in Barnes’ fancy restaurants. Here - under 50 quid. So great value as well.

title: Fiona
comment: What a lovely experience. One that never lets you down. The family owned restaurant go out of their way to look after you. The food is delicious. I can’t Awesome Thai more.

title: What’s not to like?
comment: Tasty, high quality food, great service and low prices. What’s not to like? We’d forgotten how much we’d enjoyed this neighbourhood Thai the last time we visited a year or so ago. This occasion reminded us and we won’t leave it another year again before we are back.

title: Awesome service!
comment: Pre booked for small birthday celebration. Table was confirmed on the day also which was handy as I never took note of the time. Although small inside they made space for group and baby who was sleeping. Food great ! Service amazing 2nd to none in hosting , didn’t manage to get many pics but they did make surprise for me , which was really nice ☺️

title: Superb Thai Food
comment: This has been a neighbourhood favourite for several years and never disappoints. The flavours and food are excellent, I cannot recommend highly enough. Service is always with a smile too.

title: Been before, will definitely go again.
comment: Great food. Friendly service. They even provided a birthday cake platter with my name on it! We were a party of 6 and everyone loved it. I definitely recommend this restaurant!

title: Ms
comment: Great Restaurant. Took great care to explain gluten-free options which were important to me. Also told me that a friend of mine who is allergic to pepper could also be catered for.

title: Let Down
comment: I have eaten at this restaurant a couple of times and I enjoyed my experience. Takeaway was a different story. The Pizza was so doughy and I would class it as below average. shame as it used to be good.

title: Love it
comment: I love this place, the food is always outstanding and staff is adorable. We come here often, but recently we are doing lots of take away and is always spot on.

title: A really nice meal
comment: We had a really nice meal. The staff were friendly and there was a convivial atmosphere. The food was well presented and very tasty. We will certainly use this restaurant again.

title: Really lovely evenibg
comment: I visited with my parents at the beginning of September on their wedding anniversary. It was a delicious meal, my Mother had arranging and the seafood pizza, it was amazing, my mum was a bit wary of the seafood but sh really enjoyed all of it. My dad had gluten free pasta and I also had pasta, the food was hot, really tasty and the service was excellent. The staff were good fun, polite and always ready to bring water. It was a lovely relaxed evening and I will definitely be going back.

title: I was there for my wedding
comment: I was there for my wedding anniversary with my husband. As an Italian I can guarantee is a very nice and tasty Italian restaurant. Cozy, Maurizio is the most nice owner you can find. Food is really nice, true Italian traditional recipes. Book well in advance if you want to go there for dinner.

title: Mom & Pop Italian done right!
comment: If you are after a Mom & Pop Italian with great food and friendly service, La Dolce Vita is the place to go. The pizzas were light, fresh and tasty. The pastas were oh-so tasty and perfectly cooked. And as for the lemon tart... heaven sent! There was a buzzy, friendly atmosphere and I took it as a good sign that so many of the diners were greeted by name. We will definitely be coming here again.

title: Always good
comment: I will never get bored of this restaurant, everything is excelent from start țo finish..see you NexT Weekend

title: Lovely friendly cheerful atmosphere and great food
comment: Lovely friendly cheerful atmosphere. The staff went out of their way to make sue you had a good time. The food was the best I've tasted in years

title: Roberto P
comment: I know "La dolce vita" restaurant since long time. And today after a long time I came to eat at the restaurant but nothing has changed. Maurizio and his staff always offer a fantastic atmosphere and also the food is at high standard. I had Pappardelle al ragù and all my friends who came enjoyed both the food and outdoor area. Highly reccomended

title: Coeliac/Allergy friendly
comment: First time trying Citi Kitchen in Orpington this weekend, after hearing about it from family. As a member of the family has Coeliac Disease it can be difficult for us to find a decent take away restaurant that fully understands the severity of food allergies and the issues of cross contamination. Kiran was very helpful and advised on which dishes were safe and which were not suitable. Thoroughly enjoyed our meal and will be returning again soon. Thank you!

title: We really enjoyed this Indian
comment: We had been recommended the restaurant by a friend and it did not disappoint. Although a 20 minute drive away, it was well worth it. The korma was rich and creamy, the paneer tikka masala was spicier than expected but excellent, and the Chicken 65 was so authentic - it took me back in time to when I lived in South India. This restaurant/take away is excellent authentic quality. Definitely worth trying out.

title: Best Indian I've had
comment: Our family always order from here, sometimes multiple times a week, and it has become our go-to for Indian food. All the dishes I've tried here (which have been a fair few now) have been delicious, made with quality ingredients, and have been very clean, not like some Indian restaurants where you don't feel so good after eating there. Absolutely highly recommended!!

title: Best Indian Restaurant in London
comment: One of the best in London for Indian dishes. Hyderabadi Lamb Biriyani and any manchurian dishes are awesome in particular. Must have in you are an Indian in London. Value for money, both in quality and quantity.

title: Best local authentic indian takeaway
comment: Ordered a takeaway for the first time from Citi Kitchen based on the reviews. Wow! My wife and I were not disappointed. I've tried curries in Southall and Wembley on many occasions, so had high expectations. It exceeded those expectations. The food is absolutely amazing and tasty. Most importantly authentic and good portion sizes as well. Finally found our local go to indian takeaway. Compliments to the chef and the prompt delivery service.

title: Amazing Indian cuisine
